1a[1]1(gzungs 'dus): de ltar 'jom pa'i yon dag 'khar bcas kyis// ka gros dam pa'i rdo spa rab mdzangs nas// ming du dod pa yun tsun rgyal mtshan mgon dang // yon dag mo yang phyug sgron pho mo gnyis
1a[1]2(gzungs 'dus): kyis// dge ba dmigs can dmigs med mdzad pa dang // khyad par mi rtag mchi ba dran pa dang // bsags pa'i nor la snying po klang phyir du// ka'i snying po mdo mangs rgyas pa zhengs pa ngo ma
1a[1]3(gzungs 'dus): med mangs 'di la mdo sna rgya dang nye ga ma sum bcu zhugs// dkon mchog sngon gyis u khu a ne rnams kyi zhabs teg yin zhen mdzod// / kye ho// 'jam dbyangs gser mdog can la byog
1a[1]4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// bong du ka kha suM bcur bsgyur pa 'di// sngon dus mkhas pa khyung po ga yu dzi rgyu mi du mkhas pa sbal dang rnga pa dang // ring sang mkhas/ 'buM dpal zhabs la 'dud// ring sa dus
1a[1]5(gzungs 'dus): kyi glegs baM mdo mangs 'di// snong na rgya skad nyi ma shar 'dra dang // bar na kha gad+ha rma khA bcan chos 'dra dang // sle ma rgyas 'dra 'di// rig pa'i 'byung gnas ban tshad sngar sbrengs nas// dkon
1a[1]6(gzungs 'dus): mchog sgrub pa dag gis legs par bkod dge'o// ma~MmaM/ rdzu sr-i las skar
1a[1]7(gzungs 'dus): dngos ga kya 'a
1b[1]1(gzungs 'dus): ma la myodu ya yil me'i
1b[1]2(gzungs 'dus): da so kya pa kho so ya 'i
1b[1]3(gzungs 'dus): bya byar nga 'ir babya rgya na
1b[1]4(gzungs 'dus): yang kyir ma bya yo
1b[1]5(gzungs 'dus): ma m+bi yi
1'b1(gzungs 'dus): nan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
2a1(gzungs 'dus): bri/ bla na med pa// lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa / sangs rgyas bcom
2a2(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das te// de bzhin gshegs kyi da bsod rnams dag gi rgyu 'thun pa/ dag
2a3(gzungs 'dus): bu rnams chud mi dang / bzod pas brgyan pa/ bsod nams kyi ga
2a4(gzungs 'dus): byad bzang po rnams kyis sbas bka mtshan rnams kyis mi dod rgyas
2b1(gzungs 'dus): par 'thun pa/ mthong na mi 'thun pa med pa// dad pas mos pa rnams la mngon par dag/ 
2b2(gzungs 'dus): ba shes rab zil gyis mi non pa// stobs rnams kyis rdzi ba med pa// sems can thams
2b3(gzungs 'dus): kyi ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/ 'phags pa gang zag rnams kyi rgyal
2b4(gzungs 'dus): kho ma ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon// ye shes dpag du med pa
3a1(gzungs 'dus): spongs pa bsam byis mi khyab pa/ gsung rnam par dag pa// gsung gdangs snyan
3a2(gzungs 'dus): su byad blta bas mchog migs pa/ su mtshus pa med pa/ 'dod pa dag gis mgos
3a3(gzungs 'dus): gzugs dag gis nye bar ma gos pa// gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa// phung po dag las
3a4(gzungs 'dus): ra durnas par grol / khams rnams pa dang ldan pa skyem ched rnams
3b1(gzungs 'dus): mdud pa rnams shin du bcad pa/ yongs su gdung ba dag las rnam par grol ba// srid pa las
3b2(gzungs 'dus): su grol ba/ chu bo las gal ba// ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // 
3b3(gzungs 'dus): pa// yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang
3b4(gzungs 'dus): dag pa rnams so// 'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du// d+harma aH
4a1(gzungs 'dus): ti byed skad du/ ches rjes su dran pa/ dkag gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di ltar
4a2(gzungs 'dus): dam pa'i chos ni thog mar dge ba bar du dge tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po
4a3(gzungs 'dus): ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa/ yongs su bab/ yongs su dkar ba/ tshangs par spyod pa zhal
4a4(gzungs 'dus): nas gsungs pa mnyam par 'thong ba/ nad mod pa dus chad pa med pa/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro ba
4a5(gzungs 'dus): mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa// 'di 'thong ba don yod pa// mkhas pa rnams kyis rig par bya
4b1(gzungs 'dus): kha yin no// dam pa'i chos ni zab pa zab par snang ba// zhi ba zhi bar ston pa/ sdong pa sems can med pa
4b2(gzungs 'dus): spros pa med pa/ spros pa dang bral ba/ spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba yin no// zhes rnam par yid la bya'o// 
4b3(gzungs 'dus): rjes su dun g+sa s+ho/ kle/ sa m+b+ha sa hU~M/ bad smra du/ non
4b4(gzungs 'dus): su dran pa/ dkon mchog sum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar 'bigs pa'i dge 'dun ni// / legs par
4b5(gzungs 'dus): bzhugs pa/ rig par bzhugs pa// drang por bzhugs pa/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun par bzhugs pa// chos kyi rjes
4b6(gzungs 'dus): su 'thun par skye ba'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang // gang zag ya brgyad yin no// gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam
5a1(gzungs 'dus): par grol ba'i phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / de shes ba dang // mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa yin no// 
5a2(gzungs 'dus): gzhan yang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni/ phyag 'ba'i 'os su gyur pa// thal mo sbyar ba'i 'os su gyur ba// sbyin pa'i 'os su
5a3(gzungs 'dus): gyur pa ka/ bsod nams kyi zhing yon tan yongs su sbyong ba che na po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon gnas yon no// 
5a4(gzungs 'dus): par yid la bya'o// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom
5a5(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das bye rgod phung po'i ri las/ rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen por gshegs pa'i shul phyogs su// dge slong nyis brgyan
5a6(gzungs 'dus): bcus zhus po bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyad kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal ba
5b1(gzungs 'dus): slong dag phung po 'di la skye ba yong gis 'chi/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang po che/ brtsog pa'i skye gnas sdug bsnga
5b2(gzungs 'dus): ji snyed myong // 'byung ba'i tshwa srog mig grangs snyam byed/ lcags cheng rgyal nas ngan sreng sgrog byung nas// tsher ma'i drong khung nang
5b3(gzungs 'dus): du myur snyam byed// skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i blugs med do// phung po 'di la rgas pa yang gis 'chi// mgo bos
5b4(gzungs 'dus): sgo gyi ngan so yang med// mig gis mi 'tho rna pas ma thosashing // 'gro yang mi nus rga lag 'khyams te 'a
5b5(gzungs 'dus): khyim mdzes byis pa rnams kyi sngags mor rung // dgas pa'i sdug bsngal 'dir la bzod pa'i blags med do// phung po 'di la
5b6(gzungs 'dus): no nga yongs gos 'chi// shau la mi bdang gtar ka dbugs bral byed/ sman gyi khu ba kha la rang bzhin dung dkar yang / 'chi
5b7(gzungs 'dus): bas dogs te dbang med pa rnags te mthung / na ba'i sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i blags med do// gang zhig gnyen sdug
6a1(gzungs 'dus): ngag dang rtag tu 'dril 'gyur zhing / dgra sdang dag dang rtag tu 'phreng 'gyur ba/ sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i brags med
6a2(gzungs 'dus): do/ phyug po nor mi thub pa'i sdug bsngal ni/ bdag nyid shi nas gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur/ bu tsha bran du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal na
6a3(gzungs 'dus): bdag nyid shi nas gzhan gyis bkol bur 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'di la bzod pa'i blags med do// dbang po las kyis
6a4(gzungs 'dus): 'brel ba'i sems can rnams/ dam du bcings te so'i 'og tu sbas// rul sungs mugs skams thal bar song ba'o// 
6a5(gzungs 'dus): brgya 'bod sngo 'dod rna bas ga la thos// bye bral du smre 'di la bzod pa'i brags med do// phung po 'di la 'chi ba yong gis 'chi// 
6a6(gzungs 'dus): phyogs bzhi nas rde nga ji bzhin du/ de la bskur med de la gso ru med/ gshed mu ra wAr 'bod cing snying bcu srog gcod ltar/ 
6a7(gzungs 'dus): gnyen sdug byams pas snying gdugs 'o byas kyang // de la bad pa'i dngos po ci yang med// sdug bsngal nyini ngo nas shi ba mi zad
6b1(gzungs 'dus): shi las thar pa'i sems can 'ga' yang med// de'i phyir na gzugs la ma chags shig/ phung po 'di la chags pa gang yin pa// sdug bsngal 'di brgyad dang du len
6b2(gzungs 'dus): pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul po// dge slong rnams kyis slar zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'di brgyad las ji ltar bgyis na thar
6b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' btsal pa/ dge slong dag sdug bsngal 'di brgyad dag ru mthong na/ bsrung ba'i tshul khrims dag cing gtsang bar gyis/ 
6b4(gzungs 'dus): gsung rabs mthong ba brgya cher bar ma bcad// sdig pa byung bar 'dod na mdol 'thol gshags kyi/ 'on kyang bla med byang chub thob pa'i rgyu ru
6b5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces bka' basprul nas/ dge slong de dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
6b6(gzungs 'dus): mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa sdug bsngal brgyad sbyong zhes bya ba/ thegs pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur
6b7(gzungs 'dus): ga tA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gyur pa ni thams cad la// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa
6b8(gzungs 'dus): gnyis mnga'// rdzogs sangs rgyas grags ldan pa'i/ rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs bya gang du rnam pa dang / gong du byang
7a1(gzungs 'dus): la reg dang // zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang // bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang // 'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa/ 
7a2(gzungs 'dus): dang // seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi// gnas de la ni bdag cag 'tshal// steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam su yang // skur bcas
7a3(gzungs 'dus): sku ni med pa yi// mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pa shA ra dang ni// byang gi phyogs shar zhug pa yi/ rgyal ba snyen dka' zhes bya ba// des de tshags
7a4(gzungs 'dus): bcod 'di gsungs so// gang gis tshogs bcad 'di bzhi yis// de bzhin gshegs la stong byed na// bsko/ shel pa bye ba stong du yang // de ni ngan 'gror 'a
7a5(gzungs 'dus): mi 'gyur// tshogs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar bAdzA ba ra mi to/ asta sha ska ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma shes rab kyi
7a6(gzungs 'dus): pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshon rtsa brgyad pa// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'das dang ma byon da lta'i gyi// rgyal ba gang lags kun rgyu
7a7(gzungs 'dus): yum ni dag ma khyod ni lags ste// khyod ni lha mi rgyal ba'i sras// rang bzhin mod pa'i rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas yum 'gyur de'i mtshan// dge ba bdag
7a8(gzungs 'dus): brjod par bgyi// 'byor pas 'dod pas mnyan par gyis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang // lam gyi rnam par shes
7b1(gzungs 'dus): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang // gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / sa
7b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / de kho na nyid dang / yang dag pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang / stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dngos med pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang
7b3(gzungs 'dus): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / chos
7b4(gzungs 'dus): kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid dang // ngo bo nyid bdag med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyi// dang / srog med pa nyid dang / gso ba med pa
7b5(gzungs 'dus): nyid dang / skyes bu med pa nyid dang / gang zag med pa nyid dang brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes
7b6(gzungs 'dus): pa dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa nyid pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / bdag gi med pa dang / rgyags pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / spros pa dang / 
7b7(gzungs 'dus): bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang / byang chub sems dpa' thas
7b8(gzungs 'dus): cad bskyed pa dang / nyan thos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskrun pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs
8a1(gzungs 'dus): zad mi shes pa bsags pa dang / ye shes 'bar ba dang / rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang // lha'i rna ba rab tu dang mdzad pa dang // 
8a2(gzungs 'dus): pha rol/ sems shes par mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran par mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad
8a3(gzungs 'dus): zad par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i brtsang ba dang / brtsegs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
8a4(gzungs 'dus): gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang / dbang / kho sbyong bar mdzad pa dang // stobs mdzad pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med/ ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi
8a5(gzungs 'dus): po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
8a6(gzungs 'dus): 'jug pa dgu brton pa dang / dbang bcu bsgrub pa dang / sa bcu la gnas par mdzad pa dang / stobs bcu yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang // cung zad med pa'i skye mched cus
8a7(gzungs 'dus): mdzes par byas dang / shes pa bcu bsgrub pa dang / bag la nyal ba bcu'i ngag 'jig par mdzad pa dang / bsam gtan rnams bsgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
8a8(gzungs 'dus): khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang / shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa
8b1(gzungs 'dus): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
8b2(gzungs 'dus): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thad
8b3(gzungs 'dus): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po me/ 
8b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung ba dang // ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag/ pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa/ 
8b5(gzungs 'dus): dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams pa bsgom pa dang / rab tu rtag par bya ba ma
8b6(gzungs 'dus): yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang / gzhi med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang / 
8b7(gzungs 'dus): thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gnyis med pa dang / gnyis med pa ma yin pa dang / blo 'jug pa rnam par
8b8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / gnyen po med pa dang / ma gos pa dang / nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba yod pa dang / med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i cho
9a1(gzungs 'dus): nyid dang / 'gal me bskor ba 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do// su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya bcwa brgyad pa 'don
9a2(gzungs 'dus): pa de/ ngan song thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rtag par
9a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang bskyed pa byed par 'gyur ro// de'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang rtag par rgyun du dran par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma
9a4(gzungs 'dus): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin ma la mos pa la dbyams ma/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma/ de bzhinagashegs pa tha~Md kyi ye shes kyis rnam pa
9a5(gzungs 'dus): mkhyen pa nyid// sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMs dpa' thaMd kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ prad nye brad nye/ ma hA prang nye/ prad nye a
9a6(gzungs 'dus): ba bo sde brang nya a lo ka kA re/ oMd nyan pa dmi ni/ sid de su med do// sid dman po gangatis rang / ga ba tis rang gsun da ri b+ha ga pa ti ba sa le/ bras
9a7(gzungs 'dus): re ta ha ste/ sa ma shA sa gA ri/ ti shwA ti shwA/ kam pa kam pa/ tsa la tsA la/ ba ra ba ra/ gardza gardza/ a gardza a gardza/ bA ga ba di/ man ma bi lam pa swA hA// / she
9a8(gzungs 'dus): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'bum phrag bzung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na de'i las spri po thams
9b1(gzungs 'dus): byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran par dang / yid bzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
9b2(gzungs 'dus): kyis chos ma lus par bzung bar 'gyur ro// gos ngo sngags dang / rigs sngagaso thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran par 'gyu ro yid
9b3(gzungs 'dus): bzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzog s+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 
9b4(gzungs 'dus): oM a~M kha mu khi/ d+hi mu khI dr-i mu/ Shi swA hA// de bani gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gon cig po// thams cad
9b5(gzungs 'dus): mkhyen pa thub pa che// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad gus par badz+rod// bkra shis kun gi bkra shes pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab 'a
9b6(gzungs 'dus): pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba po// ston pa la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa po// lus can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa// shin du bde ba sbyin
9b7(gzungs 'dus): pa po/ zla ba mdzes pa bdag phyag 'tshal// bkra shis thams cad yang dag rdzogs// sen kun gyi thugs rje ba// sems can kun gyi 'gon po mchog/ thams cad mkhyen
9b8(gzungs 'dus): la bdag phyag 'tshal// rig pa thams cad legs sgrub pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rtogs pa'o// gnod pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// don grub kun la phyag 'tshan// 
10a1(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'gro ba'i gnyen// lha'i lha la bstod pa yi// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mchog tu dga' ba bdag nyid bshad// don kun
10a2(gzungs 'dus): grub pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// shAkya'i skyes mchog thams cad mkhyen// chos kun dbang phyug brtan pa'o// drang srong chen po yon tad mtsho// dgra bcom bde gshegs
10a3(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin ga shegs// bcom ldan 'jig rten kun mkhyen pa// rgyas pa dring kun las 'dis// chos kyi snang ba mdzad pa'i mchog/ 'jig med shAkya bas kyang / 
10a4(gzungs 'dus): bu ram shing ba'i rigs dga' bye/ kuru mi s+ho nyi ma'i rigs// thu dang la nyi ma'i rgyu dag go/ 'jig rten mngon po stobs bcur ldan// bdung
10a5(gzungs 'dus): de bung nyes par 'joms pa po// nyes srings shing dug 'joms pa// mi 'dul kha lo bza po pa// rig pa grol ba mun sel ge/ zhi zhing
10a6(gzungs 'dus): dul ba dbang po thul/ tshul khrims rnam dag dri ma med// 'dod chags dral zhing ser sna med/ dpag tu med cing 'jigs med brnyes ni/ chos kyi mchog dang
10a7(gzungs 'dus): ldan pa po// mtha' yas dpe med gsung ldan pa// bsam gyis mi khyab ya mtshan skabs// 'jig rten gsum mkhyen gsu rig pa// dus gsum mkhyen gyi
10a8(gzungs 'dus): nyes gsum 'joms// cho 'phrul gsum dang ldan pa po// phung po gsum gyi lung ston pa// brtson pa brtsod med rims med pa// bdag phyi med cing nga rgyal me
10b1(gzungs 'dus): tsher ma med cing spros pa med// 'jigs med kha na tho med/ dpa' bo mchog sbyin mchog don 'os// smra ba'i seng ge smra ba'i mchog/ rnam par dul zhing nyon mongs bral
10b2(gzungs 'dus): ngag bdag nyid rnam par 'dren// rig dang zhabs su ldan pa po// khyab bdag kun dag rnam par mdzes/ sems dul dri ma mi mnga' ba// rdul dang bral ba rig pa'i mchog zhi
10b3(gzungs 'dus): bar mdzad cing sdig pa zhe// bsil bar mdzad cing shes par mdzad// ston pa 'gro ba'i skyabs 'os pa// dpa' bo dag pa snyes mi mnga'// yang dag mtshan rdzogs
10b4(gzungs 'dus): dpal dang ldan// myig mkhan zug rngu 'byin pa'o// shAkya seng ge dge sbyong dbang // dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// sangs rgyas chos drug dri mam
10b5(gzungs 'dus): pa'i bdag/ mngon shes drug drang ldan po'i mchog/ go drug brgya mtsho pha rol gshegs// rang byung bde gshegs grub pa po// 'jig rten kun las
10b6(gzungs 'dus): dges par phan// shes rab mi mnyam mnyam par gzhag/ ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu 'du// sems can kun kyi phan pa tshal// bden pa gsungs cing dbang po bsngos
10b7(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten kun la dge ba po// sems can snying por kun gzigs pa// 'khor ba'i dgon las dgal ba po// de grongs pa thams cad rdzogs 'gyur ba// dbang ldan
10b8(gzungs 'dus): yul las rnam par rgyal// bden pa bzhi ni ba rab ston pa// pha rol gshegs shing sgrol ba'i mgon// 'dren pa shin du mya ngan 'das// bram ze tshangs pa
11a1(gzungs 'dus): thu btsun/ gtso mo bde/ mdzad pade ldan pa/ srung mdzad nam rgyal bdag nyid che// rnam grangs 'jig rten ni bar mdzad// sems can kun la pham 'o// 
11a2(gzungs 'dus): dpa' kun gyi dam pa lags// 'jig rten mchod nas 'jig rten mkhyen// 'jig rten snang mdzad legs mdzad pa// rnyes ldan 'jig rten bya ba lags ka 'jig
11a3(gzungs 'dus): chen 'das pa'i lam du gshegs// chos kyi mnga' bdag chos kyi rgyal// ded dpon legs par 'od mdzad pa// rkang gnyis rga rtse'i skyob pa po// bzod par bzung zhing
11a4(gzungs 'dus): bzod pUr ldan/ gzugs bzang blo bar+d+ha zhi bste// ngang tshul bzang zhing bde ba sprid// 'dza'o bzang po gser mdog can// rab bzung tshul ba
11a5(gzungs 'dus): dge ba sbyin// sangs rgyas dpal chen mi seng ge// dpa'i gcig pu mun sel go/ 'joms pa med pa 'gro ba'i skyabs// rgyal ba bla ma mi mnyam mnyam
11a6(gzungs 'dus): zhabs las grol cing sred pa srel// mi yi skyes mchog nga rgyal bcom// spyan dang ldan pa kun tu spyan// mi rnams dmigs te gsung gi mchog/ mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam
11a7(gzungs 'dus): pa 'di/ rtag tu gang zhig klog byed pa/ de ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las dag la// go 'phangs mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// de phyir rtag rab bsgrims te// nang par langs
11a8(gzungs 'dus): nas mkhas pa dag/ brjod dam yang na mnyan pa'am// yang na yid la byed yang rung // rgyal ba'i mtshan stong dge 'an// bkra shis bsod nams mchog tu 'gyur/ 
11b1(gzungs 'dus): byed sdig pa sel ba ste// don kun grub paskrun pa yin/ sdig pa kun las rab tu grol/ sdug bsngal kun dang 'jigs las grol// nyon mongs kun nas rnam grol ma
11b2(gzungs 'dus): rgyas nyid ni bde ba thob/ de ltar bdag gis thub pa yi// yon ngan mtshan tsam pastsogs pa yis// dge ba rgya chen yang dag smos pa gang yin pa// 'di las 'jig rten lha yul
11b3(gzungs 'dus): dang ni sa stengs su// de rnams thob nas bde ba mchog gi sangs rgyas spyon// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rgya tsa brgyad pa rdzog s+ho// @#// rgya gar+ya skad du/ 
11b4(gzungs 'dus): ar+ya kA na mu khI na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// 'jam dpagazhon nur gyur pa phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag
11b5(gzungs 'dus): gisah+la'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams gtsang ma'i steng / na mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu phye bas sbas
11b6(gzungs 'dus): pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gas grangs med pa dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' bstsal
11b7(gzungs 'dus): pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'gro ba la phan pa bde ba'i phyir// sgo drug pa zhes bye ba'i gzungs zung shig/ de ni 'di ltar ste/ 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i skye gnas gzhan dag tu
11b8(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba de sems can mnyam pa nyid du/ mi shes pa'i mtshan nyid can du ma gyur cig/ bdag gis 'jig rten pa'i bde ba ci phun sum tshogs
12a1(gzungs 'dus): bde ba gang myong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongasu spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las/ gang ci byas pa des sor gshegs/ 
12a2(gzungs 'dus): pa/ bla na med par so sor ma gshags par ma gyur cig/ bdag gis bdud kyi las gong ci bgyis pa de yongs su shes pa bla na med pas yongs su ma shes par ma gyur cig/ bdag
12a3(gzungs 'dus): gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang rung // gang yod pa de bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bur gyur cig/ bdag
12a4(gzungs 'dus): gi rnam par grol ba gang ci yod pa des sems can thams cad rnam par thar par gyur cig/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par ma gyur cig// tad+ya nA
12a5(gzungs 'dus): k+Sha mi grA mi/ k+Shan te klan te/ da me da m+me/ ngan te dan te/ b+ha dre b+ha pre/ su b+ha dwe su b+harbe/ tsan dre tsan dwe/ su tsan dr-i su tsan dwe/ tsa na kra ki rin/ tsan dra ba ti te tsau/ be
12a6(gzungs 'dus): d+harma ba ti pra hA ba ti/ sarbaR+ShA sa d+ha ni/ sarba a nur thA pra sha ma naM/ pa mo ra b+h+r-i sa d+ha nI/ ka yASh+TaM sho d+h+r-i ni// bag dz+hi sha d+ha naM/ na ma sam sho d+ha ni sAr+the// rigs
12a7(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu dag de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sgo drug pa zhes bya ba'o gzungs 'di ldan gsum mtshan lan gsum blagase nA/ de'i las
12a8(gzungs 'dus): kyai bsgrib pa thams cad byang nas/ bskye ba bdun gyi bar du des ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur// bcoM ldan
12b1(gzungs 'dus): dges shing de skad ces bka' bstsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / lha dang me dang lha ma yin dang dri zar ba'i 'jig rten yid rangs te// 'a
12b2(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa sgo drug pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA ba lo ki te sha ra ma tan/ na ma d+hA rA ni/ 
12b3(gzungs 'dus): bod skad du// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
12b4(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyer yongs pa can na/ 'khor chen po/ yangs cing // mdun gyis lngas nAs bzhugs te/ nyan
12b5(gzungs 'dus): thos chen po sha ri'i bu la sogs pa/ dge slong lnga rgya dang byams po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu bskor cing ka medun gyis lha
12b6(gzungs 'dus): nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdan bshams pa la bzhug so// 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba 'dug ste/ 'dug par
12b7(gzungs 'dus): ba de rang gi stan las langs te/ rmA sa zag pa cig du nas/ lus mi gsasmra pa'i ljangs kyu gtsugs te/ bcom ldanA 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'am
12b8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi bzhi/ rigs sngags kyi bzhi 'das pa
13a1(gzungs 'dus): mabyon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sngon gsungs sh-ing da lta gsung bye/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur
13a2(gzungs 'dus): byang chub yong so tshol na sems can thams cad yongasu bzung ba'i don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi bar gyi phyir sngon gsungs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i
13a3(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi bar gyur pa/ mar gyur pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mtshan
13a4(gzungs 'dus): gyun pa dang / sgrib pa rnams cad ba 'gyung ba mchis te/ gdus dungs ma thag rngubs pa rnams cad yongs rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ga sngags pa
13a5(gzungs 'dus): cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka bstsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga sngon byeng chub sems dper gyur te/ byang chub // 
13a6(gzungs 'dus): su tshol ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi pha rol kyi yid pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba/ 
13a7(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos ston no// 'khor de nyid na bram ze dbang phyug 'ong
13a8(gzungs 'dus): ces bya ba// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa thob par gyur pa zhig 'jug pa des/ spun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
13b1(gzungs 'dus): 'di bram ze brgya stong mang po dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la skyugs/ bshad bstan te// de dag thams cad kyis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sdig pa ldu
13b2(gzungs 'dus): bar byed pa/ thams cad las rnam par grol bar gyur pa dang / skyo ba dran pa 'gyur ba ngas bran do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smros shig/ 
13b3(gzungs 'dus): ma'i dus na 'jig rten gyis khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du/ sems can sdig pa byed pa/ mtshoms med pa byed pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i sdig
13b4(gzungs 'dus): pa zad pa dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du/ gyur ro// ngas kyang gnang zhing rjesu yid rang ngo // bcom
13b5(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes
13b6(gzungs 'dus): bye ba'i gzungs kyi rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag smras so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag sde/ 
13b7(gzungs 'dus): l-i phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag lo// de dag la phyag btsal nas/ 
13b8(gzungs 'dus): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rig sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag brjod par bya'o// bdag la rig pa 'di grub par gyur cig/ dad+ya/ 
14a1(gzungs 'dus): I laM mi li/ tsi le mi le/ kun du le kun du le/ bu le si re/ sI si re/ baM sI re/ si ra ya/ bi sa rA/ go'u re gan d+ha re/ dra mi rdi/ ma tang gi/ bug ka si/ kA ta ya/ 
14a2(gzungs 'dus): ma la tsan ta li/ hung nga mi la ni/ dud Te Tu mi len rtso maM mi lai/ br-i tA se'u mya ngar sha Ne/ ku ru tsan tra mu khyi la/ g+hur ma ni ya ma d+he/ ar+ya k+Shi na d+hu dzi/ sa la byaM d+yan ma
14a3(gzungs 'dus): pra sA d+ha ne/ sad+ha b+hi r+yan pa/ e sha ri swahA/ klags pas grub pa'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin to// thos ma thag tu las kyi sgrib pa thang byang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa
14a4(gzungs 'dus): thams cad las bsrung ngo // dus gsum du bzlas pa byas nA ni/ zhag bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po kun du bzang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
14a5(gzungs 'dus): gzhan du mi sems pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba gcig gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma rig pa chen po'i bdag nyid ston te/ 'phags
14a6(gzungs 'dus): pa 'od dpag med kyang mthong ngo // byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// skye bo dran pa dang / thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du yang skye ba de dang der ngam
14a7(gzungs 'dus): pa'i chos dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// long spyod che bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a8(gzungs 'dus): na po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
14b1(gzungs 'dus): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyu
14b2(gzungs 'dus): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
14b3(gzungs 'dus): snang mdzad rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje chen po dang ldan pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag
14b4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// / dad+yaSh+Ta/ ka la ka la ki li ki lI/ bai ri bi rAts+tsha hu ru hu ru/ tson/ sa na dzo de/ a gad tsa la/ ar+yA au ka
14b5(gzungs 'dus): thA gar dza/ ma hA ko ru naM ka/ pu ra ya a sha/ nA da ri sha ya/ bud ti 'i she wau ni tsi ra tsa ra tsa ra tsar so// kla gas pas 'grub pa ste/ mtshon dngo mi dang chu
14b6(gzungs 'dus): dang / dug dang / sdug sbyar ma dang / byang sde mas dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs pa mi thams cad kyis kyang klags rnyed par mi 'gyu
14b7(gzungs 'dus): dris nas gang bu gzhag pa der/ gnod pa dang / nad mgo ba thams cad mi 'byung // dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bI ti nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyuraro// rnaM bar snang mdzad kyi snying po rdzogas+ho// 
15a1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la byug la sa ma// dge 'dun la phyug 'tshal lo// 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyugag dpung po byang chub sems dpan
15a2(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa'i di 'dzin gyis/ rig pa 'di bdag la grubar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha sa ni pas ni/ tA pa tra pa na
15a3(gzungs 'dus): dza la dza la ni dza la rtsa la ni/ pur pa bayo ga ma nu slar pad ma has+t+ra ye swA hA// / gang gis rig pa 'di grags pa de'i tshe rabs brgya sdang du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'dzas
15a4(gzungs 'dus): nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten tu skye bar 'gyur ro// bde ldan/ gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// bde ldan gyi snying po rdzog s+ho// @#// / dkon mchog gsu
15a5(gzungs 'dus): la phyog 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs bdug bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa mdzad rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa bya / 
15a6(gzungs 'dus): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnam kha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// dAm+mA/ badz+ram bu badz+ram du/ d+h+wa dze shun Na ta pre b+he she/ be ro tsa na/ gar
15a7(gzungs 'dus): dI pan tsen dre ya/ a bo da ni swA hA/ cho ga ni rtag du bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// bdud thams cad dang ngag thams cad
15a8(gzungs 'dus): dang / dgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus byed na/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thad/ 
15b1(gzungs 'dus): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// smon lam ni btab pa bzhin du yang skye bar 'gyuraro// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dag
15b2(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bsgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la
15b3(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti raM/ du ru du ru/ ka lo ka laM/ kai li ki la/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+hi ri b+hai ra/ d+hu ru d+he ru/ b+ha yAM d+ha yA/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karma
15b4(gzungs 'dus): b+hA ra na/ Ni maM krA ya ng+ga ra/ dza la ni b+ha d+hi ni b+he swahA/ ku ru na tsa li swahA/ sa ka ra sa d+ha'i raM sar+tha/ sarbASha ta/ tha b+hU taM/ oM d+ha shwe te swa ha/ gzung sa 'di'i cho ga naM 'di
15b5(gzungs 'dus): yin te/ nang par langs nas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad zlas brjod nas/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig yin pa'i ke las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// gang du skye ba
15b6(gzungs 'dus): 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// de la mig nad 'byung brir mi 'gyur ro// yid kyi lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yid la kyi nyes pa mi 'byung ngo // spyan lnga rnam par dag par
15b7(gzungs 'dus): 'gyuraro// de bzhin du yid dam rnam par dag pa lnga yang thob par 'gyu ro// tshe rabs thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'phrad par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying pa la gnas kyi bar du/ 
15b8(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mthong ba dang / dge 'dun la snyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lus mdzes par 'gyur/ 
16a1(gzungs 'dus): sems dang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bi ma la na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 
16a2(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa dri ma med zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
16a3(gzungs 'dus): po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gos rnam par dag pa la bka' ba stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul
16a4(gzungs 'dus): khrims yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa phan ting / nge 'dzin yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
16a5(gzungs 'dus): su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bzod pa yongasu dge pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gos rnam par dag pa phan pa'i yongs dag pas/ de bzhin ga
16a6(gzungs 'dus): yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dge bas/ dga' rnam par
16a7(gzungs 'dus): dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs dag pas/ rnam par go le ba yongs dag pa dang / rna
16a8(gzungs 'dus): par grol ba'i ye shes yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// blo ges rnam par dag pa/ stobs yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshe mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag pa
16b1(gzungs 'dus): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag no// zla gros rnam par dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs
16b2(gzungs 'dus): yongs su dag ge// blo gros rnam par dgu pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong suM dag bram su nan/ me tog dang phreng ba dang thos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan lasags pa dang
16b3(gzungs 'dus): mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis skye bskrang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mthar yang rdugs par mi nus so// de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum ga po las/ theg pa gang yang
16b4(gzungs 'dus): rung bas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma rdzogs par bsod nams kyi thung ze de'i mtha' ya zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zla gros rnam pa
16b5(gzungs 'dus): dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi chos thams cad tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin ga pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so/ bsam
16b6(gzungs 'dus): byis mi khyad po/ mtshungs pa med de// blangs med do// dpag tu med do/ grangs med do/ dngag gyis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag su zhig/ de bzhin
16b7(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa la bsti stong byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / brjed par byed pa dang / phyi mtshatsha
16b8(gzungs 'dus): dus lnga byas ma la/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'ongs pa'i rang bsrel yungs 'bru tsam lo ste stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mar byed pa dang / mchod pa
17a1(gzungs 'dus): byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i sems nye bar bdag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol pa'i sems bskyed pas/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed
17a2(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / ri mar byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / brjed pa dang / zhe sa'i bu dang / bsngags pa dang / 'anor de byed pa des phan yon par shes par bya ste/ ldog pazhe na/ dran po
17a3(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang // rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba/ 
17a4(gzungs 'dus): dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga/ po de dag du shes par bya'o// des gzhan yang / chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin
17a5(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / 
17a6(gzungs 'dus): myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhir po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhid
17a7(gzungs 'dus): ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi rags kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yid la
17a8(gzungs 'dus): byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'das pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par
17b1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dang bdud kyi rig lha rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rnam par dag pa
17b2(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa bskyod de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lte nga sa la btsugs nas/ 
17b3(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig
17b4(gzungs 'dus): ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nas kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
17b5(gzungs 'dus): rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe nablo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po
17b6(gzungs 'dus): nyid dam/ rgyu byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi
17b7(gzungs 'dus): nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros na
17b8(gzungs 'dus): par dag pa 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med par rtogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i grong khyer du 'jug gam/ rtsug lag khang ngam/ 
18a1(gzungs 'dus): du 'jug kyang rung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgyu yang rung / 'jug kyang rung / gleng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'dzi
18a2(gzungs 'dus): rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ dri 'i dzi 'am/ lha ma yinan pa/ rnam par ldeng ngang/ mi 'tsho gyi dang lha 'phye chen po dang/ maM 'am mi yin nam/ shing ngamatsha
18a3(gzungs 'dus): ri khong bu 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de legs su 'dud pa dang / kun du 'dud pa mi 'byed pa de gang yang med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
18a4(gzungs 'dus): dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang ldan pa la byed pa bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum de dag slong ngas/ grong khye ram grong brdal lam/ yul 'khor ram po brang 'khor ma
18a5(gzungs 'dus): bal sems can rnams 'dud// rab tu 'dud/ kun du 'dun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med la phyag 'tshalo// / a mi ta ma/ te ba
18a6(gzungs 'dus): ma hA pra be/ pra b+hA ba tam/ pra b+hA ba te/ pra b+hA ba tai/ pra b+hA ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+he ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das mthus bstan du gsol/ 
18a7(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu bstan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ ma ti ma ti/ sa ti ma ti ma ti ma ti ma ti ma ti ma ti/ sgra ti smai ti sni tim+b+ha ti skr-i ti s+thi ti smi ti smr-i ti smr-i ti skr-i ti/ mahA skr-i ti/ mahA
18a8(gzungs 'dus): smr-i ti/ ma ha s+yA ti/ mahA m+bu'i mahA tI ma pA smA hi/ ma hA hA ti/ ma hA s+saH/ man+ta s+sa/ ma hA s+yA te/ mahA s+yA te// chags pa mi mnga' ba gti mug gsal du gsol/ so mye/ so mye/ so myen sa mye/ 
18b1(gzungs 'dus): so mye/ se mye so mye/ si sa mye/ so ru sa na yA/ se'u ba na yA/ so'u ma na s+ya mu ba na la/ so 'u ma na/ s+ya mu pa na ya/ so 'u ma na/ s+ya mu pa na yA/ so'u ma na/ s+ya mu pa nA ya/ so 'u ma na/ s+ya mu ba naH
18b2(gzungs 'dus): sa'u ma na// s+yA mu~M pa na ma/ sa ru ma na/ so'u bA na sa/ sno'u ma na/ s+ya mu bAn sa/ shi She shi She ga~M ShI/ shi l+li Sha~M shi Sha~M ki ShI shi Sh+T+r-i shi khI shai khI/ zhi bar 'gyur cig/ dgegs med par gyur
18b3(gzungs 'dus): cig/ pra b+hA ba ni/ ma hA b+hai t+ye/ ra shI ra shrI ra sh+mi ra shI ra shI ra shI raM shr-I ra shrI ra shI ra shI// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan yang bzung bar bya zhing / phyag kyang bya'o// 
18b4(gzungs 'dus): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen zla ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen
18b5(gzungs 'dus): 'khregs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog dang / bcom 'das 'od 'phrod dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa dang / bcom ldan
18b6(gzungs 'dus): 'das 'od dpag med dang / bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das thub dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen
18b7(gzungs 'dus): 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das skar ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bden yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma dang bral ba dang / bcom
18b8(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das zla ba dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das zla 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das dri med 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dkar dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das
19a1(gzungs 'dus): 'od dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' yas dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i
19a2(gzungs 'dus): sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yan lag mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das
19a3(gzungs 'dus): gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta bur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan
19a4(gzungs 'dus): 'das klu'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das me togadang / bcom ldan 'das spos thams cad kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das phreng ba'i rgyal po dang / bcom
19a5(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das dpa' brtan pa'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha srong dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po nor bu rin chen snang dang / bcom ldan 'das dpag
19a6(gzungs 'dus): med gtogs 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra dang / bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung dang / 
19a7(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das snying pos zil gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das rdza ste'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das bzla ba'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das mthu pad ma zil non dang / 
19a8(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das 'jig rten sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das sgra me dang / bcom ldan 'das sgra byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mu khyud dang / bcom ldan 'das rtag tu yongasu
19b1(gzungs 'dus): mya ngan 'das dang / bcom ldan 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sbrul 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab lhar rnam par gnon dang / bcom ldan 'das phyag
19b2(gzungs 'dus): na rin chen mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa'i dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das phyir mi log pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i tshig gi don gyi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das
19b3(gzungs 'dus): kun nas rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag bsnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla sgron ma dang / bcom ldan 'das lhun po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan
19b4(gzungs 'dus): 'das shin du lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab bu'o// t+yeT+Ta/ pa ta pa ta/ dA mA dA ma/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma swAhA/ shar phyogs lobs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
19b5(gzungs 'dus): 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang zhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis bdag 'khor dang / bcas pa la ma nad med pa dang / zhi ba dang nad med
19b6(gzungs 'dus): par mngon du srung du gsol// lha phyogs logs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar srung
19b7(gzungs 'dus): dadugasol// ni ba byigs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dgazhugs pa de dag la phyug 'am / de dag gis kyang bdag la rang med pa dang / zhi bar srung du gas la/ byang phyogs legs
19b8(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar srung du gsol/ 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas
20a1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar srung du gsol/ steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas
20a2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nang med pa dang zhi bar srung du gsol/ phyogs 'tshamus lon na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
20a3(gzungs 'dus): 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshalo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar bsrung du gsol// / tad+ya thA/ bi ma le mi le ge re/ bi ma le sam pa be swAhA/ 
20a4(gzungs 'dus): bi ma le/ bi ma le/ baM ma le/ baM ma le/ bi ma'o/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ma le Shi ma le/ bi ma le// bi ma la ka re/ bi ma la ka re/ bi ma la kra re/ bi ma la ka re/ bi ma la ka re/ 
20a5(gzungs 'dus): mA la ka re/ bi ma la ka re/ bi ma la ka re/ bi ma la ka re/ ba ma la kA re/ bim las mu ga te/ bi ma las mud ga te/ baM ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma las bung ga/ 
20a6(gzungs 'dus): bi ma la sa mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ga te/ baM ma las mud ga te/ bi ma la sa mud ka te/ bi ma las mu ga te// karig sngags 'di ni rigs mye// lha rnams kun kun gyis mchod pa yin
20a7(gzungs 'dus): 'di ni dus gsum brjod byas na// nad rnams la ni yongs su thar// mi ma yin gis gang byas pa/ sdig pa gang byas sbyor byas 'grol// de dag dran pa rjid mi 'gyur// gzung ba rnams kyang chud mi ra// 
20a8(gzungs 'dus): de dag skye ba rnams su yang / rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur// su zhig dri ma med pa'i gzungs 'di dag dga' ba so 'dzin byed pa// zhing rnams kun du rgyu ba dang / dpal ldan pad ma'i snying por
20b1(gzungs 'dus): 'byung // mtshan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyad// yan lag 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyur// t+yathA/ ku tra~M ku tri/ kud tsa lo/ e la e la/ mug ta/ g+ho tha lo/ e ri ma ra/ s+thi ti swAhA/ 
20b2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri ma zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
20b3(gzungs 'dus): yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// #// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sarba
20b4(gzungs 'dus): durga ti pa ri sho d+ha naM/ ub+hiSha dza yA na ma d+ha ra naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yod su sbyong ba gtsug rtor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
20b5(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas lha'i bu shin du brtan pa zhes pa bzhog/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nas chos bza
20b6(gzungs 'dus): lha'i mdun sa na gnas te/ lha'i gzhal med khang chen po na/ lha'i long spyod chen po dang / lha'o bu mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor na se/ rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod do// de lnga'i long skyong
20b7(gzungs 'dus): myong ba nas/ mtshan mo sgra cig thos pa/ lha'i bu shin du brtan pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ de'i tsha ba'i dus byas nas kyang / 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te/ der yang
20b8(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba bdun po myong nas/ sems can dmyal bar skyes par 'gyur ro// rgyal nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang / de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus
21a1(gzungs 'dus): yong du yang 'gyur ro// zhes thos so// de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos pa dang / 'jigs skrag cing spangs te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas// de rings par rings par byed pa rgya byin ga la
21a2(gzungs 'dus): ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te// stabs par smra zhing kying hud ces smre sngags 'don bzhin du// lha'i dbang po rgya byin la 'di skad
21a3(gzungs 'dus): ces smras so// lha'i dbang po rgya byin bdag der bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ lha'i long spyod dga' bas rtsi zhing bde ba myong ba las sgra zhig thos pa// lha'i bu shin du brtan pa bzhag bdun na
21a4(gzungs 'dus): 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du skye par 'gyu ro// der yang 'gro ba bdun myong ba nas// sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// brgya la nan zhig mir skyes
21a5(gzungs 'dus): par gyur na yang / de dbul por 'gyur na zhing / dmus ma tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes thos na/ lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
21a6(gzungs 'dus): gyis lha'i bu shin du brtan pa'i tshig de thos nas// shin du ngo tshar du 'dzin par gyur te/ lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing / de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / 
21a7(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ba bdun po na de dag pu mi gtsang ba zab myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun pa de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du/ e ma lha'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi zad
21a8(gzungs 'dus): pa chen po myong bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rtogs par de ni skabs dang rten dang / dpung gnyen du gyur pa su zhig yod snyam du bsams
21b1(gzungs 'dus): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nub mo de'i srod la spos dang / me tog dang 'dug pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / brgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
21b2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas mchod pa chen po byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ lha'i bu shin du brtan pa'i blo gros kyis 'gro ba 'dun
21b3(gzungs 'dus): po dag bcom ldan 'das la zhing du gsol to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro bdun po de dag gsol ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste/ des phyir
21b4(gzungs 'dus): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas/ snang bar byas te// slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum
21b5(gzungs 'dus): pa mdzad nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhe bya ba'i gzungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang
21b6(gzungs 'dus): bskur ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu sbyong ba las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal bar skye ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye'i gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'dzin
21b7(gzungs 'dus): rten thams cad yongasu sbyong ba des bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod de/ de'i lha'i dbang po de lnga bas na/ gtsug gtor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs/ ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu sbyong ba thos pa/ 
21b8(gzungs 'dus): thag tu/ sgring par 'gyur ba sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs tshe rjes bzhin du/ mang po dag 'dzegs par byed do// skye ba yongasu dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe/ 
22a1(gzungs 'dus): rabs dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten nas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa
22a2(gzungs 'dus): gnyis kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang ba de brjod ma thag tu tshe zad pa'i mi de yang tshe phyir nur pa'i las thob par 'gyur ro// lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las yong su dag pa gsal bar
22a3(gzungs 'dus): bde ba la reg pa gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la gzigs so// de bzhin kyang de la rtag tu rgyun me 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sna ba mdzad par 'gyu
22a4(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par 'gyur ro// brjod pa tsam gyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'dramaskye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / 
22a5(gzungs 'dus): yid btags kyi yul thams cad skyems par byed par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// rnam par sel bar 'gyur/ ro// stongs par 'gyuraro// de ltar de la sangs
22a6(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phye bar 'gyur ro// de gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyuraro// de nas
22a7(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs de bka' bstsal du gsol// sems can rnams kyi srog la san gdags par mdzad du
22a8(gzungs 'dus): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa btab pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di bka' bstsal to// // na mo rang na tra ya yA/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te
22b1(gzungs 'dus): sarba N+De log k+Shu/ prA twaMb+h+raM sha~MSh+Ta ya/ b+hud d+hA ya te na ma/ dwAd+yA Sh+TA/ aM d+h+yed+b+ha b+h+yAM/ shod+d+ha yA sho d+ha yA b+hUM sho d+ha yA/ b+h+r-i sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man tra/ a ba d+ha sa na/ skA ra na g+ha ti ga ga na/ saH
22b2(gzungs 'dus): wa b+hi shudad+hI/ a d+he shin tsa dumaM/ sarbad tha g+ha te/ su ga te pa ra wa~M tsi nau/ a mr-i te/ oM b+hi She kair/ ma ha mu tra/ man tra pa te// a ha ra/ a ha ra/ ma ma a yu sam d+ha ra ni sho d+haH
22b3(gzungs 'dus): sho d+ha mA/ bai shom/ bi sho d+ha mA/ ga gan saM b+ha wa be shud+he/ uSh+NI la bi dza yA/ pa 'i shud d+he swa rAsmai san co dang/ sarba thA ga ta/ a wa lo ki tI/ 'dra par mi pa ri puran
22b4(gzungs 'dus): sarba thA ga d+hA/ ma de da sha b+hU mi pre tiSh+Thi ti/ ta thA ga ta hr-i da yA/ a d+hiSh+Tha te/ mud+he mu dre/ ma hA mu dre/ badz+ra ka yA sa ha tA na pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba karma a la ran
22b5(gzungs 'dus): bi shu d+he/ pra ti ni wA ra ta ya/ ma ma a yur bi shud d+ha sarba te tha ga ti sa ma yA/ oM d+hiSh+NI naM/ a d+hiSh+Tha te/ oM mu ni mu nAM/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni/ bim+bu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti maH
22b6(gzungs 'dus): ma hA ma ti/ ma ma taM su ma ti ta tha bu taM/ ko tr-i pa ri shudap+te/ b+h+r-i s+phu tra yA/ bu d+he shu d+h+we/ he he dza yA/ dza ya/ bi dzi yaM/ bi dzA yA/ sA rA sma rA/ sA ra swa ra/ swa ra ya swa ra ya/ sarba b+hUH
22b7(gzungs 'dus): d+ha/ oM d+haSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Tha te/ shud d+hi shud d+he/ bud+d+he bu d+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+ra su badz+re/ badz+ra gar+b+he/ dza ya ga r+b+he/ badz+ra dza la gar+b+he/ badz+ra dzo b+ha le/ badz+ra sam b+ha 'gro badz+ra badz+ran
22b8(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra b+ha lA du ma ma shir ram/ sarba satwa na maM/ ka ya pa ri shud d+hir/ sarba pus dme/ sarba ga ti pa ri shud d+hi sh+tsa/ sarba ta thA ga tash+tsa ma~M/ sa ya sa man du/ bu d+d+ha bu b+ha si
23a1(gzungs 'dus): d+ha sa dz+ra d+b+ha y+YA kho d+hA yA/ dz+nyA d+ha me do d+hA ya/ bo tsa ya/ mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya/ baM mo tsa ya/ sho d+hA ya/ sho d+hA ya/ sho d+ha ya/ b-i sho d+ha ya/ sa mnaH/ mo tsa
23a2(gzungs 'dus): mo tsa ya/ sa man ta/ ra smai pa raM shud+d+he/ sarba ta tha ga ta hr-i da yA/ a d+h+waM Sh+ThAn/ A d+hiSh+Ti te/ mu d+de mu tro/ ma hA mu tre/ man+ta tA pa te ye swA hA/ oM d+h+waM swA hA// / lha'i dbang po
23a3(gzungs 'dus): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ ngan 'gro thams cad 'joms shing yongasu spong ngo // sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba// bde 'gro'i las
23a4(gzungs 'dus): thams cad du 'gro ba// ngan 'gror ltung bar bya ba na par 'jig par byed pa/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i ltung 'bum phrag bye ba brgya
23a5(gzungs 'dus): rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs/ rje su yid rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag brgyas btab pa ste/ 
23a6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad bde 'gro ra bye ba dang / ngan 'gror ltung bar bya ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsnga
23a7(gzungs 'dus): zhing nyams par gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing bskal pa chung smang
23a8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du gzhag go// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di bzung la// lha'i
23b1(gzungs 'dus): bu shin du brtan pa la bsgrogs shig/ bsgrags nas kyang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun
23b2(gzungs 'dus): chub par bya ba la de sbyor bar gyis shig/ de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dzam bu gleng ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
23b3(gzungs 'dus): 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag khyod la btad do// de'i phyir lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu/ bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa byung
23b4(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// skye ba rnam pa sna tshog su sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yid btags kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi ris
23b5(gzungs 'dus): dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang sbrul po dang / lus sbrul po dang / brjed byed dang / khyi dang rus sde dang / sbrul dang gcan zan dang
23b6(gzungs 'dus): bya khrag dang / sbrang bu dang sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grog skur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs rnams phyis mi skye bar shes par bya'o// gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrad
23b7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigasu skye bar skye ba ni ma gtogs so// de'i rigs chen po 'di lta ste/ bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lnga
23b8(gzungs 'dus): bu 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye'o// zhes nga smra'o// lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus
24a1(gzungs 'dus): byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du/ skye ba yongasu dag pa chen po thob bo// lnga'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/ bkra shis pa
24a2(gzungs 'dus): yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gi phyir// gtsug rtog rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu sbyang ba 'di gzhag go// 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu na
24a3(gzungs 'dus): po che nyi ma'i snying po shis tu dri ma med pa/ na mkha' ltar yongasu dag pa 'od gsal ba'i 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go// lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes
24a4(gzungs 'dus): par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi chu bo'i gser ni shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin du yongasu dag pa/ shin duganyer bshin du sdug pa/ lha'i dbang po de shin du sos
24a5(gzungs 'dus): can de yang shin dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gang ni gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang bye brag tu ni yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / dzi
24a6(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur bar der 'gro ba thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur te/ sems can
24a7(gzungs 'dus): dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger dris te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag par bya/ ri 'thon po 'am/ khang pa 'thun pa 'am/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi thog
24a8(gzungs 'dus): du gzhag par bya'o// lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gi rtse
24b1(gzungs 'dus): mor gnag par byas la mthong ngag de ngang nye bar gnus par gyur na// zhan de'i rna khams phog gas/ de'i nus rlung gis btab pas thog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de dag la sdig pa thams cad na
24b2(gzungs 'dus): 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // son dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yid btags dang / lha ma yin gyi rigs thams cad du mi skye bar rig pa
24b3(gzungs 'dus): bya'o// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// lha'i dbang
24b4(gzungs 'dus): sems mchod pa dang / rim byu kyang me teg dpal/ dang / spos dang me tog dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'angs dang / spos dang 'argyan rnam
24b5(gzungs 'dus): brgyan byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te// gzungs 'di gzhag la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing bskor ba byed blta ci smos te/ lha'i dbang po sems can de ni son chen gyi
24b6(gzungs 'dus): yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o// de chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin
24b7(gzungs 'dus): rje nub mo de'i nam ldongs pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / gos dang / brgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang / bsti bstang byas nas/ des
24b8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la btsugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba la
25a1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang brtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par sems can de'i skad bzhin 'drang zhing kun du bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par dbya'o// ma
25a2(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang de bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa bzo bar bgyi'o// byas pa mi bzo bar mi bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis
25a3(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bka' gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga bzhipa mo dang bgyi ba'i tshul rgyas par
25a4(gzungs 'dus): bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// nyon cig dang / gzungs 'di bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad
25a5(gzungs 'dus): par bya'o// sems can tshe thung nga'i don gyi phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ tshes bcwo lnga zla ba nyal khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma 'gos te/ bsrung ba byas te/ 
25a6(gzungs 'dus): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ des sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe'i phyir nur ro// nad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyuraro// na
25a7(gzungs 'dus): dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du yang gzungs 'di sgra sbags par bya ste/ 
25a8(gzungs 'dus): des na de'i ngan 'gro 'di nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste/ sman pa rnams kyis bye brag tu bye ba de yang de ltar nad de las yongasu thar
25b1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// der ngan 'gro skye bathams cad kyang rgyun da bar 'gyur ro// shaM 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du skye bar 'gyur ro// de cing de'i mangs gyi gnas
25b2(gzungs 'dus): tha ma yin par rig par bya'o// de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pang ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rangs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyu
25b3(gzungs 'dus): sems can sdig pa byed po gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi don dus gzungs 'di yungs dkar la len nyi shu rtsa cig yongasu brjod pa de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi stong
25b4(gzungs 'dus): du gtor na de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ yid btags sam/ de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rma/ 
25b5(gzungs 'dus): su skye bar gyur kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus don 'gro de ga las thar bar 'gyur ro// de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di nyin
25b6(gzungs 'dus): cig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs su mchod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// de tshe ring por 'gyur ro// bde ba myong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu spros pa dang ldan pa
25b7(gzungs 'dus): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyuraro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gyu
25b8(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ro// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'byin 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad
26a1(gzungs 'dus): du yang 'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po thabs ca 'di ni thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur
26a2(gzungs 'dus): de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu shin du brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston pa sgrogs shig/ lho'i dbang po des na zhag
26a3(gzungs 'dus): bdun na/ lha'i bu 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/ de'i gnas su
26a4(gzungs 'dus): phyin nas lha'i bu shin du gtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no// de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun gyi bar du/ nyin drug mtshan drug du gzungs 'di la brtson par byas nas/ de'i thams
26a5(gzungs 'dus): cad kyang phun sum tshogs te/ 'di ltar ste/ ngan 'gro las ni yongasu thar/ bde ba'i lam la yang dag ga che ni ring bar yang dgra gyur/ a la la sangs rgyas a la la chos
26a6(gzungs 'dus): a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ nges 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar 'gyur ro// zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du 'arjod do// 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu
26a7(gzungs 'dus): sbyong ba gtsug rdor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa
26a8(gzungs 'dus): zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thos cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te// 
26b1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyi maH
26b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chung sems dpa' thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rdo rje khro las byung ba/ rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te// mchod pa
26b3(gzungs 'dus): mi shigs pa bden pa bsra ba bton pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad sgeg par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jigs
26b4(gzungs 'dus): par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams
26b5(gzungs 'dus): cad 'jigs par byed pa/ gdon thams cad klag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad las thar bar byed pa 'byung po
26b6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad las byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ gus pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa
26b7(gzungs 'dus): thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa/ thams cad thams cad bsrung ba/ zhi ba rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i
26b8(gzungs 'dus): gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so// na mo rang na tra la yA/ na ma tsaN+Da badz+ra pa na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa da ye/ t+ya thA ma
27a1(gzungs 'dus): na/ can rngog rloT mjog smra su bgrus srung la/ zums kun thun/ blun pa la/ gyun pa dang bzas dam b+ha pA pAng+gA mardzas dAn/ d+ho d+b+ha pa dz+ha d+hag/ 
27a2(gzungs 'dus): d+ha la sam d+hA rmA/ Sh+T+r-isatwAM ga sa~Md+d+himathA/ sad+d+hi mArmAs pan+d+ha nA d-i/ kun kur+pa/ sa kr-ir+pa nA~M/ Ta ra ga rtenan/ b+h+yaHd+d+ha rmA sa m+b+ha t+pa la/ yang g+haT ma~M/ @
27a3(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra badz+ra/ s+pho ta swo ta badz+ra bidz+ra/ ka Te ka Te badz+ra badz+ri/ maT ma Ta badz+ra badz+ra/ ma thA ma thA badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+ra a ta ha sa na la su bidz+ra ye sAn+tu/ he 'u lu ni/ ru phu lu sbyin
27a4(gzungs 'dus): mi li tsu su ku ru ku ru lu/ badz+ra b+hi d+ha ra na ye swA hA/ ki li ki la ya swA hA/ ka Te ka Ta/ ma Ta maH/ ra Ta raT/ mo Ta maT/ pra ma ta na ye swatA/ 
27a5(gzungs 'dus): na tsa ra ni/ ha ra hi ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ri/ ma ra y+ra badz+ra ki li ki la ma swAr+tha/ tshin d+ha chenab+hin b+hin d+he/ mahA ki li ki li ya swahA/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ 
27a6(gzungs 'dus): kr-i ta kro ta/ ki li kI li ya swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsan d+ha ki li ki la ya swahA/ tra sa ma tra sa ya/ dz+dza kI li ki la ya swAtAM/ ha ra he ra badz+ra d+ha ra ye swAhA/ prA ta ra pra haH
27a7(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra pra b+ha na dzA na me sr-ihA/ ma tI sU ra br-idz+r-i/ su ti stai / pra ti sti ra badz+ra/ tri ma hA badz+re/ a pra ti he taM badz+ra/ a mo g+ha badz+ra/ a tra ha ta ya badz+ra/ shi g+h+raM badz+re/ Tu
27a8(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra ye bswa hA/ d+ha ra d+ha raM/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ badz+ra ku lan aM ba ra ta na ye swatAM/ a mu ka ma ra ya phaT/ nam sa man+ta badz+ra na ne/ sarba b+ha le/ a ba ra d+ha ya/ 
27b1(gzungs 'dus): ma hA ba le ka ta b+he/ ta ta le/ a tsa le ma hA la ye/ a ti badz+ra a ti badz+ra/ ma hA b+ha la/ b+he ga ra na/ badz+ra a tsi te/ dza la dza la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ ting g+ha le/ da ha da ha/ te dz+re ba ti
27b2(gzungs 'dus): ti li ti li/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma hA pa pa la/ badz+ra a g+hu shA dzA la ye swa hA/ na mo rad tra ya yA/ na ma tsan Da badz+ra pa na ye/ tad+ya thA/ AM ha ra ha ra badz+ra/ ma thA ma thA badz+ra/ d+hun d+hun
27b3(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra bAts+tsha pA tsa badz+ra/ d+ho rad+ha ra badz+ra/ d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya badz+ra/ d+ha run d+ha ru badz+ra/ tshin d+ha tshinaH badz+ra/ b+hin d+ha b+hin badz+ra/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT swat+ma/ na mo tsan+da badz+ra kro ta ya/ hu
27b4(gzungs 'dus): yuka tiSh+Thi triSh+TaM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a te hUM phaT// sdig pa thams cad bya byas nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ rgyud do// 
27b5(gzungs 'dus): cog gi rtsa ba ste/ dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / che zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / 
27b6(gzungs 'dus): lha rnams brgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / mdza' sdug skyo bo sdang ba dang / bram ze la sogs brtses pa dang / phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin pa dang / nor sgrib pas ni gnod pa dang / 
27b7(gzungs 'dus): ngan mngal nas gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa ni 'phongs pa dang / gza' dang sbyar skar byed sdems dang / mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / mya ngan mngol nas byung ba yi// rmi lam sdig
27b8(gzungs 'dus): pa mthong na yang / de ni rab bkru sa gtsang ma yin/ gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / tra gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ zab mo'i sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ mdo sde dam pa nyan
28a1(gzungs 'dus): par bya/ mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ mdo sde 'di'i gzi brjid kyis// srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi// mi bzad ba'i nad nas kun// de dag thams cad zhi bltar/ tshe dang bsod
28a2(gzungs 'dus): nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang / rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas// shel dang rdo rjen me tog gas// chu'i gser ram yang na naM/ 
28a3(gzungs 'dus): dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung // rtsang ma'i gos kyis bkris shing gang // lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ yang lan grangs rgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje rnam 'joms zlas nas ni// rgyal po rtag
28a4(gzungs 'dus): hu khrus gyis shig/ de skad ces gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad nas lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcwa
28a5(gzungs 'dus): pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// 
28a6(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA ba le kr-i ta sha ra sa ya/ na ma a swA shA ka ra na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gau mtshan brgyad rtsa brgyad da/ sangs rgyas
28a7(gzungs 'dus): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ ri bo po nya la'i
28a8(gzungs 'dus): rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba// rin po che sna tshogs kun du 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhags te// lha dang klung dang gnod
28b1(gzungs 'dus): sbyin dang dr-i za dang lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / maM dang me yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'bum phrag du
28b2(gzungs 'dus): mos/ bcom ldan 'das la bsti bstang du byas// bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/ mchod cing bkur bstir byas// yongasu bskor cing mdun du bltas la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba bar
28b3(gzungs 'dus): dge ba bar du dge ga thar dag pa/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa yong su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o// de nas tshangs
28b4(gzungs 'dus): pa la sogs pas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kyai kye bcom ldan 'das// bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag
28b5(gzungs 'dus): don rjes su brnyes// srid par sbyor ba yongasu zad// yang dag dka'i rnam grol sems// shes rab shin du rnam par grol// glang chen po ni bcang shos po/ sems la dngang
28b6(gzungs 'dus): sgyur thams cad kyi// mchog tu pha rol byin pa thob/ ye shes tshogs ni yongasu rdzogs// srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu dag la// gzhan la phan par mdzad la brtson// thugs rje dang ni 'brel gyi/ 
28b7(gzungs 'dus): thugs / skye dgu kun la rtag tu byams// de la rab brtson byams las 'byung // mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// khams gsum kun
28b8(gzungs 'dus): kyi gnyen gcig po// 'dod chags zhes sdang gti mug med// dri ma gsum ni rab du bsrangs// rigs pa gsum gyi pha rol phyin// rnam ngon par shes pa drug ra kyang rnyes/ n+ya kau ta lA
29a1(gzungs 'dus): chu zheng gag/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus kyang // sku ni rnam pa kun du brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog
29a2(gzungs 'dus): 'dra/ sku tshad cha la dkar po po// rna ba ge gzar gzhon nu ltar// cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog / dbu'i thor gtsug dag dang ldan// thor tsugs mang pos nye bar g.yog// dbu la 'od
29a3(gzungs 'dus): dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro// 'od 'phro 'don gang rab tu 'bar// gser gyi de 'dra grags par khyab// gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la shar ba yi
29a4(gzungs 'dus): nyi ma'i gtsug gtor dag dang ldan// nor bu rin chen 'bad ba yis/ se ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan// sa dag la ni rab tu chen mkhas// pha rol phyin bcu la spyod// tshul khrims ma/ 
29a5(gzungs 'dus): nyams ral pa med// thong ba seng ge 'tshong ba 'dra// u ni 'jam zhing ldem dag can// gzigs shing gshegs pa khyu mchog 'dra// g.yas su la~M byil ba dung yang
29a6(gzungs 'dus): g.yon du 'khyil ba pad me 'dra// dpral ba bzla ba gang ba 'dra// dpral ba'i mgo dbyibs ni rgya yang che/ sprin mtshams par yang yongs ma chad// shangs kyi dbyings kyang cung zad man
29a7(gzungs 'dus): mgur yang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra// dpung mgo dag kyang rab lkug// phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang kya ring // sen mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag gi sor mo rnams kyi ba
29a8(gzungs 'dus): 'brel// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil rnamasal// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu brgyan// snron ka'i pad ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs dngas zhing shangs kyang byas// gsung de tshangs
29b1(gzungs 'dus): pa'i dbyangs ltar zab// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// balka na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad ma las 'khrungs pad ma dra// pad ma dag las kun du skyes// pad ma dag gi
29b2(gzungs 'dus): bdan la bzhugs// phyag na pad ma bzang po snrums// ril ba spyi blugs phyag na snams// bkri sta sa le'i lpags pa snams// dbyug pa dar dang dgrang phreng 'dzin// bkra shis ngag
29b3(gzungs 'dus): gis gtsang mar gyur// snga nas gsung zhing gsong bar gsung // bdud rtsi'i tshor ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang
29b4(gzungs 'dus): por snang ba'i ljon shing ltar// sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur// sems can kun gyi sprul pa lags ka/ bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs mnga'// bde bar gshegs
29b5(gzungs 'dus): pa'i ring srel mnga'// bsku nyag ma re re la 'ang // sems can kun gyi btso bor 'gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// rab tu brag po'i
29b6(gzungs 'dus): brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tu dag la// dam chos rgyal tshab mnga' gsol pa// yid bzhin 'khor lo dge ba spyod// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren// 
29b7(gzungs 'dus): yang gr-I ba bdud bzhi 'joms// kro ta mgrin sngon sdug bsngal sel// lha mo sgrol ma rje su 'breng // 'khroganyer bcan ni bka' bzhin bgyid// rgyal ba'i sman ni tshul dang ldan
29b8(gzungs 'dus): mthu chen ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// yon tan ldan zhing byings dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing dpal dang ldan// tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan// don rnams kun nas rig pa
30a1(gzungs 'dus): go// the tsom thams cad gcod pa 'o// chos rnams thams cad gsung ba bo// 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa po// zhal bzangs zla banya ba 'dra// sku slad rin chen rnams kyis
30a2(gzungs 'dus): brgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar mdzes// 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag/ tshangs la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa'o// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
30a3(gzungs 'dus): la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrub pa yang byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gas
30a4(gzungs 'dus): sngags thos cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// bskal pa stong gi bar du yong 'gror mi 'grol/ mnar med par mi'i rma'o// su zhig nam langs nas glog gam// glog tu 'jug
30a5(gzungs 'dus): na/ kha don du 'dun pa de'i lus la mdze dang // shu ba dang glong na ba dang / dadugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad tha~Md las thar bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu mchog tu skye ba dran po
30a6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang phra bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe// yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal skyes gang na gnas kyang 'phags paspyan ras gzugs
