30a7(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'azlas brjod byas na med gzungs par 'gyu ro/ dpa' bar 'gyur// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// rnam par smin pa de dang 'dra ba
30a8(gzungs 'dus): brag med do// tsug lag khang thams cad la mkhas par 'gyuraro// bstong po 'dis stod na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug bcu rtsa gnyis la
30b1(gzungs 'dus): mchod par byas par 'gyur ro// rnam par smin pa de dang 'dra ban bye brag med do// tshul ba thams cad kyi ring 'phel rin po chu za ma tog ces bya ba'i phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan rgya
30b2(gzungs 'dus): rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya me'i tren ma d+hA ra naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
30b3(gzungs 'dus): brgyal tshab tu hU~M sum/ 'phags pa byams pa phyog 'jil lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sgrung po smras pa// nas n+te ya dzAka naM/ sarba sa
30b4(gzungs 'dus): me tA lA/ oM saras pa sU ru s+yA ru/ b+hu @d+hA/ ra/ ma hA ra d+hA n+d+har/ @ bshAn gtsu mamanan na/ rnam na
30b5(gzungs 'dus): kA sa ga ra swAhA// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyis 'di ces bka' ba stsal to// kye ma gzungs rten mo 'di ni phan yon che ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pa bskal pa
30b6(gzungs 'dus): byi ba khrag khrig mang por yang thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston// de bzhin gshegs pa phrengs med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis// bsrin bkur mdzad
30b7(gzungs 'dus): mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / 'jug pa thams cad ning skyed ba// rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas dran pa thams cad las byur bye ga/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas ma
30b8(gzungs 'dus): med pa yongs su thar par byed pa ste/ shin du dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa nom bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings par/ brgyan phreng rab tug
31a1(gzungs 'dus): ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas// byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa/ dpa' ngo chen po thabs rnyes pa// rgyal tshab mi'i bdag po ste/ 
31a2(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal// dar ba chen po mngon par byas// mtshan chen stobs la che ba ste// de bzhin langs zhing rtul dang dral// dbang chen gtse ldan 'od ldan pa// sa yi dbang phyug na
31a3(gzungs 'dus): par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste// mtshon char chen po rdo rje brtson// yon tan 'od rgyas skyengs pa ste// nor bu rin tshwa'i rgyan rdzogs pa// srid gsum dag na sba ba'i sku// rgya mtsha
31a4(gzungs 'dus): bur spyod yul can// lhun po'i zla byin ti se yi// rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'od spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des// yongasu dga'
31a5(gzungs 'dus): ldan chen po'i lha// che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor brgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par sbyong
31a6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bsnun pa btsun pa'o// ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs// sa ya~M dbang phyug deng mdzad pa// pad+ma ma 'ad ba slong rgya ma can// rdo rje pad mi legs par skyes// chos kyi longs spya
31a7(gzungs 'dus): longs par spyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dko'// snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po// srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags// rtse mo chen po cher grags pa// seng ge chen po stobs pa che// cha lun
31a8(gzungs 'dus): chen po zhal cho ga/ skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje bye ru bai dUr+ya// nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs// byi ru gser gyi bcal bkam// sku can zhags kyi skabs kyis gshegs// zhol
31b1(gzungs 'dus): gyi mdangs ni nyi ma du ma'i gzi// ljang lo can gyi spyod pa na dbu thod can// rigs sngags 'chang rgyas zhabs la 'dud// brjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu rgya 'gul 'od zer gyis
31b2(gzungs 'dus): brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas// cod pan de 'ong 'tsher ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya 'odi ldan// rin chen sna tshogs bkram zhing // dri maud dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod
31b3(gzungs 'dus): pa yi// 'bar ba'i chen po lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan yon thabs ni rab ston pa// bas brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi// 'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yang spyod// 
31b4(gzungs 'dus): dpung rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod/ tshon dris shin tu 'dzes par 'char// lhun po phrad cing 'brug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs// rdo rje chen po gtso mo can// 
31b5(gzungs 'dus): shin tu dga' mdzad bde byin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos// brtsod pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu
31b6(gzungs 'dus): 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas sra bo'i dkyil 'khor ba// mi pham thu ba med pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che// byams pa'i snying po snying po che/ 
31b7(gzungs 'dus): byams pa'i pad ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rjes bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bdud// de bzhin sten cing stod pa po// grub pa
31b8(gzungs 'dus): chen po rig sngags grug/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po rnam pa
32a1(gzungs 'dus): des// mdo rje bkod pa 'od srung ga/ nges 'gyur nges pa'i 'od skyon gyis// snang ba drim sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od sdang nga // dkyil 'khor dkar ba med me/ 
32a2(gzungs 'dus): dang 'thun pa'i chos dbyings dang // nye bar gyur cing shin du nges// swa hA swa hA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// bstobs tshon 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyi ma
32a3(gzungs 'dus): 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stod chen rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// bsgrub pa po
32a4(gzungs 'dus): ste brtson pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa ston// rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yis// g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sna ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad ma
32a5(gzungs 'dus): ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skye// mngon shes chen po mngon shes rnyas// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas de'i dbang phyug go// byams pa'i dkyil
32a6(gzungs 'dus): 'khor byams pa la// stong nas kun nas gdon bral ba// thub pa nyi mas bka' bstsal pa// kye ma ming rgya rtsa brgyud mchog/ ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa// bde dang phun
32a7(gzungs 'dus): sum tshogs ldan pa// thabs chen bla na med pa ste// ming rgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// 'jig rten kun gyi bde bskyed pa// 'di ni 'don pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ 
32a8(gzungs 'dus): sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi// byams pa'i bstod pa'i gnas pa la// ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di de la lha tsho gas kun dang yang // lag na rdo rje stobs can rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug
32b1(gzungs 'dus): bsngal kun// gtan du gsal byer brtson par byed// gang zhig ming rgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i mi ngas ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// 'di ma the tsom yod med pa/ 
32b2(gzungs 'dus): nang par langs nas ngan par ni// ga drug byams de'i sengs kyis snang // del rnams par rtogs bA naM// byams pa'i bde legs byed par 'gyur// dbyir dri ma thams cad sel byed ces
32b3(gzungs 'dus): sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming rgyu rtsa brgyad ched du grogs// // 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad
32b4(gzungs 'dus): pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// @#'jigs pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// 'phags pa na mkha'a'i
32b5(gzungs 'dus): snying po'i na la rgya che zhing // spyan gis 'od 'phros tshabs// namakha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// namakha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad
32b6(gzungs 'dus): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM swa s+t+rai/ ka ma lA kri/ baM pu la si b+ha wa/ dA man+tar du// g+ho tsa ra swA hA/ de nas gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu/ ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
32b7(gzungs 'dus): sa yang g.yos par 'gyur// rnga bo che dag gis skye yang grag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
32b8(gzungs 'dus): bka' bstsal pa// kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams na mkha'i snying po 'khor mngon sum rnams kyi swahA'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung ba shin du bsod nams
33a1(gzungs 'dus): chen po// sdig dang nyon mongs thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rin po che'i snying por gyur pa 'di tshan cig dang // 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyural ning
33a2(gzungs 'dus): legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin du rnam par 'gyur ro// pad ma lta bur gyur te 'khor ba'i nyes pas mi gos so// nyi ma lta bur gyur te/ sems can thams cad bde bar byed do// 
33a3(gzungs 'dus): zla ba lta bur gyur to// sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par byed do// na mkha' lta bur gyur te// ngan song gyi sdug gi bsdug bsngal thams kyis mi gos goso// sa bzhi lta bur gyur
33a4(gzungs 'dus): mthon dman med do// lhun po lta bur gyur te/ son sa thams cad kyis skyod par mi nus so// thar par gyur te bong ba dang sdug/ bsngal gyis mi gos so// de'i 'dod de la sogs pa yon
33a5(gzungs 'dus): tan stong phrag grangs med tshad med pa dag thob par 'gyur ro// nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gyis gang ci yang
33a6(gzungs 'dus): rung / de'i 'dod pa dang / skrod pa dang / re ba thams cad rdzogs par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod byed pa tsam gyis char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs
33a7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i dus dang / 'tsho ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan zan dang / 
33a8(gzungs 'dus): mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongasasu bsrung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas
33b1(gzungs 'dus): 'khor de dag thams cad kyis haH zhes ca co dang gzha nyon te// sgra dang zhes byas nas gos dang brgyan sna tshogs skyed de// snying nas phyag 'tshal nas// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
33b2(gzungs 'dus): la dbang byed pa/ 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags pa rgya mtsho'i stong pa yang bdag par brjod pa// na mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/ 'byor
33b3(gzungs 'dus): ldan tho gros rin chen rgya mtsho mdar / sems can dag la bla med rin mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ kun mkhyen tshul tshul mkhyen legs dang legs mi mkhyen
33b4(gzungs 'dus): thar mchog chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen// lam mkhyen rjes mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen// dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen// 'gro mchog chos
33b5(gzungs 'dus): mchog sems can yon tan mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshun min mchog/ rgya mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog/ dga' mchog rtogs mchog
33b6(gzungs 'dus): mchog dang mchog min mchog/ zhi rang snying rje'i rab sde 'khor byi rag// 'od rang thar pa'i rab ste brten gyi rab// rgyu rab sngags kyi ste thugs rje'i rab// mnyam pa rab sems can rab ste gsu
33b7(gzungs 'dus): rig rab// legs sgron mchog ston stobs dang stobs min ston// thar smon rig smon rgyal dang rgyal min snron/ dge slon gzi sgron nor bu 'od kyi sgron// rgyu skar bzla nga rgyal las shar ba'i sgron
33b8(gzungs 'dus): mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od// legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten pa'i 'od// 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'gyod pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'di 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'char// rdo rje'i
34a1(gzungs 'dus): snying po 'dren dbang sems can dbang // rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya la dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal po'i spobs rgyun tshad med dbang // dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid
34a2(gzungs 'dus): gsum dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan// rdo rje 'od can rdo rje'i 'dzin pa rdo rje drag/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na bza' sngo zhing sku'i
34a3(gzungs 'dus): cha lugs sngo ka/ sku mchog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// ral dri sngo 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsdams// mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// lA zhal dri med shin
34a4(gzungs 'dus): du mi bzada' bar// rab du drag po 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur// sdig sel brdul ltar 'khrul med phreng mchod/ can// klog gi stobs kyi snang bas skyegs la brtan
34a5(gzungs 'dus): ral gri'i mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo rje ri mtshon thogs mnga' dang mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor lo'i mtshan thogs bcings pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal
34a6(gzungs 'dus): zhing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa// bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum dag rdo rje'i dbyig/ sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/ grags pa'i rigs su byung bas
34a7(gzungs 'dus): rgyal po mdzad// mu tig phreng bas skyegs shing mdzes par bgyis// skye mdzes rnyis shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'jam mchog rnyes sa la 'jug pa rnyes// mthu stobs
34a8(gzungs 'dus): lhag par brnyes shing grub brnyes pa// rig pa gsum gi stobs rnyes mthus// bde 'dren zhi ba 'don cing 'od 'dren pa// lamatshugs gsal mchog dang ba chen po 'dren byams 'dren ni
34b1(gzungs 'dus): ma 'dren ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// log 'dren zhig gi stongs 'dren snying rje can// dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar// rnam grangs skyegs pas grags pa'i bdan can// 'gro ba'i
34b2(gzungs 'dus): skyabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen// longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sku dmar 'don sku mdzes sku bzang ba// gsor sku lngar dkar dar ba chen po'i sku// sku rol rnga
34b3(gzungs 'dus): rdo'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku// rigs sku rigs sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can de chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpal 'dzin
34b4(gzungs 'dus): rin chen dam pa'i chang ba'i mchog/ sngags pan/ phyag rgya 'tshang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid gsum nyi ma cig
34b5(gzungs 'dus): shu 'od stong mnga'// ri cher 'char ba bdal legs pa// shos pa// yon tan mthu spobs khyad par rnam par grags/ nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma'i nor du
34b6(gzungs 'dus): tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pa// na mkha'i dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ltar// sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum
34b7(gzungs 'dus): bsrungs ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog/ zhi ba rab tu zhi la skyabs 'os stobs// skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos 'bar bkad
34b8(gzungs 'dus): ba legs bshad pa rab tul legs bshad phyag// tho bzang 'od bzang 'di ldan skye gnas bzang // mkha' rab zhir po mchog gi chos dang ldan// zhing mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba
35a1(gzungs 'dus): 'byung gi gnas// 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs skyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzangs rnam
35a2(gzungs 'dus): grags mdzad// rnam grol des grol shin du grol ba'i blo// blo yang rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun du longs spyod sngo sto/ rje'i mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog
35a3(gzungs 'dus): gsum las sbyangs// sangs rgyas padang 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thang // snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun
35a4(gzungs 'dus): rnyes rab gsal ba// spyan zur mnga' ni rab dul bang legs pa// 'jigs med zhal ras ston ka'i rna 'dra// mdung thung rgya'i mtshon mchog mtshan cha rdzogs
35a5(gzungs 'dus): drag po 'joms pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab tu mkhas pa grogs dka' 'dis pa bla// rab tu grags pa gnyen rab gser mdog can// lha chen gsal zhing bde
35a6(gzungs 'dus): byed phyag na bsnams// spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan mun gsuM sel// 'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mnga'// na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phem
35a7(gzungs 'dus): legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'// na 'da' sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal bzangs zla ba'i 'od bzer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pa'i 'jig rten kun 'a
35a8(gzungs 'dus): gzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jengs mnga'// zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal mdzad lam me ba/ dbang chen rdo rje'i thog tog 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ 
35b1(gzungs 'dus): sgra nyan snang ba mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rno ba'i mchog/ rgyun 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshen
35b2(gzungs 'dus): pi mgon sras phreng ba bzang // stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing rtags// mi'i mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu// sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mnga'
35b3(gzungs 'dus): dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug par mdzad// brtan pa rgyud la rab tu
35b4(gzungs 'dus): nges par 'gyur dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig du skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor chog mkhyen// par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes// dbang bskud rnyes shing
35b5(gzungs 'dus): sa bcu legs gnas pa// gnas chen srin pa mchod gnas gcig phul gas// skye dgurnams kyi rlo mangs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas
35b6(gzungs 'dus): bder gshegs sras mchog su 'don byed pa// 'jig rten zla ba gcig shir bzhin du spong // namakho'i snying po sems can mchog cig pa// mdun 'dug nang par langs stong 'di
35b7(gzungs 'dus): brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur// yul du 'thab brtsod shin du mi zad dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad 'byung
35b8(gzungs 'dus): ba ni// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dang bskyed nas nam pa'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa/ de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pacwon
36a1(gzungs 'dus): las grol// de ni zhi mchog bde ba kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur// bde thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am// rgyal srid thob dang byang gzugs na
36a2(gzungs 'dus): thob dang // rig 'thob yon tan kun gyi bzhi sgrub phyir// gtan nas grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de cir ci ste rtag tu 'don de kun la gcig dpa' ba// nam mkha'i snying po sring gsuM
36a3(gzungs 'dus): mngon po la// nag tu bstod cing sngags kyang rtsod par dubyas// 'phags pa rnamakha'i snying pa'i mtshan brgyan brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / 'phags pa kun du 'bang ba'i mtshan
36a4(gzungs 'dus): rtsabargyang ba/ gzung sa sdugs dang baHsa / b+h+yachub sems dpa' sems dpa' rlan pa snong rje chen btu/ dubazang po// namakha'i dkyil kun du rang 'jam ma lus
36a5(gzungs 'dus): dang // mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi chos kyi snong gsal ba'i sku brnyes pa// sa'i dkyil 'khor kun du smra pa'i tha dad pa med pa cing // dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid rjes
36a6(gzungs 'dus): ba 'a drugs snga chags can// byang chub sems dpa' sems rapa chen po'i mchog dang // rab mtshag dam pasbyin pa/ yon tad chen po'i rgyus kun du mapa mdad pal byas
36a7(gzungs 'dus): drinas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrims dpa' chen po kun tu bang // gzugs sna tshogs can byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rang 'jam pa'i dbang phyog chen
36a8(gzungs 'dus): zhes bya bar snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa'o'o/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rted
36b1(gzungs 'dus): gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed sku rab 'jam kun tu yongasu rgyas par 'gyur te// nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag du kun du 'khod
36b2(gzungs 'dus): par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'jam thams cad kyi khongs su rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag g.yas brkyang ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
36b3(gzungs 'dus): po kun du bzang po'i mgo bos byugs nas bka' bsngal pa// rigs kyi bu legs legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen po shod cig/ de nas byang chub sa
36b4(gzungs 'dus): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pa de'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyizhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas zungs 'di bshad do// 
36b5(gzungs 'dus): tad+yaH/ oM na mo na ma s+t+waM d+hu ne ga sham hA 'og ma a sA mA~M sa mA/ I mI sa ma/ a nan ta swa mA/ ga/ na sa ma/ tri b+hu na sa ma/ a she she swa mA/ ts+tsha sha rnam par
36b6(gzungs 'dus): sa ra sA m+b+ha a ra dzas ma shud d+hisam+b+ha b+hu d+h+yaM sA mA/ d+harma thA sA nA~M/ oM b+ha sha ma sA m+be/ sa ma sa ma nA~M/ i ka na yA swa ga rA/ d+ha shud+d+he a lo ka/ dI la ba d+ha la d+hA/ ngi rdzal
36b7(gzungs 'dus): dzA ma// e pra sa ga tan yA nA mA/ tI nai ra d+hi dz+nyAn/ sam b+h+yo k+Sh+me/ sidz+dza g+h+ra/ oM A n+d+ha lA yA lA mA/ d+harma a kra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dzA ma dzA ya/ hUMr+m+ma d+hA ma d+ha me sr-ihA// de nas rgyal/ 
36b8(gzungs 'dus): ba'i sras kyi thu bo pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon pa gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bzang po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
37a1(gzungs 'dus): bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo byar byas nas/ de ska ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang dum byas so// de nas lha dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub
37a2(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' rnams kyis gang ba'i// dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar shing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can// sa stengs chen po kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod chen
37a3(gzungs 'dus): po/ stan las bzhengs te bskyod do// dkyil 'khor nas langs nas// ha ha zhes sgra phyung ste smras pa// kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grangs med pa rgya mtsho rab du 'jam
37a4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i gzungs chen mo kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba/ chen mo mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang ma ni zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med par yongasu
37a5(gzungs 'dus): smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dbangang kyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gnas med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas/ 'phangs pa
37a6(gzungs 'dus): sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skyems la// lta ba'i ri bo mthong bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo// bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung
37a7(gzungs 'dus): ba yang dag par bsags shing / bde bar gshegs pa'i 'bum phrag du ma mngon gsum du mthong bas// byang chub kyi sa bon bsgrungs pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par yin
37a8(gzungs 'dus): tan rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs par rjes su thob pa ma yin pa/ gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po// gzungs chen mo 'di nyan par yang mi nus na/ bzung
37b1(gzungs 'dus): 'am// klog pa 'am/ kun chub par bya ba lta ci spos/ gzungs chen po 'di ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba stong gi bar du thos par dka' 'o// kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sen gang dag gi
37b2(gzungs 'dus): lag tu 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o// mcho ba bzang pos bzang ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zhing bzang po'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs po'o// de
37b3(gzungs 'dus): bzhin go shegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las grol
37b4(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur ba'o// lan gnas brjod pa tsam gyis sdig dpa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba'o// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol
37b5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// de ltar na rjod pa can gyis gang na / du man tan rnams thong bar 'gyuro// mchog pan du brjod dus sdug bsngal thams cad las thar
37b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// shing gcig 'breg gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'gro bzhini du bzlas brjod byaso na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 
37b7(gzungs 'dus): nags tshal chen po'i nang du dkyil moM krung bcas te/ 'dug yi len bdun brjod na/ bsam gtan chedan po thog par 'gyur la// nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur// 2nga
37b8(gzungs 'dus): pa kun du bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du dkyil mo bkrung bcas te 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pa ji med pas mchod nas/ lus ngal 'gyur gyi bar du/ gzungs chen po 'ang
38a1(gzungs 'dus): brjod nas/ de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas// yang dag par dbugs 'byin
38a2(gzungs 'dus): par mdzad de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po yang brtsol bar mdzad do// 'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por
38a3(gzungs 'dus): pa yin te/ khyod tshe rjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro// zhes kyang gsung ngo // de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' batshon
38a4(gzungs 'dus): po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu che/ ba dang che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang de la lta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo // nang par langs nas byang chub ses
38a5(gzungs 'dus): dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams klag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang 'de ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas
38a6(gzungs 'dus): rol du phyin pa thams cad rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro// lha la sa
38a7(gzungs 'dus): pa yang de la bsrungs pa dang sgrub pa dang / skye ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyu ro// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun du bzang po la 'jug pa
38a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje gtsug pud la sogs stong gsum gyi bdag po nga rigs sngags kyi 'chang tshon mo rnams dang / spyan chen po la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnas/ 
38b1(gzungs 'dus): de rje snying po la sags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje nags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyisgra chen pa rnams dang // tshan chen dra ba can la mas
38b2(gzungs 'dus): pa rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang // dar chen dang / gzugs bza
38b3(gzungs 'dus): dang / shin du blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus
38b4(gzungs 'dus): mchog la sogs pa srin po'i bdag po rnams dang // ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang phyu// chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / 
38b5(gzungs 'dus): med tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams langs nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
38b6(gzungs 'dus): mchog/ 'phags pa kun du bzang po la mtshan brgyu bcwa brgyad rlon med pa'i yon tan snang ba zhes bya bas mngon par bstod pa// / kun du bzang po kun gyi mchogs/ 
38b7(gzungs 'dus): tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzi brjid mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po dgas pa mo// gzi brjid chen po stobs
38b8(gzungs 'dus): po che// gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rag/ khyad par rgyal po'i blo glos rgyal// rdo rje chen po rab tu gzhang // sgrub dka' chen pos rnam par rol sgrub mdzad pa// rol mo
39a1(gzungs 'dus): chen pos rnam phrar rol// dga' ba chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste// brtson po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag/ sa stengs sa 'og sa la dges// de
39a2(gzungs 'dus): bzhin sa 'dzin la gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gyi mnga' bdag lags// bshes gnon can de gzol dge// brtson 'grus 'byung ba gyu
39a3(gzungs 'dus): bache// brtson 'grus bcu dang // thabs bcu pa/ stongs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/ mthu stobs skyong gi spro ba dang // yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba// rdul sel rgyal po chen po ste/ 
39a4(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba// rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa'i blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa 'dzin pa bskal ba bzang // shin du sdug pa dga'
39a5(gzungs 'dus): dag skyed pa/ snying rje chen po las byung dpa'// nyon mongs bral ba thub pa dka'o// sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam// rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// gzi
39a6(gzungs 'dus): brjod de nyid gzi brjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu dang 'dra// rmugs dang skyo bzhi bar mdzad// thub par dga' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil// g.yul sel las dges pa ste// g.yul gyi
39a7(gzungs 'dus): nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsung bzang ngang pa'i 'dang su bzhad// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po las lhag thugs dang mnyam// chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par
39a8(gzungs 'dus): bstan// rang dga'i bu lon zhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab snyoms par mdzad// dpa' bo rgyags pa'i rims nad sel// khro'o'i degs pa rnams por 'joms// 
39b1(gzungs 'dus): gsung snyan 'jams pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyam pa ma mnyam mnyam dang // mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying
39b2(gzungs 'dus): por rgya chen rol// rim par bston dge ba ste// spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge// gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa// ngag mdzad sreg sbyin mchod sbyin po// 'joms byed/ 
39b3(gzungs 'dus): bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po// rdo rje 'jig rten gcig snang ba// skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ 
39b4(gzungs 'dus): sems can 'khor bar zhi bar mdzad// brtan po/ sdig pa rnams dang bral// kun du rnam rgyal snang ba po// kun du rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can// kun du rgya mtsho'i sna
39b5(gzungs 'dus): ba mdzad// kun du nges pa sel ba lags// mi bza nga se 'og rnam par bkrugs// de bzhin bzang mdzad thug par mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs nyon
39b6(gzungs 'dus): mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar ba'i dkar ba 'phro mdzad pa/ brgyags shing bde bzhi par mdzad// rdo rje chen po stongs bskyed pa/ snang ba thams cad nges par 'joms
39b7(gzungs 'dus): pha rol bzhugs pa'i sdig sel// dag pa namakha'i spyod yul can lod sbyin tu 'brus bu sbyin bzhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod zhing rgyal srid sbyin
39b8(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la// nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par rgyal// dga' cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde 'byung bcug na nor bu thom/ 
40a1(gzungs 'dus): sa 'dzin bzung par dga' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bad cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam// sbrel ma mun sel
40a2(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba can// yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan// brten mchog che ba'i bdag nyid can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che// sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston// mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi
40a3(gzungs 'dus): theg pa bla na med par ldan// mchod pa chen po chos che ba// 'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchod// ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po// zhi ba de bzhin ni mdzad pa// bzang po bzang
40a4(gzungs 'dus): dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun du rab 'jam sel mdzad pa// snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyis dkyil 'khor can// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs// 
40a5(gzungs 'dus): dus chen rnam par mdzad// mtsho ba mchogadang rab mtho ba// rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can// skye dgu bsrung zhing spyan yangs pa// brnyed par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor
40a6(gzungs 'dus): kun du spyong pa'i khong dag pa// dge bangam pa sbyin pa po// kun du yul kun mnga' ba s+ho// zhes bzang po rtag tu mang rI// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil lakho'i
40a7(gzungs 'dus): chen po bde ma legs// zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs// mkhas pa rgya spangs chog mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'// ngam/ 
40a8(gzungs 'dus): tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po grags pa tshe// dam pa nyid de bla mamod// gosang sngags rlabasa'i rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab dag chen po ni// yon tan pa
40b1(gzungs 'dus): spos kyis rgyas// bdag cing byang la mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal// btsug na nor bu thogs la sogs// mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu
40b2(gzungs 'dus): bo bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya// ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa nyi yin// mi rnams la l-i gang zhig gis sdig bsal kun du bzang
40b3(gzungs 'dus): po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don// ming de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs
40b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i tshul che ba'i// ye shes ma lus sgrub/ nus// de ltar thugs mchog yon tan rgya'i sgrol// nges pa 'byung 'gyur cing // yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba dang / 
40b5(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten yan chad bdag gi yon tan rgyu/ rnams las// bstod pa chen pos snang byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re stong byas nas// bslobs bcu mnga'
40b6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i sku 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur// // 'o phags pa kun du bzang po'i mtshan brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// 
40b7(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa// gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dog
40b8(gzungs 'dus): la ma lus par khyab cing / mchog du rmang du 'byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs
41a1(gzungs 'dus): dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba// yon tan dri med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis rgyan pa'i sku// zhabs brten cing pad ma la lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang
41a2(gzungs 'dus): klu dang rigs sngags 'tshang rnams kyis thor tshugs dang / bcod pan kyi btso mos btugs pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gi dpyas
41a3(gzungs 'dus): ngan song gi 'gyi ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// / tad+yan+ta/ oM b+h+yo ma hA ma ni/ ru tsi ra/ kau lA pa~M/ bing cing prA mu twad+ha ma/ a lang kra ti/ shwa ri rA/ ra
41a4(gzungs 'dus): ma smad tra/ mo tso ka ta la thA ga ta/ ma hA d+ha ma/ ka sha/ d+ha ra/ pra bA ra/ d+harma lo te/ dzI yA/ su rata/ saM go pad+ma shi kaM/ kle shing shar pra sha ma ka/ shUn+yaH
41a5(gzungs 'dus): swA ga a nus ri/ ma sa r+b+ho d+hi/ sad ta ba ra da ra d+ha/ na d+ha dang / oM ma sa pra sha/ pra swa ra/ sa sa ma/ sA mA a nan/ ta sa ma/ sa san tra b+hu tra/ sa man tra sun d+ha ra/ sa nanaH/ 
41a6(gzungs 'dus): a ka ra sa man da pra sa ra/ sa ra sar/ he he/ man dzur rag/ sa hA da dzAr// 'dag/ chen chen d+ha shin d+hAShiHrmA ShaMr dzA ShA radza/ kA mas pa ga sa ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hurAd+d+har+ya
41a7(gzungs 'dus): su ru sa mu ru mu ru/ d+hud+yA d+hA d+hA/ ma ha ma ha ma ha ma ha/ mo hA yA mo ha yA b+h+yo d+ho/ ngi shA dzi ma/ rA d+yan da/ sa rA sa rI/ ma d+ho d+hi sAd tA mo tsa yA ma man thA/ mai nu sr-i ha/ I hrI
41a8(gzungs 'dus): khan sud khA/ ma hi kai r-I ni kaM a na tho ha na/ dug gi tho ha na/ sar rje ha na/ u bdadu do ha/ a b+hi big to ha ma/ ku si d+ho ha ma// mA ran d+ha mo ha na/ ta na b+ha ga
41b1(gzungs 'dus): hama?/ su khan dang An thA nA mA/ sA na thA gA rA/ sA ra dza sa ma/ b+hai ra dza ska ra/ u pad dru ta/ na maHswarba pad tra ba pra sha ka ma a b+hi big ta nan// ku sha la sam b+ha ra/ ba ri pu ra yi ta/ ku
41b2(gzungs 'dus): saM ti naM/ ma ha bIr+yad ta ma rA na/ d+hirma nAm/ a mri ta padad ta/ mA mi ba ga ban/ na tho b+ha ba/ ShA re naM pa ri ya nan/ tra ta swa dza/ du khA ni/ mA pra sha na ma yA/ sarbakle shang ra dza// si
41b3(gzungs 'dus): a pa na mU/ sarba san san ra~M/ prad tra ba du/ khwa ni men sha y+YA/ sarba ku sha la d+harmA/ pur bu/ me ku ru sa rba karma/ a pa ra na kle shi pa ra pa ta ma ma// baM ka ra/ ma sa d+ho d+hA sA
41b4(gzungs 'dus): sa ba ta bir+ye pA rA mi ta// ya gam me// sa ni yo dzaye/ a ra naM/ d+harma b+hi rag+ma/ bai ra dza sa ne dzi ya/ pra dzahA/ d+ha ra ni sa ma/ khA sA mdza la ni d+hi sa maHma ru swa
41b5(gzungs 'dus): ma/ ma ha b+ho d+hi d+hi sa dang / b+ha ra ta swA hA// rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di// 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ kyis bshad pa na// de ma thag tu sems can rnams// 
41b6(gzungs 'dus): skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur// ngani 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar lha rnams thams rab tu dga'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 'gyur
41b7(gzungs 'dus): ldog pa zhi bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mdo las kyang / grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed// 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar// 'jams dpal rgano/ 
41b8(gzungs 'dus): nur gyur pa yis// 'jama'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing // kaM gong tshe rigs sngags bshad pa ni// drag dang nags tshal du bcas pa/ rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// sa bzhi de'i
42a1(gzungs 'dus): tshen g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis// sa'i steng yang khyad par 'gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po mi zad gzugs na/ 
42a2(gzungs 'dus): rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// skad chung tshig 'thun par smras// lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can// thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ lag ni rdo rje
42a3(gzungs 'dus): ral gri che/ de yi drung lcags spros pa ni/ phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul/ 
42a4(gzungs 'dus): 'khor rab 'joms pa/ sngags 'chang gas/ sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugaso can mi yi dag/ shin tu spobs gzugs midzes 'jigs// drag po
42a5(gzungs 'dus): drag po rab 'joms pa// gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe'// rdo rje can de snying spyod pa// mi shes pa'i rab rib sel
42a6(gzungs 'dus): skyeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba// skye dgu'i bdag po sbed la bges// bzhu ba stobs can la phyag ring ba/ nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza'
42a7(gzungs 'dus): sna tshogs gsol// me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ dges shing na bza' mdzes par gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu gzhad// 
42a8(gzungs 'dus): dkar nag dbye ba'i spyan 'dar ba/ ha ha'i sgra ni sgrogs par sgrogs// rab tu dga' ba'i bstan pa dga'// rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan// rgya mtsho'i snying po'i
42b1(gzungs 'dus): spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ snang ba'i snying po ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs spobs sa skyong ba// lha'i bdag po dga' bar mdzad// 'dra
42b2(gzungs 'dus): nga'i lha ste/ 'dod sel brtan// rgyal ba'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su gzhad// bdud pa g.yas
42b3(gzungs 'dus): btud phyag bgyis pa// rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags// stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ring yum chen mnga' ba po// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// 'dzem shes
42b4(gzungs 'dus): rab bsrung ngo tsha shes// dkyil 'khor chen to de'i snying po mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po/ dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po/ 
42b5(gzungs 'dus): mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpo/ dkyil 'khor can/ zhabs la brjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan// ha ta/ swa ha'i bdag che ba// mchod pa chen po'i sa dang
42b6(gzungs 'dus): mnyam// hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha yin rnams kyis bdud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid// zhabs ring ga
42b7(gzungs 'dus): rgyangs chen po can// rlung grag mun nag sel mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod skyon srin pos bsnyen bkur ba// drag po dga' mdzad pade 'byung ba// mnga' bdag
42b8(gzungs 'dus): btsug gi nor bu can// 'dzum zhing skyeg pa kun tu ston/ spyod pas sa ltar rten pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi ma gsal ba lam me go// nyi ma'i 'od
43a1(gzungs 'dus): 'dra mja' khugs bzhin// tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bshad// mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin// dbang phyug sbyin ning rgyal
43a2(gzungs 'dus): srid sbyin// gzugs sbyin de bzhin sbyin pa// dpal dang dpal mdzad bgegs gnon re// kun du rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du bden gshegs pa// zhabs la
43a3(gzungs 'dus): mdzod pa'i tshogs bsogs nas// dpung rgyan rna cha gdung 'khor dang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba sgrol// rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po// ston pa
43a4(gzungs 'dus): sngon mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' dag dmag gi tsheH'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'jigs pa m+ba pa'i gnas sbyin pa// dkar po sngo ba 'od gsang ba/ 
43a5(gzungs 'dus): 'grin sngon gyi ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul gyu ga/ de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston// shes rab ra gis 'debs par mdzad// stong nyid chos nyid
43a6(gzungs 'dus): lhur 'dzin pa/ byams shing mchog dang tham mkhyen// rnam par grags pa gsan par rigs// rigs sngags 'chang ba stobs pache// shin du nam rgyal 'khor las spru/ 
43a7(gzungs 'dus): med blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzangs 'dul mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa// lha dang lha min bcas pas// sem
43a8(gzungs 'dus): thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan po sems can kun gyi chog/ sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas// srid med bu ste drag shul
43b1(gzungs 'dus): me phung 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa sku mchog mchod sbyin// rtsed mo'i rol mo ston par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad pa gsang sngags/ bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan// bdud dpung rab tu
43b2(gzungs 'dus): 'joms pa po// mchod sbyin spyod pa skyed du med// de bzhin thung med rnam par rgyal// bstan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// mya ngan med cing gnas pa med// 'joms med tshig pa 'ang
43b3(gzungs 'dus): cha lugs bzang // dpo' bo dag rnams rab 'jams pa// mtshan chen nges 'joms b+ha/ ka/ 'dod pa gnod pa khyad par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba sras kyi mchog gshin rje 'am
43b4(gzungs 'dus): mdzad skye dgu bsrung // las dang nyon mongs rab sreg pa// sngon mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags// legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya bco brgyad pa rab gsal
43b5(gzungs 'dus): dad pa bskyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin srin blo lha min dang / gdangs 'phrogs gdum po rgod na/ 
43b6(gzungs 'dus): kyis// de ring legs par bstod par 'gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// sgyings pas ltas pa yang bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas nas kyang 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa/ 
43b7(gzungs 'dus): khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med cing bde legs thar pa thob 'gyur ba// 'jigs med bkra yang shes par shog/ ngal 'jigs pa ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu chos bshad cing // 'jug
43b8(gzungs 'dus): che sgra ltar sgrogs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas// shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' bskul pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug/ gsal
44a1(gzungs 'dus): ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// shin du rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur// kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa yi// sems can rnams ni rab sbyang phyir// dam
44a2(gzungs 'dus): pa sbyin pa grub pa'i gnas// 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad/ la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi// sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am/ 
44a3(gzungs 'dus): yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung // de'i don kun grub 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag/ de yis nges pa thob par 'gyur
44a4(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa sa tshe yang // ring por// mi thogs de yis thib// byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ kyis// rab dga' shin tu dri ma medaka'od 'byed pa dang
44a5(gzungs 'dus): 'od 'phro can/ spyad dka' de bzhin mngon du gyus ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi srin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig ces
44a6(gzungs 'dus): nas 'don pa yi// sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe 'phos nas ni thob par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang / sdes pa dzang
44a7(gzungs 'dus): zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang / sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing / bkra shis mchog du dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'od
44a8(gzungs 'dus): 'di// sor mo bcu'i tha sbyar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mdun 'dug la// shin du dang bas brtse gcig tu// nang par langs nas su brjod pa// de la rigs sngags 'chang
44b1(gzungs 'dus): kun dang / de bzhin lha'i dbang po rnams// gnod sbyin srin po dag/ rtag tu yang ni bsrung bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // 
44b2(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin rdo rje mtshan 'chad rnams// de la nges par bsrung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur zhugs shing // mnyam par bzhag pa snang bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin lha'i bdag po rnams// 
44b3(gzungs 'dus): bgegs dang // log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam yis// rgyang ma nas kyang phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir bgegs rnams dga' 'gyur bas// 'tshe bar byed kyi
44b4(gzungs 'dus): mi nus so// lan cig klags na tshangs ches dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig gis// nyin rer mtshan mchog brjod
44b5(gzungs 'dus): byas ni// dri ma med cing rab dga' la// rab tu 'od gsal sgra bstan dang // sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang thob// mtshungs pa/ 
44b6(gzungs 'dus): med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog lha dang lha min 'tshogs te// 'don pa'i gzungs 'di
44b7(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// 
44b8(gzungs 'dus): ka'aphags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gsel ba'i mtshan brgya ba rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45a1(gzungs 'dus): snying pa thams cad nas gyur sel brdzun 'tshal lo// oM a mr-i ta dz+nyAn du dzag/ ma hA su ka swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sna
45a2(gzungs 'dus): mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la tshim par mdzad nas// bka' bamyal pa/ yon tu
45a3(gzungs 'dus): rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyis gzungs 'di phyung bas// sems can rnams kyi bde ba bskyed pa legaso legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la// gzungs 'di thos pa de ni
45a4(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa gang gang klung bcu'i byen snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrang
45a5(gzungs 'dus): dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'imachod rten gyi drung du/ zla ba yar kying tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la srung bar gyur cing // gso sbyong dang ldan pa
45a6(gzungs 'dus): byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog phreng ba dang / rnyog pa la sogs pas mchod la// bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod po thob par 'gyu
45a7(gzungs 'dus): tau/ sdig pa thams cad dang / bsdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba la/ spos la sogs
45a8(gzungs 'dus): pas mchod de// bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te// bsam 'a thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed cing // nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel
45b1(gzungs 'dus): bar byed do// de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po dang // sa gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po dang thabs gcig tu 'khyor kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas// stan las langs te byang chub sem
45b2(gzungs 'dus): dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad ma rnam par sel ba la bdud nas// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par sdong pa// sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'cha
45b3(gzungs 'dus): pa/ nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyod la bya ba 'tshal lo// sgrib pa kun las rnams par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnar grol
45b4(gzungs 'dus): skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam srangagacig pu'i tshul ston cing // theg pa cig pu tshul brnyes/ pa// theg pa dag la khyod phyag 'tshal snang ba chen po snang
45b5(gzungs 'dus): rnyas// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'den bzla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ 'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa ste// sangs rgyas the
45b6(gzungs 'dus): ba togs gyur cig/ rdo rje dkyil lakhor rnam grags pa// rdo rje chen po khyod byug 'tshal// dpa' ba chen po bdud las rgyal// dang pa chen po nyon mongs 'dzums// bgags
45b7(gzungs 'dus): thub gshin rje thub pa ste/ rin cin drug khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po kho ma'o// lhun po dbang phyug chen po ste'abyor ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sdig pa tha~Md gtsang
45b8(gzungs 'dus): mdzad cing // sgrib pa thams cad sil bor mdzod/ kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnam sol khyod la phyag 'tshal// sa sa rgyas spyod yul ya bzhugs pa ste/ 
46a1(gzungs 'dus): spyod yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che// sred rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sku mdzes yon tan chen po brnyes// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor
46a2(gzungs 'dus): brgyan// sangs rgyas lam ste don yod tshe// ye shes dag la khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas pa dbang dag po// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/ yangs pa dri med shes rab can// snang
46a3(gzungs 'dus): bdag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ zab cing brtan par rnam par gnon// zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' rtsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
46a4(gzungs 'dus): bskal pa chen po nyon mongs bcom// 'khor ba'idakyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ zhi bzhi mdzad bde 'byung // chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thar pa'i rgyus te chos
46a5(gzungs 'dus): lugs che/ bde 'gro gnas pa dri ma med/ rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen// nyes sel khyod la phyag 'alo// rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags// sngags chen mang po
46a6(gzungs 'dus): 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul
46a7(gzungs 'dus): mtshungs// rnam gsum mkhyen la ba rnyes pa'i bdag/ rnamathar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes shing mgam nyid rjes// bskul
46a8(gzungs 'dus): dag ni grangs med par// tshogs chen bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// so la gnas pa sa chen brnyes// sa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs // yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba// ye shes khyod
46b1(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ nyes gsum spong zhing sdug pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba// mnyam nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mgon pa chen po snang
46b2(gzungs 'dus): ngo che// sdug bsngal chen po dri ma med// ni 'gyur ma lus ni mdzad pa// yon tan mtha' yas khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas 'tshungs pa'i gsung ldan pa'i// chos kun zhi ba dun/ 
46b3(gzungs 'dus): sum tshogs// dkon mchog gsum rig dpe med pa/ rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje drag po med mchog/ rdo rje mtshon rnams sdig mi mnga'// nam mkha' ma lus yul
46b4(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig dang sel ba po sde drim sbyong // shes rab chen po ste rgyal ba'i sras// sred spyod khyod lnga
46b5(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rtsal can rnams rtsol// rdo rje sdang du khyod phyag 'tshal// rin po che po s+pho rin chen
46b6(gzungs 'dus): d+h+r-i// rin chen rdo rje 'od che/ rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // rin chen bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul snyes shing // ye shes stong pa nyid kyis sngon// stong nyid man/ 
46b7(gzungs 'dus): khyod phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can// dag pa rnam dag sa dang bral// chos gcig las ni snang ba po// 'jig rten 'das pa'i la tshul chen lags// 'jig
46b8(gzungs 'dus): rten snang mdzad sgra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las rnam par 'das// 'jig rten pa'i yon tan brnyes// rgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus gas/ 
47a1(gzungs 'dus): bste/ phal chen skye'o kun la phan// sa 'dzin par grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dga' mkhyen dga' ba long spyod pa// dga' ba'i rigs mchog/ 
47a2(gzungs 'dus): dga' ba mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// skyeg chen 'dzum zhing dgongs par ldan// rnam par skyeg la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa skyeg pa'i mchog
47a3(gzungs 'dus): skyeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// bla med mchog khyod
47a4(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo byang chub sems dgra / mchog/ sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// rdo rje'i/ dkyil 'khor 'khod rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad
47a5(gzungs 'dus): kyis bstod nas// rdo rje brtan pa rab grags pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba'i dpal// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
47a6(gzungs 'dus): can// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di bdag so sor brjod byed na// da ni nyes pa kun zlog cing // rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis// sleb
47a7(gzungs 'dus): pa thams cad sel ba la/ blo ldan ga pa ni bstod pa/ de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas brgyad byed pa// snang
47a8(gzungs 'dus): thams cad de dbang 'gyur// bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongasu pa dang // sdig pa dag pa thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho long spyod cing / 
47b1(gzungs 'dus): la b+hU nga phyu shA ga/ des rgyan pa lams/ ma rdzoms tha pa
47b2(gzungs 'dus): rgyud chen ldan zhing rdo che ga// gang zhig meng mchog 'dod pa ni// rdo rje dkyis bston pa la ka ring po mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po
47b3(gzungs 'dus): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya ba rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
47b4(gzungs 'dus): chen po sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dpa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po sa'i snying po la
47b5(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// oM sum b+hA ni sa~M Sh+TA natsaram hUr+dz+dza nam rung a bo ts+tsha bad \u0f7f s+yAd d+hA swAhA// denayon tan sbyin pa sbyin pa yi// ga zus 'dri bshad ma
47b6(gzungs 'dus): yang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// taM se gangs can+da g.yos par 'gyur// sa'i snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje rkyen gyis spras// bskal ldan chen po legs
47b7(gzungs 'dus): logs// / sa stongs khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod ni gzungs 'di rnam grangs shing // yon tan dpag med mchog skyed pa// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // 
47b8(gzungs 'dus): bzlog byed thos pa ni// 'khor bar rab tu rtsub na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'das gyi pad ma dag/ 'das phye nyes pas mi gos bzhin// lus can dag la
48a1(gzungs 'dus): su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las ni cig tsam yang byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog thos nas
48a2(gzungs 'dus): mos par byed pa ni/ nges par yon tan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa'i dbang phyug po// sa'i snying pos sa mtsha
48a3(gzungs 'dus): la/ ming rgya rtsa brtsad smras pa ni// sa'i snying po gtso bo che// klog 'gyur lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// gcod par can te sa brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor ba rnyes// rigs ldan
48a4(gzungs 'dus): rigs mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dgesbyong sten pa po// bzhi bcas ldan pa rlung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo/ ldan snying rje'i rab// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i
48a5(gzungs 'dus): mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol// sa'i dbang phyug gar thabs can skyeg po zhal bzang gar thabs can// skyeg po zhal
48a6(gzungs 'dus): bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po can// snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// 
48a7(gzungs 'dus): rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sngogs skyon gsal cing // gar thabs chen po ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'
48a8(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug gsung dang 'dra// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar bar bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho gangs chen mtsho// yon
48b1(gzungs 'dus): ten sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul zab mo mkhas pa ste// theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgra che ba// zla ltar
48b2(gzungs 'dus): grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtsho brgya pa// rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog thod// blo gros chen phyag ring ba// pad ma chen po stobs po che// gsang sngags chen po tshogs
48b3(gzungs 'dus): chen ldan// sa bzhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan nges// nor bu me tog thod kyis brgyan// mnyam pa nyid 'jam blos spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje
48b4(gzungs 'dus): 'od mde 'ardo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhi / sel longs spyod longs spyod bzang // mtshan cha g.yo ba du/ sum tshogaso// rab 'jam sdod ni rnam par grags
48b5(gzungs 'dus): smras mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste// me tog sngon po'i thod kyang bcings sgotra chen po'i phyag ring ba// brten po brtan la ba
48b6(gzungs 'dus): sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste// gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin rje rgya chen dang // brtson po khyab 'jug stobs dbang 'jug// 'jig rten
48b7(gzungs 'dus): mchog rigs sangs rgyas 'tshang // de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can// rin chen tog ste cher bshad pa// dges pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs pa rings pa spyan yang
48b8(gzungs 'dus): gan mkhar bzhin du thogs pa med// thos pa mi dpon rin chen btsug srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma gsal// dag pa gtsang ma gos spong can
49a1(gzungs 'dus): rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyi grags pa che ba// bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo seng
49a2(gzungs 'dus): ge 'jigs par byed// snang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgya cher rab byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen
49a3(gzungs 'dus): rigs kun du ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs mchog skyes pa'i rten// rdo rje'i ni dkyil 'khor brgyan// rdo rjes 'og rab grags pa// rigs sngags 'chang ba stobs
49a4(gzungs 'dus): po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyad par mchogamagrin bzangs nad dang bral ba logs// skyon mdzadabaston pa dag pa ste// sangs rgya se lam ni rab ston pa// 
49a5(gzungs 'dus): sgrol ma smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyi bdud// rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon
49a6(gzungs 'dus): rten/ grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang tshul min gtogs pa po// dkyil 'khor 'od zer mtha' nga skye/ 'od zer ljang khu'i 'od dang ldan// ser la na bzla' ser
49a7(gzungs 'dus): mnams// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan// spyad rtswa dmar la zla ba 'odapa'// nor bu sna tshogs 'di 'byung ba// rdo rje ba rgya yi skyabs kyi spro// mnyam nyid mnyam
49a8(gzungs 'dus): pa de ma med// sku yang dag cing ni bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste// 'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa// 'khor ba bzad
49b1(gzungs 'dus): mdzad shes rab can// tshul shes tshul la longs spyod pa// rdo rje rgya mtsho snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che// 'byung ldan rab 'jam shes rab can// ma lus grags pa
49b2(gzungs 'dus): 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje snying po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i ga
49b3(gzungs 'dus): bo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lod zer bsil// dpa' dang dang bskyed pa ste// ye shes rgya mtsho spyod yul ba// rlung gi drag shul ltar bur drag/ drag po las te drug sel gnas
49b4(gzungs 'dus): rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhing // rgyal ba'i dpa mdzod dgor bar mdzad// lhun po te se mo la yas// spyod yul zab mo non pa ste// rin chen rdo rje'i rdo rje'i
49b5(gzungs 'dus): snying po tshoka sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lagarin chen brag las byung ba'o 'od// rdo rje dkyil la dag gis brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgas la/ 
49b6(gzungs 'dus): shugs drag dpal gyi bzhi brtan lags// rab gsal dpal mdzad btsang ma ste// phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad
49b7(gzungs 'dus): mchog rnams kyis/ rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni// rdo rjes gsum dbang mchog smras// yon tan snying pos shes rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing // nyes
49b8(gzungs 'dus): pa bzlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa yi steng nangs ma mthong // mi'i brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste// sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // dri ma kun
50a1(gzungs 'dus): bral yon tan nges// de phyir sgrib pa thams cad gyis/ phun sum tshogs pa mis thob 'gyur// ming rgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par bgyi// ming rgyartsa
50a2(gzungs 'dus): brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun nang 'byor pa yis// gnas michog bla na med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen byin pa yis// yid ni shin du dam pa yis/ ka sa'i snying po mtshan gsal
50a3(gzungs 'dus): ba'adod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i// yon tan mchog ni gang brjod pa// dpal yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi// ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni gang zhig brjod byed pa// 
50a4(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol// 'phags/ na pa sa'i snying po mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa/ gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs spyo// 
50a5(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i menabargya rtsa brgyad pa// gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na dzarje/ 
50a6(gzungs 'dus): la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po spros pa/ oM badz+ra tsan d+ha sarba duSh+To na ta~M ka ha~M na/ drA pa tsa hUM phaT// de nas gzungs 'di bshad
50a7(gzungs 'dus): ma thag tu/ sa chen po g.yos par 'gyur te// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyams thag pa'i skad phyu // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams
50a8(gzungs 'dus): tsad ha ha zhes mdzer to// lha la sogs pa'i rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang // rgyal gyis char chen po phang dzo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum
50b1(gzungs 'dus): su// da b+ha gangags su / ltung ra 'ang dag han yang sdug pa ma rgyad cig// rdo rje 'chang gis smra// bamam ldan 'das pad/ 
50b2(gzungs 'dus): gis gzungs 'di mchog tu gsung ba lags so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang // bgegs thams cad bzlog pa dang // sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang // dam pa
50b3(gzungs 'dus): gsol ba dang / 'byor pas gsol pa dang // sdang ba thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos nas don mchis pa dang // brjod na don mchis pa dang // bsnyen bkur/ 
50b4(gzungs 'dus): bgyis na don mchis pa dang // stobs bskyed pa'i dang gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spongs pa bskyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang // nor dang lda
50b5(gzungs 'dus): par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdo / 'joms pa dang / sdang ba 'jigs par bgyid pa dang dug sel ba dani rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar
50b6(gzungs 'dus): bgyid pa dang / mchog du dga' bar 'gyid pa deng / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par 'gyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang // nongs par
50b7(gzungs 'dus): bgyid pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi par bgyid pa dang // mtshams ma mchis pa bzlog pa dang // rmi lam ngon pa zhi par 'gyid pa dang / 'akra shes pa
50b8(gzungs 'dus): thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal bskyed pa dang / bskal pa bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'a
51a1(gzungs 'dus): ba la sogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang // char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags
51a2(gzungs 'dus): g.yul chen po dang // mi nad ched po dang / rtsod pa dang / mi ma lags pa/ la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang byang sems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang // skrod pa dang / 
51a3(gzungs 'dus): srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po zung ngan/ nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis pa gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltos la/ bcom ldan 'das
51a4(gzungs 'dus): 'chang gi dong du blta zhing / lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing // grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ tha~Md
51a5(gzungs 'dus): du rgyal bar 'gyur te// sems can thams tsa bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sred pa ni gzungs chen mo'ilas lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad
51a6(gzungs 'dus): ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ rdo rje 'jigs pa dges
51a7(gzungs 'dus): pa'o// rdo rje snying po stobs me// rdo rje la jug pa zhags pa/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdorje hUM gi hUM lags te/ rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rmi/ 
51a8(gzungs 'dus): chags pa ste// chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che// phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste// spyan dbar spyan dang ldan pi lugs// rdo rje 'thon ka mthon ka che/ mtho 'thing dbu skra
51b1(gzungs 'dus): brgyan pa lags// ral gi sngon po ral gI che/ dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can// mthon ka spyan de dbu sngo// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/ rdo rje sngon po stobs mi 'tshungs// 
51b2(gzungs 'dus): spro ba'i bstobs che ba/ khro bo ri rdo rje khro bo che// sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gdod// khro'o 'gegs rigs sel bar mdzad// gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsgon
51b3(gzungs 'dus): ba ste// rdo rje'i mdangs ni nges par 'gums// dbyug thogs rdo rje ral gri bsnams// rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu
51b4(gzungs 'dus): ge// sna tshogs sgra ste thig les bris// gzi brjid myed pa grags mdzad pa// bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ sdig pa 'gegs rnams gcod mdzad pa// drag pa chen po/ 
51b5(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje che// skyel byed drag po skyel bar mdzad// gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs// rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dka'// rgya mtsho chen po'i dpung dang ldan// dam pa ti se
51b6(gzungs 'dus): lhun po'i ro// gad rgyangs chen pos bshad pa po// spyod yul bskal pa grangs me de gsum// rig sngags 'chang mtshig rdo rje can// rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag legs// na bza'
51b7(gzungs 'dus): dza hing dmar gsol// mthon kan bza' mthon la dgos// srin po srung ba drag po ste// me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgas// nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od// 'od zer brgyad phrag rab tu 'gyed
51b8(gzungs 'dus): grol mdzad mgon pa ston pa'o// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i bdag sngo ba// mgul bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags// gcod pa ni chen
52a1(gzungs 'dus): @// rdo rje'i 'od/ phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ ye shes che ldan srung ba sa che// rlung dmar lags te spyod yul can// gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs// 'jigs
52a2(gzungs 'dus): las grol bar rab 'jigs pa// rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs// mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gzigs rtse gsum// 
52a3(gzungs 'dus): 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mdzad// zab pa po sde 'jigs par mdzad// 'thor ba sku mchig zhal gsum pa// tsham chom med te srid las byung // rtag par skar dges dus 'byor pa/ 
52a4(gzungs 'dus): rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad pa po// rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste// bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas palogs// bai tur+ya ltar dri med sku// mdzes shing stobs
52a5(gzungs 'dus): bskyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' ba skyed pa dga' sna mdzad// dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mtsho// lha chen pa' bo chen po ste// brtan po dpa' bo lam me ba/ 
52a6(gzungs 'dus): bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod// dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon cha chen po can can// rigs sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba// pad ma chen po phyag ring ba// pad ma
52a7(gzungs 'dus): las byung pad ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa// brtul phod dka' thub
52a8(gzungs 'dus): brtson pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje// zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan// rdo'i lA
52b1(gzungs 'dus): mangs srog mdzad pa// rdo rje mangs ni rnam par gcod// rdo rje'i don yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje'i bzang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ yis dag dag theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po laT/ 
52b2(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje chen po rtse mo can// spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po// rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan// mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen// rdo rje chen po dkon pa po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs
52b3(gzungs 'dus): par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gang rgyangs skyon// me tog chun po 'od gsal baM// dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sris// nges par bskul bzang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te lha kun mchos
52b4(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje dpung gi dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rab rgyas pa// rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can// rdo rje'i bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes pa shin du rnam par
52b5(gzungs 'dus): dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpo za// gsang ba chen po 'chang // rigs sngags 'chang gi mchog gis brjod// gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsum// skyes pa
52b6(gzungs 'dus): bud med chags dag re // rdo rje'i thog thog sgra chen sgrogs// rdo rje'i srog ste rnam par 'joms rdo rje lcags kyu dgas pa che// rdo rje bar ba che rabar ba// nor bus smras pa'i na
52b7(gzungs 'dus): gsol// spos dang me tog zeng gis brgyan// dbu'i sman cha gdu 'khor btags// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i ston pa 'o// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen
52b8(gzungs 'dus): grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas dkyil ston pa po// dbu brgyan con pan kun nas bcings snga tshags brgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar
53a1(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bdag gis bskyed// de nas rdo rje don gsungs pa/ rdo rje gsang bas brgyad pa yi// ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung // 
53a2(gzungs 'dus): sdang ba thams cad bzlog byed pa// ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa// grub pa thams cad 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// lag
53a3(gzungs 'dus): na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje yon tan che// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// de ni sdig pa kun las thar// ngan song kun las
53a4(gzungs 'dus): thar bar 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar sgo/ pa 'di// su zhig nang par langs nas brjod// rgyal/ po blon po grong khyer ba// gnyen rnams dang ni dga'
53a5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/ 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cang zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ 
53a6(gzungs 'dus): ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yis// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// su zhig nang par langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar brjod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'ang
53a7(gzungs 'dus): la the tsom med/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// gagegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nus// shes
53a8(gzungs 'dus): rab can ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don na// gzugs bzang stobs ni bskyed pa dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis thob// gagang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ 
53b1(gzungs 'dus): nges par gnas shing gtsang bar 'don// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yis// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad paka/ gzungs sngags dang bcas
53b2(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya bar skad du/ badz+ra ma thA ma thAn ma d+har ni// bod skad du/ rdo rje gnam lcags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
53b3(gzungs 'dus): tshangs pa dbang phyug dang // khyab 'jug sel dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis// bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
53b4(gzungs 'dus): gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'du danas// klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par 'gyid ga sbyin 'gams pa/ klu ma rungs pa rnams kyi snying rigs rung
53b5(gzungs 'dus): par byed pa// rlung dang ser ba'i sprin thams cad bcwag/ par bgyid pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang / me thams cad 'byi bar bgyid pa// rdo rje gnam lcags/ 
53b6(gzungs 'dus): kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don gyi slad du/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyab 'jug sel dang/ 
53b7(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po zhis gzungs 'di smras te/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa pa
53b8(gzungs 'dus): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin drag po la phyag 'tshalo// pha rol zil gyis gnod pa'i mthu chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig
54a1(gzungs 'dus): rten gyi gtso'o la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnam lcags ma rungs pa drag tu bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu ma thAm
54a2(gzungs 'dus): tha bra ma tha dza li tA d+hi krata/ badz+ra dza ya dza ya/ ma hA ba la bir+ya pa ra kra ma/ tr-i ta ra dza dra ma me/ su pra me/ pra ma rtsa re/ bo bo na ga/ bdi bi sa ra/ bi te pr-i ma de na/ sur+ha nan/ swa ra yam/ 
54a3(gzungs 'dus): hUM phaT/ ba ra ba ra/ bstu tsa kra/ ha ha ni ba ban na ge na ratra/ mihI kra ma te/ bi snA tsag kre ma/ shi re tsin+ta mI/ du Ti tu Ti hUM hUM phaT/ mu ru mu ru/ mu dun tu// sarba duSh+TA na ga swo ta yA
54a4(gzungs 'dus): me he shA rA dzA lA ti// hr-i shu la da rA/ han/ ha na/ hUM hUM phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ tu ti b+ha ba gA/ k+Sha ne k+Sha ne/ tsa tu nanau/ ma hA ra tse dz+wa la nan/ dze li ta sha ga taM// da ra dar/ hUg
54a5(gzungs 'dus): dustA swa shau nau da ta// me ge shau tA/ bid ta/ dza la/ be sl-i ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma bo na ga gi ta pa ti/ ngi tsa ra mI/ da ya sa swA hA/ ma he shaM bo tu/ 
54a6(gzungs 'dus): ti hUM hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ badz+ra a shi nan sha ya hUM phaT swA hA/ sarba na ga hi he She ye ni/ bi s+pho ti ye ka hUM phaT swAhA/ bud+d+he bi lo ki ta ya yaM swAhA/ pra ma na ya swAhA/ tsu sU murda ye swA hA/ ma he
54a7(gzungs 'dus): sha ra dzi ti kr-i/ shu l+ye swAhA/ tsa tu ra ma ha ra \u0f7f/ sa man te ye swA hA// bu dza ga ya swA hA/ bu tsa ga ye baiT swa tre/ dza li ti bag kri yA sA hA// ro ma hA shi na ye swe hA/ dzu ti dzu ti su dzu ti swAH
54a8(gzungs 'dus): phaT phaH// de rje 'bar ba gnam lpags kyi mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs thog ma thag tu// klu ma rungs pa thams cad lus rul nas/ dri mi zhem pa rnams par 'gyur ro/ 
54b1(gzungs 'dus): lus so sor zhig nas khra bor gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad par gsol/ lha dang 'jig rten thams cad
54b2(gzungs 'dus): kyi snang bar gyur pa/ bdag cag ni ma rungs par 'gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sngan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la gnod par mi bgyid// mgum par mi bgyid/ chung ngu na
54b3(gzungs 'dus): meg gis blta bar yang mi bgyid/ chu stobs lta ba lta ci smos// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gdum po lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba mdangs cha ba/ ma ma rungs pa la sa
54b4(gzungs 'dus): te/ klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gdugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ klu thad kyis phyi ma'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad
54b5(gzungs 'dus): la me tog dang / 'bras bu dang lo tog dang / la ma dang yol thams cad bsrung bar bgyi// rlung dang ser ba 'di dgugs par bgyid// dus dus su char ba dbab par bgyid
54b6(gzungs 'dus): rang gyi bro tshig yi dam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar bgyid// sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongasu rdzogs par bgyi// yid la bsam pa yongasu rdzos
54b7(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyi/ gnod par mi bgyi// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag las cag byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ 
54b8(gzungs 'dus): 'di lags te// tad+ya thA/ oM ta kr-i tsa kyaM/ gu laM gu li mu li/ sha sha gu gu/ ti bi ri ti/ shu yA hu tru'u hu ri ti swA nA/ char mi 'bab pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i char 'bab pa 'am/ 
56a1(gzungs 'dus): rlung dang sprin dang / ser ba dang / grang ba'i rlung dang / gnas lugs lung ba'im/ gas 'dzin gyi blo chog 'di khang thog gan/ sa mthon po 'am/ ri'i steng du yang / 
56a2(gzungs 'dus): rung / kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ lan bdun skad chen pos bzlas/ yungs dkar la lan bdun bzlas te/ gyen tu gtor na gtor ma thag du klu thams cad dum bur gyur zhing nan
56a3(gzungs 'dus): dur byas pas/ myur du char yang phebs so// sngags 'di nyid kyis dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// yungs dkar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig ba rnaMs te/ nan du re dreg par gyur te/ 
56a4(gzungs 'dus): thams cad myur du phebs so// phyogs bzhir gtodan 'tshams bcad par 'gyur ro// rdo rje la lan brgyam brgyad bzlas pas klu dgug par bya/ lan gcig dran na// 
56a5(gzungs 'dus): rlung dang ser bri mar brdzogs pa bgyi/ gnam ldan kyu chur 'gyur// ji klud la bskod cig dang / phyogs du bskor ba rnyer/ ser po 'byol lo// nang par smra bar ngas
56a6(gzungs 'dus): par 'dug ste/ sngags lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas te// rlung dang sprin drang / ser ba yang bkal/ klus gnos par mi byed cing // phyis kyang mi tshugs yungs dkar la sngags
56a7(gzungs 'dus): te phyogs bzhir gtor na/ lo gcig tu mtshams bcad te/ rlung dang srin dang / ser ba yang mi g.yo// ngag nyan cing rgyun du bsrungs pa dang / las byed par 'gyur ro// dril bu la lan
56a8(gzungs 'dus): rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dkrol na klad pags shing sa la lhung be re 'gyur ro// gnod pa byed pa sel to// mchod pa tshul bzhin du legs par byas te// skad gsal bar klags te/ phyogs
56b1(gzungs 'dus): bzhi dang / bla 'og tu yungs dkar gtor na/ ser ba dang / rlung dang klu gnod pa byed pa bcings par 'gyur ro// lhas ngan pa dang / mi dge ba dang / gnod par sems pa dang / ngag dang
56b2(gzungs 'dus): pas kyi rgol ba mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lo tog dang 'bras bu dang / khu ba thams cad rgyas par smin pa dang che bar 'gyur ro// byang sems la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// 
56b3(gzungs 'dus): gnam lcags kyi mchu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ @/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA pa la na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'jag
56b4(gzungs 'dus): stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad laphyog 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
56b5(gzungs 'dus): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri ka dang bzung chen po na chos ston te/ do na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis
56b6(gzungs 'dus): bskyod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis sems can rnams dbugs
56b7(gzungs 'dus): 'byin cing // shar phyogs na mau lce kun du 'bar ba phreng ba'i pad ma'i ba dan la bzhugs so hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na spobs po che lag pa bzhi pa/ gcig na rnga ya
56b8(gzungs 'dus): thog/ lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas na ni be can thogs/ g.yon na ni zhags pa thogs te/ sgra kham pa gyen su brdzes pa/ mig dmar po'o// de'i 'og na ni bcom ldan
57a1(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje 'chang 'khor dang bcas pa'o// g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so// g.yon na ni bdud rtsi thal sbyor ro// de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur
57a2(gzungs 'dus): gzhag go// snying po ni ki li ki li dang / 'gro lding ba'i sngags dang / lus dmar po dang / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje rgyal chen te/ snying po'i mchog go// rigs sngags kyi rgyal
57a3(gzungs 'dus): drag po chen po dang / nye ba na ni 'phags pa ma ma kye'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thal mo sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud do// sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje tho ba dang
57a4(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// g.yon logs su na ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan daras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o// bcom ldan
57a5(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar me'i/ de'i'og du ni sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can no// g.yon du ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de dag la srog
57a6(gzungs 'dus): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong ngo // de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang dbang po'o// me'i phyogs su ni me'i drang srong chen po/ 
57a7(gzungs 'dus): rnams kyis bskor ba'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go// bden bral phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po'i ma mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po/ 
57a8(gzungs 'dus): klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang phyogs su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang gi
57b1(gzungs 'dus): tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// lha'i dbang po rgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po dang de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med grangs med dpag tu med po dag dang
57b2(gzungs 'dus): nga/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ mdo sde 'di bsgrub pa po'idi
57b3(gzungs 'dus): la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di nyid rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag mardo rje drug po la phyag
