57b4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// oM ki li ki li badz+ra kI wi ki li ya hA/ skye gtsug la stan/ dpral ba la swAd+ha/ rig la snyam drug shul can la swAhA/ shin du drag shul can la sa'o// 
57b5(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje zhags pa la sad+d+ha/ lus ngan po la swA hA/ len ni rdo rje la swAH/ leg na zhags pa la swA hA/ lag na ral gri lA swAhA/ lag na dag sA la swAt+ma/ gzhu 'dzin
57b6(gzungs 'dus): la swAhA// gdun shing 'dzin la sa// le ge na 'khor la la swAH/ leg na mdung rtse gsum la swA hA+e/ snying la // me'i snying po la swA hA/ drang po ki li ki la
57b7(gzungs 'dus): la saH/ byis pa~M ki li ki li la swAr+b+ha/ dam pa ki la~M ki li la~M swA hA/ stongs kyi tshal ldan/ rim pa can la sam/ zla thetshal pal swAH/ gzhan rjel swAm+ba/ \u0f7f/ 
57b8(gzungs 'dus): yam yun la sA Ta/ drag po chen po la swArba/ srin la swAhA// ri 'dzin la swASh+Ta/ raM bdang bzung 'dzin la swA hA/ gsus 'phyang po la swA hA/ rdo rje de can la swA n+de/ 'jigs byed
58a1(gzungs 'dus): chen po la swAH/ lus 'jigs byed pa la sadz+ra/ sdigs byed la swAH/ rdo rje lugu rgyud las hA// rdo rje brtan pa la swAhA/ rdo rje'i lus la swAH
58a2(gzungs 'dus): b.lA swA hA/ bdud kyi la skyes/ nga/ 'thu 'dzin pa la na sl-i/ legs rna las / don med la sa // tshun pa rgyal po la saH/ mdag dka la
58a3(gzungs 'dus): mdog le swA n+te/ 'phyang po la swAH// glang po che la sngun/ de ladza'i phel gyi lag pa la srung // bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa lA s+yAt+ma/ sbrul kye ska rigs can la snud+d+ha
58a4(gzungs 'dus): pur bu la s+yetAM/ log pa gnyis pa lasa.a rdo rje la sAn/ 'bar ba'i 'od byeng la sA tsI/ b+he gsabartan pa'i rdo rje la sIhA/ myu gu la sAhA// 'di byedapa
58a5(gzungs 'dus): la swAhA/ rdo rje dam par 'joms pa la swA hA/ 'idra ba lwa swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la sAhA/ rdo rjekhu tshur la swA hA/ sprin rnam par 'thor ba la sAhA/ char
58a6(gzungs 'dus): pa gten+d+ha la swaH/ rdo rje'i lcags kyu la ste/ rdo rje'i snying po la sku D+h+we/ rdo rje'i nye ba'i snying po la swAH/ khro bo'i rgyal po la samA/ be can la swAH/ go che'i rgyal po la
58a7(gzungs 'dus): swAhA/ oM d+hi a / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// / oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han d+ha d+haH
58a8(gzungs 'dus): dA he na ha ni/ a mri te hUM phaT sAM hA/ oM oM mri te hUM phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes pa la swA hA/ lus ngan po la
58b1(gzungs 'dus): dbang po la swA hA/ me la swAH/ drang srong chen po thams cad la swAH// nyi ma la sA/ zla ba la swam+ba/ gshin rdzal swAhA/ gshin rje la swArba/ khyab 'jug la swAhA/ srin pa
58b2(gzungs 'dus): bdag po la swA n+d+he/ klu'i bdage bo la swA hA/ rlung la swatra/ dbang bdag la swA hA// dbang bdag gi chung me la swA hA/ bdag brgya byin la swAhA/ non+ta bu la swAH/ rdo rje chen po le swA hA/ 
58b3(gzungs 'dus): tshangs du chen po la swA hA/ sa la skyes/ dbyangs can la swAhA/ rtse mo dpal la sUts+tsha lha mo dpa'i 'dzin la spa / lha mi dka' thub rje ba la myug ma'i rig sngags chen/ 
58b4(gzungs 'dus): stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil la'o// gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na/ bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyuraro// las thams
58b5(gzungs 'dus): cad kyang grub par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dong / 'phags pa nithos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dge 'dun dang / rang sangs
58b6(gzungs 'dus): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas brtan blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa las
58b7(gzungs 'dus): nga byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang drug par spyong ba rnams la phyag 'dz+wa lnga / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin la
58b8(gzungs 'dus): dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ ki li ki l-i ma hA ki li ki li/ d+haM ki ka tra ka Ta~M/ ma hA ka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma ma ha/ sha
59a1(gzungs 'dus): tri shA traM/ shan ta shan ta shan tA/ dAn ta dAn ta dAn ta/ d+hi ra d+hi ra d+hi ra/ ma hA ba me b+ha d+hu ra d+hA ra/ ha ri ha ri ha raM/ ku ti ku ti ku ti/ tshin d+ha tshin dA tshin d+ha/ bin d+ha bin drA bin d+hA
59a2(gzungs 'dus): sarba du b+hAn/ gu mu gu mu bu mu/ ha ra ha ra hi ra/ pra na ne dam/ Ta Ta rbe thathA thAM/ sh+tsa DA DA DI DADA/ tsItsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/ ba tsa pa mA da hi da ha da dang / hUM hUM/ hai he he/ phaT phaT paT/ 
59a3(gzungs 'dus): ba ri sha da ri sha ba raM/ ma tang gi tsan dra lIHhU hU hu/ dzu hra dzu hU dzu hu/ ha pra t+yenr-i ne/ tsi laM tsi lo tsi laM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ti shA ti shwA ti shwatish+tsa tiSh+ThanAM/ mai ti pra mA tha/ ma tang ta gai/ 
59a4(gzungs 'dus): hUM hU~M hU~M/ he he sa/ gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha dang memid pa dang / mig dang snying dang ngag bcing bar 'gyu'o// dbrog go// dza la dza la dza la/ rgyun cu
59a5(gzungs 'dus): d+hu d+hu d+h+r-i/ b+han d+hud+hAn d+hu d+ha na d+hu/ ni la ni la ni la lang ga badz+ra d+ha ra/ spobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig/ ko ti ko ti ko Ti ni/ sarba b+hu tra ni/ badz+ra ma li
59a6(gzungs 'dus): badz+ri d+hA raM/ 'adz+ra maung Ti/ ha saM tsar du nar tu mar d+ha/ ku ru ku ru ku rA tu ru d+ha ru sems can chen brlan par gyis shig/ rmAhUM/ sauhi he/ phaT badz+ra phaT/ tsan da tsun da tsan pa
59a7(gzungs 'dus): ma ha tsan d+ha/ tur du hur du dud du/ mu ru mu ru/ gr-Id+ha g+h+rit+te/ badz+ri bi ni/ hi ne he na ha nA/ ma ma sarba shi drung 'u nan/ mu Ni tra Ti mi phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru// lag na rdo rje'i las
59a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gal bar ma byed cig/ dam tshig lo sa'i 'gal bar byas na/ dam tshig bral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang sdus par 'gyur ro// gsang sdigs kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no// 
59b1(gzungs 'dus): tsu tsum+b+ho ha ra ha ra ha ra/ phung rngu bung cu phung nu/ ta pa ni Shab ni ta pa ni/ btsa na pa tsa ni btsa ni// lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran gyis shin/ 
59b2(gzungs 'dus): tse li tsi li tsi li/ bu lu bu lu phyi lu/ phu phu du// / bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag gis snying po 'di dang 'gal bar gyis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i 'tshams
59b3(gzungs 'dus): med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig/ dar bu tsar phu nar phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang btsas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub cig swA hA/ oM hUM hUM
59b4(gzungs 'dus): phaT swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ldan pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun du 'bar ba'i snang bas stong
59b5(gzungs 'dus): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lasa'adas nas/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'akun du rab tu 'chad cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig
59b6(gzungs 'dus): tu gyur par kun du sdong / de ltar gyur pa dang / bdud sdig can ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te/ bgegs kyi rnam par
59b7(gzungs 'dus): 'phrul par byed par byed do// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi lha'i ba rnams par 'phrul pa chen pos/ 
59b8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gau la ba der song ngo // de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo tshol ba mdog dmar ba/ sgra rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mche brtsegs pas mi zad pa/ skra khan pa
60a1(gzungs 'dus): gyen du rjes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yod pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sdug lpags kyi sham thangs bgos pa/ shar phyog su
60a2(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang kun du snang ngo // de nas bdud sdig can dang bgegs
60a3(gzungs 'dus): bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya/ khro bo'i tshol bas 'dar bar gyur to// rudud sdig can ni nyon shing gzir te/ 'phos nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
60a4(gzungs 'dus): zhags pa yis bcings pa lngas bcings// de ltar 'gyur de ltar gyur pa dang / de'i 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis
60a5(gzungs 'dus): spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la ci nus mchod nasaphyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub
60a6(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing sngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas te/ bcom ldan
60a7(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rigs sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang
60a8(gzungs 'dus): don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnod pa stobs che'i stobs chen po'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsod kyi gzhi 'di
60b1(gzungs 'dus): dag smras so// gang la la bzhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ gzhan ga lnga rgya cher yang dag par rab du ston tam/ bsgri bskang byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed
60b2(gzungs 'dus): dam/ mchod par byed na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams can gshig pa dang / bcom pa dang skyel bar yod
60b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rigs kyi mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas byung ba smras so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das
60b4(gzungs 'dus): kyis rjes su thugs rangs par mdzadapas/ don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs po che dpag tu ste/ pas/ pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang
60b5(gzungs 'dus): sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM badz+dzata mahA pa lA ha na da ha/ btsa bo d+hA na sa ya/ dza li tI li/ lam po ud tsum+ba d+hA hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas
60b6(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang lo la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs
60b7(gzungs 'dus): 'di thos nas 'dzin tam 'chang dang / klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror 'apyid dam/ mchod par 'byed na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du dag
60b8(gzungs 'dus): bskur bar 'gyuraro// gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bstobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ srin po'i bu 'am
61a1(gzungs 'dus): rdul dum gyi bu 'am/ zul bum gyi'u 'am/ namakhar lding 'am/ na mkha' lding gi bu'am/ klu las klu'i bu'am/ dri za'am num/ sha za'am/ sha za'i bu
61a2(gzungs 'dus): sgo byed dam spyi byad kyi bu 'am/ mkhar 'gro ma 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma'i bu ma 'am/ grub pa 'am/ sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byang dang / lus sbrul po dang / ro langs
61a3(gzungs 'dus): lo sogs pa dang / gcod pa'i tha don thams cad dang / brjed byed la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di
61a4(gzungs 'dus): skad ces bka' bstsal to// gcod pa'i gnod/ thams cad med pa gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ leg so legs so// / stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 
61a5(gzungs 'dus): phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lagan
61a6(gzungs 'dus): rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyid pa dang / phyag 'gyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor ba bgyis pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so// 
61a7(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi bzhi smras pa// // oM hUM hUM hUMphaT phaT phaT lag na mdung rtse gsum
61a8(gzungs 'dus): thogs pa drag shul can/ hAM hAM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ai dze ti ni ra na d+ha/ hUM hAM hUM/ A~M IM IM/ stobs po che la swA hA/ oM rdo rje khro bo stong sa bai che/ ha na ha na pa tsa ma thA bi ki ra khid dan/ 
61b1(gzungs 'dus): sa ya dzi ti la/ laM po dar/ u nu shwa kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba duSh+TA na/ sAM b+hA ya/ staM b+hA ya/ du ra tsa ran duSh+TAn ni ba ra ya/ bdag la srungs shig/ srungs shig swA hA/ oM A
61b2(gzungs 'dus): nanAM ta bi tsa ya/ ma hA tsan+d+ra hUM phaT swA hA/ i d+haM ga hUM phaT/ oM shi re shi re ma lI na/ si ni si ni/ shi shi ni shi shi ni/ oM sarba ad ma tsa/ ma ha d+he dz+re/ badz+ra a she Sha ni/ badz+ra pa sha a nu
61b3(gzungs 'dus): pra bi sh+ya sarba duSh+Tan/ sta~M b+hai ya/ sti b+hU ya/ hU~M paTaM/ oM hUM d+han d+ha b+hanad+d+ha/ oM hUM a nan ta/ bi dza ya/ ma hA tsan+nap+tAd+h+we hUM phaT/ oM phaT baT pAT/ badz+ra k+Shod+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kar+Na
61b4(gzungs 'dus): ka ra ka ra d+ha tshin+ta tshan+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta maNihA ba le d+hi ka d+ha ka dza la dza le hUM phaT/ oM bi sU ra kra ni badz+ra pa ni re dza hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li badz+re/ badz+ra bu 'ur b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha
61b5(gzungs 'dus): hUM phaT/ au badz+ra kr-i ta ma hA ba la/ a karaSha ya/ a ka ra Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra ya da ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la da
61b6(gzungs 'dus): na ha na/ da ra da ra dA ra/ da ra ya da ra ya/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya hUM paT+Ta/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ ud cung ShA kro d+ha shi ka ha ra hA ra hUM phaT/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
61b7(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// gnod byin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tsha'o// oM badz+ra kr-i d+hI maM hI tsan TaM/ ha na ha na h+ya pa tsa ma tha pi ki ro byed bad+yAn sA ya/ bcom ldan 'das
61b8(gzungs 'dus): tshu ra gshegs tshur bshegs// ha na ha na/ ha ra ha raHd+ha ha d+ha ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bid d+ha na sa ya/ byid d+hen sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ 
62a1(gzungs 'dus): las skyes pa/ gzi brjid chen po// su ru su ru mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ b+hu ru g+hu ru/ kurba kurba/ ma hA kurba bi kurbar+tha ku nang Ti ku nad Ti/ na tin ti/ shi ni shi ni/ 
62a2(gzungs 'dus): khi ni khi ni/ kha kha kha hi kha~M hi/ khu ru khu ru/ ku Ta ku Ta/ tud ta tu data/ tad Ta tad Ta/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi khyer rnam par 'dzums
62a3(gzungs 'dus): par byed pa khro bo 'chol ba stobs pa che/ d+ha ma d+hu ma/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru su ru pu ru/ hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ d+hA ha d+ha pra br-i hUM phaT/ pA tsa ba tsa hU~M phaT hri hUM hUMts+tsha pha
62a4(gzungs 'dus): phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu ru sUhA// oM 'akro d+ha ma hA ba la/ sarba duSh+TAn na ma/ Sh+TAM b+ha ya Sh+TA b+hA ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya hUM/ baiT/ au ha ha/ sa rA sa ra/ bai si ra bi sa
62a5(gzungs 'dus): ra g+hA te ya g+hA ta ya/ ai baM se ra ya hUM// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma ha ba la/ he ra ha ra/ khI khA khA hai khA hi/ na sha ya hUM phaT/ hU~M hUM ma ma mam phaT/ au b+haka ko d+ha ni// bdag
62a6(gzungs 'dus): la srungs shig/ srungs shig/ oM ma hA ba la badz+ra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ bAn+d+ha b+had+d+ha hUM phaT swAhA// oM dza la grA sa/ u rbu shwa sam g+ha ra hUM/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtse bzhi pa
62a7(gzungs 'dus): dag kyang srung ba dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur// dug gis gnod par mi 'gyur/ shi ba sos pa
62a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// dge rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// bu mang bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs kyang gtsang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// las thams cad
62b1(gzungs 'dus): kyang nus par 'gyur ro// gdug pa zin pa la khyor chus 'gyu ro// dug thams cad krung dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur ro// mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo yang bde bar btsal bar 'a
62b2(gzungs 'dus): r-i mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyuraro// zhag bdun bcangs ni zhi ba chen po 'gyuraro// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag po r-ig sngags 'chang stong phrag du mas bskor
62b3(gzungs 'dus): ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'di nas langs te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub
62b4(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag rjel 'di skad ces smras so// stobs po che bsnan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa lag na
62b5(gzungs 'dus): dga' ba dang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / pa dang / dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang ro langs pa lus sbrul po dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang / 
62b6(gzungs 'dus): smyo byed dang / sprod pa dang / gsod pa dang / skye mas byed dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / brtan pa dang / rdo rje rnams par 'joms pa las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil
62b7(gzungs 'dus): 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas thams cad dang ldan 'ba'i 'khor gyis/ 'byung ba'i bdag
62b8(gzungs 'dus): po dbang bdag la/ 'thung ba'i bdag po legs so legs so// zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji rdzas de/ rjesi la zhugs pa'i tshul gis zhugs nas
63a1(gzungs 'dus): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs te// rdo rje mi gzang pa khrib chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
63a2(gzungs 'dus): nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad snying rje tsho ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dga' ba kun du ston pa zhes bya
63a3(gzungs 'dus): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes
63a4(gzungs 'dus): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
63a5(gzungs 'dus): stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la leg na rdo rje ngom dag nAn du sngar / de nas rdo rje pad ma la gnas pa'i
63a6(gzungs 'dus): tshul gyis gnas nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lo rnam par ltas te/ rdo rje mi zad pa khro bo chen po sbrul gyi sku rags kyis brgyan pa/ dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba
63a7(gzungs 'dus): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// zla tshal pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma'ang ring / gzir dra dag gis mthong ngo // de dag tshig nas smye ning/ 
63a8(gzungs 'dus): srog btang ste/ bsreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing / nyam theg pa'i skad kyis ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gum du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu sgyur du
63b1(gzungs 'dus): gsol/ byang chub sems dpas yongasu skyabs du gsol// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo tshal bas gzir cing myos te/ 'phongs nas srog la mi lta'o// 
63b2(gzungs 'dus): nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma khro bo 'di ni mthu che brdzu 'phrul cha
63b3(gzungs 'dus): de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o// khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che'o// mthu che ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang
63b4(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ seng ge'i lha stangs kyis bltas nas/ 'byung ba'i bdag po khro tshol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa
63b5(gzungs 'dus): smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma ha pa la/ na d+ha ha na pa tsa/ dza ti la lam bo d+ha ra/ u tsUSh+pa kro ta hU~M phaT/ a a ma had sUhA// grogs po gang gang la la zhig khro bo sto
63b6(gzungs 'dus): pi che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na/ de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyuraro// dus me yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la drag po'i las dang / nad thams
63b7(gzungs 'dus): tshugs par 'gyur ro// !khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga ya lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'gyur// 'dir dbang bskur na/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par+ya 'gyu ro// dpal gyis byin gyis
63b8(gzungs 'dus): bslabs par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo chen pos lan khrir sngar spyad par byas pa bzob// rgyud shes pa gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skabs su song ba/ byang chub kyi
63b9(gzungs 'dus): del dang breg dang log dren pad kyis blas rnyed mi 'gyu skye thod dag lnga tshur zhi shu ga nags si gre thaM krung ba la'o// 
64a1(gzungs 'dus): sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyis lung 'byin pa/ gang bdud thams cad dang
64a2(gzungs 'dus): sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de bdud dang / ngag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin
64a3(gzungs 'dus): dang / srin po dang / yid bdags dang / sha za dang sbrul po dang / lus / sbrul po dang / namakha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa thams
64a4(gzungs 'dus): dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par/ 'gyur ro// rmugs byed dang rings byed dang / rmongs byed logs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// klu'i 'jigs pa thang
64a5(gzungs 'dus): las thar par gyur ro// bkra mi shis pa tha las thar bar 'gyur ro// sems can dbul po la la zhig gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum 'chang ngam/ klog gem/ yid la byed pa
64a6(gzungs 'dus): rjes su dran par byed na/ dngul po'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro// lo nyes byung ba'i tshe stobs po che lam bdud bzlas na/ sprin chen po las char 'bab po/ gal te char me 'bad na/ 
64a7(gzungs 'dus): sprin gyi lnga rnams kyi srog skams par 'gyur/ klu'i rgyal po nag dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa rgyal po rnams kyis spen chen po las 'beb so// gal te mi 'ab na
64a8(gzungs 'dus): srog skams par 'gyur ro// gang du smos pa'i chog bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/ klung gi ngos sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'bram 'am/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa'
64b1(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan dan dmar po dang / kA ra pa'i ri me tog dang / pad ma dmar po dang / a ti mug ta ka'i mi tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang
64b2(gzungs 'dus): ba dan dmar mo la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas/ gang mdo sde 'chang ba'am/ klog pa de dag g.yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// sems can thams
64b3(gzungs 'dus): cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// stobs po che rgyal mtshan la bdags te/ g.yul ngon song na/ pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur
64b4(gzungs 'dus): gsang sngags grog la bris te spyi bor/ btags na/ g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan
64b5(gzungs 'dus): gsum bskor ba bya te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
64b6(gzungs 'dus): bka' bstsal pa/ stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi phung po'o// stobs po che zhes ni/ chos kyi tshul lo// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ 
64b7(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so skyabs su mchi'o// sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun
64b8(gzungs 'dus): la skyabs su mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen gi yan lag bzung bar bgyi'o/ bde dang thar pa dang mtho ris dang / mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/ dam pa kun la
65a1(gzungs 'dus): phan pa'i phyir/ bstobs po che zhes bzung bar bgyi// de nas bdud sdig can chos la dga' zhing / yid bde ba dang / rangs par gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces/ 
65a2(gzungs 'dus): bka' bsngal to// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yid dgas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar
65a3(gzungs 'dus): byed do// de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed pa 'gyuraro// bskal pa mtha' yas par gling gzhi la dbang byed pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang
65a4(gzungs 'dus): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa 'am// srung ba byas pa 'am/ sbyang ba
65a5(gzungs 'dus): ma byas pa 'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la bsgre/ pa yang 'grub par byed do// de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro// de na/ ste rab 'byor 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur pas/ bcom ldan
65a6(gzungs 'dus): 'das rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po tshe ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig gsol pa dang / brtsi ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal paM/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris
65a7(gzungs 'dus): shig/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ dam ma ci zhig sbyin par byed lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed
65a8(gzungs 'dus): gos sbyin par byed do// dngul sbyin pa byin par byed de/ gau gser sbyin par byed do// bablang sbyin par byed do// dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de byin par byed do// rab 'byor rgyu
65a9(gzungs 'dus): smras pa/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ lago na rdo rjes smras pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin to// sems cam nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i dus su gnas
65b1(gzungs 'dus): 'bras bu'i dus kyi yon tan gyi don du gyis bla na med pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lags na rdo rje legaso legs
65b2(gzungs 'dus): gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/ gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun gsum tshogs/ sbyin nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs/ mtshan dang yang dag ldan
65b3(gzungs 'dus): skye sbyin dang tshul khrims/ shes rab che/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ dbang che ri grags shing bsod nams rtse/ yon rin rtse mo stobs pa che// mdo sde 'di la dbang
65b4(gzungs 'dus): phyir/ sangs rgyas brgyad stong 'dir gshegs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje mdo ste 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor gzhag ste/ dag
65b5(gzungs 'dus): bar byed par 'gyur ro// gang gis gzugs sngags 'di sa 'am/ ri 'am/ klung gi ngos sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med par
65b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// su mdo sde 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu / 
65b7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / bro nad ma mchis ber lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// yang lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ chos kyi rnams gengs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar zung bar bgyi// bcom ldan
65b8(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig// chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung
66a1(gzungs 'dus): shwe/ de na na ga shegs pa rnams cad mas kyu sa d+ma ba drug zung rgyas nas byu yang rung shig/ sgyu sa rlung ba rnams cad kyi rgyas ba nas bya bar yang
66a2(gzungs 'dus): bzung shig/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba ro zung shon/ chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zi shig/ rigs sngags
66a3(gzungs 'dus): kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ chos kyi gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes mang 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug
66a4(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / bsti bsnang du byed pa dang / zlum byed pa dang rim gror byed pa dang / mchod par byed 'das pa dang / ma 'apa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
66a5(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod de byas par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rden sku bcas pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur
66a6(gzungs 'dus): lag ni rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// shin du zab pa'i chos ston pa/ 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi chos brgyan gyi chos bstan par bzung bar bgyi'o// 
66a7(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams/ chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rung bar 'gyur/ 
66a8(gzungs 'dus): spos dang / me tog dang / gdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag du med pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// mdosde
66b1(gzungs 'dus): 'di gnas gang yang rung ba ni 'chang na/ lha dang mir bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs pa che 'gags dang log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byedan
66b2(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang // drang sring chen po rnams dang / lha dang klu dang / dI zar bcas pa dag gis dag pa'o// slobs
66b3(gzungs 'dus): che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dogs pa'i dus kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes su mdo sde 'di la
66b4(gzungs 'dus): gus par byed pa dang // rim gror byed pa mchod par byed pa de la bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yig 'bru 'am/ tshig nyan na
66b5(gzungs 'dus): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thong bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes gsol ba/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyapa shin du zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyad pa
66b6(gzungs 'dus): sems can rnams kyi nang na/ gangang sems pa de mos par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba bdag po lag ni rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don
66b7(gzungs 'dus): phyir/ mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa gsal ba dang / zhi bar byed pa dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / skur bam bya ba dang / dbang bskur bar bya
66b8(gzungs 'dus): bo dang / bkra mi shes pa thams cod las thar bar bya ba dang / dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cing byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad blan mong
67a1(gzungs 'dus): g.yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par nga ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o// daci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad stong dang bar mdzad nas/ de bzhin gtses
67a2(gzungs 'dus): pa shAkya thub pa la bskor ba lan gsum mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs sa legs so// mngon par dgas par mdzod do// de nas de bzhinas
67a3(gzungs 'dus): pa shAkya thub pas/ sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag legs par gsungs pa rab tu gsungs pa legaso leg so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
67a4(gzungs 'dus): basprul pa/ skyobs po che'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' lags na rdo rjes sdud ba'i bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
67a5(gzungs 'dus): kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po phyag 'tshal lo// 
67a6(gzungs 'dus): tad+yar+m+ma oM han tan badz+nyA/ dad ha badz+nyA/ btsa ba tsad+hadza/ mthAm paH/ dza ladz+wa la trang la/ su ru sa ru mu rA mu ru/ kAShang ka to/ nga la ba~M dza ya me/ a dza te/ A ra
67a7(gzungs 'dus): mA ro s+yAn+ya/ pra mararA da ne ya~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i bsngal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po li ga ni rdo rje bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig/ sdig
67a8(gzungs 'dus): shig / tshangs shig tshangs shig/ rnam par chings shig/ ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/ grub pa rnams dul bar byis shig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dzid
67b1(gzungs 'dus): 'bab par gyis shig/ lha dang klu rnams tshur shog tshur shog/ nga stobs po che'i khro bo 'di'i mthus dge bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ 
67b2(gzungs 'dus): zla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
67b3(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ bya chub sems dpa' 'jam
67b4(gzungs 'dus): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhon cig/ 'du byed// thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni kr-in dang sprin dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni khyim nga
67b5(gzungs 'dus): 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni mar me dang 'a'o// 'du byed thams cad ni chu'i chu bur dang 'dri'o// 'du byed thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni
67b6(gzungs 'dus): dri mo'i rnam po dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'drol/ 'du byed thams cad ni bde ba dang bsdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni bde ba dang
67b7(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal gyi rlung dang 'dral// 'khrug par gyur pas rgya mtsho dang 'drar/ skar ma dang 'dra'o// sems can rnams kyi 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mo sems/ mi mthong mi shes
67b8(gzungs 'dus): mi 'jal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'jal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// 'du byed tha~Md stong panyid
68a1(gzungs 'dus): du mtshan nyid gcigs par mkhyen to// don pa stong pa nyid du mkhyen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyim tshan nyid du mkhyen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi man
68a2(gzungs 'dus): nyid du mkhyen to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen do// de bzhino nyid pas bstong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di
68a3(gzungs 'dus): nyid mthong zhing / mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes te/ spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson
68a4(gzungs 'dus): 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab tu pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems
68a5(gzungs 'dus): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis// bcom ldan 'das la la ni gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ 
68a6(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'dri mtshan nyid gang gis na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
68a7(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe// de bzhini gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur te/ mtshan
68a8(gzungs 'dus): nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di yong su nub par gyur gyi dus kyi sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang yongasu nub par 'gyur te/ 
68b1(gzungs 'dus): mtshan nyid nges na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sngo ring 'tsho zhi myong na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing stod te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin
68b2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// den
68b3(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa saras gzigs dbang phyug gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rjesuM yid rang nas/ bko' lung bzhin du bgyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gam du 'i'achi'o// zhes gsol pa
68b4(gzungs 'dus): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsgral pa/ mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus/ sangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo // 
68b5(gzungs 'dus): lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gas to// legs so legs so// bdag cag kyang dam pa stsol par mngon pa dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
68b6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid rtsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i ngag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi
68b7(gzungs 'dus): kyi snying po ni sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad kyang sbyin par byed pa'o// de nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lan
68b8(gzungs 'dus): na rdo rje 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis na/ mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs
69a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ zhagasum bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyon mo ba dang brdung chen por ste mdo sde 'di nyid kyi chos bstan pa ma
69a2(gzungs 'dus): des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dpa' bo bskyed pa la gnas de/ mtshan nyid des
69a3(gzungs 'dus): na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde 'ar 'chang ba dang / 
69a4(gzungs 'dus): klog pas de bzhin ga shegs pa thams/ cad kyi sras su 'du shes bskyed do// 'khor 'di nyid du mamI ba'i dus byas nA/ s+ya/ ngan la las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog pa
69a5(gzungs 'dus): mdzad do// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor bar dkod dka' sems can gyi srid pa'i phur po'i byin cing na rab kyi// srid phur sems lhung 'joms
69a6(gzungs 'dus): zhing thub pa na/ chos snyan pa ni sdig 'joms legs chos spyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ log na rdo rje legs pa'i nub tu bshad pa legs so// lag
69a7(gzungs 'dus): nArdo rjes gsol pa/ su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par spyod pas/ bsod nams kyi phung po zhig thob par 'gyur// bcoM ldan 'das
69a8(gzungs 'dus): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin bye ba thob par 'gyur ro// 
69b1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bye ba
69b2(gzungs 'dus): phrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti bstang du byed par 'gyur ro// bla mar byed par 'gyur// rim 'gror byed par 'gyur ro// mchod par byed par 'gyur
69b3(gzungs 'dus): gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang ye byad rnams dbul lo// byang chub sems dpa' la yang bde bar sbyar ba sbub pa'o// dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang rim 'dra
69b4(gzungs 'dus): byed par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba dedag/ kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da
69b5(gzungs 'dus): por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag yang rim 'gro byed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis chos bstan pa yang bsgo bstang du byas te/ nyan te len to// 'dzin to/ 
69b6(gzungs 'dus): klog go// byang chub sems dpa' lag la rdo rje ji ltar dang mtshungs par stobs po ches pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// stobs po ches pha rol gnon pa'i khro bo 'di'i mthus
69b7(gzungs 'dus): bdag dang sems can thams cad las ste/ sid d+he sid rtse swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpa' das
69b8(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
70a1(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang dri za dang lA ma yin dang / 
70a2(gzungs 'dus): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye tshon po dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag lag na rdo rje yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
70a3(gzungs 'dus): mngon par stod do// 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogas+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ga thA dA ya d+ha ra ni/ 
70a4(gzungs 'dus): bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa/ 'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// / sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / 
70a5(gzungs 'dus): le lo dang ni cung tsam chog par 'dzin// 'did chags dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang mdzes byed pa dang / sos can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste/ de'i
70a6(gzungs 'dus): gnyen po theg pa mchog bsnun pa/ de la rab tu gcod pa de dag go/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur// tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pra ka ra/ badz+ra pra kar/ badz+ra tsa
70a7(gzungs 'dus): dang shA rA ya ke/ a ma le b+hi ma le/ nir ma le/ tsu lu ke tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sarba bu d+he swA hAM/ tshig su gcad pa gnyis kyi gzungs la ni/ tshig gam don gyi sgo
70a8(gzungs 'dus): nas gang sbyor ba/ sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des/ phan yin rnam pa bcu dge thob par 'gyur/ khams rnams mtha' dag rgyas par gyur pa dang / mchi ba'i tshe na mchog dga'
70b1(gzungs 'dus): dam pathog/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang / thams cad du ni tshe rangs dran par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang / phrad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin de dag la ni theg mchog
70b2(gzungs 'dus): thos// mos par gyur pa blo dang bcas pa dang / sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du thob/ tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ a r+yab la
70b3(gzungs 'dus): kai ti shwa ra/ e ki da sha mu khA d+ha ni nu ma d+har naM/ bod skad du/ 'bigs pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyaskye dang byang chu
70b4(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' thams cad la byi ga'i tsha'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dang phrug rig sngags 'chang dums yongs su bsgo
70b5(gzungs 'dus): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas gabacom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba nas/ phyogs
70b6(gzungs 'dus): gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag bcu gcig gsungs pa
70b7(gzungs 'dus): lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bro nang thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / sdig pa dang / bkra li shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang / dus
70b8(gzungs 'dus): ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang / ma zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad du bshad par
71a1(gzungs 'dus): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrungs par bgyid pa dang / yongs su sgrub pa dang / yongs su bzung ba bgyis pa dang // zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa
71a2(gzungs 'dus): dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshan che spang ba dang / dug gzhol bar bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa
71a3(gzungs 'dus): dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong bram ze dang bcas pa dag gis mthong ste/ sngon las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma rtogs lags// snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa
71a4(gzungs 'dus): lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying ngo // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs rangs par mdzad do// btso/ ldan 'das bdag gis dran lagag te/ 
71a5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma brgya'i spyan gtsug na/ chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer
71a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las gnos lags te/ thob ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/ 
71a7(gzungs 'dus): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces smras bgyid pa lagaso// de ltar lags pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus pa
71a8(gzungs 'dus): bgyis la/ snying po 'di brjod par bgyi'o// gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu spyod par bgyi'o// nang par langs nas brgya rtsa badzin na/ tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongasu 'dzin par/ 
71b1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ zo nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / des sgrim mtshal bar nor dang 'bru dang / dbyig
71b2(gzungs 'dus): rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dag thams cad kyang 'khrugs shing thul par 'gyur ba dang // rgyal po'i 'tshogs pa rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang / lus
71b3(gzungs 'dus): la dug gyis mi tshugs pa dang / dbyig drug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba lags so// mtshan chas mi tshugs pa dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus 'gyid
71b4(gzungs 'dus): par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gus pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus/ bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lagaso// gzhan
71b5(gzungs 'dus): yang yon tan bzhi yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyis tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur dang / ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba
71b6(gzungs 'dus): dang yang dam srungs pas 'dul 'byed par mi 'gyur bar du/ 'di nam shrI'abs nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khangs bde bcan du skyes par 'gyur ba lags so// ma ldan
71b7(gzungs 'dus): 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang gi klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gis snga rol gyis yang snga rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa man+dA ra ba'i gzung
71b8(gzungs 'dus): zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pa'i 'di bzung na bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor stsol lags so// bdag gi snying po gton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
72a1(gzungs 'dus): thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa'i yis kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thos lags so// gang dag bcings pas bcings pa rnams pa dang / gang dag bcing ba la thun
72a2(gzungs 'dus): pa rnams dang / chab dang zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gis 'di gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dgyi'o/ 
72a3(gzungs 'dus): gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dris bkug par byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyis te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god
72a4(gzungs 'dus): par 'byo'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyid/ po 'di ni de lhor rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so// lan cig brjod pa tsamagyis rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byung
72a5(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dge kyang ma lus par byang bar 'gyid par gyur na/ ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lnga ci smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 
72a6(gzungs 'dus): de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / bsgrub pa
72a7(gzungs 'dus): lha ci smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// su zhig nang bar bdag gi slad du/ chos bcu bzhi 'am/ bcwo lnga la nyung ba 'gyis
72a8(gzungs 'dus): na/ bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ming 'dzin cing don mchis te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag 'bum pas lhag par lags so// 
72b1(gzungs 'dus): bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid pa gnas par 'gyur// bro nad thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad dang lus dang
72b2(gzungs 'dus): ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongasu thar 'gyur lags so// la la zhig cho ga bzhin sbyar bar bgyid na/ de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob lag
72b3(gzungs 'dus): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad rje
72b4(gzungs 'dus): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnal dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing rjes su yid rang dpa byas kyi/ rigs kyi bu khyod spros shig/ de na
72b5(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug spyan las langs te/ bla gas phrag pa cig dugasanas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la man
72b6(gzungs 'dus): bas phyag 'tshal nas// snying po 'di smras so// num rang na tra ma yA/ na mo Ar+yA dz+nyA na sa sa b+ha / ra tsan/ b+hU tA ra dzi yA/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te sa myaka sam+b+ha bud ma nam
72b7(gzungs 'dus): sum+ba to thA g+ha te b+h+yo/ a ra ha te b+h+ya si myag sa~M bu N+yeb+h+ya/ na ma a h+ye a ba la ko ti shwa ra ya/ b+h+yo d+hi sa dang yin meng+ge sad ta ma/ mahA ka ru ni ka ya// tad+yo thA/ oM d+hi re d+hi
72b8(gzungs 'dus): ra ga tu ru ed tri bi tre/ tsi lo tsa le/ bA tsal rna ma'i/ shu su saM ku su 'o// de ma mi ma ma me cid te rdzas ma pan me dzu 'di'i tshigano 'i me dgas par ma
73a1(gzungs 'dus): thams cad byed de/ rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin dran pa dang / 'byung po dang / namakha' 'gro ba dang / dred dang / lus sprul
73a2(gzungs 'dus): po dang / brjed byed dang / lbu ba dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / bas ljags la sogs pa dang / dug dang po la maMg na ba la sogs pa la 'jim pa la sngags te sku'o// lan bdun
73a3(gzungs 'dus): bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa spyong nga bar bgyid do// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro// rnab rnga bo 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro// 
73a4(gzungs 'dus): bro 'tshal ba la ni gro ba btags nas des tezhi bar 'gyur ro// bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyis te/ klan pas grub pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
73a5(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a par mi ta/ b+hu na shA sa na mA d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yon
73a6(gzungs 'dus): dan sngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal loni/ na mo rlon tra ya yA/ nA mo b+h+r-i ga ba ti/ a mi mi ti ba ya/ ta thA ga ta yA/ ar d+he saM myag
73a7(gzungs 'dus): saM bud d+ha yA/ tad thA/ au a mr-i tau/ a mri tod ba b+he a rmita saM b+ha d+hai/ oM mri ta bi dan ta ga mi ni ge ga ne/ ke ri ti ka ri tai/ sarba ke sha ya ka ra sA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni
73b1(gzungs 'dus): 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa byung bar 'gyur ro// nyin re bzhin dus sum du bzlas brjod byas ma/ sdig pa thams cad byung bar 'gyur ro// 
73b2(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas sdong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i tsa ba thob par 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ rtsa ba'i lhung ba bzhi po byang bar 'gyur ro// lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas/ 
73b3(gzungs 'dus): na/ 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// lan nyi shu 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// lan sum 'bum bzlas
73b4(gzungs 'dus): brjod byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'odi dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro// yon gzhan yang mang du yong na/ mdor bsdus nas bstan par yin no// 'phags
73b5(gzungs 'dus): pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzung rdzogs s+ho// // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la/ dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs
73b6(gzungs 'dus): sngags dang bcas pa dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad stong rje can cin ngan
73b7(gzungs 'dus): dri zhim po'i spos kyis byug pa'i sku zhabs kyi rten gyi baidam la lha dang lha min gyi nor bu'i phan gyis gdugs pa rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa/ ston
73b8(gzungs 'dus): pa de bzhin gshegaso banyis pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid cin gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsol ba'i gzi brjid can/ suM dpe byad kyis brgyan pa yon tan thams
74a1(gzungs 'dus): yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma rgyas par nal bzhad te/ mtshams dkar ning snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la/ nor bu dri ma med
74a2(gzungs 'dus): ba ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ snang zhing gsal ba nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas 'bar ba mang po'i 'bar ba mang po'i 'bar ba mang po 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa
74a3(gzungs 'dus): mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dud do// oM b+ho hUM hUM/ a a hi ti shi ba shing/ shan tri/ shan ti/ sha ma sha ma/ sha ma bA ya/ tapra ta nug
74a4(gzungs 'dus): swa b+ha lAHa b+ha wa/ sa mud daM ya/ a saM ma pa la/ aubi ra la pa la/ a mi ta ba la/ a mi ta pa la/ g+hud g+hud/ d+ho'u d+heru/ b+ho'u b+he'u/ b+h+re du
74a5(gzungs 'dus): b+h+re du hi hi/ b+ha ga wan ta ka/ su ra ta/ b+ho b+ha ma hA/ shan ti kar/ pa pA ki la/ bi sha na sha ka swA hA/ de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal ba/ yan lag
74a6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad rab brgyan cing / nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba po// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor brgyan mnga' ba/ grags shing dri ma rab spangs pa/ dri med skyon bral chos kyi bla// 
74a7(gzungs 'dus): khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan// rdul bral dpal ldan pa po// rin chen sa bzhi chen po la/ pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/ nor
74a8(gzungs 'dus): bu du ma rab 'phro zhing // 'od zer dri med gsal dkod pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor po brang na// thub pa'i long spyod sa zhi la// seng ge'i khri chen yangs la 'dag/ nor bu'i dbyig
74b1(gzungs 'dus): gis sa bzhi gang // khri chen rab sa de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dges chen gyi// phun sum tshogs pa brgyan bkod ltar// thub pa me lnga nor bu'i 'od// 'od zer gnon
74b2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde blag shin du bkra shis tshul// 'od gsal dkyil mo dkrungs bcas nas// sku mdog 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can// 'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang ga/ 
74b3(gzungs 'dus): dri med 'od zer dkye ba ni// mr-i g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/ dkyil 'khor chen por bzhugs pa mi// rdo rje can dag rab bdul ba/ gang yin de dag kun byas nas// dkyil ma
74b4(gzungs 'dus): dri med sbyor bar byed/ ngan song dri med de/ ma dag/ legs par shin du dag byas nas// sridagasum dkyil 'khor rgya che ba// rnam pa du ma 'ong gas
74b5(gzungs 'dus): ba/ 'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa// bskur nas bde chen rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/ cod pan ma g.yos nang du bzhugs/ de nas 'jigs pa'i
74b6(gzungs 'dus): sgra skad kyis// 'gyengs shing mig ni klog 'gyu/ rig sngags hUM nas sgrogs pa po// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs pa byed// bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan// 
74b7(gzungs 'dus): smig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing / bstan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ legs par mchod byas smras pa ni/ kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing / bskal pa du
74b8(gzungs 'dus): ma'i dri ma se ma/ rig sngags yon tan bsrub byed pa/ thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ de gzigs dge 'du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas sde
75a1(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyang ngas kyang chud par sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhig/ srung ba du ma 'byung ba yi/ yod tan brgya'i spos ldan 'di/ 
75a2(gzungs 'dus): thos pas spro bar mi nus so// longs spyod rgya 'tsho chen po nyan// byang chub sems 'chog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchag rnams kyi dang bkur ba'i// phyir mi log pa'i sa chen ldan 'a
75a3(gzungs 'dus): thos sangs rgyas spyad pa yi// sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams ni mi lus rab chu bas la nas ni/ zo chen dri ma med par 'gyur// zhi zhing dag byed bkra shes pa// brdul med brgyan te zhi bar
75a4(gzungs 'dus): byed// dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms da gsong sngags dam pa ste/ sa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel// ma smad 'bras
75a5(gzungs 'dus): bude bar sbyin// bstan pa yin te dad pa btul nyes pa byas pa sel ba yi/ gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur nges/ sangs rgyas brnyes pa dka' ba yin// ring po mi thogs thob
75a6(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rab zhi zhing / khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba// gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yi// kun du bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang thob
75a7(gzungs 'dus): rigs sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang / 'dabs thos ni thod par 'gyul// 'jig rten kun la lam me ba/ bcom ldan par snang mdzad kyang // dkyil 'khor dam pa cing med
75a8(gzungs 'dus): pa/ 'di ni ji srid ma gsan par// rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'phang ma rnyes te/ rnam par dag phyir gnas gyur nas/ gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ de phyir phun sum
75b1(gzungs 'dus): phun sum tshogs pa dang / legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/ gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas/ thub pa kun gyis gang rnyes pa/ 'khor ba 'di ni nam du yang / bdud kyi las dang khrug sde/ 
75b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/ gzugs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur/ gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang // thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/ gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i// 
75b3(gzungs 'dus): bzang 'gro de ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ legs par 'dod pa rnams kyis ni// nyon mongs zad par bya ba la rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gdungs 'dis mchog/ sdig pa byed cing dag la sdang // sdug pa
75b4(gzungs 'dus): rang bzhin rab 'jugs pa// gang gis thos nas de spong ba/ nga yi mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur/ sdig pa gzhan yang / mi bya zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bshags par
75b5(gzungs 'dus): gzungs mchog gi ni mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan ni spong dag dang / tshe rabs bye ba ga brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa// 
75b6(gzungs 'dus): dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// yar kyi ngo ni tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin tshes ni bcwo lnga la// banyen gnas legs par lhur blangs pas// cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med
75b7(gzungs 'dus): par yang // nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'jams shing // shin du dga' thub dpe med pa// nyes pa bzlog pa'i gzungs brjod na// thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nyes par mthong
75b8(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur// des ni tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi// rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur/ 'od dpag med las mtha mnga' ba yi// yon tan mtha' yas rabu rgyas pa// bskal pa byed
76a1(gzungs 'dus): stong du yang / mtha' mi rtogs par thob par 'gyur/ de nas dzin 'chang gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis// thos nas brgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das
76a2(gzungs 'dus): la 'dul bar byed// rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/ lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang / ri bo te se ri rab la/ gnas pa'i rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang / de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/ 'jo
76a3(gzungs 'dus): pa'i rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang / ma la ya'i raM 'o la// gnas shing brgyan par thogs rnams dang // khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs// lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ 
76a4(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/ nor bu'i dpung brgyan rna cha dang / rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus// rab tu bsgo de ladra nas ni// sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la// phyag 'tshal
76a5(gzungs 'dus): thal mo sbyar nas kyang // kun gyisa'i dbang phyug/ po// thub mchog dam pa de la ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis stong // mnyam nyid chos de bzhin nyid // shin du rtog pa lam me ba/ dul
76a6(gzungs 'dus): pa brtan po dri ma sel// dri ma med pa skyon dang bral// thub pa sangs rgyas shin du ni// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul gsal ba
76a7(gzungs 'dus): bston pa bstan mdzad brtan pa ste// sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/ ston pa po
76a8(gzungs 'dus): ste dri ma sel// spod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/ zab pa rnam par gnon pa btan/ brtan po thugs brtse rnam par rnam par nga rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// snyan zhi ba'i bdag
76b1(gzungs 'dus): nyid zhe sdang dral// bcings pa las grol nges par grol ka/ 'jig rten mgon po snga kun mchog khra ba'i sa bdag gis mi 'dzin dri ma med/ ngan song sel ba dpal dang ldan// dpal ldan de bzhin pan
76b2(gzungs 'dus): pa mdzad// mnyam pa med par dpe med pa// khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams grol// khengs pa med pa dman pa ste// mnyam pa de bzhin me mnyam mnyam// snang ba rnyes pa snang byed med/ 
76b3(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa/ sgrib pa thams cad baspangs pa ste/ 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo zhi ba ni mdzad pa/ nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad// mnga' bdag
76b4(gzungs 'dus): thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/ sems can kun gyi 'jas sa lags// don yod rnyes dkar blo dang ldan/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor thungapar dka'// skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/ de
76b5(gzungs 'dus): bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dpa' chen po 'jigs pa med/ gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/ sum rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi longs spyod rgya
76b6(gzungs 'dus): mtsho lags// dpe byad bzang po dkod pa yis// sbas pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan skyon/ dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa des sbyin pa// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba// bdud
76b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhi'i stobs rnams sel bar mdzad// btson chen spyod pa che ba ste// dges pa chen po stongs po che// mthu ba rnyes brten pa chen po ste/ gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags// gsal ba gsung
76b8(gzungs 'dus): ldan dpe med pa/ dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa// phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/ 
77a1(gzungs 'dus): dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan// dpal gyi longs lang sprod shin du rgyas// bcom ldan legs sgos sgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid
77a2(gzungs 'dus): mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan dpag med// rab tu dges po longs spyod gsal// bzhi bcas sel ba mnyam nyid legs// blo dag blon ldan dri ma spangs// gnas chen brtan
77a3(gzungs 'dus): par ldan pa ste/ rgyal ba longs spyod dri ma med// thub pa thugs rje'i brgyan mnga' ba// bskal pa bzang po mi gnas 'jig rten pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'joms med nyon mongs sel// dri med
77a4(gzungs 'dus): skyon dral longs spyod ldan// sna tshogs 'o// ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes// sku bzang dge ba'i rig pa'i mchog/ thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// maM gnas long
77a5(gzungs 'dus): spyod dam pa lags/ chos kyi rgyu ste yon taganas// brjed 'os mchod gnas longs spyod che// na mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam dag zlo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shes pa Sh+ya
77a6(gzungs 'dus): mchog che sbyin pa brdzi ma/ rgyal ba skyon bral shes rab spyan// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mi dag kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod bstan pa can// sa dang stongs dang
77a7(gzungs 'dus): shes stabs/ pha rol phyin pa kun la ming nga// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/ rnam thar sgom par mngon sum par// gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos can bde bar 'char
77a8(gzungs 'dus): lags// thams cad mkhyen pa yul las 'das/ spyod yul sgrim pa mi mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don du tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/ 
77b1(gzungs 'dus): bsgrib pa med par 'bar ba brnyem rigs chen 'thun par skyes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog/ khyad par shes pa mnyam nyid rnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang ma nyaM/ don chen nin
77b2(gzungs 'dus): bumathar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral bathub par dkar// dge sbyong sdig pa skyong mdzad pa// gnod pa med par 'dra bar spyod// blo rgya che bar thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshan cha ma lus gson// dgon
77b3(gzungs 'dus): pa bde thob par 'gyur// mnyam pa khyad par yul dang ldan// 'jig rtog thams cad dang mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsom gyis mi khyab bas ma yas yul// dpe med
77b4(gzungs 'dus): pa ste dper bya ba// 'od bzang rab dges dpa' dang ldan// legs gsungs blo yis stobs kyis 'byung // mkhas pa zhalabazang 'od 'byin pa/ rab dges 'das pa'i spyod yul
77b5(gzungs 'dus): can/ gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ gnas tshwa bkra shis chen po ste/ mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/ bya ba mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste// shes
77b6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i spyod yul rgya che // kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mngar phun su tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i tha
77b7(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rang sngon yon tan sgyur mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzod// yongs su rdzogs pa rnams par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas// 
77b8(gzungs 'dus): bgegs byed ma legs byed ma bcol// bdud kyi 'gregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba rnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub med stobs// thegs pa chen po shing rnga chi bas// blo chen
78a1(gzungs 'dus): rgal bar dga' ba yi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/ nyan thos sa'i spyod yul cad// rang rgyal las kyang
78a2(gzungs 'dus): 'das pa ste/ sangs rgyas sa'i 'bras bur gnas/ gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni nam pa'i gnas na bzhugs// de 'byungs dang nang rnams kyi// mtsho chen dgal longs par smra sa
78a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ de la lha'i tshogs rnams kyis// phyag byas mgo slong phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/ gnas pa'i ma lus
78a4(gzungs 'dus): che mer 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba'i// langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil 'khor 'thon po thams cad du// skad bar chen pos yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i
78a5(gzungs 'dus): rna cha brgyan ni rab g.yo zhing // ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/ bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa// byang chub sems bsogs mchog rnams kyis// 
78a6(gzungs 'dus): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klob cing rgyal la bstod/ 'bras bu chen por 'grub par 'gyur// man/ 
78a7(gzungs 'dus): brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjod na ni// sgrib pa kun dang nyon mongs dang / sdig pa thams cad dag pa thob/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog gtan na// sdig pa kun
78a8(gzungs 'dus): las nges par grol// nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong // shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur// de ni longs spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad
78b1(gzungs 'dus): blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de las// bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis/ mngon sum gzigs nas bka' bstsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa
78b2(gzungs 'dus): 'di zhi ba ste/ nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon du phyogs// gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// #
78b3(gzungs 'dus): brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/ de dag nam dag bdag nyid de/ sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag dga' chen 'bras bur gnas// ring por mi thog
78b4(gzungs 'dus): dga' 'gyur na/ 'chang ba sogs lnga la ci zhig smos// de'i rtag du rab sgrims la/ gtan nan du bde bar 'dod pa yis// yon turgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing
78b5(gzungs 'dus): bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis kyang gton na naM/ de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang ni phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni gton pa'i
78b6(gzungs 'dus): yon tan kun// dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla med mchog/ bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin// 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung // 'bras bu thob par byed pa yin// dzan
78b7(gzungs 'dus): par mi 'gyur dgas pa med// kun mkhyen go 'phang thob par 'gyur// dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di ni dge zhing 'dras ngur ldan// sangs rgyas sa yi 'dras bur ldan// sangs rgya
78b8(gzungs 'dus): sa yi 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan// snying rje'i dri ma med sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam par nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste// 'jig rten gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di
79a1(gzungs 'dus): 'dra ba gang yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ 
79a2(gzungs 'dus): ar+ya karma a pa ra na pra ti sra ba d+hi na ma ma hA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun bcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
79a3(gzungs 'dus): dpo' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnyen yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na// dge
79a4(gzungs 'dus): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi/ dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri dang // thabs gcig tu zhugs te// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan
79a5(gzungs 'dus): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bstan las langs te/ bla gos du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga bA de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ 
79a6(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la 'di ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang tags par zhugs pa'am// sems can gzhan dag kyang
79a7(gzungs 'dus): rung ste// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas// las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi// de skad ces
79a8(gzungs 'dus): gsol par dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bskul to// sha ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhu
79b1(gzungs 'dus): pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am// sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste// bla med pa yang dag par rdzos
79b2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chen lan gsum du zla gos phrag pa cig du gzar la// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thar mo sbyar nas tshig 'dis
79b3(gzungs 'dus): hU~M bo meng mo la sman pa dang / skye bo meng pa la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs dartse ba dang / skye sel po che dang / lU dang mi rnams kyi don dang // sman pa dang bde ba'i skud byas/ 
79b4(gzungs 'dus): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogasapar sangs rgyas nas// chos kyi 'khor
79b5(gzungs 'dus): lo rab tu skor ba dang / chos kyi 'khorarab tu ston pa dang // chos kyi tshul rab du 'dzin pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad do// chos kyi sgron ma 'bar ma mdzad pa// chos kyi tshar
79b6(gzungs 'dus): rab tu 'degs pa/ chos kyi rnga rab tu rdung ba dang // chos kyi ngo bo che rab du bzung ba dang / chos kyi dung rab tu 'bung ba dang // chos kyi srog shing rab tu bsgreng ba/ sems can thams cad
79b7(gzungs 'dus): la tshus kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad de// nyams ngag tu spyod du 'dzud pa 'am// sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas// phyag
79b8(gzungs 'dus): ba'i gnasaka ri mo bgyi ba'i gnasaka mkhyen par gyur pa// spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad tsho mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa// de dag la bang
80a1(gzungs 'dus): / mgo dang / ngag yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe// bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba 'am// zhes sdang gis gzir ba 'am/ 
80a2(gzungs 'dus): gti mug gis gzir ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa gang mngon par 'du bgyis pa// sangs rgyas su ma 'tshal ba dang / chos su ma 'tshal ba dang / dge 'dun dum 'tshal
80a3(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / dge ba dang mi dge bar 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag phyung ba dang / chos spangs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dben bgyis pa dang // dge slong dgra bcom
80a4(gzungs 'dus): pa bkum pa dang / ba ma bkum pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa gsum/ ngag gi rnam par ni yid kyi rnam pa gsum ste/ mi dge cu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang / bgying
80a5(gzungs 'dus): brtsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang dang / sems can kha cig la ngag rtsub pos smras pa dang / skur pa bdab pa dang / bsra laM g.yo ga gyes pa dang / gzhal ba la gso
80a6(gzungs 'dus): bgyis pa dang // 'gro ba drug du 'khor bar 'khor na/ pha ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang / gang zag gi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge
80a7(gzungs 'dus): 'dun gyi nor gus pa dang / ji ltar bslab pa'i bani bcas parnams kyi 'dul ba dang / 'gal bar bgyis pa dang / mkhan pa dang / slob dpon gyi sgo bal mo mnyan pa dang / nyan
80a8(gzungs 'dus): kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can
80b1(gzungs 'dus): rnams la mi snyan par bgyis pa dang / smyos pa dang bdeg pa dang / de dag la tha ba dang / zhe sdang skyed pa dang / 'phra dog dang / ser sna las byung ba'i sems kyis sangs bcom ldan 'das la
80b2(gzungs 'dus): tshig rtsub mos smras pa dang / chos la chos ma lags zhes bgyi ba dang // chos ma legs pa la chos lags/ zhes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par
80b3(gzungs 'dus): gyur pa// spyan du gyur pa// sran du gyur pa// dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/ gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ de dag gi sman sngar so sor chags so// 'thol
80b4(gzungs 'dus): lo mi 'chab bo// slan chad mi bgyid do// bdag las gyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs te sems can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'iskye gnas dang / yi bdags kyi yul dang / 
80b5(gzungs 'dus): lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi nang du 'chi bar 'gyur kha dang // sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun mnyes par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang // mi khom pa rnam su skye bar
80b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di nyid la rnam par smon te/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa// spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa/ mkhyen par
80b7(gzungs 'dus): gyur pa gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ de dag gi spyan sngar so sor chags so// 'thol lo ma 'chab po// slan chad mi 'gyid do// ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
80b8(gzungs 'dus): po de dag sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang // ma bcangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor chags sa/ 
80b9(gzungs 'dus): 'thol lo mi 'chab po sman chad kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ las
81a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor chags par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'chab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo mi 'chab po// slan chad
81a2(gzungs 'dus): kyang mi bgyid do// ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir spyod par/ las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor chags pa dang / maM nya
81a3(gzungs 'dus): par de bzhin du// bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor chags/ 'jol lo mi 'chang po// slan chad mi 'byed do// ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba
81a4(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags/ pa dang // so sor 'chags par 'gyur
81a5(gzungs 'dus): pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo mi 'chang bo// sran chan mi bgyid do// zhes brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu de bas
81a6(gzungs 'dus): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par dag pa thob par 'dod pas// 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags so// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chung
81a7(gzungs 'dus): kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal rigs kyi shing sa la lta bu d+hug pa/ nor med la snod mar/ sa le snyam dang / nor dang mi byad mang de bshin du skyid pa gzhon pa chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod
81a8(gzungs 'dus): des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po blta bu rnams dang / 
81b1(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu phyug pa/ nor che ba long spyod che ba/ sa le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad mang bshin du skyed pa dang / bzhon pa chen po gzhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye
81b2(gzungs 'dus): bar 'dod pa des kyang // 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / mtshung
81b3(gzungs 'dus): par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang // 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / 
81b4(gzungs 'dus): mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang // 'di bzhin/ du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// ci bcab bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi 'o// de bzhin du mtha' bral dang / dag
81b5(gzungs 'dus): ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med
81b6(gzungs 'dus): 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / sems can 'du shes med pa dang / gya nom snang ba
81b7(gzungs 'dus): dpa shin du mthong ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi 'artul zhugs dang / mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgring rnams so so/ 
81b8(gzungs 'dus): bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// byin chad kyang mi bya'o/ su gzugs med pa rnam par mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du
82a1(gzungs 'dus): nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nyo bar 'gro ba rnams dang / 'du shes med min skye mched du che bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang / mtshungs par
82a2(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur bas kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// byin tshad kyang mi bya'o// su rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong/ 
82a3(gzungs 'dus): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib bi rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'tshab par bya
82a4(gzungs 'dus): phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// su rig/ pa gsum pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa drug gam// stongs rnams sam// dbang po rnams sam/ nyan thos/ kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'am/ nyan thos dang / 
82a5(gzungs 'dus): me bar grags pa 'am// rang byed chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang / 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'cha' bar bya'o// phyin chad kyang ma
82a6(gzungs 'dus): bya'o// su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang // bsam gyis mi khya pa'i ye shes dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu
82a7(gzungs 'dus): dang / ye shes mngon par sgrub par 'dod pa des kyang / de bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o// mi 'chab par bya'o// phyin chad kyang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
82a8(gzungs 'dus): bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang rkyen gnas gyis gzhan skye'o// gzhan 'gag so// de las 'das pa'i tshe/ 
82b1(gzungs 'dus): gang yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa dang / zad pa bral ba rnam par gyur pa ste/ de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang / med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos
82b2(gzungs 'dus): thams cad na stong pa s+ho// sems can med pa srog med pa// gang zag med pa ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'dus ma byas pa'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag/ 
82b3(gzungs 'dus): las byung yang dag kyang yod pa ma yin no// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di lta ste// sems can med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni/ las
82b4(gzungs 'dus): kyi sgrib pa rgyun bcod pa zhes bya ste// sha ri'i bu 'di ni so sor bshags pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
82b5(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu ma nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
82b6(gzungs 'dus): pa 'am// sems can gzhan dag kyang rungs ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshal brgya par 'tshal bas ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yid
82b7(gzungs 'dus): rang bar bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// sha ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos
82b8(gzungs 'dus): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos breg pa cig tu gzar nas la// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du phyogs
83a1(gzungs 'dus): bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i dang / sngo ba las byung ba'i bsod nams brgya
83a2(gzungs 'dus): dngos po mngon par 'du bgyis pa de dag thams ra la rjes su yid rang ngo // rjes su yid rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang phul dang gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang bla na med
83a3(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / lhag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi ring ngo // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung / 
83a4(gzungs 'dus): ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyid par 'gyur ba// de dag
83a5(gzungs 'dus): thams cad yang rjes su yid rang ba'i mcho gos rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas bar gyis rjes su yid rang ngo // phyog+sa bcu'i 'jig rten na/ sems can gang / 
83a6(gzungs 'dus): su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang // sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag
83a7(gzungs 'dus): thams cad la yang rje su yid rang ba nas/ rjesu yid rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' gang dag da ldan sems dang po skyed pa de dag ga
