83a8(gzungs 'dus): dang po skyed pa'i dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa rgyas byung ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po gang lags pa dang // byang chub sems dpa
83b1(gzungs 'dus): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang / phyir mi log pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po lpags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig
83b2(gzungs 'dus): gis thogs rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su ying rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yid rang nas// rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis
83b3(gzungs 'dus): rjes su yid rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag thad
83b4(gzungs 'dus): la yang rje su yid rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yid rang ngo // rjes su yid rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / khyad par can dang / rab dang phul dang / gya nom dang / bla na med pa dang lhag na med pa
83b5(gzungs 'dus): dang mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yid 'ang ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir ba spyad pa spyod pa na
83b6(gzungs 'dus): pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du'abyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes ya rang ba dam pa dang / gso bo dang khyad par na
83b7(gzungs 'dus): dang / rab dang phul dang / gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang bla na med pa dang / lhag na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yid rang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
83b8(gzungs 'dus): chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyir bskyod pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag tha~Md la yang rje su
84a1(gzungs 'dus): yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yid rang ngo // rjes su yid rang ba dam pa dang / gtso bo dang khyad par rten dang // rab dang phul dang / gya nom dang / bla ma dang bla na med pa dang / lhag na
84a2(gzungs 'dus): med pa dang / mnyam med pa dang / maM mnyam pa dang mnyas pas rjes su yid rang ngo // skye ba mang bra la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig ched la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo pa la
84a3(gzungs 'dus): rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang 'di ste'i skad du sngon gyi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bla na med
84a4(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ rdzogs par mtshod rgyas nas ka/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i chos 'khor lo/ rab tu ston pa/ chos kyi tshul rab du bzung ba
84a5(gzungs 'dus): chos kyi char rab tu bab pa/ chos kyi char rab tu ba ba/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs pa/ chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu rdungs pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud bya// chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad
84a6(gzungs 'dus): pa/ nyam bag med du spyod du btsud pa gang lags pa dang / de las nyan thos kyi theg pa po 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa
84a7(gzungs 'dus): bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo // skye bo ma
84a8(gzungs 'dus): po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo 'phel po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / smon pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis
84b1(gzungs 'dus): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang / de las nyan thos
84b2(gzungs 'dus): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yid rang ba'i mchog
84b3(gzungs 'dus): rjes su yid pa nas// rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yid rang ngo // skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs ce
84b4(gzungs 'dus): dang / skye ba ngal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ni/ khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
84b5(gzungs 'dus): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab du bskoradang / chos kyi 'khor lo ston rab tu ston pa dang
84b6(gzungs 'dus): chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/ chos char rab tu 'bebs pa chos kyi char gtong ba/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa// chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi rnga brdung ba chos kyi rnga ba che
84b7(gzungs 'dus): bdung ngo chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/ sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/ nyam bag tu spyod du mdzud pa gang lags pa dang / de la nyan
84b8(gzungs 'dus): thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems dag dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags de dag thams
85a1(gzungs 'dus): la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yid ring ba nas/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i thar bgyis rjes su yid rang ngo // zhes brjod par bya'o// / 
85a2(gzungs 'dus): sha ri'i bu 'di ni rjes su yang rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o// rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo rjes su yid rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rjes yid rang na/ bsod nams kyi phung
85a3(gzungs 'dus): po grangs med/ dpag tu med pa skyed do// sha ri'i bu stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can nas/ 'jig rten gi khams gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom
85a4(gzungs 'dus): pa zag pa zad par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de dge la ji srid mtsho'i bar du/ gos dang zas dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis
85a5(gzungs 'dus): snyen kur byas pa las gang gzhig rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rje su yid rang na/ de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// sha ri'i de bas rigs kyi bu 'am
85a6(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// bud med skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'dod cing / 
85a7(gzungs 'dus): bud med kyi dbang po rje bar 'dod pas kyang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' bsngal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
85a8(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa bskyed par 'gyur
85b1(gzungs 'dus): ba'i skul ba'i phung po bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bskul to// sha ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu
85b2(gzungs 'dus): 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ thegs pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ 
85b3(gzungs 'dus): sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag
85b4(gzungs 'dus): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu
85b5(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
85b6(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul gyis/ bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo ngal
85b7(gzungs 'dus): po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don rna dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol// chos kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi tshul rab/ 
85b8(gzungs 'dus): tu gzung du gsol/ chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad par 'thung du gsol// chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad gsol// chos kyi rgar pa bcu gas ma// chos kyi rdza brdung du gsol// chos kyi dung 'dud
86a1(gzungs 'dus): dugasol 'chos kyi srog shing sbeng du gsol// zhes garjod par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ 
86a2(gzungs 'dus): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag
86a3(gzungs 'dus): pa gcig du gzar la/ dpus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la brtsugs te// thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na tshe'i 'a
86a4(gzungs 'dus): byed pa dang ba'itshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa 'debs kyis/ sangs rgya
86a5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang ba la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po ched lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i ska
86a6(gzungs 'dus): du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ chos kyi sgron me ni rab du 'bar bar mdzad// chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs// chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong // chos kyi rnga ni rab tu brdung / chos kyi rnga'o che nai raH
86a7(gzungs 'dus): du brdung / chos kyi rab du 'bud// chos kyi srog shing ni steng / chos kyi sgron ma ni mched par mdzad// sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/ nyam bag tu bskyod du bcud pa
86a8(gzungs 'dus): 'jug cing / re zhig zhugs su gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sde ste ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
86b1(gzungs 'dus): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du/ 'di yongasu bsngo ba de brjod par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gsol ba btab pa'i phung po ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos gsol ba btab pa'i phung pa
86b2(gzungs 'dus): 'das gsol ba 'debs na bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
86b3(gzungs 'dus): rten gi khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul po bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol pa btab na/ 
86b4(gzungs 'dus): de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ de bzhin ga tse
86b5(gzungs 'dus): pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na nga lha'i dbang po brgya ste/ dang / mi mjed kyi dadag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan
86b6(gzungs 'dus): 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye'o mang po bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye'o phal po che dang / lha dang mo rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor
86b7(gzungs 'dus): lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab po// shau ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du zhugs par
86b8(gzungs 'dus): gsol te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
87a1(gzungs 'dus): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / yongs tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa
87a2(gzungs 'dus): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am
87a3(gzungs 'dus): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa 'am/ sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
87a4(gzungs 'dus): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa rnams ji ltar yongasu bsngo bar bgyi// de skad ces gsol
87a5(gzungs 'dus): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bskul to// sha ri'i bu la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag snga
87a6(gzungs 'dus): zhugs pa'am/ reng sangs rgyas kyi theg pa le yang dag par zhugs pa'am// sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon para'i rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
87a7(gzungs 'dus): 'dod pas// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa
87a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas pam/ chos pam/ de 'dun dam/ gang dgags/ thun du 'dza'i rtsi gnas su song ba rnams dang / sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ na tshadas na
87b1(gzungs 'dus): tsam bskul bar 'gyur ba// 'chags pa gang lags pa dang / gsol pa btab pa gang lags pa dang / skyabs su 'chi ba gang lags pa dang / bslab pa'i bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
87b2(gzungs 'dus): lags pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / rje su yid rang ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang / gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'i
87b3(gzungs 'dus): rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa' dag thams cad du bsdus gzhal zlums te// sems dul zhing rnams par grol ba dang / bzung ba ma mchis pas sems can
87b4(gzungs 'dus): thams cad la bsngal to// ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la btang bar bgyi ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ chags pa mi mnga' dra
87b5(gzungs 'dus): ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de bdang ngo // sems can thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig/ mgon po rnam mkha'a'i mdzod dang / longs spyod
87b6(gzungs 'dus): zad mi shes pa dang / bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang / chos zad mi shes pa dang / ye shes zad mi shes pa dang / spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
87b7(gzungs 'dus): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad la rab tu
87b8(gzungs 'dus): btsal ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang cig du bsdus te/ zhal nas bzlums te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sum
88a1(gzungs 'dus): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig/ snyam du sems can thams cad
88a2(gzungs 'dus): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur
88a3(gzungs 'dus): bgyis pa'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su sngo bde bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su snga'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ 
88a4(gzungs 'dus): bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs kyi par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar ma
88a5(gzungs 'dus): 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yong su rdo bar 'gyur
88a6(gzungs 'dus): ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i snying rtsa ba yongs su bsdu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzon
88a7(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par 'gyur cig/ ji ltar na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub
88a8(gzungs 'dus): kyi phyir spyod pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu pasngo ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig
88b1(gzungs 'dus): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dri ma med pa shin du dkar ba la bzhugs na
88b2(gzungs 'dus): bdud sdig can bcom ste/ shes par bgyi pa dang / lnga bar bgyi ba dang / rtogs par bgyi ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad nam kyi tho rangs 'a
88b3(gzungs 'dus): kar ska cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi rnyes te 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i las// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang / bla na
88b4(gzungs 'dus): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
88b5(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / 'od mchog dang 'od dag dang / bsod nams 'od dang mi 'khrugs pa dang / seng ge dang 'od zer brgya pa dang / 'od zer mthong ba dang 'od dra ba can
88b6(gzungs 'dus): dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / 'od 'bar dang snang ba'i rgyal po dang / shin du brgyan dang / rin chen tog dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lag na mchog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
88b7(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
88b8(gzungs 'dus): nas/ ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad
89a1(gzungs 'dus): du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin gdu bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
89a2(gzungs 'dus): skye bo mang po mang dang / smye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sngon pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'ja
89a3(gzungs 'dus): lo rab tu bskor bar shog shig/ ces brjod par bya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po lnga mas yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i yang nye bar mi
89a4(gzungs 'dus): 'gre bas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo 'di len tam/ kun chub par byed dam 'dzin tam/ klog gam gzhan dag
89a5(gzungs 'dus): la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas chos grang sa med dpag tu med paskyed do// sha ri'i bu stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
89a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ snga phyi med par mo'i lus thob nas kyang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am
89a7(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bsti bstang dang / bung dud bya ba'i phyir/ gos dang zas dang / mal cha dngon pa'i gsos sman dang yid rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bstan bkur byas
89a8(gzungs 'dus): te/ rim gror bya ba lan cig tsam yang rin po che'i phung po/ ri rab tsam gyi rin po che rnams yongasu zad par byas la yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de dag gis mchod rten rin po che sna bdun
89b1(gzungs 'dus): te/ gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang / byi dUr+ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang muga'i dmar po la 'bang du dpag tshad bcu pa byas te/ de dag la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang
89b2(gzungs 'dus): ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
89b3(gzungs 'dus): mang lags/ bde bar gshegs pa mang mags so// bka' bsngal ba rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mongam/ rigs kyi bu mo gang lam mdo 'di 'dzin tam/ kun chub par byed dam
89b4(gzungs 'dus): 'don par byed dam/ klog gram/ skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston tama?/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/ de ni de bas
89b5(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams che bas mang du bskyed do// bsod nams kyi phung po 'di rgya'i char yang nye ba ra mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar tu yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di
89b6(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi du 'am rigs kyi bu mo sgrub pa 'dis gnas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar skul ba'i phyi
89b7(gzungs 'dus): sha ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin po mchog ces ngas bshad do// de nas 'khor de las srog chags khrims ldan las langs te/ so so nas blo gas phrag
89b8(gzungs 'dus): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
90a1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo 'di bzung bar bgyi'o// gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// bsgrub par gnas par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
90a2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal zhing / don du gnyer ba lags so// de nas lha'i dbang rgya byin gyis
90a3(gzungs 'dus): bcos kyi rnam grangs 'di la me tog man ta ra bas mngon par gtor ro// mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems
90a4(gzungs 'dus): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun bcod pa'i bces sbas bgyid pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal ba/ de de bzhin gshe ke'u shi ka de bzhin
90a5(gzungs 'dus): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/ 'di nas skal pa grangs med pa'i ches grangs par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos/ 
90a6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
90a7(gzungs 'dus): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten tu byung ngo // lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kyi phung po chen po'i chi'i tshe'i tshad
90a8(gzungs 'dus): ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to// de'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni bye ba phrag 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa
90b1(gzungs 'dus): pa gnyis pa ni/ bye ba phrag brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod do// thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa yang zag pa zad pa sha srog go/ de'i nyan thos 'dus pa sha sta gsum pa ni bye ba brgya
90b2(gzungs 'dus): stong dgra dgu bcu yod do// thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha bstag go// lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kyi phud
90b3(gzungs 'dus): po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o// lha'i dbang po de'i tshe bud med gang ga'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhis
90b4(gzungs 'dus): 'khor 'dus pa 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus byar gyur te/ 'dus pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po las mngon gsum bzung
90b5(gzungs 'dus): kun chub par byas/ blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas shi 'phos nas/ bung
90b6(gzungs 'dus): med kyi lus spangs te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/ rtag par rgyun tu lha dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lan brgya khri bzhi stong du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por byas nas/ 
90b7(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur te/ ke'u shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag snang ba ni chos ston to// ngas ltar na yong mthong ngo // 
90b8(gzungs 'dus): ke'u shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las
91a1(gzungs 'dus): 'das par nges par gyur ro// bud med gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos
91a2(gzungs 'dus): sam/ 'aN+Di kar yang mngon sum du byed na/ de nyid de'i dud kyi lus kyi mthu ma yin no// lha'i dbang po de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91a3(gzungs 'dus): po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i phyir ces sgras byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
91a4(gzungs 'dus): to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal
91a5(gzungs 'dus): to// ko'u shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
91a6(gzungs 'dus): rgyu byin la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// kle'u sha ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgringab pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar gzung shig/ byang chub seMs ze'i sde snod ces bya bar bzung
91a7(gzungs 'dus): shig/ 'di skyed pa zhes bya bar bzung shig/ btso ldangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang mi dang lA ma yin dang / 
91a8(gzungs 'dus): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa las kyi dri rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
92a1(gzungs 'dus): mdo glang ru lung bstan bzhugs s+ho// yon mchod thams cad bkra shis par byon cig/ 
92b1(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya gro shing ga byA ka Na/ nam ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan
92b2(gzungs 'dus): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
92b3(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas bsod nas
92b4(gzungs 'dus): kyi tshogs kyi rnam par smin pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gau sangs rgya sa rnyes te/ 'jam bu'i gling gi ljongs kyi yul gzhan du
92b5(gzungs 'dus): 'du ba'i sems can yongasu smin par mdzad nas/ yul yangs pa can gyi lho phyogs thub pa drang srong chen po'i khab na gnas rgyal po'i khang
92b6(gzungs 'dus): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dum dang / gnas brtan
93a1(gzungs 'dus): shA ri'i bu dang / me ru 'gal g+ha~M bu la sogs pa/ nyan thos chen po stong nyes brgya lnga bcu dang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lta
93a2(gzungs 'dus): du ma dang / lha'i dbang po rnams thos kyi bu la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po du ma dang / gnod sbyin mthu che mang po dang / dri za
93a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs/ dri za mang po dang / mi 'o ma ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma dang / rgyal po gzugs can
93a4(gzungs 'dus): snying po la sogs pa/ 'dzam du gling gi me'i rgyal po'i 'khor du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas ngo'i tshe lnga'i yang wA sa/ 
93a5(gzungs 'dus): rgyas shAkya thub pas/ phyi ma'i dus kyi yul dge ba la rjes su dgongs shing / mngon sum du mdzad nas 'khor mang po la bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
93a6(gzungs 'dus): byung phyogs log su r-i glung ru dang nyi chu bo go ma'i 'grem/ thub pa drang srong chen po'i pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la gan d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de
93a7(gzungs 'dus): godon mi za bar bya dgos pa'i phrin las zhig yod pas gshegs pa'i dus la bab po// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bal
93b1(gzungs 'dus): po che dang / nam mkha' la 'phags te/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa la sogs pa/ dri za grangs med pa ni mdun na lha'i rol mo sna tshogs byed/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa/ 
93b2(gzungs 'dus): mi 'am ci du ma yis/ steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang / lha'i skad yid du 'ong bas bstod bzhin du 'khor de dag dang / mchod pa de dag dang
93b3(gzungs 'dus): bcas te/ r-i glang rug la der gshegs so// gshegs nas lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs bzhin du zhal byang phyogs su mtsho chen po yun ring po nas rgya mtshor 'dug
93b4(gzungs 'dus): pa la gzigs te/ sku drang par srang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag rgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa smon la dang bsod nams
93b5(gzungs 'dus): mngon sum du mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri glang ru deng / yul dge pa dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor nas sring ba'i rtse mo
93b6(gzungs 'dus): bar du byin gyis brlabs te/ bsrung ba dang / btsang ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / mtshams bcod pa dang / zlas brjod dang dge bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i lha/ sangs rgyas
93b7(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' bskul pa/ raM grang ru bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten ge ma sa la gan d+ha dang bcas/ yul dge ba dang bcas pa 'dzin
93b8(gzungs 'dus): bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag mtshan dang / ma 'dres pa dang thun mong ma yin pa dang / dben pa yin te/ rgyu des na yul de dge ba zhes bya'o// 
94a1(gzungs 'dus): de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul dge ba dang / 'khar dge ba can dang dge 'dun sa so'i kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dag
94a2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i gnas dang / yul der so so nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po dang / chos dang ldan pa'i dang ba can sbyin bdag dang / li yul thams cad lung bstan to// 
94a3(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' bstsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang mi 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i yul 'dir ci nas kyang sems can rnam
94a4(gzungs 'dus): dam pa chen po myur du thob par gyur pa dang / ting nge 'dzin grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs shog/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tshur rol nas cung zad cig slar bkyed de/ de'i mdo
94a5(gzungs 'dus): la ri blang ru'i steng du bdan khri bshams pa la dkyil mo bkrung bcas te bzhugaso nas/ zhal nub phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi pho drang mchod rten ge ma sa la g+han dag na ba de logasu
94a6(gzungs 'dus): gzigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong mang po dang thabs gcig tu bcom
94a7(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das ga na ba de logs su lhags so// lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sa la g+han la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
94a8(gzungs 'dus): 'khor dang bcas pa la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'in sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phal po che 'dus par mkhyen nas/ 'khor
94b1(gzungs 'dus): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// bstsal pa bzang po 'di la sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa ni byung ste/ de dag gis kyang mchod rten goms la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa rgyan
94b2(gzungs 'dus): gyis brlabs so// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas te 'dir gshegs na/ mchad
94b3(gzungs 'dus): rten go ma sa la gan da yul dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs cing mtshams cad pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / dge bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab pas/ byin rtswa
94b4(gzungs 'dus): rlob par mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang // gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nying
94b5(gzungs 'dus): nge 'dzin grangs med pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / bsam rten rnams yongs skyong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen kyis kyang
94b6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas 'od bsrung gi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs yul byung bar 'gyur ba 'is/ bdag gi gzugs brlang bar 'gyur bar 'gyus bzhi de byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du smon lam chen par gnas
94b7(gzungs 'dus): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kyang ri glang ru la gtsug lag khang spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa bzhi snyen pa byed pa rnams 'grub par byin gyis
94b8(gzungs 'dus): brlabs so// de bzhin du nam mkha' ltar bsgobs dpag tu med pa byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snyi ngo bos kyang gtsug lag khang 'jig tshogs spong byed ces bya ba 'byung 'gyur ba'i sa bzhi de
95a1(gzungs 'dus): mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byin gyis parnanas so de bzhin du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' 'phags bstan ras gzigs kyi dbang gis kyang gtsug lag khang 'ong
95a2(gzungs 'dus): can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i so bani der dngos grub 'grub par byin gyis brlabs so de bzhin du rtag tu byams pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' byams blo spyan ras gzigs kyi
95a3(gzungs 'dus): dbang gis kyang gtsug lag khang byi saM no \u0f85 zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa bzhi der bdog nyid bzhugs par byin gyis brlab so// de bzhin du rdogacod pa shin rnam par dag pa'i bya
95a4(gzungs 'dus): chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos kyang gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa bzhi de phyag bya bar 'os par 'gyur ba'i byin gyis pa rlangs
95a5(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin du gdul ba'i skye bo grol bar mdzad pa lnga/ thags thogs mi mong ba byed chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang gtsug lag khang no co zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur
95a6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i sa bzhi de dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabaso// de bzhin du brdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang gtsug lag
95a7(gzungs 'dus): khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa bzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa
95a8(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang / dgra bcom pa yang chen po rnams kyis kyang li yul gang dang gang du gtsug lag khang dang / bskyed mo tshal dang / dgon pa'i gnas
95b1(gzungs 'dus): 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi thams cad dper na zla ba nya ba la skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su skor nas steng gi bar snang dag la rgya ba bzhin du mdzes pa dang
95b2(gzungs 'dus): yid du 'ong ba dang rgyas pa dang / dga' dga' ltar 'dug par byin gyis rlab so// de'i tshe ri glang ru la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang / byang chub seMs
95b3(gzungs 'dus): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs du ma kye bas l-i yul thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas// 
95b4(gzungs 'dus): nas skad cig de nyid la mtshe chen po de'i nang nas pad ma sum rgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te/ pad ma re re'i nang na yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
95b5(gzungs 'dus): dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dang bcas pa snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
95b6(gzungs 'dus): la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'tsho'i nang nas pad ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku
95b7(gzungs 'dus): gzugs dang bcas te 'byung ba 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul 'di 'byung bar 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ yul 'di nyid du pad ma ji snyed pa'i dgon pa'i gnas dang gtsug
95b8(gzungs 'dus): lag khang g+han d+he gdung bar gyur pa dang / gnas gang dang gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'od zer nam nga
96a1(gzungs 'dus): 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'dred dang yum byin gyis rnams pa sa bzhi rnye dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a zung na chang rten gom sa la thananasu
96a2(gzungs 'dus): dge ba dang bcas pa byin brlabs pa'i sa bzhi 'dir dad pa can gyi sbyin bdag rnams kyis so so nas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs snyan byed par 'gyur zhing / gnas de dang
96a3(gzungs 'dus): de dag du snyen pa byas nas/ ci dang ci 'dod pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no// yang de'i tshe lha rnams stan la langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
96a4(gzungs 'dus): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'di ci tsam na ka na 'byung bar 'gyur/ su zhig gis sbyin pa bgyis par 'gyur/ ba lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar ni dgon
96a5(gzungs 'dus): pa che bo 'i gter lags na/ su zhig gis ji ltar sbyin 'byin pa bka' bstsal bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ mya ngan las
96a6(gzungs 'dus): 'das nas lo rgya lon nas pa'i tshe rgya'i yul du ma'i rgyal po tsa yang zhes bya ba bu sdong tshang bar dog pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bu re re yang yul re rer gsar du tshol du bcug go// 
96a7(gzungs 'dus): phyis nub phyogs logs nas ri glang ru lu dang / bcom ldan 'das phyi pho brang mchod gling 'di na/ rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba'i bu cig btsas pa byin te/ bu de ni gzun bzang ba mdzes
96a8(gzungs 'dus): ba lnga na sdug pa gcig yin no// bu de'i don du sa la nu ma zhig byung ba dang / bu de sngon gyi bsod nams dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus nu ma de la nu bar byed pas/ de nas bu de'i ming sa la
96a9(gzungs 'dus): nams sa ngan 'ang min pa mas tsas mas bcas sug ba nams mas datshan ma sa sa rgya rgya sa grags pa son sa tu ma 'ongs pa ma sa kyi#
96b1(gzungs 'dus): nu ma zhes bya'o// bu de myur bar skyes na/ brgya'i rgyal pos rgyal srid kyi dbang skur/ nor mang po no byin/ blon po bal po che ni/ lus kyi rim 'gro bar skos nas/ rgyal bus las nu
96b2(gzungs 'dus): ma nu de blon po chen po bye ni zhes zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ dmag du ma dang / ldan cig tu rgya'i yul nas byung ste/ yul 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs 'dir yul 'debs par 'gyur
96b3(gzungs 'dus): te/ rgyal po sA la nu momau nu des yul btab pa'i phyir/ rgya des na 'di'i ming ni sa las nu ma nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dus de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas rgya gar gyi mi phal po che
96b4(gzungs 'dus): 'dir 'ang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po sa la nu ma nu pa'i 'bangs su mchis kyis 'tshal zhing / ming ni sa las nu ma nu na/ cha srid gcig par dum par gyur nas/ rgya'i blon po chen po
96b5(gzungs 'dus): byang sho la sogs pas rim gyis rgya dang / rgya gar kyi grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal 'bebs par 'gyur// de ltar rgyal po sa la nu ma nu de mi rabs du ma'i bar du
96b6(gzungs 'dus): yul 'di'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de rnams kyi rim gyis sos nas yul 'dir dgon pa'i gnas dang btsug lag khang byas nas zhang chu dang 'bangs dang / gzhal da byed
96b7(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dbul zhing / la la zhig yang bdag nyid kyang rab tu 'byung bar byed do// la lA bu dang bu mo rab tu 'byin par byed do// la la ni 'bangs las grangs med pa zhig/ rab tu byung bar
96b8(gzungs 'dus): byed do// yul 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rigs can mang po zhig 'byung ste/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las dge ba'i brtsegs shing bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po byed 'a
97a1(gzungs 'dus): byed par 'gyur/ de ltar na yul 'di ni rgyal po sa la nu ma nus gdod tshul de ltar bus 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'di ni sangs rgyas re re'i tshe rang 'byung zhing / rgyas
97a2(gzungs 'dus): par gyur ro// ci'i phyir yul gzhan dang bzhin dag zhig nas yun ring po zhig du song zhing dgon par 'dul la yul dge ba ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe mi rnams kyis brgyan cing
97a3(gzungs 'dus): 'dzes par 'gyur zhe na/ yul 'di ni thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bi mA sa la g+han d+ha zhes bya ba ri glang ru dang nye bar chu bo go ma si 'gram na yod
97a4(gzungs 'dus): ba'i phyiraro// mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni/ ming ga ma sa g+han d+ha zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten phal gyi tha snyad du ni chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya bar dogs par 'gyur to// 
97a5(gzungs 'dus): ji ltar ji srid du mchod rten go ma sa la 'gram zhes bya ba dang / 'od bsrung gi mchod rten 'di gnyis rgyus shing mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du ni/ yul dge ba yang rgyas shing / 
97a6(gzungs 'dus): bzang por 'gyur ro// nam mchod rten 'di bgud pa'i tshe/ yul yang bgud cing stongs par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha rdzas kyis bka' bstsal ba'i gsung de thos
97a7(gzungs 'dus): nas mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+hA dang / ri glang ru la dad pa dang / gus pa chen po rnyed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal// bskyabs su song nas 'di skad du bdag
97a8(gzungs 'dus): cag kyang dus de'i tshe yul 'dir rigs mthon por skyes nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung zhing yul chos kyi bka' khrims mi nyams par byang bar gyur cig/ ces smon lam
97b1(gzungs 'dus): btab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes can lnga'i yang lha mi 'jam pa zhes bya ba
97b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / klu'i rgyal po khyim ces bya ba dang / lha na mkha'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang / lha gsor kye phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang / lha mo lcags kyu can zhes bya ba dang / lha mo gnas can zhes bya
97b3(gzungs 'dus): ba rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams la mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+ha dang / ri glang ru yul dang bcas pa dang / nga'i bstan pa dang sras rnams yongs
97b4(gzungs 'dus): su btad kyis yongs su bsrung ba dang / bslab pa dang / bskyang ba dang / mchod gnas su gyur par bgyis shig/ yul 'di'i rgyal po dang yul 'di'i blon po dang / sbyin bdag chos dang
97b5(gzungs 'dus): 'thun pa rnams dang / yongs su gtad kyis de bzhin gshegs du bgyis shig/ ri glang ru lung bstan pa'i mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par bgyis shing / gang gi tshe
97b6(gzungs 'dus): yul 'di me 'am/ chu 'am pha rol gyis dmag gis nyen cing bong par gyur pa na/ mdo 'di klag pa dang / kha don dang mchod pa dang / bsam pa dang sgom pa byas na/ de na yul de'i gnod
97b7(gzungs 'dus): ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yul 'dir sum pa rnams dang / bod rnams 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe mdo 'di lton
97b8(gzungs 'dus): shig dang / mdo 'di thos nas/ mdo 'di'i mthus dang / lha rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dad pa med pa de rnams/ yul 'jig par mi byed cing yid kyang 'gyod par 'gyuraro// 
98a1(gzungs 'dus): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'dir rgya rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe mdo 'dir lcogs shig dang / mdo 'di thos de dag dang pa skye bar 'gyuraro// dang ba
98a2(gzungs 'dus): stobs kyi yul dge ba 'di la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no// mdo 'di'i phan yon gzhan yang mang du yod de/ yun thung dus ni brjod par mi nus// mi 'jigs cing phyir zhing
98a3(gzungs 'dus): srung ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang med par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na mdo 'di ni yul dge ba 'di la phan 'dagos par byed pa yin no// mdo 'di'i phan yon gezhan yang
98a4(gzungs 'dus): mang du yod de/ yun thung ngus ni brjod par mi nus so// de nas de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / lha mo de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas te/ 
98a5(gzungs 'dus): langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams
98a6(gzungs 'dus): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spyi bos len par 'tshalo// yang gsol ba ston pa bcom ldan 'das ji skad bka' bskul ba bzhin du/ mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+ha dang / 
98a7(gzungs 'dus): dang / ri glang ru yul dang bcas thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'tshalo// bde bang gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po dang / rab tu byung ba dang / chos
98a8(gzungs 'dus): dang 'thun par yul 'dzin pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i skyon bdag dang / gang zhig bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su srung
98b1(gzungs 'dus): bar ni 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid du/ yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su bgyid pa dang / yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang 'thun par yul skyong zhing / chos dang
98b2(gzungs 'dus): mi 'thun pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'gon mi bgyid pa de srid du ni/ bdag cag gis yongs su srung bar rngo thog ste/ mdo 'di yang li yul du yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o// 
98b3(gzungs 'dus): lI yul las nyi 'go du gyur pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po rnams la mdo 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yul li yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum gyi ched du glang ru la bshad pa
98b4(gzungs 'dus): yin// zhes rnam par grags par bgyi/ sug par thob par bgyi/ sems cad gyi sbyar bar dbyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas
98b5(gzungs 'dus): su mi bgyid cing / chos dang mi 'thun pa rnams kyi mgon lhags par bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bar yul 'di'i sha
98b6(gzungs 'dus): thang bsrung bar ni rngo mi thogs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag gi mthu stong pa gzi brjid ni bde bar gshegs bI bstan pa dang / chos dang 'thun par yul bzhin du
98b7(gzungs 'dus): stong ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bangan las bzhengs nas ra
98b8(gzungs 'dus): glang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+ha gden pa der logasu gzigs nas yang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten go ma sa laM g+han d+ha ri m+ba
99a1(gzungs 'dus): grangs med pa rnams 'ad zer dang thugs rje chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dang thugs rje chen pos chu na gnas pa'i sems can de drug thams cad kyi sdug bsngal ni
99a2(gzungs 'dus): zhi bar 'gyur/ khro ba dang khang du 'dzin pa dang ni bral to// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur cig/ lha'i bde ba dang ldan nas skad de nyid las sems can de dag las dral
99a3(gzungs 'dus): med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas/ g+hu dang mi rnams kyi nang du/ skyes te/ sangs rgyas nyid du gyur pa'i sa bon snyed cing / phyir mi ldog par gyur cing phyir mi ldog par
99a4(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnam sa la lan gsum gyi bar du bos nas 'di skad ces bka' bsdus te/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam byas pa
99a5(gzungs 'dus): rnams ni brtson 'grus med par mi 'grub po/ rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar tu dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa 'di dang / mchod rten go ma yul
99a6(gzungs 'dus): g+han d+ha yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams yongs gnyis kyi yongs su bsrung / khyed rnams las gang zhig rjes su dran zhing / gzugs yod pa dang / bstan pa bsrung ba des nani bstan
99a7(gzungs 'dus): bsrung ba des ni ston pa 'di sa rab tu byung ba rnams yongasu bsrung bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tha mas phyi ma'i gsod nams kyi rgya 'cher yang nye bar mi 'dzin// de tsan
99b1(gzungs 'dus): zhe na/ sangs rgyas gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / sngar khyim gyi gnas spangs te rab tu byung nas/ spyod lam 'di nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes// nga yang pha rol tu
99b2(gzungs 'dus): byin pa drug yongs su rdzogs te/ sa bcu brnyes nas/ srad pa tha ma'i tshe nam phyed nas rgyal po khab nas byung ste nags su gshegs so// nags tshal nas dgon pa rgyal po yang
99b3(gzungs 'dus): kyi thog nas sri nas rang gi ral gris bregs de nga'i gos gya nom pa rin thang med pa mnyam pa las/ chos gos ngur smig su rjes so// ngas chos gos de byon nas dus gsum gyis
99b4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas thams cad lu phyag 'tshalo// skyabs su song nas/ rab du byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang / lha thams cad dA la phyug 'tshal// skyabs stong nas byi bzhin du 'brang
99b5(gzungs 'dus): nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brnyes so// de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bston pa dam pa yin par shes par bya/ rab tu byung
99b6(gzungs 'dus): ba ni bsod nas dang ldan par rig par bya'o// 'jig rten na khyim pas thob pa ma rtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ bla na med pa'i byang
99b7(gzungs 'dus): chub thob pa ni sus kyang ma thos ma mthong ngo // rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam 'di ni 'jig rten lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod gnas yin no// de nas de'i tshe lha dang ma lha mo de dag
99b8(gzungs 'dus): thams cad bsnyen las langs nas dbyangs gcig tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dag cag rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis
100a1(gzungs 'dus): ji ltar bka' bstsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing bsams bzhin du ni bka' las 'gal mi mtshal lo// yul 'di sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
100a2(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun du bsrung ba dang / skyang bu dang rjes su bzung bar 'tshal bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag cag rnams la mthus bstan tu gsol/ de ci'i slad
100a3(gzungs 'dus): du chen/ ma 'ongs pa bzod pa'i dus na byin pa gyis brla' pa brlab pa'i yul 'dir dgra mang ngom dang ba dang / byir dgal ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dang ba'i khyad par ma nid
100a4(gzungs 'dus): cing brdzun pa bshig pa'i slad du brtsod pa dag d+hAngu ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag lalegaso// zhes bya bar gnang ste/ skyes bu dam
100a5(gzungs 'dus): ba rnams legs so legs// des kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlabs byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de nyid kyi 'tshams bcadapa yang ma yin no// ma 'ongs brtsod pa'i dus na
100a6(gzungs 'dus): yul 'di gzhom pa'i phyir/ sum pa'i dmag phal po che dang drug gu rus sna tshogs dang / dor dang gzhan yang yul 'dir gshegs nas gzhan dag yang yul dad pa med pa dga'o/ 
100a7(gzungs 'dus): ba 'gyur te/ de'i tshe tshul gzhan dang gzhan dganas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzugs snyan gyis/ byin rgyas rlabs padag yum 'dzi gshegs nas gzhan yang yul 'drid de bzhin pa
100a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i gzugs panan rnaMs brgya rgya brgyad kyang srung gi rkyen dadu bcus pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ deng gi thams cad kyang tshe 'dum chen po man cing sems can rnams kyi sdig pa chen che/ 
100b1(gzungs 'dus): yongs su sbyong ba dang / gnod pa sel bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// yul 'dir gnod pa dang 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa 'ga' zhig byung na/ yul ched du phyogs lngar sbyor ba byas te/ 
100b2(gzungs 'dus): rgyal po dang blon po yul 'dzin pa dang / gang zhig 'dzin pa dang / gang zhig 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bsod nams skyed par 'dod na gtsug
100b3(gzungs 'dus): lag khang tshar ma zhes bya bar bsod nams bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'dir mi rnams kyi dang ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba ni dang po'i gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur ro// nam
100b4(gzungs 'dus): zhig lha'i rgyal po dang / blon po dang yul 'dzin/ pa rnams la gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shig byung na/ ri glang la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
100b5(gzungs 'dus): gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i bzhi de la skor bar bya'o// yul 'di'i sems can rnams las mi dge ba chags par 'dod ni/ mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+ha'i drung du gshegs
100b6(gzungs 'dus): bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten 'di ni sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba 'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'i dri 'am/ rol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas
100b7(gzungs 'dus): pa/ de'i mtshams mo de lnga yang nyams dmas par gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'dir rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa gang zhig rtul shugs chen po'i sdom pa
100b8(gzungs 'dus): len par 'dod pa des ri glang ru gang na der de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyad byi se zhes bya ba dang / 'od bsrung gi mchod rten yod pa de'i dge 'dun las mos pa bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen
101a1(gzungs 'dus): yul 'dir chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims yong su dag pa de nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'di'i mi la la zhig chad pa chen po la thug na/ des
101a2(gzungs 'dus): glang ru la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ste/ des na chad pa de las thar bar 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas de na thar pa thob pa stong phrag du ma'i mtha'
101a3(gzungs 'dus): bar du gnas shing mi stongs pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang / mtshud rten go ma sa la g+han d+hA yul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi cha rkyen yin no// de nas de'i
101a4(gzungs 'dus): tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad
101a5(gzungs 'dus): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang thabs sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa spyod yul dang / yul yongasu sbyang bar bgyi/ srung bar bgyi zhing dza
101a6(gzungs 'dus): srid du yongasu gshegs pa'i bskrun pa dang / dkon mchog gnas shing rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa'i mi'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang / yul tshwa dang 'thun par bgyid
101a7(gzungs 'dus): ba de srid du yongs su ma gtang zhing yul 'dir dus dus spyod lam dang / cha lugs ci dang ci lta bu thams cad dngos pos bsod nams chen pos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / 
101a8(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgya ste sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i/ 
101b1(gzungs 'dus): skye ba blang po'i slad du kha cig gis ni rgyal rigs yongasu bzung bar bgyi/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung bu dang / khyim pa gzhan gyi cha lugs yongasu bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
101b2(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legaso// rigs kyis bu khyed rnams kyis 'odadi ltar bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / yul
101b3(gzungs 'dus): 'di gang na du sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid las byer mi ldog par 'gyur ba 'di lta bur chub gang thong shig/ yang de'i tshe lha rnams thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / mi kham
101b4(gzungs 'dus): la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
101b5(gzungs 'dus): yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du zhe na/ stobs dang ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis rlabs pa dang / mthus bdag/ cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul
101b6(gzungs 'dus): dang byin gyis brlang pa'i yul 'di kun du bsrung zhing yal bar mi gtong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs kyis 'bang bar 'tshal lo// gas te swA
101b7(gzungs 'dus): 'dri zlog gu la sogs pa gtum pa dang pa ma mchis bla rnams dang / hod dang sum pa'i dasagasachis par gyur na/ de dag pa ni tshun nung drug byung ba dang / de dag gis la
101b8(gzungs 'dus): mi 'thun por gyur pa dang / 'bum par 'gyur bar bgyi'i// yang na de dag ci nas kyang 'dir mi 'chi zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba
102a1(gzungs 'dus): slad du/ gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'o// gal te rgya'i dmag mchis par gyur na/ de dag gi sems dad par bgyi zhing slar yul 'din la phan 'dogs pa
102a2(gzungs 'dus): dang byis yul 'dir bsod nams kyi bya ba'i dngos pa dge ba rgya chen po bgyid du bskul to// nam zhig yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyid pa'i tshe na/ yang phyir dad pa
102a3(gzungs 'dus): bgyi zhing mdo 'di yang khong du chud par bapyad du bstsal to// gang gi tshe de dag ma 'ongs par dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la dbang 'tshal zhing mang du 'brog pa dang / sems cad pasang
102a4(gzungs 'dus): nams dang ldan pa rnams la 'tsha ba de'i tshe/ 'ad cag gi gnod sbyin dad pa can dang / dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dbang bskur te bkye nas/ yul der ci nas kyang
102a5(gzungs 'dus): yun ring du bgud par mi bgyid cing / yul 'jig mi nus pa'i slad du/ mu ge dang nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bgyid du bskul to// la yul gyi nor rdzas de dag gis
102a6(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal ba rnams kyi dang / bkra mi shis par bgyid zhing gang dang gang du yul phyin pa'i yul de dag thams cad du yang phan mi thogs shing 'phrog par 'gyuraro// de dag gis yul 'dzin
102a7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / dmag dpon yang dgud par bgyid do// bod kyi dmag rnams la yang shin du rig par bgyid ste/ de gang gi tshe de dag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di 'dzin cing bsrung na ni/ bdag
102a8(gzungs 'dus): cag rnams kyis kyang de dag la yongs su sbyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// nam zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / yul mi gnod pa byed pa de'i tshe ni dmag rnams nang // 
102b1(gzungs 'dus): khrug byung ba dang / dmag gi dpon po yang tshe thung du dgud par bgyi ste/ rgyas pa ni snga ma bzhin no// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / blon po sems can gya gyu can can bsod
102b2(gzungs 'dus): nams chung ba dad pa med pa dkon mchog gsum gyi nor la 'jog nyog du rlom zhing yul gyi rtsis mgo dang 'gal bar bgyid pa/ nor rdzas ma rtags pas go 'phang tshol ba/ sems can
102b3(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la/ sun 'byin du dgol ba ngo tsha ba med par mngon du sems can 'dod chag pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms mi myong ba rab tu byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la
102b4(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis byang bar gyur na/ de dag bdag cag gis/ kyang yul 'di nas 'byung ba zhig/ yul ngan pa gzhan dag du sgyun/ par bgyi ste/ tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongasu skyong
102b5(gzungs 'dus): ba dang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod ma'i dus na/ yul 'di zhig par brtson pa'i sems can bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa bgyid pa mthu stobs dang ldan pa/ 
102b6(gzungs 'dus): yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par bgyid pa/ sems can drug cing rlang ba'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po du ma zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag kyang bdag cag gi
102b7(gzungs 'dus): dbang du mi 'gyur na/ de la bdag cag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal ba/ rigs kyi bu khyed yid skye bar ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ klong ban
102b8(gzungs 'dus): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lhamathu bskabs cher ba dang / klu dang gnod sbyinas thob pa du ma zhig gnas pa de dag la sems 'jam pas mchod pa chen po byas te/ mtshan
103a1(gzungs 'dus): rten ge ma sa la g+han d+ha dang gtsug lag khang cho ma la stsogs pa yul byin gyis rlabs rlangs pa rnams su theg pa chen pa'i sde sdod shes rab tu
103a2(gzungs 'dus): pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'dus pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas bal po che dang / dkon mchog rtsegs pa la sogs pra shin du rgyas pa'i mdo sde mang po lhogs shig dang / 
103a3(gzungs 'dus): yul se so nos byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang / mthu stobs che ba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas/ chos kyi ro mnos shing dus
103a4(gzungs 'dus): gsum du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs/ pa rnams kyi dam tshig las mi 'gal bar byed/ bsgral pa bzang po na sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang / 
103a5(gzungs 'dus): yul yang bar byed/ yul 'di'i ming dang / bstan pa byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mo 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yu dge ba 'dir rgyal po mthu chung bar 'gyur
103a6(gzungs 'dus): de/ 'thung 'a des ni rang gi mthu stobs kyi yul mi thub pas// rgyal po dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/ bod kyi rgyal po dang / rgya'i rgyal po la skyabs btsal nas yul
103a7(gzungs 'dus): srung bar byed do// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyu dang bod kyi yul du dkon mchog gsum gnas shing mchod/ gnas chen po byed pa dang / yul dang / 
103a8(gzungs 'dus): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas su 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag kyang byang chub sems chen po'i las tshol ba'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa
103b1(gzungs 'dus): chen po la dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhol bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi mthu stobs kyis l-i yul gyi mi dang / dkon mchog gsum rlag par mi 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyed
103b2(gzungs 'dus): rnams dang / bod dang rgya'i rgyal po dang / blon po dag ci nas mchod rten ge ma sa la g+han+da d+ha dang / yul dge ba 'di la ri mo byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'dir bsod nams bya ba
103b3(gzungs 'dus): dngos po dge ba rgya chen por byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'di'i mi nyi 'og dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyam pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde bar rang gi yul skyel nas
103b4(gzungs 'dus): phyis yang dag par lta ba can dang / bsod nams la dga' bar sems sgyur cig/ dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stobs kyis bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mdangs
103b5(gzungs 'dus): dang gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyurazhing / sangs rgyas nyid du nye bar sem 'gyur gyis dus gsum du rtogs pade bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdam dag
103b6(gzungs 'dus): la byas pa bzo bar bgyis shig/ 'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams ni byor mo ldog par byang chub sems dpa' las dang ldan pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bden pa dang ldan pa gang
103b7(gzungs 'dus): bde dang / pra dog dang khon du 'dzin par spangs pa/ byas pa zo ba chos la dga' ba yang dag pa'i lci ba can/ log pa'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa sems 'jam par 'gyur te/ 
103b8(gzungs 'dus): rgyu des na dge ba rnams shes pa'o// yul 'di'i 'khar yang mi byams pa dang 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang du mas brgyan par 'gyur te/ de'i
104a1(gzungs 'dus): phyir 'khor dge ba can zhes bya'o// gzhan yul gzhan dag nas/ sems can dad pa med pa/ sdang ba 'khon du 'dzin pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun/ yul 'di'i
104a2(gzungs 'dus): rdul gyis reg cing / yul 'di nas 'khrungs pa'i mtsho ba la longs spyod na/ de dag thams cad kyis sbyar nas sems 'jam pa dang // mnyen pa dang / byams pa'i bsam pa dang / khrod
104a3(gzungs 'dus): dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang // dad pa dang / yang yul 'dir sdig pa mi byed par 'gyur te// yul 'di ni yon tan mang po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe slar
104a4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum bye bar du byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer thugs rje chen po dang bcas te bkye ba des/ chun gnas pa'i sems
104a5(gzungs 'dus): can rnams kyi sems yongasu dag pa dang / bde ba dang ldan par byas pa dang // chu'i nang nas slar mthong ste/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par gyur
104a6(gzungs 'dus): yang 'od zer de dag slar log nas// byang chub sems dpa' se mos dpa' chen po rnams kyi yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi yul byin gyis brlabs
104a7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / mtsho nang nas byung ba pad ma'i stong ni // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bstan bzhugs pa de dang / de dag gi 'od zer dang 'dres nas na mkha' la 'phags te// steng gi
104a8(gzungs 'dus): khams nam mkha' khyebs par gyur cing // li yul thams cad tu lha'i me tog gi char pa ba pa~M// lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas
104b1(gzungs 'dus): dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / shes rab dang tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bstung ba dang / 
104b2(gzungs 'dus): lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i/ rdzu 'phrul dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi'i// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang
104b3(gzungs 'dus): phyir mi 'ong ba dang // dgu brtsam pa dang / khams gsum gyi srid pa las nges par 'byin par thar pa'o sgo gsum dang / 'du byed ring mi 'ardzogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhug+sa
104b4(gzungs 'dus): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rdzu 'phrusagyi rkang pa dang / bsam gtan dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang so so ya / dag par rig pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyos
104b5(gzungs 'dus): par 'jugs pa bzhi dang / dbang po yo su dag pa dang // byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos mtha' dag gis sgra 'byin par 'gyur te// gzhan yang
104b6(gzungs 'dus): sems can yong su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / snyom par 'jug pa dang // sa dang stobs dang thugs rje chen po dang byams pa chen
104b7(gzungs 'dus): po dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang // the tsom sel ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / maM skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / ma 'as
104b8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang // 
105a1(gzungs 'dus): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i khong su rtogs pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par
105a2(gzungs 'dus): spyod yul dang / skye ba dang sdug bsngal dang / rga ba dang sdug pa dang / bral ba dang mi sdug pa dang / phrad pa dang / 'dod pa btsal te mi rnyed pa/ sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung ba
105a3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur to// gzhan yang phung po dag la sems pa med pa dang / gso ba dang gang zag dang // srog med pa dang chos bden pa skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa
105a4(gzungs 'dus): dang / dag pa med pa dang / rjed pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'gro
105a5(gzungs 'dus): lnga po dag gis khrug pa'i rmi lam lta bu dang / 'khor ba'i 'du byed brtso ner lta bu dang sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu dang nu zla dang / brag tshe lta bu'o zhes bya ba'o sgra byung bar
105a6(gzungs 'dus): gyur to// gzhan yang dad pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang // 'khor bas skyo ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sgra rgya stong bu ma 'byung
105a7(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor 'dus pa mang po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas lhags pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang / gnod sbyin thams ca
105a8(gzungs 'dus): sems ngo mtshar du ma 'byung bar 'gyur to// rangs pa smos te/ chos kyi sgo mo'i sgra de dag la/ yi mi phyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag gis khongs du chud
105b1(gzungs 'dus): bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
105b2(gzungs 'dus): du cho 'phrul chen po 'di lde bu bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni/ yul dge ba nas
105b3(gzungs 'dus): skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi ched du lhags par yong byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dis ni byang chub sems
105b4(gzungs 'dus): dpa' tshegs chung dus dbang po dang / shes pa yongasu dge par 'gyur zhing chos kyi sgo mo dang / de dag kyang ma par rdzogaso par 'gyur ro// mi 'ongs pa'i
105b5(gzungs 'dus): skye bo de dag ni byis pa chung ngu yan chad chosamangon par rdzogs par dga' zhing rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgom 'di dag smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag dbang po yong su
105b6(gzungs 'dus): rtogs nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rtsu ba rnam par dag pas/ chos yang dag par nod pa yang thos par 'gyur
105b7(gzungs 'dus): de dag 'khor ba ni 'du byed pa dang / chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/ semos de lta bu des na/ yul dgan par byin gyis rlangs pa 'dir/ dad
105b8(gzungs 'dus): phyogs la brtson pa'i sgo/ yang na 'i glang rul de dag thams cad dngos grub thang bar 'gyur gyi/ bdud sdig can gyis kyi grags mi snod na/ gzhan ngag gis lnga smos kyang
106a1(gzungs 'dus): dgos/ 'di lta ste/ lha rnams kyis 'khor gnod sbyin nam dri za 'am mi 'am ci yis chad pas bcad par gyur na yang / mchod rten go ma sa la g+han d+ha 'am/ ri glang rul khras
106a2(gzungs 'dus): na/ de dag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// brgya la mthong na sems zhi bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na ri glang ru dang / mchod rten goms la gAn d+ha ni mtshams bcad pa dang / gtsang byed
106a3(gzungs 'dus): dang / skyabs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no// mchod rten go ma sa la gAn d+ha dang / ri glang dang / yul dge ba dang
106a4(gzungs 'dus): 'khar dge ba can dang / dgon pa byin gyis brlab rtse ba'i ming thos nas dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po byang ba 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
106a5(gzungs 'dus): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / rnam thos bu la bka' bskyal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis song la/ mtsho chen po 'di sha'i ri gril te/ byang phyogs logs na gyi sho gtsang ma'i nang
106a6(gzungs 'dus): cu po la/ chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnod par bsrung ba dang / yul 'dis 'choms mngon par bgyis shig/ de nas nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang / rnams kyi duH
106a7(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin du 'tshal lo// zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gis na mkha' las sha'i ri grol gang na ba de logs su chas te/ sha ri'i bus ni lag na mkhar sil thogs/ rnam tham
106a8(gzungs 'dus): kyi bus ni lag na ma dung thogs nas// sha ri'i byed sngam pas blangs te/ nub phyogs logs bzhag nas chu srol chen po dod te/ mtsho srog chags dang bcas par gyi sho gtsang
106b1(gzungs 'dus): ma'i nang du'o ste// tshul de lta bus mchod rten gom sa la gAn d+ha dang / ri grang ru dang / li yul de mngon par bya'o// de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
106b2(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri drang srong dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / khyi
106b3(gzungs 'dus): dag la sogs pa lho chen po brgyad dang / 'khor sum khri lnga stong lnga brgya dang bcas pa/ mchod rten gi me sa la g+han d+ha la sogs pa yongasu btad do// lha de dag gis kyang de bzhin
106b4(gzungs 'dus): du mnos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bskul ba dang / 'khor de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
106b5(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa glang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pachen po'i mdos rdzogs s+ho// / @#/ 'phags pa mdo sde snang brgyad ces bya ba/ rig sngags
106b6(gzungs 'dus): kyi mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das paM yang rim yangs pa can na 'khor rnam
106b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhi phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dang / thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong 'khor der 'dus
106b8(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur te/ 'dug pa bstan las langs nas/ sangs rgyas ga la ba de logs thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling
107a1(gzungs 'dus): gi sems can 'di dag ni/ gcig gis gcig bskyed de/ thog ma ma mchis pa nas rgyun ma chad do// de la shes pa dang ldan pa ni nyung / mi shes pa mang sangs
107a2(gzungs 'dus): rgyas la dran pa ni nyung / 'di gdon la zhen pa ni rlung / tshe ring ba ni cung / mthung ba ni mang / shes rab can ni nyung / gti mug can ma / btsun pyug ba ni nyung / dngul po
107a3(gzungs 'dus): pa ni mang / gnyen nges pa ni nyung / khro gdum pa ni mang / drang po ni nyung / yon pa ni mang / chos bzhin byas pa ni nyung / chos khrims bzhin mi byed pa ni mang bas/ skye'o thams
107a4(gzungs 'dus): cad chos bzhin mi byed pa ni mang bas/ skye'o// thams cad chos bzhin mi byed de/ khral ches pas 'phongs kyang sdugs par gyur te/ de ltar log par lta ba la
107a5(gzungs 'dus): yid ches pas/ 'di ltar nyon mongs par 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'ad kyis log par lta ba'i sems can rnams la yang dag par bltas pas chos bstan te/ sdug
107a6(gzungs 'dus): bsngal dang nyon mongs pa las grol zhing thar par mdzad bu gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ shin du legs so// shin du legs
107a7(gzungs 'dus): thogs pa med pa khyod snying rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can log pa lta ba rnams kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i chos zhus pa/ bsam gyis mi
107a8(gzungs 'dus): khyab po/ rtag par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / gnam dang sa la yang snang brgyad mdo sngos phye ste/ de la bstan par bya'o// 'di ltar ni 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ 
107b1(gzungs 'dus): kyang gsungs so// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas so// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs so// da ltar zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs so// gnam dang sa'i bar rnam
107b2(gzungs 'dus): mchog rtse bo dam pa thams cad las 'phags pa'o// mi zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa drang po/ sems la g.yo sgyu med cing lus kyis yang dag par dran par byed pa mi zhes bya
107b3(gzungs 'dus): ste/ yang dag pa'i chos spyod cing / rtag tu drang po'i las byed pa ni mi zhes bya ste/ de bas na mes ni chos la spyod par 'gyur la/ chos kyis ni mi lus la phan par 'gyur
107b4(gzungs 'dus): mIs ni chos la rten pas 'angags par 'gyuraro// thog pa med pa sems can thams cad ni mi lus thob kyang bsod nas kyi tshogs mi byed de/ yang dag pa la rgyab kyis phyogs
107b5(gzungs 'dus): shing sgyu ma lta ste/ sdig pa sna tshogs byed do// gal te gang zhig gis mdo sde 'di thos te/ log par mi byed na/ sdig pa kun las grol zhing thar te/ sdug bsngal mtsho las
107b6(gzungs 'dus): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i lhas srung zhing bskyabs dang / gdon bgegs med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang dus ma yin pa'i blo bur du mi mchi ste/ 'di la yid ches pas de 'dra ba'i dpal
107b7(gzungs 'dus): thob par gyur to// gzhan yang thogs pa med pa rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo gang gzhig log par lta zhing log pa la yid ches na bdud sdig can dang / su mu stegs
107b8(gzungs 'dus): can dang / ltas ngan mang po dang / 'dre gdon ma rungs pas 'tshe zhing blo bur kyis thebs pa dang / skang ba dang / sha ba ma rungs pa 'byung ste/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar
108a1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// gal te dge ba'i bshes mnyen dang zad te/ snang brgyad kyi mdo sde 'di lan gsum blags na bde gdan ma rungs pas mi tshugs shing / nad rdzas
108a2(gzungs 'dus): dang mche ba dang bral zhing mthu stobs dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di lar gsum glags na bsod nams 'di dag go/ sems can gang zhig 'dod chags dang
108a3(gzungs 'dus): zhe sdang dang / gti mug che zhing ser sna dang / dog byed pa dag mdo sde 'di la yid ches ste/ na bsod nams 'di dag go// sems can gang zhig 'dod
108a4(gzungs 'dus): bsti bstang byas pas mchod pa byas nas/ lan gsum glags na gti mug la sogs pa'i nyes pa thams cad byung zhing byangs pa dang / snying je dang / dgra
108a5(gzungs 'dus): ba dang badrang snyoms su 'gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos bskal yang yod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis 'du byed kyi las ci byed kyang rung ste/ 
108a6(gzungs 'dus): sngar mdo sde 'di lan gsum klag go// 'di ltar ste gang kharang khyim rtsig gas// sa gos sam/ kha khyim byed dam/ bya ba chen po byed dam// khyams saso/ byang tshang
108a7(gzungs 'dus): bka' sa 'am/ sgo 'don nam/ chu ko 'am tha rtsig gam/ rdzun dang rang thag 'dzugs sam/ bang mdzod byed dam/ phyogs kyi dris sam/ rang byed na/ nyi ma'i bza' dang / 
108b1(gzungs 'dus): zla ba'i bshed dang tshangs kun dang lo bskor dang / 'brug rje dang / sa lnga dang lha'i sa dang 'brug sngon po dang / stag dkar po dang bya dmar po dang / hen bu dang lha drug dang
108b2(gzungs 'dus): lo bskor kyi lha drug bcu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa lha dang / gdon thams cad kyis gnod par mi byed de/ de las 'byol shing bros so// de byas nas bkra shis chen po
108b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur te/ bsod nams tshad med pa yang 'bab bo/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byas na/ khang khyim bzhir brtan pa dang / btsan phyug pa dang / nor 'du bar 'gyur ro/ 
108b4(gzungs 'dus): gal te/ g.yul ngor 'gro'am/ rjes zlas la 'og 'am/ tshong byed du 'gron yang khye stegs phyin cing nyes pa mi 'byung ste/ btsan zhing
108b5(gzungs 'dus): dar ba dang / bu tsa brgya stong du 'phel ba dang / pa ni byams/ ma ni sr-i zhu che/ pho ni chu gang che/ mo ni srun pa dang / phu nu dang
108b6(gzungs 'dus): khyo shug mdza' ning 'dum pa dang // / re shing smon pa thams cad legs shing mi 'ag
108b7(gzungs 'dus): po med do// sems can gang zhig gyod la thogs pa'am/ brtson du phan pa gang gis mdo sde 'di lan gsum glags na/ de ma thag de las thar par 'gyur
108b8(gzungs 'dus): sems can gang zhig sangs rgyas mdo sde 'di'i chang nas 'dzin tam klog gam/ 'don dam/ gzhan la bstan na nga ni
109a1(gzungs 'dus): mi ma yin pas kyang mi tshugs te/ ri la gnas na yang stag dang / skyang khyi la sogs te/ gcan zan ma rungs pa gnod par byed par mi 'gyuraro/ dge ba'i lhas bsrung bar
109a2(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur zhing // skyab pa dang / mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu gang zhig pha ma shi nas sdig pa'i las bgyis pa/ sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ 
109a3(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal tshad pa med pa myong ba las/ de'i bu mos mdo sde 'di lan gsum glags na/ pha ma sems can dmyal ba las thar te/ mthe ris kyi lhar skyes shing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 
109a4(gzungs 'dus): ches mthong ba dang / mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang / byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// thogs pa med pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba de'i tshe na dge bsnyen dang / 
109a5(gzungs 'dus): bsnyen ma zhig log par lta ba la yid ches shing sbyin pa yang spyod pas zag med pa'i sku grub ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub grub nas/ kun du 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin ga
109a6(gzungs 'dus): pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyuraro// bskal pa ni 'ga' 'ga' chen po zhes bya'o// yul ni ming ni mtha' yas mu med ces bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i mi thams cad
109a7(gzungs 'dus): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag sna brgyad kyi mdo 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na bzhugs pa'i gnas de na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang / tshangs
109a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i rgyal po dang / lha rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mdo sde 'di la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar spos dang / me tog gis mchod par byed do/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis
109b1(gzungs 'dus): sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di ston cing / yang dag pa'i don khong du chud cing rtogs na des ni sangs rgyas kyi sku chos kyi thugs yin par rig par bya'o// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
109b2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i mig gis rtag tu zad mi shes pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs mthong ste/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzug so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
109b3(gzungs 'dus): rnam par shes pa stong pas/ de ni gzugs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rna bas rtag tu mi zad mi shes pa'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs thos kyang sgra nyid stong pa nyid kyi
109b4(gzungs 'dus): sgra ste/ de ni gsung dbyangs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// snas rtag tu zad mi shes pa'i dri rnam pa sna tshogs myong yang / dri stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dri yin pas/ 
109b5(gzungs 'dus): de ni spos brtsegs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rjes rtag tu zad mi shes pa'i ro rnam pa sna tshogs myong yang / ro nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro yin
109b6(gzungs 'dus): pas/ de ni chos kyi snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// sus kyis rtag tu mi zad shes pa'i reg bya rnam pa sna tshogs tshor yang reg nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg tu ste/ 
109b7(gzungs 'dus): de ni ye shes kyi snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// yid kyis kyang rtag tu zad mi shes pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la bye brag 'byed kyang / chos nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos
109b8(gzungs 'dus): yin pas/ de ni de bzhin nyid kyi snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi dbang po drug po sngon du btang ba de dag thams cad kyi tshig tu brjod pa ni shes te/ gal te dge ba'i
110a1(gzungs 'dus): tshig smras la/ dge ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor na 'phags par 'gyur ro// gal te tshig sdig smras na/ sdig pa'i 'khor lo rtag tu bskor te ngan song du ltung ngo // 
110a2(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu de bas na dge ba dang / mi dge ba la ni yid che su mi rung ngo // gzhan yang phyogs pa med pa lus dang / sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod yin la// theg
110a3(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i mdo sde bcu gnyis yin te/ thog ma med pa nas glegs kyang zad mi shes te/ sku'i nyag ma tsam yang ma gdong/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo sde ni rnam par
110a4(gzungs 'dus): shes pa gcig gi sems yin te/ rang bzhin mthong ba dag gis shes ni shes par yin gyis tshig tu brjod pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ ma rabs rnams kyis
110a5(gzungs 'dus): shes pa ni ma yin no/ rigs kyi bu gang gis mdo sde 'di glags te/ don rtogs dag gis ni lus dang sems sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod yin par rtog so// gang
110a6(gzungs 'dus): ngag gis sems can sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dngos po yin par ma rtogs te/ de la mos shing srad na rgyun kun du 'khor zhing ngan song du ltung ba dang / gzhan sdug bsngal rgya mtshor
110a7(gzungs 'dus): 'bying ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mtshan tsam yang ma thos so// byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na gnas
