110a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i mi 'di dag ni skye ba dang / mchi ba lci bar 'dzin pas/ skye bo'i tshe ni yang nyi ma mi 'dam ste// dus ran pa dang skye'o/ shi na yang nyi ma mi mda' ste/ dus la bab na
110b1(gzungs 'dus): 'chi ba'i slad du da ltar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal na/ de yang dag pa'i lta ba la bgod cing / phyin ci log las bsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa dge'o dgel
110b2(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can shi ba dang / skye ba dang / shing byed pas dris pa legs/ khyod kyis legs par nyon cig/ khyod la bstan par bya'o// shes rab
110b3(gzungs 'dus): tshul dang / lam chen po'i chos gnams yongs par rtag tu s+ho/ yangs par rtag tu gsal te/ lo gcig bzhin du dge ba dang / legs pa na tha dad pa med do/ 
110b4(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mi'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can kun la bu dang 'dra bar snying rje bas mi'i dbang por gyur to/ 
110b5(gzungs 'dus): pa ma lta bur gyur pas/ skye bo'i chos su lo bskor gyi yi ge legs bzhir zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad kyi dus dang zla tshigs shes par byas ste/ nyi ma maH
110b6(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / gang ba dang grub pa dang / bskud pa dang / dbang ba dang gsal ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / g.yang za ba dang / zhig pa dang / gsad par bya ba zhes bstan te/ glen pa
110b7(gzungs 'dus): dag de la yid ches te/ de bzhin byas ni nyes pa las thar pa med de/ gzhan yang bon pos bcad pa dang / mnan pa dang gsod pa zhes tha spyod smras na/ lha dang gang+gAn
110b8(gzungs 'dus): gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ bdag la gnod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kha lo byed par zad de/ 'di lta bu dag ni gnam gyi dus tshong dang / sa'i gzhung lugs las 'gal cing // 
111a1(gzungs 'dus): nyi zla'i 'od la rgyad kyis 'phyogs pa yin te/ rtag tu mun khung du 'thums nas/ yang dag pa'i lam bcas pas/ g.yengs pa las log nas log pa'i lam du song
111a2(gzungs 'dus): bas/ ha cang yang phyin ci log ces so// rigs kyi bu gang btsas pa'i tshe/ mdo sde 'di lan gsum glags na nyes pa ci yang mi 'byung ste/ shis pa dang yid bzhungs shing shes ra
111a3(gzungs 'dus): rno ba dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / blo bur mchi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// shi ba'i tshe lan gsum glags na nyes pa ci yang mi 'byung ste/ legs pa grangs med pa
111a4(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu nyi ma yang rtag/ tu bzang / zla ba yang rtag tu bzang lo yang rtag tu bzang ma dag pa'i nyes pa med kyis/ nam yo byad 'byor tsan
111a5(gzungs 'dus): shid btang ngo // shid btang ba'i tshe mdo sde 'di gsum klags na pa na sa chen por 'gyung / bsod nams tshang med pa thob cing // rigs che zhing btsan pa dang / shin
111a6(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa'i lam thob par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu dur sa btab pa yang shar dang / sgo dang nub dang byang dang gar yang rung ste/ gang bde la mi'i gnas mi'i yid du 'ong zhing dga'
111a7(gzungs 'dus): de la 'dre gdon yang dga' bar 'gyur te/ mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags te/ dur btab na nam yang nyes dmigs mi 'byung shing phyug pa dang / mi 'phan pa dang / bkra shis
111a8(gzungs 'dus): chen por 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gden de dag bzlas ni/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// skye ba'i nyi ma pa'ang la dan/ mche ba'i dus kyang bzang ba ste/ skyem
111b1(gzungs 'dus): dus ni 'di klags na/ phan pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ zla ba rtag tu bzang zhing / lo yang rtag tu rab tu bzang / mdo sde glags shing shing byas na/ gzhan du legs shing dge bar
111b2(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ de'i tshe na 'khor bdun khri bdun stong snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/ sems rnam par grol bar spangs nas yang dag pa la phyogs shing / sangs
111b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyis chos kyi bskal pa thob ste/ the tsom zad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas
111b4(gzungs 'dus): la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rabs thams cad ni phan tshun yol bar dus bzhi dang / zla tshigs brgyad dang / mngon par gsol lo// chu dang me rgyud
111b5(gzungs 'dus): pa las thams cad gsos so// pho mo phrad pa lis bu tsa skyes te/ 'di yang gnam sa'i gzhung lugs yinate/ tshul gyis de ltar 'jug pa ni 'jig rten
111b6(gzungs 'dus): chos so// rigs kyi bu gang glen pa shes rab med pa ni bon la yid ches te/ bkra shis su re bas mo 'debs kyi na dge ba mi byed pas sdig pa sna tshogs byed pa'i rkyen gyis
111b7(gzungs 'dus): nas/ phyir yang mi lus thob pa ni sen mo'i steng na sa yod pa dang 'dra'o/ sems can dmyal bar ltung ba dang / yi dgas dang byol song du skyes pa ni sa chen po dang 'dra'o// 
111b8(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu gal te gnyen cig byed na/ chu dang me ste gcig la gcig 'phrod de ma 'phrod ces mi lta bur dbang thang dang / tshe rabs rtsi ba'i yi ger lta so na dbang thang che chung mngon te ga
112a1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur mi 'gyur yang mngon no/ bag ma len pa'i nyin par mdo sde 'di lan gsum klags nas/ chung ma blangs na 'di ni legs pa'i steng du legs par bsdus la/ 
112a2(gzungs 'dus): snang ba'i steng du gsal bas snang bas/ rigs che ba dang / btsan pa dang / bu tsa 'phan pa dang / med bzhungs pa dang / shes rab rdo ba dang / shes pa dang ldan zhing sgyu
112a3(gzungs 'dus): brtsal che ba dang / sri zhu che bar 'gyur te/ shin du bkra shis pas blo bur du mi mchi zhing bsod nams dang ldan pa dang sangs rgyasu 'grub po/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
112a4(gzungs 'dus): brgyad gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rtag tu mi'i nang na gnas te/ thams cad dang / 'thun par spyad kyang log pa ni bcom yang dag par
112a5(gzungs 'dus): gzhung ni 'dzugs/ 'dod pa bzhi las dag pa ste/ rnam par grol ba brgyad thob pa'i ming ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ba da ho zag pa zad pa ha/ 
112a6(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' len na dkar zag pa zad pa ta/ byang chub sems dpa' ku'u 'bod do/ zag pa zad pa ha/ byang chub sems dpa' su byi ni shin zag pa zad pa
112a7(gzungs 'dus): ha/ byang chub sems dpa' na la yan zag pa zad pa ha/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgyad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bdag cag gis sangs
112a8(gzungs 'dus): rgyas mang po la gzungasu bzung ba'i rigs sngags 'dis/ gang snang brgyad kyi mdo 'di 'chang ngam/ klog pa dang / 'don pa la nyes pa dang / 'jigs pa nam du yang mi 'byung
112b1(gzungs 'dus): zhing / mi dge ba thams cad kyis gdon pa bsrungs shing bskyab pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags 'di 'bul lo// 'di lta ste/ a ka ni ni ka ni a thi
112b2(gzungs 'dus): la/ man ta le/ man Ta le ye swahA// // bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig par sems pa gang zhig chos smra ba la log par byed pa 'ongs na/ rigs sngags 'di thos pa tsam
112b3(gzungs 'dus): gyis mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du// 
112b4(gzungs 'dus): snang brgyad kyi mdo zhes bgyi ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la phye zhing ston te rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen cing gzigs
112b5(gzungs 'dus): gzigs pA la the tsom yongasu bcad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs leg so// khyod rtogs par nyon cig/ khyod la
112b6(gzungs 'dus): snang brgyad kyi mdo bstan par bya'o// snang brgyad ces bya ba ni rnam grangs/ snang brgyad ces bya ba ni gsal bya'o// theg pa chen po 'dus ma byas kyi chos gsal bar rig cing
112b7(gzungs 'dus): par shes pa brgyad rgyu dang rkyen stong par dmig su med pa rnam par 'byed pa'o// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rgyu dang / rkyen snang zhing gsal ba'i spun gyis mdo sder
112b8(gzungs 'dus): gyur pas snang brgyad kyi mdo zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa brgyad ces bya ba ni/ dbang po drug ni rnam par shes pa drug ste/ mig ni gzugs kyi rnam par shes pa
113a1(gzungs 'dus): rna ba ni sgra'i rnam par shes pa/ sna ni dri'i rnam par shes pa/ lce ni ro'i rnam par shes pa/ lus kyi reg bya'i rnam par shes pa/ pid ni bye phrag gi rnam
113a2(gzungs 'dus): par shes pa ste/ kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa brgyad ste/ rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa ba stong zhing ci yang med par rtogs na/ mig gnyis 'od snang ba'i gan
113a3(gzungs 'dus): yin par shes te/ 'od snang ba'i gnam du de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to// kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i gnam las ni/ mdo sde ang glu ma dang / mya ngan las
113a4(gzungs 'dus): 'das pa'i mdo sde chen po byung ngo // yidarnam par shes pa'i gan ma mas ni/ shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa'i 'brel ze'i mdo sde dang / rnal 'byor
113a5(gzungs 'dus): spyod pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ngo / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas nyid kyang chos yin la/ chos nyid kyang sangs rgyas yin te/ mtshan nyid gcig pa las
113a6(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba'i ye shes rtogs pa chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di gsungs pa na sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'o
113a7(gzungs 'dus): zer kyi thal le bor mthar med par snang bar byas nas/ mun nag thams cad dang 'od zer gyis mdo snang bar byas/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang zhe ste
113a8(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal las thar nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba ni stong snyed dus gcig tu
113b1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas grub nas nyi zla 'od ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas su ston te/ rna ba gnyis ni sgra thos pa'i gnam yin te/ sgra thos pa'i gnam du tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa
113b2(gzungs 'dus): bstan to// sna gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi spos kyi gnam yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi spos kyi gnam du spos brtsegs dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa bstan te/ 
113b3(gzungs 'dus): kha dang lce ni chos kyi lce'i gnam yin te/ chos kyi ro'i gnam du chos kyi ro'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to/ lus ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnam du rnam
113b4(gzungs 'dus): par snang mdzad lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer gyi sangs rgyas dang / rnam par snang mdzad gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs
113b5(gzungs 'dus): brnyan du bstan to/ yid ni rnam par shes pa'i gnam yin te/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i gnam du mi g.yo ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'od zer
113b6(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pas bstan to/ sems ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnam yin te/ chos kyi dbyings gan ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings gnam du stong pa'i rgyal
113b7(gzungs 'dus): bo zhes bya ba/ mtshan yang na mkha' zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyuraro/ bskal pa chen po'i ming ni yongasu
113b8(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs pa zhes bya/ yul gyi ming ni mtha' yas med pa zhes bya ste/ de na gnas pa'i mi thams cad dang gzhan dag dang gzhan zhes bya ba med pas/ brtsod pa med pa'i ting
114a1(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin thob bo// dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / drug khri drug stong ni/ gzungs chen po thob par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / 
114a2(gzungs 'dus): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pa ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par
114a3(gzungs 'dus): dag pa thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu gang zhig yig gtsang ngam/ thabs thob pa'i nyin par ram/ khang khyim gsar du rtsig
114a4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sbyin par ram/ mdo sde la lan cigagasum glags na/ mdo sde thams cad lan cig klag+sa ba dang 'dra'o/ mdo sde 'di lan cig bris na/ 
114a5(gzungs 'dus): mdo sde thams cad bris pa dang 'dra'o// 'di'i bsod nams ni dpag tu med/ brjod du med de na mkha'i dang 'dra bar mtha' med de/ mi des 'phags pa'i
114a6(gzungs 'dus): lam thob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mtha' med pa 'di ltar rig par gyis shig/ sems can gang zhig chos la ma dad pa dang / 
114a7(gzungs 'dus): log par lta ba ni mdo sde 'di thos na mdo sde 'di sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no// zhes skur pa 'debs te mi'i lus la mdze dang shu ba dang / ma rungs pa
114a8(gzungs 'dus): rnams dang / rnag khrag kun nas mdzag pa brtsog cing dam pa kun gyis mi 'dod pa ni nad kyi thebs shing shi nas kyang mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ 
114b1(gzungs 'dus): steng ge me ni 'og du thal 'og gi me ni steng du thal te/ mdung dang shag tis lus la btsags pa dang / kha nas lcags khu blugs pa dang / rtsa dang rus pa yang zhig nyams te/ 
114b2(gzungs 'dus): nyin zhag gcig la lan bdun khri ni mchi/ lan bdun khri ni gson te/ sdug bsngal chen po rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyuraro/ de yang mdo sde 'di la skur pa btab pa'i phyir/ 
114b3(gzungs 'dus): de 'dra ba zhig myong ngo / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa de dag tshig su bcad de bka' bstsal pa/ lus ni ye nas yod pa'i lus yan lag lnga yang ye nas tshang // 
114b4(gzungs 'dus): skye yang ye nas rang skyes ste/ rgas kyang ye nas rang rgaso/ shi yang ye nas rang shi'o/ ring por 'dod kyang ring mi 'gyur/ thung bar 'dod kyang thung
114b5(gzungs 'dus): mi 'gyur/ bde skyed khyod kyis rang myong ste/ yang dag log pa khyod kyi dbang / 'du byed las rnams rang byed pa/ gzhan la ma dri mdo sde klogs/ nam zha zha'i bar
114b6(gzungs 'dus): du yang / lam tho ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di gsungs nas/ 'khor mang po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sems yid gsal ba thob nas rab tu
114b7(gzungs 'dus): dga' mgu yid rangs te thams cad kyi mtshan dang mtshan ma thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen cing gzigs pa la zhugs pa yang med/ rtogs pa yang med mthong ba
114b8(gzungs 'dus): yang med/ shes pa yang med/ chos gcig kyang ma mthong ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dben pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o// 'phags pa snang brgyad ces bya ba rigs sngags kyi
115a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi mdo rdzog s+ho// 6// rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA pradz+nyA nya/ da na na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
115a2(gzungs 'dus): na ro rad ya yA/ nu ma ar+ya lo ki sha ra ya/ d+ho te sa ta ya/ mai hA sa ta yA/ tad+ya thA/ ska li ska la ma ni t+ye swahA/ rigs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ sbyor tshul
115a3(gzungs 'dus): lan gsum bzlas te mthungs na/ lan bdun gyis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// / rgya ga
115a4(gzungs 'dus): skad du/ sarba na ma na ya/ bod skad du/ rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa zhes bya ba gzungs/ d+harma sarba b+huH/ ba ma pri ti ha ta/ rmi lam ngan
115a5(gzungs 'dus): sh+tsa san tud+yAr+dz+dza oM/ gag kha hi khA dza la dza la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha phaT Ta/ man 'dun brjod pas rmi lam ngan pa thams cad klog par byed de/ rmi lam ngan pa
115a6(gzungs 'dus): zlog bzhi ste bye ba'i gzungs sngon ste// / mu gar skad / ar+yA pradz+nyA par mr-i ta dza~M dem/ bod skad na/ bcom ldan 'das ma sum chod du zhes ran kyi ba smra
115a7(gzungs 'dus): phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ chos theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshan/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig
115a8(gzungs 'dus): no// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung ze'i ri la dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po dang thams gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i
115b1(gzungs 'dus): tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhug so// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
115b2(gzungs 'dus): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
115b3(gzungs 'dus): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
115b4(gzungs 'dus): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo spyad pas spyod pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bya// de skad
115b5(gzungs 'dus): ces smras pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
115b6(gzungs 'dus): la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo spyad pas spyod par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa rnam par rje su
115b7(gzungs 'dus): blta'o// gzugs stong pa'o/ stong pa nyid gzugasaso// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
115b8(gzungs 'dus): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gag pa
116a1(gzungs 'dus): dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa gang ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ gzugs dang / tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnam
116a2(gzungs 'dus): par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg med/ chos med/ mig gi khams
116a3(gzungs 'dus): med pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du med/ ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa'i bar du med/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med// 
116a4(gzungs 'dus): bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa med/ sha ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems
116a5(gzungs 'dus): dpa' rnams la thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med cing / skrag med de/ phyin ci
116a6(gzungs 'dus): log las shin du 'das nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
116a7(gzungs 'dus): du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// sha ri'i bu de lta bus shes par bya ste/ shes
116a8(gzungs 'dus): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bsngags/ rig pa chen po'i bsngags/ bla na med pa'i bsngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i khasdigs/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu
116b1(gzungs 'dus): zhi bar byed pa'i bsngags/ mi brdzun pas ni bden par nyid du shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snying po smras pa// // tad+ya thA/ oM g+ha te gA te pa ra ga te
116b2(gzungs 'dus): pa ra sam ga te b+ho te swAhA/ sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o// de nas
116b3(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 
116b4(gzungs 'dus): leg so legaso/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ 
116b5(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rje su yid rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
116b6(gzungs 'dus): spyan ras dbang phyug dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste/ 
116b7(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das mi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog
116b8(gzungs 'dus): s+ho// / @// rgya gar skad du/ e ka a kra ri pra badz+ra pa ra mi ta na me ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge gcig ma zhes
117a1(gzungs 'dus): batheg pa chen po'i mdo/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung
117a2(gzungs 'dus): bo'i ri la dge slong gi 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
117a3(gzungs 'dus): bka' bsngal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bzung shig 'di lta skye/ bcom ldan 'das
117a4(gzungs 'dus): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jin
117a5(gzungs 'dus): rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog s+ho// 
117a6(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a tha dza na na ma mA hA ya su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mda' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo dang / sangs rgyas dang byang
117a7(gzungs 'dus): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs na/ 'khor thams
117a8(gzungs 'dus): cod la chos ston cing bzhugs pa lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mchi ba'i
117b1(gzungs 'dus): dus kyi tshe/ mda' ka ye shes mngon du sgom par bya'o// de la mda' ye shes bya ba ni 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas na ci la yang mi chags pa'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// 
117b2(gzungs 'dus): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas na/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// thams cad byang chub kyi semasu 'dus pas na/ snying rje chen po'i
117b3(gzungs 'dus): 'du shes sgom par bya'o// sems rtogs na ye shes yin pas na/ sangs rgyas gzhan du mi tshol ba'i 'du shes sgom par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / 
117b4(gzungs 'dus): bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to/ 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas ci la yang mi chags 'du
117b5(gzungs 'dus): shes sgom/ chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes sgom/ byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas/ snying rje chen po'i 'du shes sgom/ sems
117b6(gzungs 'dus): ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po dang / thabs
117b7(gzungs 'dus): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams rjesu yid rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
117b8(gzungs 'dus): par bstod do// 'phags pa mda' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog s+ho// / sha ri'i bu de la bshags pa ni yin te/ bdag ming 'di zhes
118a1(gzungs 'dus): bgyi ba sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o// chos la skyabasu mchi'o// dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
118a2(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshalo/ rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshalo/ klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ 
118a3(gzungs 'dus): dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshalo/ dpal dges la phyag 'tshal/ rin chen mo la phyag 'tshalo// rin chen zla 'od la phyag 'tshalo/ mthong ba don yod la phyag 'tshal// rin chen
118a4(gzungs 'dus): zla ba la phyag 'tshalo// dri med pa la phyaga'atshalo// dpas byin la phyag 'tsha'o// tshangasapa la phyag 'tsha'o// tshangs pas byin khya/ 'tsham/ chu lha la phyag 'tsha
118a5(gzungs 'dus): chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal/ dpal bzangs la phyag 'tshal/ tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshalo/ 'od dpal la
118a6(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshalo// mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo/ srid med kyi bu la phyag 'tshalo// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshalo/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer
118a7(gzungs 'dus): rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal/ nor dpa
118a8(gzungs 'dus): la phyag 'tshal// dri ma med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal// mtshan ma dpal shin du yongs grags la phyag 'tshal// dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
118b1(gzungs 'dus): g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal// shin du rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal// rin chen par
118b2(gzungs 'dus): mas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshalo/ shin du rnam par gnon pa gshegs pa'i dpal l-i phyag 'tshalo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
118b3(gzungs 'dus): sang+yas rgyas rin che zla ba dang pad ma'i ba dan la rab tu bzhugs pa sku ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na zhugs
118b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pas na 'khor ba'i skye gnas
118b5(gzungs 'dus): gzhan dag tu sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa 'am bgyid du brtsal pa 'am/ bgyid pa la rje su yid rang ba 'am mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par
118b6(gzungs 'dus): blang ba la bzhugs pa 'am 'jug du brtsal ba 'am/ 'jug pa la rje su yi rang ba bgyis pa 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis pa 'am/ bgyid du brtsal ba 'am/ 
118b7(gzungs 'dus): bgyid pa la rje su yi rang bar bgyes pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi dkor ram/ chos kyi dkor ram/ dge 'dun gyi dkor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi bkor phrogs pa 'am/ 
118b8(gzungs 'dus): 'phrog de brtsal ba 'am/ gzhan 'phrog pa la rjesu yi rang bgyis pa 'am/ bdag las kyi sgrib pa gang gis sgribs nas/ bdag sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/ yi dgas
119a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi yul du skye ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gan su skye ba 'am/ yul mtha' khob du skye ba 'am/ kla blor skye ba 'am/ lha tshe rings po rnams kyi nang du skye ba 'am/ dbang po mtshang
119a2(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur ba 'am/ lta ba log par 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par ma bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdig pa ci dang ci bgyis pa
119a3(gzungs 'dus): thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shesu gyur pa/ spyan du gyur pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar 'gyur ba/ mkhyen par gzigs pa dgongs pa de dag gi spyan sngar
119a4(gzungs 'dus): mthol lo gshegaso mi 'chab po/ mi sbed do/ slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid pa lag so/ de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
119a5(gzungs 'dus): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag gis skye ba 'di 'am/ skye ba thog ma 'am tha ma mchis pa na
119a6(gzungs 'dus): 'khor ba nas 'khor po'i skye gnas gzhan drug tu/ sbyin pa tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes pa la zas kham gcig tsam brtsal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / 
119a7(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang / bdag gi bla na med
119a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu zlums shing sdoms te bla na ma mchis pa dang / gang na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong mar
119b1(gzungs 'dus): yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongasu bsngos pa dang / ji ltar ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu
119b2(gzungs 'dus): sngo ba mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa rnams kyi yongasu bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis kyang
119b3(gzungs 'dus): yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o/ sdig pa thams cad ni so sor bshagaso// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa rnams kyi/ bsod nams thams cad la rje su yi rang// 
119b4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul zhing gsol ba 'deb so// bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mchog dam pa thob par gyur cig/ mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag
119b5(gzungs 'dus): da ltar zhus pa dang / de bzhin 'das pa dag dang gang ma byon// yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho 'dra kun la// thal mo sbyar bar bgyis te skyabasu
119b6(gzungs 'dus): nye bar mchi/ byang chub kyi ltung ba gshegs pa rdzog s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ mjam dpal yu
119b7(gzungs 'dus): 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo// 'jam dpal de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa 'di// 'jam dpal khyod kyi yid la
119b8(gzungs 'dus): bgyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod pa'i gzung sngags gsungs pa// / na ma sarba ta tha ga ta nam/ oM na mo su ka sa na ma ta ra ye ba ra mi ta// 
120a1(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal/ sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo'i// spyan gnyis skad cig glog dang 'dra ma// 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi/ ge sar bye ba las mi 'byung ba/ phyag
120a2(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun du gang ba/ brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma/ skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis/ rab tu bye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma/ phyag 'tshal gser sdor
120a3(gzungs 'dus): chu nang skyes kyi// pad mes phyag ni rnam brgyan ma/ sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba/ bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma// phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
120a4(gzungs 'dus): gtsug gtor/ mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bas spyod ma/ ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras kyi shin du sten ma/ phyag 'tshal dud tar
120a5(gzungs 'dus): hUM gi yi ges/ mdo dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma/ 'jig rten bdun po zhabs kyis mnan te/ lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma/ phyag 'tshal brgya byin
120a6(gzungs 'dus): me lha tshangs pa/ rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma/ 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma/ phyag 'tshal tradra ces bya dang / 
120a7(gzungs 'dus): phaT gyis pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma/ g.yas skum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te/ me 'bar khrug pa shin du 'bar ma/ phyag 'tshal tu re'i 'jigs pa
120a8(gzungs 'dus): chen pos/ bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma/ chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad/ dag po thams cad ma lus gsod ma/ phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag
120b1(gzungs 'dus): rgya'i/ sor mos thugs dkar rnam par brgyan ma/ ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i// rang gi 'od kyis tshogs rnams 'khrug ma/ phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' ba brjid
120b2(gzungs 'dus): ba'i// dbu brgyan 'od kyis phreng bas spel ma/ gzhad pa rab bzhad btud ta ra yis/ bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma/ phyag 'tshal sa bzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams/ 
120b3(gzungs 'dus): thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma khro gnyer g.yo ba'i yi ge hUM gyis phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma/ phyag 'tshal bzla ba'i rtse mos dbu brgyan/ brgyan pa thams cad
120b4(gzungs 'dus): shin du 'bar ma/ ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med wa/ rtag par shin tu 'od rab mdzad ma/ phyag 'tshal bskal pa'i tha ma'i me ltar/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus
120b5(gzungs 'dus): na gnas ma/ g.yas brkyang g.yon skum kun nas bskor dga' ba'i// dga'i dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma// phyag 'tshal sa bzhi'i ngos la// phyag gi mthal
120b6(gzungs 'dus): gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma/ khro gnyer ldan mdzad yi ge hUM gis/ rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma/ phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma/ mya ngan 'das zhing spyod
120b7(gzungs 'dus): yul nyi ma swA hA/ oM dang yang dag ldan pas/ sdig pa chen po 'joms pa nyid ma/ phyag 'tshal kun nas sgor rab dga' ba'i// dgra bo'i lus ni rab tu 'gems ma/ yi ga
120b8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i ngag ni bkod pa'i rig pa hU~M las sgrol ma nyid ma/ phyag 'tshal tu re'i zhabs gnyis brdabs na/ hUM gyi rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma/ ri rab man da ra ba dang 'byigs byed// 
121a1(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gsum rnams g.yo ba nyid ma// phyag 'tshal lha'i mtsho'i rnam pa'i// ri dgas rtags can phyag na snams ma// tar gnyis brjod paT kyi yi ges/ dug
121a2(gzungs 'dus): rnams ma lus par ni sel ma/ phyag 'tshal lha'i tshogs rnams rgyal po lnga dang mi 'am ci yis sten ma// kun nas go cha dga' ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ brjod dang rmi lam ngan pa
121a3(gzungs 'dus): sel ma/ phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i/ spyan gnyis po la 'od rabya gsal ma/ ha ra gnyis brjod tu ra ta ra yis/ shin du drag po'i rims nad sel ma/ phyag 'tsham
121a4(gzungs 'dus): de nyid gsum rnams dkod pa'i// zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma/ gdon dang ro ra langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnaMs 'joms pa tu re'i rab mchog nyid ma/ rtsa ba'i
121a5(gzungs 'dus): sngags kyi bstod pa 'di dang / phyag 'tshal pa ni nyi shu rtsa gcig/ lha mo la gus yang dag ldan pa ra/ blo ldan gang gis rab dang brjod nas/ srod dang tho rangs
121a6(gzungs 'dus): langs par byas te/ dran pas mi 'jigs thams cad rab ster/ sdig pa thams cad rab zhi pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad 'joms pa nyid do// rgyal ba bye brag bdun rnams kyis/ 
121a7(gzungs 'dus): myur du dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur la/ 'di las che ba nyid ni thob cing / sangs rgyas go 'phang mthar thug der 'gro/ de'i bdud ni drag po chen po brtan pa 'am/ gzhan yang 'gro
121a8(gzungs 'dus): bas zos pa dang ni mthungs pa nyid kyang dran pas rab tu sel ba nyid thob/ gdon dang rims dang dug gis gzir ba'i/ sdug bsngal tshogs ni rnam par spang ste/ seMs can
121b1(gzungs 'dus): gzhan pa rnams la yang ngo&ganyis gsum bdun du mngon par brjod na/ bu 'dod pas ni bu thob 'gyur zhing / nor 'dod pas ni rnams nyid thob/ 'dod pa thams cad thob pa 'gyur
121b2(gzungs 'dus): te/ bdegs rnams med cing so sor 'joms 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ma rje btsun ma grol ma la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad chen pos
121b3(gzungs 'dus): phyag mthil du bzhag nas bstod pa rdzog s+ho// rgya gur skad du/ sa man ta mu kha pra be she ra shrI bi ma lo shrI Sha pra bas/ sarba ta tha ga ta rdzi dA ya/ sa ma
121b4(gzungs 'dus): ya bi lo ki na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug gtor dri ma med par snang ba/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / 
121b5(gzungs 'dus): dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha
121b6(gzungs 'dus): gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang zham ring ba lha'i tshogs chen po dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu nas
121b7(gzungs 'dus): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor mang po tshogs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ ji ltar sbyin pa
121b8(gzungs 'dus): 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang / 
122a1(gzungs 'dus): lhun gyis grub par gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ba'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang tshul
122a2(gzungs 'dus): khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshangs pa dang / lhar skye bo'i 'bras bu rnam paro smin par 'gyur ba tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ji ltar lha'i gzugs 'dod pa dag
122a3(gzungs 'dus): lta bas mchog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par 'gyur ba bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / ji ltar brtson
122a4(gzungs 'dus): 'grus brtsom pa la lta ba dang btul ba dang / rga shi dang skye ba las sprul ba dang / rdzus te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur
122a5(gzungs 'dus): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ti nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i tingange 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
122a6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / ji ltar shes rab dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang / thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu/ 
122a7(gzungs 'dus): rnam par smin par 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug gis chos kyi sgo 'di nyin mtshan rjesu bsams shing rje
122a8(gzungs 'dus): spyad de/ dga' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do/ de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang na sum bcu rtsa gsum rigs kyi lha'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog/ 
122b1(gzungs 'dus): lha'i bu bye ba brgyad stong dang ldan pa// lha'i bu mo brgyad stong gis bskor ba// lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa rtsigs pa'i khang
122b2(gzungs 'dus): bzangs bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de/ lhan
122b3(gzungs 'dus): bu mo'i mchog med tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni chags/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan
122b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i khang bzangs kyi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing rgyags pa dang nga rgyal bgyis te/ snyems shing nyal lo// de nas nam phyed 'das tsam na/ lha'i bu gnyid kyis log
122b5(gzungs 'dus): lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang sgra sbyangs te nyal bar gyur to// de nas gnas mchog de na lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bor skar mda' gtong zhes bya ba zhig/ gnas pa des/ 
122b6(gzungs 'dus): lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskal nas tshig 'di skad ces smras/ kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs/ khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig
122b7(gzungs 'dus): bya dga' ba la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/ lha'i long spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/ da ste zhag bdun na mchi ba'i 'du byed pa 'chung
122b8(gzungs 'dus): te/ lha'i long spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnas gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun la byas pa cir dgos khyod sreg yang med
122b9(gzungs 'dus): kyis/ thabs ni myur ba myur bar sems shig ces smras nas/ lha'i ga ni da sbyin gyi gtso'o skar mda' gtong mi snang bar gyur te/ de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med
123a1(gzungs 'dus): pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas/ rgyal te mngal nas khab srub du sa la ltung ngo // de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag kyang skra ni bshig/ brgyan rnams ni bkrol/ gos ni
123a2(gzungs 'dus): snyi la// gdong khrag gis ni gnyer/ mchu dang / dkan dang / mid pa dang / lce ni skams la/ smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni sgra ste/ ngu zhing tshe nges 'debs la kyi hud kyi hud ces mdzed
123a3(gzungs 'dus): cing / lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang / tsan dan gyi chu dang mos mthor zhing / kha cig ni mgul nas mju/ kha cig ni lag pa nas mdzu/ kha cig ni de'i skra la bo byed/ 
123a4(gzungs 'dus): cig ni rkang pa nas mju/ kha cig ni gos 'dzin/ kha cig ni brgyal te 'gyel/ kha cig ni sa'i steng na chu dang bral ba'i nya bzhin 'gre ldog byed/ kha cig ni lus la
123a5(gzungs 'dus): mes tshig pa bzhin 'di ldog/ kha cig ni smre sngag du ma 'don// kyi hud ces 'dzin cing du'o// de nas lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te/ 
123a6(gzungs 'dus): dran pa thob nas khrag skyeg cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyam su myong nas shugs nar zhes phyung te/ lus mdar shing rlung gi shugs kyis btab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur
123a7(gzungs 'dus): la nga ro dang / snying sro shing nas de rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rkang pa la btugs te/ rkang pa gnyis
123a8(gzungs 'dus): la mjus nas 'di skad ces smraso/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can skyab du gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso'o skar
123b1(gzungs 'dus): mda' gtong gi sgra thos/ bdag gung bdun dus bgyid do zhes mchi zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig ces mchi na/ lha'i dbang po thabs gang gis bdag gis mchi
123b2(gzungs 'dus): bdag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol/ lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag mchi dag
123b3(gzungs 'dus): gi sgo nas thar pa'i cho gas bdag la bskyab du gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig des thos nas/ snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med
123b4(gzungs 'dus): pa la 'di skad ces smraso/ lha'i bu ma 'jigs shig/ gang gis mchi bdag 'pham par 'gyur ba sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur ba/ sangs rgyas
123b5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang mchi ba dang / mya ngan las skyob pa dang / bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de/ 
123b6(gzungs 'dus): de ni khyod kyi skyabs dang rtsa lag bzang po dang / dpung gnyen dang pha ma lta bur gyur pa yin no/ de ni ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa yin gyis 'dren pa de dag la zhugs
123b7(gzungs 'dus): pa der bdag cog myur du 'dong ngo / de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / lha dang lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga'
123b8(gzungs 'dus): ldan ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
124a1(gzungs 'dus): spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sro ba'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di
124a2(gzungs 'dus): la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso'o skar mda' gtong gis bskul te/ rgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di mchi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
124a3(gzungs 'dus): de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des
124a4(gzungs 'dus): zhal nas/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog dam pa dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/ 'od zer 'byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas nas 'od zer gyi
124a5(gzungs 'dus): snang ba des/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi gnas rnams
124a6(gzungs 'dus): snang bar byas nas bskul to// bskul kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor bzhug so zhugs ma thag
124a7(gzungs 'dus): tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ lha'i dbang po'i lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par mchi bdag gi sgo'i 'jig par 'gyur ba de nyon
124a8(gzungs 'dus): cig 'di gal te mchi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ sdug bsngal shin du chen po drag po'i tshor ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur/ thog mar ni grong khyer chen po
124b1(gzungs 'dus): ba ra na ser smig ma mkhan gyi phyi sa khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo can du skye bar 'gyur te/ phyis khung de na shang lci'o// phyis khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba brgya stong
124b2(gzungs 'dus): gnas te/ de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha la za zhing king rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus kun rdzogs par gyur to// lo bdun tshang
124b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyuraro// de nas mchi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de nas dgon par ru sbrul gyi skye gan su skyes la/ de na chu'i mi yang mi grag cing grib kyang med de/ nyi tshan gyis lus gdungs shing
124b4(gzungs 'dus): tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus rtogs nas lus du bur 'gyur/ de nas yang las kyi 'bras bu'i dbang gis lus byung nas yang zhig par 'gyur te/ lo lnga tshang bar de ltar
124b5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// de nas mchi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ ba ra na se de nyid du 'bab chu chen por skye bar 'gyur/ de nas las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'phongs nas lus pa chen po
124b6(gzungs 'dus): de la sbrul bdug pa dang / bya rog dang se mo dang / khyi dang gzig dang / dred dang lce spyang la sogs pas za'o// srog chags sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang za'o// de nas yang las kyi dbang gis
124b7(gzungs 'dus): byung zhing yang zad de/ lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur/ de nas mchi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun du skye zhing / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ mdze can gyi khyim dang / dbul po'i
124b8(gzungs 'dus): khyim dang / g.yung mo'i khyim dang / shan pa'i khyim dang / rigs ngan gyi khyim dang / gdol ba'i khyim dang / dmus long gi khyim ste/ lo drug bcu'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ sdug
125a1(gzungs 'dus): bsngal de dag myong nas/ de nas shi 'phos te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug du bskal pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po de lta
125a2(gzungs 'dus): bu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyam su myong bar 'gyur/ ci ste brgya la mi'i lus thob na yang dbul ba dang / yan lag ma tshang ba dang / shes rab chung ba dang / yi ge mi shes pa dang / 
125a3(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang bral ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa dang / rtag tu rdzu skom dang / bkres par sems pa dang / tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur// 
125a4(gzungs 'dus): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i du nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin du 'jigs skrag ste/ yid mi
125a5(gzungs 'dus): dga' nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par 'gyur/ bdag la skya bsu bgyid pa ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
125a6(gzungs 'dus): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po mchi ba'i chad pa chen po gnyen po yod kyis/ de bas na re ba med par ma byed cig/ dus phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus nas/ sems can de dag mchi ba'i
125a7(gzungs 'dus): dus kyi tshe/ bde bar mchi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur/ dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thos cad
125a8(gzungs 'dus): dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe ring por 'gyur/ shin du yongasu dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / 
125b1(gzungs 'dus): dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/ 
125b2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i 'jig rten sbrul du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das mchi ba'i 'jigs pa bzhi par mdzad du gsol/ bcom
125b3(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba mi zad pa gsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten pa'i seMs
125b4(gzungs 'dus): can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol/ bco ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigasu gsol// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
125b5(gzungs 'dus): phyogs bcu'i kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen pos gdab tu gsol/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i byin gyis brlabs du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
125b6(gzungs 'dus): bdag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du gnyen po'i ston pa chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
125b7(gzungs 'dus): thub pas de skad gsol pa thugasu chud nas/ rnam pa kun du rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pas/ 
125b8(gzungs 'dus): rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug rtor gyi dbus nas byung nas des phyogs bcu kun du snang bar byas te/ rin po che'i bdugs lta bur na mkha' la 'dug pa dang / bco ldan 'das
126a1(gzungs 'dus): kyis 'dzum mdzad de gzigs nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri med par snang ba/ de bzhin
126a2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bzung shig/ phyag rgya 'di ni gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
126a3(gzungs 'dus): bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyis gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'o// gzungs sngags 'di mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / 
126a4(gzungs 'dus): ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thaMd las rno bar grol bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi sgrib pa thad kyang rna bar 'jigs par 'gyur zhing / ses can dmyal ba thaMd 'jigs par 'gyur te/ dper na ma yis
126a5(gzungs 'dus): rtsa sregs pa/ rlung gis thal ba myur du de da/ de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la/ bsags pa'i sdig pa tha de bsreg/ dper na char pa bab gyur te/ ri las 'bab chu babs pa yi// 
126a6(gzungs 'dus): sa'i steng phyag dar dang / nyal nyil thadi dad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang / thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa byang / dper na me yis gser sbyangs pa/ sos bcad rung ba srung
126a7(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur/ de bzhin bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/ lus skyong 'gyur te the tsom med/ dper na nyi ma shar gyur na/ 'od zer kun du rab tu 'byung / de bzhin su zhig gzugs 'chang ba// de
126a8(gzungs 'dus): lus kyang rna bar mdzes/ dper na skam po nya 'dre ldog/ chu dang bral bas mchi sgor 'gro/ la las slar yang chu bor nas/ de na gnas shing yang rtse'o// de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang
126b1(gzungs 'dus): mi rnas tshe ni bzlog par byed/ lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig// / na ma sa rba ta tha ga ta na ma/ ma hA tsin ta ma ni/ dza la sa ra gaM b+hi ra a kar sha ya/ a yun
126b2(gzungs 'dus): d+ha ra/ san d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ k+Sha na kA na/ kA na kA na/ k+Sha k+Sha/ sarba ta tha ga tha/ sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ ma hA b+hU ba na/ sa ga re/ sang sho d+ha ya man/ b+ha ga wa ti sarba pa baM/ bi ma le/ dzama?
126b3(gzungs 'dus): dza ya/ dza ya lab d+he/ sU Ta sU Ta/ swo Ta ya s+pho Ta yA/ bi ga ta/ a ba ra Ni/ b+ha ya ha ro/ ha ra hA ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ mrid t+yu da Na d+ha re a b+ha pra de/ uSh+Ti Sha bya ba ki ti/ sa man te
126b4(gzungs 'dus): mu khe/ sa man ta bya ba li ki te/ ma hA pa sha/ d+ha re/ a mo g+ha bi ma le/ a ka ra Sha ya a ka ra Sha ya/ i kad Ta ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in di ya bi sho d+ha ni/ 
126b5(gzungs 'dus): b+hu Shi ta b+hu dze/ ma hA mud dra/ bi lo ki te/ dza ya dza yaHsid d+he bo d+ha bo d+ha ni/ saM b+hA d+ha ni saM b+ho d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha naM/ sang sho d+ha ni ta tha ga ta tha ku la b+hu dzaHsa ma
126b6(gzungs 'dus): niSh+Te/ pra sa ra du/ pra sa ra du/ phun n+ya ma/ bi na sha ya tu pa baM/ ki la bi Sha ha re/ ma ni bi shud d+he/ sho dA ya bi ma le ba ke si ta pad me/ bi ka si ta pad me/ bi ka sid ta/ b+hud+ha
126b7(gzungs 'dus): ne/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/ pa ri puM ra naM/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+To Sha ba ma li/ ba lo ki te/ ta tha ga ta gu t+ye/ a d+hiSh+TaM te swahA/ a d+hiShI te swA hA/ au a yur da ti swahwA/ pu na d+h+yA
126b8(gzungs 'dus): ti swahA/ mr-id t+yA dan d+he swahA/ ya ma dan de swA hA/ ya ma du de sahA/ ya ma ya swA hA/ sad ha ra ni swahA/ saM b+ha ra ni swahA/ san d+ha ra Ne swa hA/ pra ti sa ra ni swahA/ au dze ba ti swahA/ dza
127a1(gzungs 'dus): ba ti swahA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjesu ston cig/ de nas khyod yun ring por
127a2(gzungs 'dus): phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyuraro/ kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i
127a3(gzungs 'dus): gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste/ mchod rten sar pa'am/ mchod rten rnying pa bcos pa'i nang du bzhag go// spos dang byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig
127a4(gzungs 'dus): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad dran par bya zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad skor bar bya'o// nyin gzhag cig la lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// de nas nyi ma shar ba dang / 
127a5(gzungs 'dus): kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ nyi ma log su me tog gis gtor ro/ a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pas bdug ste/ de bzhin ga
127a6(gzungs 'dus): pa thas cad la phyag byas la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya zhing / mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab la/ rigs sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bcug
127a7(gzungs 'dus): la dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na/ gang ga'i klu gyi bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyi sku gdung ring srel mchod rten re re'i nang
127a8(gzungs 'dus): du bcug par 'gyuraro// ring srel gyi snying por 'gyur// snying po ni 'di bris la zhug go/ oM tre yaing d+hi sarba ta tha ga ta hri da ya ga thi/ dz+wa la d+harma d+ha ra du ge rbe/ seng ha ra a yun sang shod+ha
127b1(gzungs 'dus): pA baM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa man to// Sh+NI Sha bi la~M shud+d+he swA hA// / kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri med zhes bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
127b2(gzungs 'dus): po 'di la gus par byas te/ mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur te/ tshe ring por skyong bar byed do// gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa bzhin
127b3(gzungs 'dus): du lus bor nas bskal pa mnyam pas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyuraro/ mchi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyuraro/ phyin chad nam yang mchi ba'i tshor ba thob
127b4(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ro/ phyin chad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur/ phyin chad sesaM can dmyal ba'i
127b5(gzungs 'dus): sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de na gnas med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags
127b6(gzungs 'dus): 'di/ bcom ldan 'das las bzung nas lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / lhan cig tu nam langs pa dang rang gi gnasu song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsam
127b7(gzungs 'dus): pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga go rims bzhin du mchod rten gyi las byas nas/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang / byas ma thag tu lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug
127b8(gzungs 'dus): bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ lus rnam par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/ skra dang mig ni mthon ting
128a1(gzungs 'dus): lta bur gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong / na mkha'i dkyil nas de bzhin gshegs pas leg so leg so zhes bya ba'i gsung ni byung ngo // de nas
128a2(gzungs 'dus): lnga'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral lus su gyur pa mthong nas/ ya mtshan zer bzung ste/ rab tu dga' nas a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la rigs sngags/ a la la chos 'bras bu 'phral
128a3(gzungs 'dus): du ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu de la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshalo// zhes ched du brjod do// 
128a4(gzungs 'dus): de nas lha'i bu deng gi gan su song nas lha'i me tog dang / lha'i bu mo dang lha'i tshogs dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnasu dong ste bcom
128a5(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te/ lan brgya stong du mas bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das
128a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la ga na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das grwa
128a7(gzungs 'dus): la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das sug las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi
128a8(gzungs 'dus): zad cing shin du tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnaMs 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam leg so legaso/ skyes bu dam pa legs par bris so// 
128b1(gzungs 'dus): de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// lag na rdo rje sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud yangs pa 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas
128b2(gzungs 'dus): pa dbyangs gsal ba yid bzhungs pa gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ rig pa smra ba
128b3(gzungs 'dus): zhig gnas te/ de rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjesu sems shing / skom pa lan mang du byed de/ sos can thos cad la phan par 'dod de/ de nas grong khyer de nyid na/ khyim bdag
128b4(gzungs 'dus): rab snang zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba long spyod che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing / gzhan mu steg can la dad do// bram ze des
128b5(gzungs 'dus): ni khyim bdag de la yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa sgrogs kyang khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi bskyed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum
128b6(gzungs 'dus): bur brngubs la nya dang ru sbal sregs pa bzhin du bor te/ khar ngan skyugs kyis dgang sna mo/ de snyam du bsams ma thag tu khyim bdag de sha bkra dang mdze nad kyis btab bo/ de nas
128b7(gzungs 'dus): mchi ba'i dus byas na/ mchi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste/ shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo // 
128b8(gzungs 'dus): de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang ru sbal dang phag gi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas mchi ba'i dus byas nas/ seMs can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/ der yang bskal pa'i
129a1(gzungs 'dus): tshad du sdug bsngal chen po mong / de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te/ dmus long du gyur nas/ phan tshun slongs mo la song ba dang / gtsug lag
129a2(gzungs 'dus): khang zhing du phyin nas/ de na dge slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste des de mthong nas byams pa rgyas par byas te zas byin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang sgragaso/ dmus lo des
129a3(gzungs 'dus): gzungs sngags de thos pa dang / tshe rabs dran par gyur nas/ bram ze de yang dran te rje su bsams shing kye ma'o// mi zad pa'i las byaso/ snyam nas ngo tsha ba dang khrel yod par gyur te mchi
129a4(gzungs 'dus): bu'i dus byas pa dang gzungs sdug 'di'i mthus sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes te/ gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i long spyod
129a5(gzungs 'dus): chen po myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyim bdag dmus longs du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am yid gnyi su gyur na de ltar mi
129a6(gzungs 'dus): lta ste/ lha'i nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do/ lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par bya'o// lag na rdo rje las des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa drug bsngal gyi tshor
129a7(gzungs 'dus): 'di lta bu myong ngo / lha'i bu 'di byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo // lag na rdo rje de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par 'gyur de gzhan zhig yin sI du
129a8(gzungs 'dus): khyod dogs shing the tsom za 'am yid gnyisu gyur na de ltar mi lnga ste/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do// dmus lo la gzungs sngags 'di sgrags pa'i dge slong ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di
129b1(gzungs 'dus): yin te/ de tshe de'i dus na dge slong du gyur to// de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon dbyung ba 'di thos nas rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te/ caco dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung na/ 
129b2(gzungs 'dus): a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa'i gzung sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas 'khor de las
129b3(gzungs 'dus): lha'i bu dgu khri nyis stong phyir mi ldog par gyur to// lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum ni bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po phyung ste/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnaso// de na
129b4(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen rnga po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba phan yon che ba
129b5(gzungs 'dus): lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i cha slad ma'i dus na/ seMs can rnas la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing / gang gis ses can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
129b6(gzungs 'dus): nas yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig/ 
129b7(gzungs 'dus): 'di ltar phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas rig sngags 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// ring bsrel gyi
129b8(gzungs 'dus): snying po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o// de nas gang ga'i
130a1(gzungs 'dus): klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 'tshams med pa lnga'i las
130a2(gzungs 'dus): kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongasu byang bar 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongasu thar par 'gyur// tshe ring
130a3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi lpags brdzes pa bzhin du lus bor nas/ bskal pa mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur/ phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi
130a4(gzungs 'dus): gos par 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye zhing pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// rtag tu
130a5(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur/ bsam pa zad yid bzhin du yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na/ des khrus byas la gos
130a6(gzungs 'dus): gtsang ma bgos te/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o// snying po'i rig sngags glog la bri bar bya'o// mchod brten lnga gdab par bya'o// rig sngags de yang mchod rten gyi nang du bzhug
130a7(gzungs 'dus): bar bya'o// mchod rten gru bzhir bzhago/ gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag go/ srog shing btsugs te ba dan dmar po sbyang bar bya'o// me tog gis gtor ro// bum pa gang
130a8(gzungs 'dus): bzhi gzhago/ grwa bzhir pog phor bzhi nas du ru ska dang / a ka ru dang tsan dan dang gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag par bya'o// yid bzhin
130b1(gzungs 'dus): gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// dkyil 'khor la bskor bar bya'o// nad kyis btab pa dang / zin pa dang nad tshabs che ba dang / tshe zad pa dang / dus ma yin par
130b2(gzungs 'dus): mchi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs skrag pa dang / bu 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par bzhag la rma bya'i sgro lngas khyab par bya'o// mchod rten gyi
130b3(gzungs 'dus): dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o// cho ga 'di lan cig byas na skal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang nyon mongs pa thaMd dang seMs
130b4(gzungs 'dus): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thad dang / 'jig pa tha~Md las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
130b5(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal dang sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang / bdug pa tha~Md tshe rabs gcig tu rgyud de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ tshe zad pa yang
130b6(gzungs 'dus): tshe phyir nur bar nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur/ sun ring du nad kyis rnyings te sha zad pa yang lus yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ lus shin du yongasu dag par 'gyur/ bsam pa yid bzhin du
130b7(gzungs 'dus): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// phyin chad mchi bdag gi sgo'i sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur/ sbrul gyi lpag pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khas
130b8(gzungs 'dus): bde ba can 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad ma las skye bar 'gyur/ thad du rgyan zad kyis brgyan par 'gyuraro/ skye ba thad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// 'dis bzlas brjod
131a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gzhag gcig dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ de sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyu ro// 
131a2(gzungs 'dus): bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du byas na/ lo gcig tshang bar byas na/ 'jigs pa med par lta ba kun nas go'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin thob po/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
131a3(gzungs 'dus): thas cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad mthong bar 'gyuraro/ dri ma med pa rnaM par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yong su dag pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// tshe rnaM pA dag pa
131a4(gzungs 'dus): thob par 'gyur/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya bcu rtsa gnyis bye ba ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa nas la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// tshe rabs cig
131a5(gzungs 'dus): nas gcig tu rgyud pa rnasu yang shin du yong su dag par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro 'dod par 'gyur/ sbrul gyi
131a6(gzungs 'dus): lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas bskal pa mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ mchi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi laM ltar kun tu shes so/ 
131a7(gzungs 'dus): tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi 'am/ bcwo lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod
131a8(gzungs 'dus): rten la bskor ba byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mchod rten las sgra 'byung ste/ leg so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ 'bral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mong
131b1(gzungs 'dus): ba thas cad dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dri ma dang / ser sna dang phra dog dang bral bar 'gyur/ lus dri ma med cing yongasu dag par 'gyur// skyes pa 'am bud med
131b2(gzungs 'dus): dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag gang gtam byas pa de dag thas cad kyang sdig pa rnas las grol bar 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gan su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnasu
131b3(gzungs 'dus): rtogs pa thas cad las yong su thar bar 'gyuraro/ bya'i tshogs thas cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thas cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro/ tha na khyi dang ru sAl dang / sbrul dang / 
131b4(gzungs 'dus): byi la dang / se mo dang / srog chags sna tshogs la smran yang thas cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro/ bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ dur
131b5(gzungs 'dus): khrod du gtor na gang gis rus pa la phog pa de dag seMs can dmyal ba gang du skyes pa de dang de nas yongasu thar te/ mthu ri su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag mtho risu skyes
131b6(gzungs 'dus): pa de dag gi lus la me dog gi char 'bab par 'gyur/ gcan zan dang bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod de dag tu 'gro ba de dag thas cad kyang bde 'gro 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ri la
131b7(gzungs 'dus): na ri dgas dang bya rgyu ba de dag thas cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyuraro// kun nas gtsug tor dri med pa dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
131b8(gzungs 'dus): byas nas/ gal te 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung bas bsregs pa las 'phral du yong su thar par 'gyuraro// lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na
132a1(gzungs 'dus): gal te mgul nas thag pas btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du log par 'gyur ro// che'i 'jigs pa chen po las kyang grol bar 'gyuraro/ ses can dmyal ba
132a2(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyang rnam par zhi zhing rnam par 'gyur te the tsom med do/ chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yang dran bzhin du sems shing 'dug go// lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/ sbrul gyi
132a3(gzungs 'dus): lpags pa rjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// mchi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur/ lan 'bum zlas brjod
132a4(gzungs 'dus): byas na lpags pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyuraro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras gcig pur gyur te/ 'bum bris te mchod rten 'bum byas la de'i nang du
132a5(gzungs 'dus): bcug 'bum tshang nas mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ bdag kyang 'bar 'gyuraro/ nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi bye ba khrag
132a6(gzungs 'dus): khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lus lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ de nas mchod rten gcig gi nang du
132a7(gzungs 'dus): bcug ste/ srog shing sgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten bya'o/ gang dag de la bkur bsti rnam par byed pa de dag thos cad
132a8(gzungs 'dus): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su rtogs pa rnams dang / gzhan yang
132b1(gzungs 'dus): srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// za na
132b2(gzungs 'dus): grib mas phog na yang yongasu grol bar 'gyur na/ bkur bsti mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par mi nus/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpan
132b3(gzungs 'dus): chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs
132b4(gzungs 'dus): pa sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bco ldan 'das la lan
132b5(gzungs 'dus): gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags mthu chen
132b6(gzungs 'dus): po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen por lta bur mthong ba thos par dka' bi la sogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs nas skad mA'i du na yid kyi nor bu
132b7(gzungs 'dus): rin po che 'di bzung bar bgyi'o// rgyas par bgyi'o// sems can thas cad la bsgrags par bgyid / 'di 'dzin pa'i seMs can chen po de de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chid
132b8(gzungs 'dus): par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// bu shin du yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag leg so leg so// khyed kyis de ltar bgyis
134a1(gzungs 'dus): shig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyed la btud do// 'jigs bya kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang pa
134a2(gzungs 'dus): sas shegs pa thams da kyi snang pa sa rna du pa zhes gnas / ra gyi gan paman da de dang / 
134a3(gzungs 'dus): sde tsha ba ban d+he ye shes smos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab po// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sa pa taH g+hA ta ad+hiSh+TA na hr-i da ma gu d+h+ye d+hA du ke ran dra mu de Ta na d+har
134a4(gzungs 'dus): Ni mahA ya na su tra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring srel gyi za me tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa
134a5(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thas cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga ta na dri ma med pa'i
134a6(gzungs 'dus): kun dga' bar na rin po che snang ba'i snying na/ byang chub ses dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / mA dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang ldam
134a7(gzungs 'dus): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang me 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mang po rnaMs dang / yul gyi me 'bum phrag du ma rnaMs kyis yongasu bskor cing bdun du byas nA
134a8(gzungs 'dus): thabs gcig tu bzhugaso// de nas 'khor de'i nang na bram ze chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu mkhas pa mdzangs pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa mthong na dga' ba dge ba bcu'i las kyi
134b1(gzungs 'dus): lam yongasu bzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod do// de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa zhi ba mor brtags pa/ ses
134b2(gzungs 'dus): can thams cad dge ba'i chos kyi don la brtson pa/ nor che ba long spyod che ba/ phyug pa rdzas mang ba yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs sdang gas
134b3(gzungs 'dus): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rina'i'abum ri ba yang gsol/ 
134b4(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum yang gsol nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bco ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bco ldan 'das la 'di skad
134b5(gzungs 'dus): ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das sang tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi bsdum par 'dugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bco ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad pa ci gnang / 
134b6(gzungs 'dus): de nas bco ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugasu chud nas cad mi gsung bar gyur nas gnang ngo / de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang
134b7(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ de rings pa rengs par rang khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang zhal zas dang yo byad dang / 
134b8(gzungs 'dus): zhal zas ro rgya ba mang po mang po bshams nas/ dkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi zhal med khang chen po dang / zhal med khang sna tshogs dang / me tog dang bdug pa khyer te/ 'khor
135a1(gzungs 'dus): mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nos/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram
135a2(gzungs 'dus): ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod pa
135a3(gzungs 'dus): la bab na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad pa cigag nang / debacoM ldan 'das kyis rnam ze chen po dri med legs srung dbugs zung nas nyi 'kho la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor dzi
135a4(gzungs 'dus): sngags bzlas cad de da pan chen po mdzad par 'gyur gyis du sheg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs na tshe ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ 
135a5(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa te sna tshogs byung ba ste/ 'od zer snang ba des bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang / bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thas
135a6(gzungs 'dus): cad la yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa chas so// de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang bkur bsti chen pos mchod cing bco ldan 'das
135a7(gzungs 'dus): kyis gshegs shul mdzes par cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mau 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnas dang / brgya byin
135a8(gzungs 'dus): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha
135b1(gzungs 'dus): cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na/ bskyed mo tshal byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ bskyed mo tshal de'i nang na mchod rten snying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa tsher mas gang ba/ rtsa dang shing
135b2(gzungs 'dus): dang gyo mos kun tu gang ba/ phyag dar gyi phung po 'dra ba zhig yod do// de nas bco ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po de yang kun nas 'a
135b3(gzungs 'dus): zhing 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la leg so legasaso// 'di ni de bzhin
135b4(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i ltas bzang ngo do// bram chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa ni yang leg so legs/ deng khyod don chen po de mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin ga
135b5(gzungs 'dus): pa mchod rten ring pa phyag dar gyi phung po/ de lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas/ lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ nyid/ kyi sku las na bza' bsil nas mchod rten
135b6(gzungs 'dus): brnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po de lta bu la sogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma dbyung ba chen po phyung nas/ bshums pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan pa des
135b7(gzungs 'dus): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md lag mthil na zhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhig bzhug so// de bzhin
135b8(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa thas cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po der zhugaso/ de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por gyur cing / yi chad de 'khod pa
136a1(gzungs 'dus): na gyi sa gas pa ga sa bya tshal na 'am din kyimanapa to/ 'dzin pa 'din mye thams pa'i mapa
136a2(gzungs 'dus): gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus ni 'bar snying ni 'gul rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das la ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
136a3(gzungs 'dus): bya ba gang bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang bar bstan pa'i lnga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba
136a4(gzungs 'dus): 'di skabs dbye bar cig nang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ lag na rdo rjes ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin
136a5(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi rnam grangs yod de/ 
136a6(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba ti l-i gyi gang bu snyed pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas
136a7(gzungs 'dus): shing / de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi rnam grangs 'di sku gdung ring srel 'di rnas gnas/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas/ de bzhin ga
136a8(gzungs 'dus): pa til 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi'o yang de bzhin du gnas/ lag na rdo rje gang na ches kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin
136a9(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan te/ lag ni rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam
136b1(gzungs 'dus): grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yi no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis
136b2(gzungs 'dus): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po/ kha
136b3(gzungs 'dus): cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig ni
136b4(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas/ kha cig/ gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob po/ kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o// kha cig ni sa gnyis pa'o// kha cig ni sa gsum pa'o// kha cig
136b5(gzungs 'dus): gis ni sa bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o// kha cigags ni sa brgyad pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa dgu
136b6(gzungs 'dus): pra'o// kha cig ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur pa'o// kha cig gis ni pha rol du phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa'o// bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing / dri ma dang bral ba dang / 
136b7(gzungs 'dus): ser sna dang phra dog dang bral bar 'gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag ni rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'ad
136b8(gzungs 'dus): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon tan gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bud du
137a1(gzungs 'dus): dang / bkur bsti shin du mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
137a2(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje nyon cig rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam gangs 'di 'bri bar byed na/ lag
137a3(gzungs 'dus): na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 
137a4(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rje su bzung bar 'gyuraro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnam
137a5(gzungs 'dus): klags par 'gyur/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'bum bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu
137a6(gzungs 'dus): dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnas kyis bzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyi na zhag gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyuraro// 
137a7(gzungs 'dus): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang me tog 'phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang na bza' dang / brgyan
