137a8(gzungs 'dus): gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig tis
137b1(gzungs 'dus): gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang na bza' dang lhab lhub dang / brgyan gyis mchod par 'gyuraro// phyogs re re
137b2(gzungs 'dus): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan las 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha dang klu das/ 
137b3(gzungs 'dus): gnod sbyin dang / dri dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de nas dang / seMs can gyi tshogs chen po de nas kyang ya mtshan du myur
137b4(gzungs 'dus): cig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis zlungs gyi byin gyis rlabs pa/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen
137b5(gzungs 'dus): po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus
137b6(gzungs 'dus): phyag dar gyi phung po bgyis pa las/ rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni phyag dar kyi phung po ma yin gyi 'di
137b7(gzungs 'dus): ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin/ lag na rdo rje 'on kyang seMs can nas kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas nub par 'gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnas
137b8(gzungs 'dus): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i srel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnas ni/ 'jig pa 'am dgyes par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar dgyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang
138a1(gzungs 'dus): sems can rnams kyi las gyi rnam par smin pa snang ba las kyang nub par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dang / sdig pa can
138a2(gzungs 'dus): dang dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin du tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed de/ 
138a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyu de dang rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub po/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig 'di gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo // dam pa'i chos kyi
138a4(gzungs 'dus): rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mchod rten ni ma rtogs de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brlob par 'gyuraro// / 
138a5(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi/ sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang
138a6(gzungs 'dus): du 'jog na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten nang du bzhag pa
138a7(gzungs 'dus): de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po bsad pas byin gyis
138a8(gzungs 'dus): rlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad
138b1(gzungs 'dus): kyi gtsug tor dang spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ gang zhig sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thas cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshes
138b2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i gzugs brnyan po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis rlabs par 'gyuraro/ 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dris bu g.yer ka da bar 'brel ba dang bcis pa dang / bkra shis dang char ka
138b3(gzungs 'dus): kyi gzugs dang / dri bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang
138b4(gzungs 'dus): byin gyis rlabs dang / bden pa dang dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis rlabs par 'gyura'o// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la bud dud dang / 
138b5(gzungs 'dus): bsting bstang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ kye chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'gyur/ 
138b6(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal po gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thugs pa la sogs pa rnams las yongasu thar bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ni
138b7(gzungs 'dus): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ gnas gang na mchod rten nas gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyis
138b8(gzungs 'dus): byin gyis rlabs par 'gyuraro// phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang si re bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi srun pa 'a
139a1(gzungs 'dus): bdug pas kyang mi tshugs par mi 'gyu ro/ gcan zan gyis mi tshugs par mi 'gyu ro// bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang ri skyegs dang / byi la dang / sre mo sha sbrang dang / sbrang / 
139a2(gzungs 'dus): bu dang / phye ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / sbrang bu mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta brla'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul bdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur// 
139a3(gzungs 'dus): phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad mgo ba dang 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang yi dgas dang / 'dre dang rjed
139a4(gzungs 'dus): byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thas cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thas cad kyis kyang ma yin/ nad thas cad dang 'bras dang po la mig dang / 
139a5(gzungs 'dus): lhog pa dang mtshan mar brdol ba dang / rkang shu dang g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thas cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// phyogs
139a6(gzungs 'dus): der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang bud med dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs pa
139a7(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// dus ma yin par mchi bas kyang dus par mi 'chi/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ me dang chus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jin/ 
139a8(gzungs 'dus): pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ byad sdems kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
139b1(gzungs 'dus): par sa phyogs de bsrung bar byed/ yongasu skyab par byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag kyang rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde
139b2(gzungs 'dus): dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag kyang rtag par rgyun mi mchod par bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang / 'jug rings chen po yang nyin
139b3(gzungs 'dus): mtshan du mthun par byed par 'gyur/ klu'i rgyal po thas cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi ma chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thas cad kyang
139b4(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo // yul na gnas pa thas cad kyang mchod
139b5(gzungs 'dus): rten dang gzugs bstan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod par byed bskor bar byed par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnas dang lhan
139b6(gzungs 'dus): cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan gyi drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad
139b7(gzungs 'dus): kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlob cing bzhug so// mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byas pa'i sa'i 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/ dngul gyi 'am/ gser
139b8(gzungs 'dus): gyi 'am/ zangs kyi 'am/ chos kyi rnam gangs 'di yang bris te de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis rlabs par 'gyuraro// 'phang dang / 
140a1(gzungs 'dus): them sgras dang / kha ran dang 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun
140a2(gzungs 'dus): gyis rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhi kun nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs pa'i mchod rten
140a3(gzungs 'dus): rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnasu 'gyuraro// sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongasu sbyang ba dang / mchod pas kyang yongasu bzung

140a5(gzungs 'dus): gyi khyad pa 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma
140a6(gzungs 'dus): tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rjes des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs gyis rlabs pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa bcom ldan
140a7(gzungs 'dus): 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa
140a8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku gsum dag ste/ chos kyi
140b1(gzungs 'dus): rgyu dang / long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum thas cad kyi ring bsrel gyi ba ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// nams
140b2(gzungs 'dus): s+yAd d+hi ka na no/ sarba ta tha ga te nan/ oM bu baM baM naM ba na re be tsa Ta/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar b+ha ta tha ga ta d+hA ra d+hA ra pad ma b+hA ba ti/ dza ya ba re dza ya ba re/ u tsa le/ s+phA rata

140b5(gzungs 'dus): bud d+he bud d+he/ sarbe ta tha g+hA ta ab+h+yAM/ Sh+Ti tad+ha tru ga rbe swAtAM/ si yai a d+hiSh+Thi te swAtra/ sarbatwa thA ga tatrI d+hA ma du mud/ sAH/ u pra tiSh+Tha su be tA tha gra ta a d+hASh+Ta

140b7(gzungs 'dus): za ma tog gi gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re kun nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs
140b8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa seMs can thas cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i glang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter gzhag pa dang / ring srel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyi
141a1(gzungs 'dus): brlabs pa legaso leg so zhes bya ba byin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyis brlabs yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di
141a2(gzungs 'dus): ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjesu 'brang
141a3(gzungs 'dus): zhing bzhugs par 'gyuraro/ thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin brlabs par 'gyuraro// de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ci tsam na mchod rten rnying pa phyag
141a4(gzungs 'dus): dar gyi phung po lta bu de/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang ba dang / legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng

141b1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags

141b7(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs pa thas cad las ni bsrungs shi ga// // tad ya thA/ oM swa hA/ a mo ga pa sha ya swA hA/ a tsi ta ya swA hA/ a par tsi ta ya swA hA/ ma ra s+ya'i n+ya pra man da na ya swA hA/ i dam
141b8(gzungs 'dus): tsa me karma ka ru swA hA/ oM dza ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hr-i sti log kya bi dza ya/ a mo g+ha ba sha ya swA hA/ pre ti ha ta hi ha hUM phaT swA hA// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i bzhags pa'i snying
142a1(gzungs 'dus): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// // @#// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya b+hud d+ha hri da ya/ na ma d+ha ra ni rma pa ra ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzung

142a6(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa tha~Md kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras thas cad kyang gzungs dang ti nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob po/ sha stag gis yongasu skor

142a8(gzungs 'dus): la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

143b8(gzungs 'dus): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo/ zhes ched du brjod pa

144a2(gzungs 'dus): gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabasu dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyeso/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs
144a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/ sangs rgyas thas cad kyi ni snying po yi/ gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis// skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos/ rgya mtsho 'khrug
144a4(gzungs 'dus): shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang / rab tu g.yos nas kyang bdud kyi ri rnams ni/ lha dag rab tu sdang zhing 'khrugs par 'gyur/ bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha nas ngo
144a5(gzungs 'dus): mtshar rab thob nas/ 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ na mkha'i gnas nas me tog man da ra ba mthor/ gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyi// se mo dang do shal
144a6(gzungs 'dus): spos rnams dang / phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnas dang / rgyan dang dpung brgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/ brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi brgyan du 'gyur/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
144a7(gzungs 'dus): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i brgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongasu mi tshol bas mi nges pa'i brgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 
144a8(gzungs 'dus): ses can thas cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i brgyan dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing spyod pa'i brgyan dang / ses can yosu
144b1(gzungs 'dus): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i brgyan dang brgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i brgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan
144b2(gzungs 'dus): te brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi brgyan du 'gyur/ gzungs 'di rtag par yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi bzhi 'di rnaMs yid la byas na las kyi
144b3(gzungs 'dus): sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ pad ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin kyang thob po/ nad thas cad dang / na ba thas cad la lag pas khyab par bya'o bzlas brjod kyang dpag
144b4(gzungs 'dus): tu med par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal nas/ byang chub sesaM dpa' ses dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang lho dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /

144b7(gzungs 'dus): mi ha ra hu ru ma kriSh+ma/ ha ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyu ro rdzog spyo// 
144b8(gzungs 'dus): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsham/ gnod sbyin chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo/ tad ya thA/ mu tsi ni swAhA/ mu kha se swA hA/ mo ha ni swA hA/ da ma ti ri swA hA/ cho ga ni chu khyor gang / 
146a1(gzungs 'dus): la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas 'thungs lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rje de bsngon par 'gyur// rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs

146a6(gzungs 'dus): 'di'i tshi ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ mchi ba'i tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong ba 'gyur/

146b1(gzungs 'dus): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tshalo/ tad ya tha/ di ri shi ti shi/ ta skar bad do si/ ma tsa la ma tsa la swA hA/ 'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab zhi

146b7(gzungs 'dus): ka ni ba wa lo ka ni dza hai pa ri d+ha ni/ hri d+h+r-i ya g+ha me/ a ma sha pa ri sho d+ha ni sarba sa da ta no ra tho/ ke r+ya sid d+hi/ shu ti d+ha ra ni smr-i ta d+ha ra ni swA hA/ cho ga ni lan bdun gyi bar du shing
146b8(gzungs 'dus): a ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ nang re bzhin zos na nyin gcig kyang sho lo ka brgya lo bas so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas nas thos pa 'dzin pa 'gyu/ 
147a1(gzungs 'dus): long sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / dkon mchog gsum sa phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

147a3(gzungs 'dus): d+hA ma ni dzi sa dzi la/ prA nyi d+hA b+he/ me d+ha bAd+h+we ni/ sarba thA ga to a d+hi shrI ti/ su ru su ru/ Tu ru d+hu ru/ me d+ha a na ya swA hA/ tshig ni nang re ning bzlas brjod byas na

151a9(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur cig/ ka na ka na/ ki ni ki ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi re tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in dri ya/ ba la b+hau d+ha ga/ tsa dur/ ar+ya sa der+ya/ sam pra ka sha ka da ma ta ma/ dam da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ 
151b1(gzungs 'dus): ya sa ya sa/ ma hA ta ma/ a na ta ka ra/ b+hi d+ha ma ni ka ra/ Sha da pa ra mi ta pa ri rdzu ra ka/ ki li ki li/ ta Ta taT/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ tha tha tha tha/ thi thi thi thi/ thu thu thu thu/ e ne ya/ tsarma kri ta pa
151b2(gzungs 'dus): ni ka ra/ a he ye/ hi ma ha ka ru ni ka/ I shwa ra ma te/ shI ra b+hU ta ga na/ b+han dzaM ka/ ku ru ku ru/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra pa ri/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka rA/ tsA ra tsa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku tu ku Nu
151b3(gzungs 'dus): ba ta pa Ta/ ma tA ma tha/ ma ha ma ha/ ma hA bi shud+d+ha/ b+hi Sha ye/ ba saM na ma hA ka ru ni ka/ shai ti yai nyo ba bid ta/ rad na ma/ ku tu ma la d+ha ra/ sarba nyi shi ra/ sa kri ta dza ta ma ku ta/ ma had bud ya/ 
151b4(gzungs 'dus): ka la/ a lang kr-i ta ka ra/ ta pa d+hu na/ sa ma d+hi bai mo kra/ a pra ka ma bya/ ba hu sad tA san ta ti/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ma hA ka ru ni ka/ sarba karA rma/ a ba ra bi shod ka/ sarba bya ti pra mo dza ka/

151b9(gzungs 'dus): sarba sa d+ha ya swA hA/ bskul byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ de nas byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po
152a1(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi bzhi gang gis gzung bas chos thams cad bzung ba
152a2(gzungs 'dus): dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs thams cad du de yang gnod sbyin gyis de la bsrung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sbed par byed pa de la nad thad
152a3(gzungs 'dus): kyis 'jigs pa med do/ s+ye ya the dan/ bud de bud de/ dza yod ta ra b+ho d+ha ni b+ho d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni ma hA saM b+ho d+ha ni/ ma tA saM b+ho d+hi ni/ a mr-i ta pa ta/ bau da ni/ ha la ha la ha
152a4(gzungs 'dus): hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud d+ha drArma a ba bo d+ha ni/ sU tra sU ta sU tan te/ sarbA pa ba ni/ b+hud d+hu d+hi shi ni/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzung

152a6(gzungs 'dus): gad ci blo he sa ha/ ta tha ba sa/ dang rtag gon ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod byas te/ bshags na mcher ba'i sran zhi bar gyur te/ the tsom med do// mcher nad zhi ba'i
152a7(gzungs 'dus): gzungs rdzog s+ho// // bod skad du/ snying rjes mi shol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshalo// 
152a8(gzungs 'dus): byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ gnod pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa/ nad thams cad rab tu
152b1(gzungs 'dus): zhi bar mdzad pa// 'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa// sos can mi khom pa brgyad du rung ba rnas yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshalo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas// 'phags pa spyan
152b2(gzungs 'dus): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs chen po mi shol ba zhes pa 'di brjod kyis thugs rje chen po mnga' ba la dgongasu gsol// 'di lta ste/ oM dza ta dza ta/ dzi ti dz+ri ta
152b3(gzungs 'dus): dzu'u dzur+tha/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka sa ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegasu gsos/ ri li ri la~M/ ru lu ru lu/ bsam gtan
152b4(gzungs 'dus): dpe rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rdo snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sa bai zhingasu gsol// tsa la tsa la ci matsa'i/ tsu lu tsu lu/ b+h+yo d+hi d+hi nI/ i hi e he khyud nadu
152b5(gzungs 'dus): d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / bzheng su gsol bzhengasu gsal/ byams pa chen pos 'byung ba thams cad zlog du gsol
152b6(gzungs 'dus): thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ b+hu na b+hu ne/ b+hi b+hu ni b+he b+hu na/ mA tha mA tha/ pra mo tha bra ma tha/ bzhengasu gsol bzhengasu gsol/ tshur
152b7(gzungs 'dus): gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las nga ni spyang du gsol/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya swA hA/ ma hA pa da ma ma hA stA ya swahA/ pad ma a sa na ya
152b8(gzungs 'dus): sAhA/ she ta yang nya u pa bi ta/ kai ri ti ni sAH/ shul nye swAH/ badz+ra ba ni sAhA/ tre nai tre ne ma swA hA/ a ka yA swAhA/ shi na swehA/ pra tsa de te le sAhA/ ya ma ye swAhA/ @
153a1(gzungs 'dus): b+hU ta ya sUt+ma/ a na ta dze b+hu b+hu ta b+h+ya swA hA/ dz+wa ra yu dze b+ho b+h+ya te bya swA hA/ sarba de tshe b+h+yo b+h+ya de bya swA hA/ sarbade tshe b+h+yo b+h+ya de bya sA hA/ a pa ba tu ke b+h+yo b+h+ya d+he b+he/ ba ti ka b+h+yo b+ha d+had+hA
153a2(gzungs 'dus): sAhA/ bi lai d+ha kr-i ti kai b+h+yo d+ha b+h+ya swAhA/ shwe shau ma kai b+h+yo b+h+ya ti b+h+ya sAt+ma/ sa na ni ba ti ke b+h+yo b+h+ye b+h+ya sAt+ma/ sarbe b+h+ye d+hi b+h+ya sA hA/ bu mi a ne ta ri ka sha tse r+ye b+h+ya b+h+ya swA hA/ 'di lnga ste/ oM pra ti
153a3(gzungs 'dus): pra ta/ tri ta tri te/ tru tru dz+ra/ bdag 'jigs pa thas cad dang / mtsho ba thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig swA hA/ gra swa gra swa/ mA thA mA tha dr-i/ mA thA pra mA tha ha na ha na/ 
153a4(gzungs 'dus): d+ha ha d+hu ti/ pA tsa pA tsi ni/ ar+ya pa lo ki ta te sha ra/ ad nya pa ya ti swA hA/ snying rjes ma shol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// yi dgas kha
153a5(gzungs 'dus): nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzung/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i dge 'dun gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge
153a6(gzungs 'dus): 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongasasu bskor ba la chos ston to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa na dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na/ chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du
153a7(gzungs 'dus): bzhag ste 'dug pa las/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba/ gzugs byed mi sdug pa/ shin du ri cing sbyim pa/ kha nus me 'bar ba mgron pa me kha btsam
153a8(gzungs 'dus): du pra ba/ skra mjims pa/ sene mo dang / mche ring ba la rna ba shin du 'jig su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ dga' bo 'di skad ces smraso// khyod da ste zhag gsum na
153b1(gzungs 'dus): tshe'i dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi kham su skye bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba smras/ dga' bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ des shin du 'jigs shing skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smraso// 
153b2(gzungs 'dus): bdag mchi ba'i dus byas na yi dgas kyi kham su skye bar 'gyur na/ 'di thabs ci byas na/ sdug bsngal 'di las yong su thar par 'gyur// de nas yi dgas des dga' bo la 'di skad
153b3(gzungs 'dus): ces smraso/ gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la yi dgas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul
153b4(gzungs 'dus): dbus 'gyur/ 'chang gi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog la mchod pa byas na tshe ring zhing yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal dral te mtho ris kyi
153b5(gzungs 'dus): lhar skye bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe dga' bos yid tags kha nas mi 'bar rab ba lus mi sdug pa dang / shin du ring / cing skyem pa dang / shin du ring cing skyes pa dang / 
153b6(gzungs 'dus): kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo kha be tsam du phra ba la skra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang / mchi ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la// yid du mi 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'i tshig
153b7(gzungs 'dus): kyang thos nas/ spyi 'bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs sgeg nas/ 'dug pa las langs te/ myur du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyi nas/ 
153b8(gzungs 'dus): lus kyi yan lag smad lnga sa la btus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus mdar bzhin du bdag sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung mdzad du
153b9(gzungs 'dus): gsol/ zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing mchis pa las yi dges kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba des
154a1(gzungs 'dus): bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// khyod dang sde zhag gsum na nges par tshe'i dus byas te yi dag su skye bar 'gyur zhes mchi'o// bdag gis 'di la thabs ci bgyis na/ yid
154a2(gzungs 'dus): tags kyi sdug bsngal 'di las yongasu thar bar 'gyur zhes/ dris na des bdag la khyod kyis yi dgas kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor
154a3(gzungs 'dus): ma byin te/ drang srong la sogs pa'i brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na/ tshe ring bar 'gyu ro// zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur yi dwags dang / drang
154a4(gzungs 'dus): srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi zhal zas 'byor bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag 'o la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas
154a5(gzungs 'dus): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong skyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa la khang zas dang / gtor ma/ mang po 'byor ba'i thabs nga la yod kyis/ 
154a6(gzungs 'dus): yid klong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal zhes bya ba
154a7(gzungs 'dus): yod de/ gang zhig gis gzi brjid kyi gzungs 'di brjod na/ yi dgas gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dag dang drang srong la sogs te/ mang po khas dang / 
154a8(gzungs 'dus): gtor ma mchog byin par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa cig la cig kha zas yul dbus 'gyur/ 'chang gi bre tshad mas btsal ba'i bye bdun snyed thob par 'gyuraro/ dga' da yang
154b1(gzungs 'dus): bram zer gyur na/ byang chub seMs dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dgas tshad
154b2(gzungs 'dus): med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po'i kha zas dang / gtor ma byin par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal las grol nas/ mtho ri su skye bar 'gyuraro// dga'o khyod
154b3(gzungs 'dus): kI te/ oM sam b+ha ra sa ma ra b+ha hU~M/ btsoldan 'das kyis dga' la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che
154b4(gzungs 'dus): zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'dod/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam yang na dus tha~Md du byas kya nga bar chad du 'gyur ba med do// snod
154b5(gzungs 'dus): gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la/ phyan nam phye 'am khur ba la sogs pa cung zad zhig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag la sngags 'di lan bdun bsngags nA/ 
154b6(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen med la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kI sa yi dwags zad kyi skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa'i mi
154b7(gzungs 'dus): dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas/ brjod pa
155a1(gzungs 'dus): byin rlabs kyis yi dgas mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing / gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam dbyangs la phyag 'tshal/ 
155a2(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam dbyangs pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis yi dgas la dgas mang po lkogs ma yangs shing che bar 'gyurate// sbyin pa'i gnas yid/ 
155a3(gzungs 'dus): bzhin du za ba dang / chog cing 'grangs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thas cad dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral gyi
155a4(gzungs 'dus): mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyisarlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po 'jigs pa thas cad dang bral de/ yi dgas kyikhams zhi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
155a5(gzungs 'dus): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs nga 'og tu se gol len bdun byas te gtor ma'i snod
155a6(gzungs 'dus): blangs pa'i nas lag pa kyang ste/ sa gtsang mar blug par bya'o// de nas gtor ma byin nas/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yid dgas gi gang klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongs sa
155a7(gzungs 'dus): la dbus 'gyur 'chang gi bre tshad nas btsal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur/ kha zas de dag yi dgas kyi yid bzhin du zab pa dang / chog cing 'grangs pa dang / yi dgas kyi
155a8(gzungs 'dus): khams spong ba dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur/ dag 'o gal te dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge snyen pa 'am/ gang zhig rtag tu kha bras bsngags kyis
155b1(gzungs 'dus): yi dgas la sbyin pa byin na/ bsod nams tshad med pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang / khyad par med
155b2(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams dang stobs che zhing 'phel ba dang / dge bI rdza ba yongasasu rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa
155b3(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyis mtsho zhing gnod par mi nus pa dang / gzhan gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ gal te gang zhig bram ze dang / drang srong la sbyin pa byin 'dod na/ kha zas
155b4(gzungs 'dus): yongasu dag pa snod gtsang ma gcig ra gi nang du bkang la/ gzungs sngags lan bdun bsngags te/ 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor nas/ de ltar byas na lha rdzas kyi zhal
155b5(gzungs 'dus): zas mchog dam par 'gyur te/ de nas bram ze dang drang srong sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thos nas/ sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis so so nas ci dang ci la dga' zhing
155b6(gzungs 'dus): mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams yongasu gyur pa so so nas 'thun pas dus gcig tu tshe ring ba dang / mdangs stobs ldan to// bdo zhing bskyed par 'gyur cig ces smon lam 'debaso/ 
155b7(gzungs 'dus): gzhan yang mi de'i sems la bsams pa bzhin du mthong ba dang / thos pa'i sgo nas yongasu dag cing shes pa mi 'dor ba dag tshangs pa lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzos
155b8(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba zas cad kyis don
156a1(gzungs 'dus): par byed mi nus par 'gyu ro// gal te dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byedas
156a2(gzungs 'dus): 'dod na/ spos dang me tog dang / zhal zas dang / gzungs sngags sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu po 'am/ 
156a3(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal de lha rdzas kyi zhal za su gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham su bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ 
156a4(gzungs 'dus): de nas bstod pa dang / gsol pa btab pa dang / rjesu yi rangs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags shing dgongs par
156a5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// lha mang pos rtag tu bsrung zhing skyong ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ dga' khyod kyis rjesu yi rang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis
156a6(gzungs 'dus): mthong zhing thob par bya ba'i phyi ra yongasu chos sbyin rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa snyed thob par 'gyur/ yi tags kha nas mau 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzung
156a7(gzungs 'dus): rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba ban d+he ye shes bsdes bsgyu ro// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya be'i sha le pra bI
156a8(gzungs 'dus): sha ma ha ya na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub ses dpa' thos cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis
156b1(gzungs 'dus): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bco ldan 'das 'das pa'i khrod na mdzangs pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ kun
156b2(gzungs 'dus): dga'o yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan to// de nas bco ldan 'das
156b3(gzungs 'dus): yul bri 'dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer a mra bsrung ba'i tshal na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
156b4(gzungs 'dus): kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ste/ gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag dang / tshig su bcad pa 'di
156b5(gzungs 'dus): dag smros shig/ bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thas cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thad kyis
156b6(gzungs 'dus): bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thas cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thas cad kyis bsam
156b7(gzungs 'dus): pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi
156b8(gzungs 'dus): bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dam ga zhug gis bsam pa/ 'byung po thas cad kyis bsam pa// bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra taHbi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba

157a2(gzungs 'dus): lha'i lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shig/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / 
157a3(gzungs 'dus): bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnaMs dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'di/ bcoM ldan

157b6(gzungs 'dus): kyi lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ gsang bsngags kyi bzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ gang la ser rnam chags pa/ rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / thugs
157b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhi'i gnod pa mi mnga' des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ thar pa'i lam du 'jud mdzad cing chos rnams thas cad ston pa des/ khyed la
157b8(gzungs 'dus): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ ston pa rgyu ba rnams kyi brten// sems can nas kyi don gyi phyir/ gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ sems can kun gyi brten 'gyur cing / gling dang
158a1(gzungs 'dus): dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ gang zhig chos rnams mngon sum gyur/ gtsang zhing bkru ba mi mnga' zhing / gsum rtsang rtsang mar mdzad pa des/

158a6(gzungs 'dus): dbang du mdzad pa des/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin tshangs pa'i lha rnaMs dang / 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ khyed/

158b5(gzungs 'dus): ltar nyan nas yangs pa'i gong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi zhi 'di dag dang / tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so/ bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta li
158b6(gzungs 'dus): sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas thad kyis dgongs pa// rang sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa

159a1(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag bzhug gis bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ sangs

159a3(gzungs 'dus): ta nir gad tsa ta/ sangs rgyas lha thabs chen po// lha'i yang lha// lha'i bla ma gshegs shig/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang // tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang //

160b7(gzungs 'dus): rdzog s+ho// / #// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ba su ta rA/ na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMs dang
160b8(gzungs 'dus): thas cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham bai ni/ tshe ra ma can zhes bya ba'i nags chen po na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam
161a1(gzungs 'dus): gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thad dang ldan pa rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig du bzhugs te/ de 'i tshe ko'u
161a2(gzungs 'dus): sham pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba dbang po nye bar zhi ba/ bu pho dang / bu mo mnga' ba/ bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa/ dad pa che ba/ dad cing mos pa
161a3(gzungs 'dus): zhig gnas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum phrag du ma bskor ba byas nas phyogs
161a4(gzungs 'dus): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bga' stsol to/ gal te zhu naso zhus pa lung stan

161a6(gzungs 'dus): la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag ci dang ci 'dod pa de bris

161a8(gzungs 'dus): skad ces leg so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar gnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dbul
161a9(gzungs 'dus): por gyur pas/ dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / zo nad kyis thebs nas/ bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba leg so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim dad/ 
161b1(gzungs 'dus): zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'bri ba// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba
161b2(gzungs 'dus): bzang pos de skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba/ gsob pa mnga' ba/ bu pho dang bu mang ba/ gza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags na/ de'i slad du gang gi
161b3(gzungs 'dus): sems can dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / brod nad kyis thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mdzad dang / bang mdzod mang ba dang ldan
161b4(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzad dang stug po dang / mid du 'ong bas mchis pa dang / mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang / dbang phyug du gyur pa dang / sbyin bdag mdzod

161b8(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus kyi skal ba grangs med par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par

162a3(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la yang de bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs bsngags 'di'i mthus mi rnams la tho 'tsham par mi byed do/ sha za rnams rnam par tho 'tsham

162a7(gzungs 'dus): 'tsham pa mi byed do/ lusau sbrul po rnams kyang rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do// lham yi rnams kyang rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do// bdag dang sas can thas cad la bde legs
162a8(gzungs 'dus): su mdzad du gsol// bsrung du gsol/ zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / za su gcin mthung ba rnams dang / za su khrag mthung ba rnams dang / za su sha rnams dang / zasu rnag za
162a9(gzungs 'dus): ba rnams dang / za su zhag za ba rnams dang / zasu rkang za ba rnams dang / za su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / za su rtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / za su dbugs za ba rnas dang / 
162b1(gzungs 'dus): zas su 'byung ba za ba'i bar rnams kyang rnam par mche bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis khyim na yod dam snying na yod de/ 
162b2(gzungs 'dus): lag na yod dam/ gleg bam du byas te chud dam/ thos par gyur tam/ kan chub par byas sam/ klog gam/ rje su yid rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
162b3(gzungs 'dus): rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / yongasu grub pa dang / lo legs par 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
162b4(gzungs 'dus): rnas la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na/ lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum 'am/ de'i lha rnas yid rangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba
162b5(gzungs 'dus): dang / chos gdagos par bya pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags par dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la dga' ba dang // lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te
162b6(gzungs 'dus): 'bru'i char 'bebs par 'gyu ro// nor gyi rgyan gyi gzungs sngags 'di lta ste// // na mo badz+ra ha ra sA ga ra/ nir ga sha yAM/ ta tha g+ha ta yA thA/ ted yA thA/ o su ru pA yAM/ 
162b7(gzungs 'dus): b+ha da Te b+had Te b+ha Ta b+hA ti/ ang ga le/ mang ga lI/ mang ga la b+hA ti/ a tsa lI a tsa le/ a tsa pa le/ ud g+ha ta ni/ ud de dwe ni/ sa s+ya ba te/ d+ha na pa naM/ shri ma ti/ pra ba b+hA hai/ 
162b8(gzungs 'dus): a ma le bi ma le/ nai ra ma le/ ru ru ru/ su ru be/ su ru ta ma le/ bi ma le/ tsa le/ a tsa na ste/ a tsa na nA ste/ a nA ste/ bin na stAM/ ba shaM ko shi bi shi ni/ shing ang gu re/ mang ku
162b9(gzungs 'dus): pra pang ku re/ bi re me/ b+hi d+ha me/ ri ri me/ d+hi d+hi me/ du du me/ kha kha me/ ta ta ra/ ta rA ta rA/ da rA ta rA/ badz+re badz+re/ badz+ra pre me/ Ta ke Ta/ ke/ tha ke tha ke/ ug ge/ stug ge/ 
163a1(gzungs 'dus): tha ke tha ke ar+ha ni/ be ra she ni/ niSh+ma da ni/ badz+ra dar/ swa ga ra/ nir go sha na/ ta tha gA ta/ ma nu s+pha ra/ sma ra s+pha ra/ sarba ta tha g+hA ta/ sad t+ya ma nu swa ra/ dar rma sadaH
163a2(gzungs 'dus): ya ma nu sma ra/ sang gad sa t+ya/ ma nu sma ra/ ta ra ta mya pu ra pu ra/ pu ra yA pu ra yA/ pu ra ni/ b+ha ra d+ha ra Ni/ a ma le/ su mA rA ga le/ shan ta ma tI/ shu ba ma ti/ mang gA
163a3(gzungs 'dus): la ti/ me ha pra ti/ b+ha Tu pa ti/ sun tra me ti/ a gad tsha/ I gad tshe/ siyAHmi na? sma re swe hI/ a pa ra rA na/ ma nu sma ra swa hA/ d+hi ti ma nu sma ra swa hA/ he dz+ra ma nu sma rA swa hA/ b+hI/ 
163a4(gzungs 'dus): dza yA ma nu sma ra swahA/ tr-i da yA ma nu smA re swa hA/ sarba s+ya ti pA ne ya/ ma nu sma ra sI hA/ oM baM su ta re swahA/ oM ba suM She ye swA hA/ oM sha ba ri ba su swa hAM/ oM ba su ga~M/ 
163a5(gzungs 'dus): mang swA hA// // rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs bsngags 'di'i mthus mu ge dang nad dang / mchi ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur
163a6(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
163a7(gzungs 'dus): nub cig bton na/ de nas dngos grub du 'gyuraro/ rgyas pa'i khyim du bdag gi khyim gzhan gyi khyim 'am/ gnas gtsod mar bang mdzod dam/ gang du yang rung bar de bzhin gshegs
163a8(gzungs 'dus): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub ses dpa' thas cad dang / gsang sngags lha'i phyir/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor grub bzhir byas te/ nub cig bton na/ 
163b1(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu de'i khyim dang / nor dang 'bru dang / gser dang dngul dang / yo byad thad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam gyis gang bar 'gyu ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa tha~Md kyang med par 'gyur// 
163b2(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ rab tu sgrims la/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung shig chings shig/ lhogs shig ston cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing / de khyod
163b3(gzungs 'dus): kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das leg so zhes gsol to/ khyim bdag zla ba bzad pos// bcom ldan 'das la nor gyi rgyun ces bya
163b4(gzungs 'dus): ba'i gzungs 'di thos nas/ tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
163b5(gzungs 'dus): btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di/ skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'igazungs 'di blangs lags/ gzungasu 'dzin lag
163b6(gzungs 'dus): kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjesu yid rangs par bgyis lags te/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyis lagaso/ de'i skad cig tsam la khyim dag zla ba
163b7(gzungs 'dus): bzang po'i bang mdzod rnaMs yongasu gang bar 'gyur to/ de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag da mar bskor ba byas te/ bco ldan 'das kyi zhabs
163b8(gzungs 'dus): la gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o song la khyim bdag zla ba
163b9(gzungs 'dus): bzang po'i khyim nor dang / 'bras bu gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod yongasu gang ba rnaMs la ltos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bco ldan 'ad
164a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko'u sham pa'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nang du zhugs pa dang / nor dang 'bru'i
164a2(gzungs 'dus): yongasu gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yod byed thams cad kyis mdzod chen po dang / mdzod rnams kyang yong su gang bar mthong ngo // mthong / 
164a3(gzungs 'dus): nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
164a4(gzungs 'dus): dga'o ya mtshan du 'dzin cing / dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes pas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad cesapa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim
164a5(gzungs 'dus): bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang nor mang ba dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
164a6(gzungs 'dus): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'o rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba dad cing mchog du dad pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor gyi rgyun gyi gzung
164a7(gzungs 'dus): 'di bzung zhing rab tu ston te/ blangs shing klags kun chub par byas/ rje su yid rangs par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par snyan pa'i phyir/ 
164a8(gzungs 'dus): kun dga'o de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di rling shig/ tshangs shig lpags shig/ kun chub par gyis shig ston cig bzu shig/ 
164b1(gzungs 'dus): gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par sten cing / de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i lha dang / mi rnam
164b2(gzungs 'dus): kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/ kun dga'o rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lA dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong
164b3(gzungs 'dus): dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ngas ma mthong ngo // lan gnyi su gtor ram/ lan gsum du gtor kyang 'gal bar byed pa do/ 
164b4(gzungs 'dus): ni gnas med do// kun dga'o gzungs kyi gsasngags kyi tshig 'di ni mi byed pa yin no// kun dga'o 'di dag/ ni seMs can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnaMs kyi rnal
164b5(gzungs 'dus): grags par yang mi 'gyur/ glegs bam la yi ger 'gri ba 'am/ yid la bzung ba lta ci spos/ de ci'i phyir ne ni/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi bkal
164b6(gzungs 'dus): ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni seMs can dbul po dang / nad sna tshogs kyis gzungs pa dang / 'jig pa dang / seMs can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thos cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs
164b7(gzungs 'dus): ba thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjesu yid rangs pa dang / rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / 
164b8(gzungs 'dus): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / go bar mdzad pa dang / smad pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
166a1(gzungs 'dus): bstan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing / tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis
166a2(gzungs 'dus): mi khyab ste// debasam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyis// rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/ zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi
166a3(gzungs 'dus): mi mnga' ba/ ye shes pha rol bgrod par byon gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa'o khyod la phyag 'tshalo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yid rangs
166a4(gzungs 'dus): rab tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji lta
166a5(gzungs 'dus): bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' 'di khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya ba bzung shig/ nor dang 'bru dang / rin po
166a6(gzungs 'dus): che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar bzung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sngags pa/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs zhes bya bar bzung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
166a7(gzungs 'dus): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o dang / dge slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha dang mi dang / 
166a8(gzungs 'dus): lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyud ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// 
166b1(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya su mu khan na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thas cad la phyag 'tshal/ 
166b2(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po ni// dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi
166b3(gzungs 'dus): dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub
166b4(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta/ ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang // pu ta ba ni/ sa t+ya ka the/ so ma ti/ so ma bra
166b5(gzungs 'dus): be swa hA// tshe ring bar 'gyu ro// tada? ya thA/ ha ra ha ra ha ni swa hA/ tad ya thA/ ga ti ta/ a ye na/ a ri ba na dza na/ ka ka rda ni bu tra/ da ha ni/ marga a bi ro ha ni/ 
166b6(gzungs 'dus): hu sa ba ti/ mu ba bi ti/ hi li hi li/ ye tha ba dzu la/ ya tha a ga ni/ ya tha ba ran tsa/ yA thA badz+ra na/ ya tha tri tha ya sA hA// / lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i
166b7(gzungs 'dus): gzungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
166b8(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis rlabs dang / bden pa de thugs dam gyis rnam par bzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu
167a1(gzungs 'dus): ga chen po'i smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer phyung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo // 'od zer gyi snang ba des skul ba dang / rang rang / 
167a2(gzungs 'dus): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa yod kyis
167a3(gzungs 'dus): sems can thams cad kyi sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags kyi bzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa bshad/ 
167a4(gzungs 'dus): leg sa leg so// bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab po// leg so zhes bya ba byin to// rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang la la/ gzungs sngags bzhi 'di/ 
167a5(gzungs 'dus): ngag 'dzin cing nang par langs nas/ klog/ pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shu shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 
167a6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas thas cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
167a7(gzungs 'dus): med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang/ ring du mtsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang / song spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu med pa dang ldan pa
167a8(gzungs 'dus): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das thams cad dgos shing / thugs su byon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ba dang / dge / 
167b1(gzungs 'dus): spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang / snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum mtshogs
167b2(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
167b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi bzhi rnams gsungs shig/ sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa'
167b4(gzungs 'dus): chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'dasal 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyar
167b5(gzungs 'dus): ba'i slad du gzungs sngags rnams bshad par bya'o/ su zhig sgro bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par
167b6(gzungs 'dus): langs nas klog pa 'di ni rnam par mche ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ shi khi shi khi/ tsau tso tsi tso/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ru ru ru ru/ dzi dza~M dzi dzaM/ gra gra grA gra/ hri hri hri
167b7(gzungs 'dus): ha ha ha ha/ ma ma ma ma/ ha na ha na/ me sarba pra ta ya rI kha da ha da ha me sa rba sha tA pa/ pa tsa pa tsa me sarba hi he/ khi na swa hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub seMs
167b8(gzungs 'dus): dpa' seMs dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can thas cad kyi don gyi phyir/ dngos grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags bzhi rnams smras pa
168a1(gzungs 'dus): leg so leg so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo ba bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong
168a2(gzungs 'dus): bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de'i sku yi khung bu rnams mdangs thams cad gsal bar byed pa bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi tsi la
168a3(gzungs 'dus): sA hA/ pra ma sa re/ bram+ba/ a pa su ga rba/ a ka la pa/ pa sha sad/ sta re swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nang par longs nas/ klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
168a4(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu mo de bsrung ba dang / yongasu skyong ba'i gzungs sngags bzhi rnams len to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
168a5(gzungs 'dus): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang / 
168a6(gzungs 'dus): yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bo ti tsi ti/ ba rA ni/ da na ram te/ did ti did ti/ go
168a7(gzungs 'dus): gin/ da ro sa ra man ha naM/ badz+ra du la ne/ dza la ma li ni/ shwa ga kA pa ka/ sha ba re sha ba re/ sha ma re swA hA/ dwe nas rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen yul 'khor srung
168a8(gzungs 'dus): dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po spyan mig bzang gis/ bcom ldan 'das gi la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
168b1(gzungs 'dus): skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / 
168b2(gzungs 'dus): nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyangs pa'i sla dad do/ gzungs kyi rigs sngags 'di rnams brjod par bya'o// / 
168b3(gzungs 'dus): tad+ya thA/ pu swe su pu sde/ sho da ni sang shau da ni/ du ma ba ti/ ha re ar+ya pra sha ste/ shan te nir mug te/ mang ga l+ye hi ran N+ya/ garbe sta swe/ sA byi ti swA hA/ de nas 'byung po ma ma/ 
168b4(gzungs 'dus): 'phrog ma sa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgom bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i
168b5(gzungs 'dus): rigs sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa dang / yid la bgyi ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongasu bskyang
168b6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i slad du/ gzungs kyi rigs bsngags bzhi rnas brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ bi li si ba pa li/ si li ma hA/ bi bi la si me/ li si[:]gu ru Ne/ gu ru gu Ne/ ma hA gu ru
168b7(gzungs 'dus): ne phu pu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtses/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// tsun
168b8(gzungs 'dus): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / gang sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la/ 
169a1(gzungs 'dus): bsrung bar 'gyu ro// katad+ya thA/ ad te phu bad de phu nad te pu/ ku nag tre puHma nan tre pu/ mun Ta ha/ ke phu ke phu/ shi pi ri puHmang b+ha g+ha pu mang ge pu swa hA// 
169a2(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das padag gis kyang sgo bzang po
169a3(gzungs 'dus): zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas/ klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang ba dang / yongasu bzung
169a4(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / yong su bskyang ba dang / bde/ leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / dug bzhil bar bgyi'o// 'tshams bcad par bgyi'o// tad ya thA/ d+hi badz+re d+hi ba/ 
169a5(gzungs 'dus): hi ha/ bi si bi si/ ma hA bi si phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
169a6(gzungs 'dus): kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongasu sbyangs
169a7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / gsang sngags bzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ sarba brum ta pra ti/ she nang ka ro mi swA hA// de nas sde dpon gzho nus
169a8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das me 'odi skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi
