181b7(gzungs 'dus): rgyu ba rgyu zhing / dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / thabs gcig tu grong khyer chen po yangs pa
181b8(gzungs 'dus): can ga la der gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe grong khyer gyi bud med rgan mo gtugs pa/ khogs pa/ na tshod las 'das par 'gyur ba/ skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu len pa zhig/ dgon pa na
181b9(gzungs 'dus): rtswa bsdud cing 'dag ste/ bud med des bco ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad par byed pa/ dbang po dul ba/ thugs dul ba/ dul ba zhi gnas mchog rnyes pa/ smras pa skyon med pa dbang
182a1(gzungs 'dus): po dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas shing gsal la rnyog pa med pa gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang de/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
182a2(gzungs 'dus): sum bcu rtsa gnyis legs par brgyan pa/ thag ring po nas byon pa mthong / mthong nas kyang sems dad par gyur nas/ dad pa'i seMs kyis bco ldan 'das ga la ba der song
182a3(gzungs 'dus): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bco ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bco ldan 'das kyi
182a4(gzungs 'dus): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bco ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dag ste/ bud med des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
182a5(gzungs 'dus): log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ btso ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye ba gang nas/ mchis/ rga ba gang nas mchis/ gang du
182a6(gzungs 'dus): mchi/ bco ldan 'das na ba gang nas mchis// mchi ba gang nas mchis/ gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs gang nas mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnaMs dang / 
182a7(gzungs 'dus): rnam par shes pa gang nas mchis/ gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams gang nas mchis/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khas dang / na mkha'i khros
182a8(gzungs 'dus): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas mchis/ gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das mig gang nas mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang nas mchis/ 
182a9(gzungs 'dus): gang du mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo gang nas kyang mi 'ong // gang du yang mi 'gro/ rga ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ sring mo na pa
182b1(gzungs 'dus): gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ 'chi ba gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du mi 'gro/ sring mo gzugs gang nas kyang mi 'ong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnaMs dang / 
182b2(gzungs 'dus): rnam par shes pa glang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ sring mo sa'i khams gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung
182b3(gzungs 'dus): gi khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du yang mi 'gro sring mig gang nas kyang mi 'od/ gang du yang mi 'gro/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang
182b4(gzungs 'dus): yid gang nas kyang mi 'ong / grang du yang mi 'gro/ sring mo 'di lta ste dper na rtsub shing dang / rtsub stan la yang rten/ de skyes pa'i mi'i rtsol ba yang brten na me
182b5(gzungs 'dus): byung ste/ me de yang rdza dang / shing de sreg nas rgyu med par yang shi bar 'gyur/ sring mo 'di snyam du sems te/ me de gong du song / gsol pa bco ldan 'das
182b6(gzungs 'dus): zhugs/ de ni tshogs pa'i dbang gis byung / tshogs pa dang bral ba las 'gag ste 'gum mo/ bka' stsal pa/ sring mo de bzhin du chos thas cad kyang tshogs pa'i dbang gis
182b7(gzungs 'dus): byung / tshogs pa dang bral bas 'gag ste/ 'di la chos gang yang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du yang 'gro ba med do// sring mo 'di lta ste/ mig dang gzugs la brten nas/ 
182b8(gzungs 'dus): mig gi rnam par shes pa byung yang / mig gi rnam par shes pa de la skye bar byed pa yang med/ 'gag par byed pa yang med/ gang yang sogs pa med/ phung po gang las
182b9(gzungs 'dus): kyang 'gro ba yang med la/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis las mngon par 'dus byas nas/ khams gsum du 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te/ 'bras bu
183a1(gzungs 'dus): de yang ston pa/ 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/ su kyang ma bgag pa ste/ sring mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra dang sna dang dri dang / 
183a2(gzungs 'dus): lce dang ro dang lus dang reg dang yid dang / chos rnams la brten nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa byung yang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de la bskyed par byed pa yang med/ gang yang
183a3(gzungs 'dus): sogs pa med/ phung po gang las kyang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med la/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis las mngon par 'dus byas nas khams gsum du 'bras bu rnam pa gsum
183a4(gzungs 'dus): gyis 'bras bu nye bar ston te 'brasabu de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa/ sus kyang ma skyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sring mo thams cad ni rang bzhin
183a5(gzungs 'dus): gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na shing dang lpags pa dang / dbyug ga la yang brten te/ skyes bu mi'i rtsol ba yang brten nas/ rnga'i sgra nges
183a6(gzungs 'dus): byung ste/ rnga'i sgra des 'das pa yang stong / ma 'ongs pa yang stong / da ltar byung ba yang ste// sgra ni shing la yang mi gnas/ lpagaso pa la yang mi gnas/ dbyug pa la yang mi gnas/ 
183a7(gzungs 'dus): mi'i lag pa la yang mi gnas mod kyi/ 'on kyang de'i rkyen gyis sgra 'dogs te/ gang sgra de 'dogs pa yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ sus kyang ma bskyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag/ 
183a8(gzungs 'dus): pa ste/ sring mo chos thad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring ma de bzhin du chos tha~Md ni rkyen gyi kha na mi las ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang rnam par
183a9(gzungs 'dus): shes pa'o// chos de dag yod na mchi 'pho ba dang / skye ba 'dogs pa de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med/ sus kyang ma bskyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ srid
183b1(gzungs 'dus): mo chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo de ltar sus rnga sgra'i tshul rab tu shes pa des stong pa nyid rab tu shes so// sus stong pa nyid rab tu shes pa des mya ngan las
183b2(gzungs 'dus): 'das par rab tu shes so// sus mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu shes pa de tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs kyang / dngos po gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med de/ bdag gis 'di
183b3(gzungs 'dus): dang de ni bdag go zhe 'am/ sems can no zhe 'am srog go zhe 'am/ gso ba'o zhe 'am/ skyes bu'o zhe'am/ gang zag go zhe 'am/ shed las skyes so zhe'am/ shed bu'o zhe/ 'am/ byed pa
183b4(gzungs 'dus): po zhe 'am/ byed du 'jug pa po zhe 'am/ len pa po zhe 'am/ 'dor po zhes de/ mngon par zhen par chos ston/ chos rab tu ston/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ston/ yang
183b5(gzungs 'dus): dag pa'i mtha' rab tu ston to// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma zhig gis ras bcos ma shi na/ du byi dor byas pa 'am/ shing leb bam/ rtsig
183b6(gzungs 'dus): ngos sam/ shin du byi dor byas pa zhig la tshon sna tshogs 'gyed cing / gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dang gang 'dod pa 'di lta ste/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ bud med kyi gzug
183b7(gzungs 'dus): kyi rnam pa 'am/ glang po che'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ rta'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ bong bu'i gzugs kyi rnam pa 'am/ de dag yan lag dang nying lag dang / dbang po thas cad
183b8(gzungs 'dus): ma tshang ba med pa/ tshegs chung ngus mngon par sgrub cing 'dri ste/ mngon par grub par byed kyang / de la chos gang yang ri mo mkhan gyi lag pa 'am/ sems las gzugasu 'phos
183b9(gzungs 'dus): pa med modo kyi/ 'on kyang de'i rkyen kyis gzugs 'dogs te/ gzugs de yang stong pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa sus kyang ma bskyed pa/ sus kyang ma bkag pa ste/ sring mo
184a1(gzungs 'dus): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'o// sring mo de bzhin du bsod nams nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa nas sod na 'di sa ste/ lha 'am mi'i nang du bsod namasu
184a2(gzungs 'dus): nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par grub kyang // gang la 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'pho ba'i pho ba ni rdul tsam yang med mod kyi 'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis skye bo
184a3(gzungs 'dus): sna tshogs yod de/ skye mched yod pa'i lus su rnam par dag go// de bzhin du bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed/ rnas yod na 'di ste ste/ seMs can dmyal ba
184a4(gzungs 'dus): dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshi rje'i 'jig rten num/ lha ma yin nam su bsod nams ma yin pa'i lus mngon par 'gro/ kyang / de la gang 'jig rten 'di nas 'dzi/ 
184a5(gzungs 'dus): rngon pa rol du 'pho ba ni rdul tsam yang me mod kyi/ 'on kyang mngon par 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba sna tshogs yod de/ skye mched mod pas su su rnam par rig go// sring mo 'di lta ste klu nas
184a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi klu'i mthus sprin gyi tshogs chen po byung ste/ sprin gyi dri ba de dag gis khyabs par byas nas/ cher chen po rgya cher 'bebs te/ char chen po rgya cher bab nas kyang / skang bshangs med
184a7(gzungs 'dus): bar byed de/ skang dang bshongs ngoms med par byas na/ srer 'gro yang de dag klu'i lus sam// sems las byung ba med mod kyi/ klu rnams kyi klu'i mthu nyid kyis sprin gyi tshogs rgya chen po 'a
184a8(gzungs 'dus): sring mo de bzhin du bsod nam su nye bar 'gro bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa yod na 'di lta ste/ lha 'am mi'i nang du bsod nam su nye bar 'gro ba'i lus nas mngon par grud po/ de bzhin du 'asod
184b1(gzungs 'dus): nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha
184b2(gzungs 'dus): ma yin rnamasu bsod nams ma yin pa nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par 'grub kyang / de la mngon par 'du byed pa yang sdong pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'bras bu yang stong pa'o// 
184b3(gzungs 'dus): sring mo mig yar nye bar 'gro ba'i lus mngon par 'du byed pa rnams yod na/ gzugs med pa rnasu rnam par shes pa 'tshams sbyar te/ gang gis rnam par shes pa de dag
184b4(gzungs 'dus): gzugs med pa rnamasu 'tshams sbyor ba de yang stong pa/ gang rnam par shes pa rnam su 'tshams sbyor ba de yang stong pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo chos tha/ 
184b5(gzungs 'dus): ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ te// 'on kyang chos rnams 'dog so// mkhas pa rnams ni de la mngon par zhen te/ mngon par zhen pa med pas mi rtsod do// 
184b6(gzungs 'dus): rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog go// gsol pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos zab mo la bka' stsal pa/ chos 'di dag la shes rab kyi mig 'jug ste/ slar
184b7(gzungs 'dus): yang yid gnyis ma mchis the tsom ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon ni chos 'di dag ma thos pas the tsom ma mchis// dwa ni rgas/ bdag 'khogs pa/ bdag sdug bsngal
184b8(gzungs 'dus): bdag dbul bdag mgon ma mchis te/ bdag ma mtsho zhing 'gum mi mda'o/ bco ldan 'das bdag gis chos 'di thos sam/ 'di na rgas pa 'am/ dbul ba 'am/ bde ba la
185a1(gzungs 'dus): nad ma mchis pa 'amanyan pa 'am/ phyug pa 'am/ dbul ba 'am/ gang yang ma mchi so zhes bdag du 'du byed shes pa dang bral bar gyur to// de nas bco ldan 'das la tshe dang
185a2(gzungs 'dus): ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das gang gis slad du/ bco ldan 'das gang gi slong du/ bco ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bka'
185a3(gzungs 'dus): stsal pa/ des kyang 'di rab tu brtsal bas/ bud med 'di ni bsod nams dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin can lags pa snyam bdag bgyed do// bcom ldan 'am
185a4(gzungs 'dus): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dge'o de de bzhin no// kun dga' ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ bud med de ni bsod nas dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin
185a5(gzungs 'dus): can no// kun dga'o bu de med 'di tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du nga'i mar gyur te/ kun dga'i ngas tshe rabs de dang // de dge du yang / bud med 'di bla na med pa
185a6(gzungs 'dus): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// kun dga'o bud med 'di la shin du phangs par bya ba dang / dad pa dang gus par 'gyur to// 'di yang bdage
185a7(gzungs 'dus): bu spyad pa gang la spyod pa'i spyad pa de la bdag gis kyang spyad de/ theg pa de bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya
185a8(gzungs 'dus): snyam mo/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar dbul bar 'bul bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'ong byang chub ses dang
185a9(gzungs 'dus): spyad pa spyod pa na/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi bston pa la rab tu/ 
185b1(gzungs 'dus): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ des nga ma btang nas/ de'i phyir nga za gcig zan bcad pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'dis 'dod pas nga btang bar gyur te/ kun dga'o 'di las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di
185b2(gzungs 'dus): ltar dbul bar 'gyuraro// kun dga'o 'di ni dbul ba ma yin te/ kun dga'o bud med de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bco ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing
185b3(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bud med kyi dbang po la 'dod chags dang bral nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'gyur te/ der skyes nas sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu
185b4(gzungs 'dus): med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro// sems can grangs med dpag tu med cing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag byang chub la 'dzud par 'gyur/ sas
185b5(gzungs 'dus): can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag/ byang chub la yongasu smin par byed par 'gyur/ seMs can grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab
185b6(gzungs 'dus): ba dag byang chub la rgod par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub la bkod nas/ de ste bskal pa brgya stong drug bcu rtsa ba brgyad na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig
185b7(gzungs 'dus): rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ kun dga'o sum bcu rtsa gsum
185b8(gzungs 'dus): gyi lha rnams kyi long spyod yongasu spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ses can rnas kyi long spyod dang kun spyod pa de yang de 'dra bar 'gyuraro/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
185b9(gzungs 'dus): ces bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa/ rgan mo 'di la kun
186a1(gzungs 'dus): dga' khyod ltos shig/ 'di ni mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// byang chub yan lag me tog byed ces bya/ 'dis ni bud med dngos po
186a2(gzungs 'dus): 'di spangs nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jigs rten kham su 'gro brgyal ba tshed pag med de srin bkur nas khams sum tshol ba mtshangs med sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
186a3(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs rted khams gzhan dag na gang bzhugs padrang srong chen po 'jig rten don mdzad pa/ rnam 'dred de dag la yang bsnyen bkur nas/ 'di na
186a4(gzungs 'dus): mtshungs med mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/ de dag kun las chos kyang thob byur nas/ bsam pa bdag pas de bzhin sgrub par 'gyur/ 
186a5(gzungs 'dus): chub sems mchog mi bskyod gnas ni// sems can dpag med chos la sbyor bar byed// de'i tshen gang dag sman pa dang // sna tshogs lus dang kha dog ngan pa dang / dardza khengs dang sring ba ji
186a6(gzungs 'dus): bzhin zhar ba dang / la ba rdum ma rdzi can de dag 'byung mi 'byu gci bla mi dang nor du rnams/ de dag tshad ni cha 'byung mi 'gyur/ nAm 'dzin byang chub yan lag me tog gi / thub pa'i 'od kyis
186a7(gzungs 'dus): kun du gsal bar khyad// sum bcu rtsa gsum lnga mchog rnams kyis ni// chu zhing rtags dang kha dog ci 'dra ba/ de 'dra'i rang bzhin gyi skye bo yis// de tshem sma da bzhing ni gang bar
186a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// de na dud maud bdud kyi ris kyang med// bdud kyi bdud kyi phyag brnyan med// bde bar bya shegs de ni smon pa'i tshe// de na su stegs can gyi min mi grag/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni
186b1(gzungs 'dus): chos ston no// dadus yid btags drung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / sems dmyal ngan song rnams kyi ming mi zag/ den bud med ming yang grag mi 'gyur// 'di mnyan thos rkyen theg pa nas
186b2(gzungs 'dus): par bzhag pa med/ kun kyang rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang ldan// de dag byams la gnas shing sde rje can// zhing der mi rnams thams cad rtag par rje su yang // rdzu zhing skye
186b3(gzungs 'dus): sarangs nas rnam pa zad/ spyi dran rna mchog ldan nings rgyas / migs par gsungs pa rdzog par 'dzin/ gi bkang tshul ci 'du 'byung 'gyur
186b4(gzungs 'dus): yon tan sbal ba ni 'di ni rjod byas na/ rgya mtshol sa ni tshuthugs gtsigs su dpa can du yang brjod par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis du skad
186b5(gzungs 'dus): ces bka' bsngal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / rgan man dang / byang chub sems dpa'adi dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi
186b6(gzungs 'dus): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
186b7(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ 
187a1(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ a r+yam hU~M shanam sangag ta/ bod skad du/ phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par marjod pa/ 'jam dpal nan du
187a2(gzungs 'dus): gdul ba rnamapa kyi mchog/ dnga'ab 'jig na gsum las rgyal/ rje dbang phyug ga
187a3(gzungs 'dus): rgya'o/ pad ma dkar ba rgyapa 'di medas rgyas 'dri'i nal yang ga/ rang gi lag gi rdo rje mchag/ dpa' yang dang yang du gsar byed pa/ khrigasar rnamapa
187a4(gzungs 'dus): ldan la sags/ lag nod rje mtha' yas pa/ dpa' ba 'dul ka 'dul ba po/ 'jig su rung dang dpal byed can/ rdo rje rtse mo'i rab 'bri ba/ rang gi lag gis
187a5(gzungs 'dus): ge sor byed pa/ snying rje chen dang shes rab dang / thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ dga' mgur rangs pa'i bsam pa can/ khro'o lus kyi gzugs ldan pa
187a6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mgon/ lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas/ 
187a7(gzungs 'dus): thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'dig skad gsol/ khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang / bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas
187a8(gzungs 'dus): mngon rdzogs pas/ byang chub cig nas bdag thob mdzad/ nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing / mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ sems can kun la sman pa/ 
187b1(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston po/ dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ dbang po bas
187b2(gzungs 'dus): pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdagan/ ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// / 
187b3(gzungs 'dus): ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che bo zhing / don chen mtshungs med rab zhi dang / thob ma bor dang mnar dge ba/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rgyas
187b4(gzungs 'dus): gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsungs 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/ yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang / rgyu nad chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 
187b5(gzungs 'dus): 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang / dpag mod nas kyi bka' bzhin du/ glu blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin
187b6(gzungs 'dus): ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir/ nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di/ bdag gi bsam pa bstan pos bzung / non mongs ma lus bsal ba dang / mi shis ma lus spangs pa'i
187b7(gzungs 'dus): phyir/ bsam pa'i khyab par ji ba nin du/ sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje las/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad du/ 
187b8(gzungs 'dus): gsol nas thal mo sbyar byos ste/ lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas lpags
188a1(gzungs 'dus): bzang ba ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jigs ca gsum pa snang byed cing / bdud bzhi'i dgra nas 'dul byed pa/ sos can nas kyi ngan song gsum/ 
188a2(gzungs 'dus): sbyor bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jigs rten gsum po kun kyang nas/ lag na rdo rje stobs che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa/ 
188a3(gzungs 'dus): snyirdo rje tshe dang ldan 'gyur bapas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyad// ye shes lus can 'jam dpal byed/ ming brjod pas ni bdon che bre/ bdag par byed cing sdig bsil ba/ ka/ nga las
188a4(gzungs 'dus): nyan par brtson pa ni// legs dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / lag na rdo rje khyod leg so// gsang ba'i bdeg po de phyir ngas/ khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ khyod ni rtse cig yid kyis nyon/ 
188a5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags ridags chen thams cad dang // gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba rigs// rigs gsuM la ni rnaM bar
188a6(gzungs 'dus): gzigs/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snying byed rigs chen dang // phyug rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // rigs chen gtor cher gzigs nas/ tshig gi bdag pas
188a7(gzungs 'dus): tshigs bcad paka gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan nang / gnyi su med par 'byung ba dang / me skya chos spyan 'di gsung ba/ a a/ i i u u/ e e oM i oM a
188a8(gzungs 'dus): hri ti dzIn mu d+hi/ ra ha~M d+hu d+hi bu d+ha nam/ ti d+ha btsun/ oM badz+ra ti lan du khi tshi d+hi/ pradz+nyA dz+nyAn mu dz+ha me dz+nyA na ka ya/ wa gI sher/ a ra ba tsanA ya te na ma// 'di ltar sangs rgyas
188b1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung / a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don cher yi ge dam pa ste/ khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med/ tshig kun brjod pa spangs
188b2(gzungs 'dus): pa ste/ brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed do/ mchod po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs
188b3(gzungs 'dus): kun gyi dgra che ba/ mchod po ti mug che/ gti mug b+h+r-i te gti mug sel/ mchod pa chen po'i khro ba che// khro ba chen po'i dgra che ba/ mtsho pad+mo chags pa che/ chags pa thaMd
188b4(gzungs 'dus): sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ dga' ba chen po mgu' ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ kha dog che zhing lus bong chen// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba/ dkyil 'khor chen
188b5(gzungs 'dus): po yangs pa tsas shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste/ rkyen mongs chen pa'i lhag rgya mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ban+d+he/ mkhas pa sgyu 'brur
188b6(gzungs 'dus): chen po 'chang / bzod pa sgyu 'phrul chen po dan drug pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' ba s+yA dag/ sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can/ sprin bdag chen po rtsa ba suM tshul khrimamatsho chenas
188b7(gzungs 'dus): 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod cheni 'chang ba bskrun pa / brtu ni 'grus chen po brtul ba yin/ garte chen po nyid 'dzin gangs shes rab ched po lus 'chang ba/ rdzu 'phrum
188b8(gzungs 'dus): dpas pa mal thams chag/ ldan lam ma shes rgya mamagro/ khyims chen nga zhin dpag tung/ dring rje che 'i rje med/ she che pa cwom ldan ma sa pa
189a1(gzungs 'dus): thabs che ga// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i skabs dang ldan/ shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/ rdzu 'phrul chen po che grags pa/ stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// srid pa'i ri bo
189a2(gzungs 'dus): chen po 'joms/ mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang / drag po chen po drag shul che/ 'jigs par chen 'jigs par byed// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/ bla ma gsang sngags
189a3(gzungs 'dus): che ba'i mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchod// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzache/ thub pa chen po thub chen ldan/ gsang sngags tshul chen
189a4(gzungs 'dus): las byung pa// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin pa bcu thob po ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa de ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu'i yi tshul// mgon
189a5(gzungs 'dus): bos bcu'i dbang phyug ste/ sa bcu la ni gnas pa po// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/ shes bcu rnam bdag 'chang ba po// rnams pa bcu po bden bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab 'i
189a6(gzungs 'dus): bdagani byedang rnam sus byed/ rnam pargyashes ldan ma ga// zags med pa snyam mad pang / dbazhin cid bdag dganga'i bdag bdad pa sgra nang mchog mi snang / rjeska rlom pa/ 
189a7(gzungs 'dus): ba de bzhin byed/ gnyis su med dang gnyis med ston// yang dag mtha' la gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/ mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun du 'gro ba'i don yod
189a8(gzungs 'dus): stobs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs/ rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal ba stabs po che/ tshogs kyi bslob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs chen
189b1(gzungs 'dus): tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan/ mthu chen ces par 'dzin pa ste/ tshul chen gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog/ tshig che tshig bdag smras mkhas pa/ tshig la dbang chug mtha' yas/ tshig bden pa d+ma
189b2(gzungs 'dus): bden par smra/ bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong / 'dren pa rang rgya lnga bse ru'i tshul/ nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba/ 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu cig por/ dge slong
189b3(gzungs 'dus): dgra bcom zag pa zang / 'dod chags bral ba bas dbang po dul// bad pa be rnyed pas 'jigs med thob/ bsil bar gyur pas rnyog pa med/ rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan/ bde bar
189b4(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs rten rig pa'i mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin sngar mi 'dzin/ bde ba gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar bston pa/ bya ba byas pas skam sar gnas/ shes pa
189b5(gzungs 'dus): 'ga' zhig las byung ba// shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa/ dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jigs rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs
189b6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i lam ni bstan pa po// don grub bsam pa grub pa ste/ kun du rtog pa thams cad spongs/ rnam par mo rtog dbyings mi bzed / chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes/ bsod nams ldan
189b7(gzungs 'dus): pas bsod nams tshogs/ ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas tshe/ ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// chogs gnyis tshigs ni bsags pa po// rtag pa kun rgyal na
189b8(gzungs 'dus): 'byor can/ bsam gtan pasam bya gro ldan dag/ so so rang rig mi gsogs/ mchog gi nga ba sku gsum 'chang / sangs rgyas su lnga'i bdag cid can/ 
190a1(gzungs 'dus): dag ye shes lnga'i bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pa na/ spyan lnga chags med pa 'dang / sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa po/ sangs rgyas sras pa lnga'i mam/ 
190a2(gzungs 'dus): shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med/ chas los byung ba srid pa sel/ gcig du sa mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag skyes mthag du 'gro ba'i bdag/ nem mdza' las byung ra byung ba// 
190a3(gzungs 'dus): shes rab yA shas me ma/ 'od chen rnam par snang bar bya/ ye shes snang ba ma m+me pra la/ 'gro ba'i mar me yo shes smran/ gzi brjid chen pos 'od gsal ba/ sngags dran
190a4(gzungs 'dus): mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug gi tor chen po rmad 'byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston/ sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos
190a5(gzungs 'dus): po'i mchog/ 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig deng ldan/ sna tshogs gzugs can bskyed pa po/ mchod cing brjod pa drang skyong rkun/ rig gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang / dam tshig
190a6(gzungs 'dus): chen po gsang sngags 'dzin/ gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa/ theg pa mchog gsum ston pa bri/ don pa po don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags
190a7(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje lcags skya zhags pa che/ rdo rje 'jigs byed/ 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang / kong rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// 
190a8(gzungs 'dus): ha la ha la ga dong brgya pa// gshin rje gshed po dgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa/ rdo rje drag po rdo rje snying po// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje las skyes
190b1(gzungs 'dus): darje'i bdag/ darje sring po mkha' 'dra ba/ mi gatshalal pa cig gis sgyings/ glang chen ka rlanags su byan/ brags can nas pacwams can pa zlogs pa/ nyi nas smran
190b2(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs par byed gang ma chen mo gang rgyangs can/ rdo rje gad mo cher grogs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe/ rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ rdo rje drag po dga' ba che/ rdo rje dzA
190b3(gzungs 'dus): zhes grogs/ mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa// rdo rje mA lus gcod/ rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can/ rdo rje gcig pus g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang /

190b5(gzungs 'dus): pa mkhregs// rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ gang brgyangs ha ha nges par grogs/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ga/ 'jigs
190b6(gzungs 'dus): rten gsum na sgra gcig pa/ nam mkha'i mtha' las sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra tshan ldan/ chos kyi gan+d+he sgra bo che/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ phyogasu nu chos kyi rnga bo che/ 
190b7(gzungs 'dus): gzugs med gzugs bzang ba dam pa ste/ sna tshogs gzugs can yid las smras// gzugs rnams thod snang ba'i dpal/ gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba bo// rmugs pa med

191a3(gzungs 'dus): sbubs 'byed pa/ srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zho byed pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin// yo shes dbang bskur btsad pan can/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

191a5(gzungs 'dus): dri ma kun las 'das/ dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sems can kun gyi glu chen po// yon tan tha~Md can rnams kyi thod// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol lag/ nam mkha'i las

191a7(gzungs 'dus): don byed phan bdogs sems can mnyes shing pa/ bzang nang shes shing dus shes la/ khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan/ dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum

191b3(gzungs 'dus): pa me tog thaM da/ mgo zlum brtul shugs chen po 'chang / tshangs par spyod pa brtul shugs mchog/ dka' thub mthor byin dka' thub che/ gtsang gnas dam be ke'u ta me/ bram ze tshangs
191b4(gzungs 'dus): yu tshangs pa shes// mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// myanu 'angs shing mya ngan 'das/ legs par mya ngan dang nye// bde sdug sel
191b5(gzungs 'dus): ba mthar gyur pa// chags bral lus las 'das pa po// thub pa med pa dpe med pa/ mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro la khyab pa po// phra zhing zag med sa bon dral/ 
191b6(gzungs 'dus): rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/ nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin du sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shas kun rig dam pa po// rnam par shes pa chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis mad
191b7(gzungs 'dus): tshul 'tshang ba// rnam par rtog ming lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas byed pa/ sangs rgyas thog ma la the ma med/ dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ ye shes mig cig dri ma med/

192a5(gzungs 'dus): rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas//

192a7(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje dkyil 'khor da krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pasadapal ldan padam sangs rgyas skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul snganags
192a8(gzungs 'dus): 'chang / che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal// rdo rje rnon po ral khri me/ yig mchog ste// rnam par bdag/ thig chen po bsdug bsngal po gcod/ mtshon chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje bzam mo 'dzin 'aM dzig/ 
192b1(gzungs 'dus): dru du smra bya rdzu zug kyi rgyu na/ u n+ta sa pa dug me rna / 'du ga shA ba dang / can na rgyu gyu za //

192b5(gzungs 'dus): pa/ ye shes maM lce 'od rab gsal ka / 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rdo sbyong ba/ mgon po sems can gyi chog/ seMs can thams rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig pa dpa'
192b6(gzungs 'dus): mi shas dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ldan pasgrags 'chang dpal dang ldan// brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa kun brgya po kun bskyod cing // sgom pa'i skabs kyis gar byed pa// dpa
192b7(gzungs 'dus): ldan lag pa rgyas gang ba// namakha' khyab par gar byed pa/ sa yi dkyil 'khor gzhi yi khyin/ rkang pa ya cig 'thil gyis gnon// kang 'thob sa mo'i khyon gyis kyang // tshangs pi yul sa rtsenas
192b8(gzungs 'dus): gnon ka gdon gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don de 'jig pa med/ rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs ston can// sems dang rnaMs shes rgyud dang ldan / dngos da ma lus rnams la dga'
193a1(gzungs 'dus): stong pa nyid la dga' 'dod chags sgo srid bI su 'dod chags rtsog spangs pa// srid sum dga' ba chen po ste sprin da kar bdag pa ste bzhin du dkar// 'od zung bston mkha'i zla ba'i 'od// 
193a2(gzungs 'dus): nyim 'char ki'i dkyil ltar mdzes// sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar// cod pan bzang po'i mthon kha'i rtse skra mchog mthon kha chen po can// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpalas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan
193a3(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan// 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan/ de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dram pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal ka byang chub yan lag me tog spos// de bzhin po
193a4(gzungs 'dus): yin mchog lam gyi yan lag brgyad chu lo rig/ yid dge sangs rgyas lam rigs pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug
193a5(gzungs 'dus): sems can gyi yin ltar mgyogs/ seMs can kun la gyi dbang don shes// sems can gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes/ rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba/ nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas/ 
193a6(gzungs 'dus): nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas// nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas// nges 'byung ba kun bston pa// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa ton// dag pa rna pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi tshul gyi rna pa can/ 
193a7(gzungs 'dus): shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // de na bdon rnam bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid pa rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnaMs pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnams pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul
193a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sku// bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// seMs skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la brtag pa po// theg pa gsu
193b1(gzungs 'dus): bye des 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas sa nyon mongs khams rnams bdag pa'i bdag/ las kyi khas nas zad byed pa/ chub rgya mtsho kun las brgal sbyor ba'i dben pa las byung ban
193b2(gzungs 'dus): nyon mongs nyim pa kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa bstan spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing // rnam shes don ni
193b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gags bya bar byed/ sems can kun yid yul dang ldan/ sems can kun gyi yid rig pa// sems can kun gyi yid la gnaso// sems de dag sems dang 'thun par 'jug/ sa sa
193b4(gzungs 'dus): kun yi dra tshim par byed/ sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nor ba thams cad rnams par spangs// don gsum the tsom med pa'i blo// kun dang
193b5(gzungs 'dus): yidan dang gsum gyi rgyal bdag/ phung pa lnga don dus gsum du/ skad cig thams cad bye brag byed/ skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas ku'i rang bzhin 'chang
193b6(gzungs 'dus): lus med lus te spus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa paM/ gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun du stan// nor bu chen po rin chen rtog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtag bya ba/ sangs rgyas
193b7(gzungs 'dus): byang chub bla na med gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi gau lnga
193b8(gzungs 'dus): thig la spong ba yi ge brgya/ rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/ bcu drug byed byed thig le can// yan lag mo'i rtsis las 'das// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can/ thamam gtan yin ma
194a1(gzungs 'dus): kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ sprul pa'i sku sde sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ 
194a2(gzungs 'dus): phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyud// ji bzhin don byed pa/ ha~M dang lha dbang lha yi lha/ lha yi dbang po lha min pa dag/ 'tsho med dbang po lnga yi lha/ 'joms byed dbang po phyag pa po// sring
194a3(gzungs 'dus): dgon po las rgol ba ni/ stong pa cig pu 'gro ba'i b+haka 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sprin bdag chen po/ byams pa'i go cha byas pa ste/ snying rje yi ni ya lang dgos/ shes rab ral khri'i
194a4(gzungs 'dus): mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed/ bdud kyi dpung rnams pham phyed pa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
194a5(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs rten 'dun/ mchung 'os bstang 'os phyag gi gnas/ rtag mad bya ba'i 'as/ bkur 'os brjod par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'as pa bla ma'i rab/ 'jig rten gsum po gom cig bgrang / 
194a6(gzungs 'dus): mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnan// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rje dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan po/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jigs rten 'das/ 
194a7(gzungs 'dus): shes rab pa la phyin mtha'// shas rab kyis ni nyid thug/ bdag rig gnan rig thams cade dang / kun la len pa'i gang zag mchog/ dpar bya gan las 'das pas/ shes dang shes bya bdan za
194a8(gzungs 'dus): mchog/ gtso bo chos kyis sbyin bdag ste// phyag brgya ba ni po'i don bston pa// 'gro'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog ngos 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyis// don gyi dam pa rnam bdag dpal// 'jig
194b1(gzungs 'dus): na bskul bzang chag ribal dpal de'i ldan pa'i/ mchog sbyin rdo rje khyod la 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stang nyid las byung khyud la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyad la 'dud// sangs rgya
194b2(gzungs 'dus): chags pa khyo la 'dud// 'jams dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ sangs rgyas dgos pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 
194b3(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ sangs rgyas gnad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyed la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las byung khyod
194b4(gzungs 'dus): la 'du do// sangs rgas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byang khyod la 'dun/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol rton khyod la 'dud// 
194b5(gzungs 'dus): thams cad thas cad khyed la 'dud/ ye shes sku zhing khyod la 'dud/ oM sarba d+harmA d+ha 'o// swA b+ha we/ b+hi shud d+ha/ badz+ra tsak+Sha/ a oM/ A~M mA hA pra kr-i tI pa ri rbu
194b6(gzungs 'dus): sarbA d+ha mA ya tu ta/ sarbA ta thA g+ha ta dz+nyA na kA yaka many+dzu shrIka pa ra shud d+hi ta/ mu pa ta ya ti/ a ArbA ta tha ga ta hri ha yA/ har+thar/ au hU~M h+yaM/ b+ha ga lA na/ dzAn b+ha ge mu rti/ b+ha gi shA rA
194b7(gzungs 'dus): ma hA bA tsa/ sarba d+harma ka ga na a ma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ d+harmA d+ha du rdza na garba A// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / dga' bzhin gus nas thal mo sbyar
194b8(gzungs 'dus): pa bcom ldan de bu gas/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ni sa// 'di ni mgon po gsangs pa'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje khro ba rgyal/ sna tshogs gzhan
195a1(gzungs 'dus): lhan cig du/ gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'ad gsol/ mgron po bdag cag yi rang ngo // lags lags par gsungs/ nab grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i/ 
195a2(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ba mo gon med rnaMs dang ni// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra bri tshul bstan pa// 'di ni rnaMs bdag lags pa'i laM// zab cing yangs pa la rgya che ste/ don chen 'gro ba
195a3(gzungs 'dus): don mdzad pa// sangs rgyas rnaMs kyi yul 'di ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi bshad// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sos dpa'i dan da pI mtshan yA dag par brjod pa// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa shA
195a4(gzungs 'dus): thub pa pas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// @#// phyag stong spyan stang mnga' ba byang chub seMs dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzegs kyi dbang po thugs chen po thogs pa med par shin du rgyas pa/ 
195a5(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i gzungs na sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMs dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis klas pa'i dus cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri bri po ha la'i kha na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
195a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi pho brang rin po chen pa bkod bI nang na// seng ge rin por che'i rgyan rin chen sna tshogs kyis kun du smras pa/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brubs shing dbyings pI gdon la bzhugs/ 
195a7(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs shing byang chub sos dpa' sos dpa' sras dpa' grangs med pa rnaMs la// 'phags pa spyan ras gzags dbang phyug gzungs 'di bshad par dgas so// 
195a8(gzungs 'dus): byang chub seM sa rba de dag la lha ste/ byang chub seMs dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub seMs rnga na chen rgyal po dang // byang chub seMs rba sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub seMs rba sman gyi bla ma dang // 
195b1(gzungs 'dus): byang chub seMs dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub seMs dpa'i mthu chen po thob dang / byang chub seMs dpa' sdong pos brgyan dang / byang chub seMs dpa' bkod chen dang / byang chub
195b2(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub seMs dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa'
195b3(gzungs 'dus): byams pa dang // byang chub sems kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ngo 'jam dpal gzhon nur byar pa dang / de dag la gsogs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
195b4(gzungs 'dus): kyang chos kyi rgyal por bya dbang bskur ba sha stag go// gzhan yang nyan thos chen po grangs med pa 'ad srungs chen po la sogs te/ kun kyang dgra bcom pa/ sa bcur gnas pa sha stag gaka
195b5(gzungs 'dus): gzhan yang tshangs ris kyi lha tshanges pa san ta la sogs pa grangs med pa dang / yang thabs cig go// gzhan yang lha'i sras po ku ku pa ka la sogs te// lha'i sras po grangs med pa dang yang
195b6(gzungs 'dus): thabs cig ga/ gzhan yang 'jigs rten bskyong / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung la sogs te grangs med pa dang yang thabs cig go// gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ra dpal chen po la sogs te/ 
195b7(gzungs 'dus): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha che chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin la sogs pa grangs med pa dang yang thabs gcig/ 
195b8(gzungs 'dus): gzhan yang 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po lha'i sras mo gzhon nu nyid la sogs te/ lha'i sras mo grangs med pa dang yang thabs gcig/ gzhan yang na mkha' la gnas pI lha grangs med pa dang / chu dang
195'a1(gzungs 'dus): dang chu bo'i lha dang / chu klung gi lha dang / rtswa dang sman gyi lha dang shing gi lha dang / khyim gyi lha dang chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang rlung gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / gnas dang gzhas med
195'a2(gzungs 'dus): khang gi lha la sogs te/ gangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang so so nas 'dus shing lhags par gyur te/ de nas byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi
195'a3(gzungs 'dus): dbang po de'i 'khor mang po de'i nang du 'dus nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi kha dog du ma snang ba'i 'od du byin gyis rlabs te/ 
195'a4(gzungs 'dus): lha dang klu la sogs pa'i pho brang dang / mtsho dang chu klung chen po dang / ri rab dang / khor yug dang ri nag po la sogs te tha~Md kyang shin du g.yo bar byas/ nyi zla dang skar ma dang // me la sogs pa'i
195'a5(gzungs 'dus): 'od kyang zil gyis mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub ses dpa' gzungs kyi rgyal po nga mtshar rmad du gyur pa// sngon ma byung ba'i las de mthong nas stan las langs te thal mo sbyar
195'a6(gzungs 'dus): btud nas// 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi ltas 'di su yis mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la dri ba'i phyir tshig su bcad de gsol po// su zhig deng 'dir sangs rgyas na/ 'di ltar 'od tshon phyogs
195'a7(gzungs 'dus): btang bas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams 'di dang / stong gsum 'jig rten gser du snang // su zhig ding 'dir mthu brnyes na// ngo mtshar mthu chen 'od btang bas// mtha' yas zhing kun
195'a8(gzungs 'dus): g.yo mdzad de/ lha klu'i gnas dag mi bder byas// rgyu rkyen 'di dag su yi mthu// 'khor gyis mi dpogs the tsom can/ rdzu 'phrul 'di dag ci'i sbed// bco ldan thugs rjes bshad du gas
195'b1(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub ses dpa' gzungs kyi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar 'khor 'di'i nang nas/ byang chub seMs dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'phags pa
195'b2(gzungs 'dus): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba de sngon skal pa grangs med pa nas/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa shin du sgrags
195'b3(gzungs 'dus): te/ ses can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mthus 'od 'di btang bar khyod kyis shes par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas byang chub
195'b4(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po stan las langs te/ gos tshags bcos te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lo gsu thal mo sbar te 'di skad ces gsol to// 
195'b5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags mchis te/ seMs can thas cad la phan pa dang bde ba thob pa dang / nad thams cad bsal ba dang / tshe ring por 'gyur ba dang / 
195'b6(gzungs 'dus): phyug cing 'byor pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i las zas cad gzhom pa dang / sgrib pa thas cad bsal ba dang / bsod nams dang rnam par dkar ba'i chos rnaMs thas cad spel ba dang / 
195'b7(gzungs 'dus): sa bon zad phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad bskyab pa dang / 'dod pa dang re ba yongasu bskang ba'i phyir bshad par 'tshal ba dang / bco ldan 'das thugs rje can gyis
195'b8(gzungs 'dus): gsan du gsol// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod snying rje chen pos ses can rnaMs la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab
196a1(gzungs 'dus): gyis myur du smros shig dang / nga dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rje su yid rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
196a2(gzungs 'dus): kyi dbang pos sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa na/ bco ldan 'das 'od stong dbang po zhi bar gnas zhes bya ba
196a3(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten du byung ste/ bco ldan 'das de bdag dang ses can tha da la thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ shin du rgyas pa thugs rje chen po thogs pa med gzungs 'di bshad de/ gser gyi kha
196a4(gzungs 'dus): dog can gyi phyag gis spyi bor phyugs nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// ngan pa'i ses can thos cad la phan pa/ dang bde ba'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di
196a5(gzungs 'dus): bzung ces bka' stsal to/ bdag de'i tshe na sa dang po la gnas pa las// sngags kyi tshig 'di lan gcig thos pas sabargyad par 'gyur te/ bdag de'i tshe na
196a6(gzungs 'dus): sems mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnyed pas smon lam 'di skad ces btab po// gal te bdag gis sos can thas cad la phan pa dang / bde ba nus par 'gyur ba zhig na// lus 'di nyid
196a7(gzungs 'dus): las phyag stong spyan stong mngon du phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu// lag pa stong dang mig sdong dang yang lus la ldan par gyur te/ 
196a8(gzungs 'dus): phyogs bcu'i sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis so so nas 'od bting ba'i snang bas lus la reg par byas nas kyang / phyogs
196a9(gzungs 'dus): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa rnamasu// de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa'i tha dad na/ 'khor mang po'i nang du gzungs 'di yang yang du thos pa dang / gus pas
196b1(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin par gyur cing dga' ba dang / mgu ba tshad med pa yang skyes pas// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par 'khor bar 'khor nga'i cha phra mo mas shin du 'das par 'gyur ba tshun chad rtag par
196b2(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin cing 'dod pas/ nam yang 'tshad mi brjed par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyi tshig 'di 'dzin pa'i tshig gi dbang gis skye ba thas cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar pad mo las
196b3(gzungs 'dus): skye zhing ma'i mngal gyis ma gos par gyur to// gang yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 'don cing 'dzin pa
196b4(gzungs 'dus): 'dod pas/ dang por sos can thad la snying rje bskyed cing smon lam 'di skad ces btab po// phyag 'tshal spyan ras/ gzigs dbang thugs rje che/ bdag gis
196b5(gzungs 'dus): rnams myur du dog par shog/ byag/ 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis myur du ye shes ming+ga/ ni thob par shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras
196b6(gzungs 'dus): gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis sems can myur du sgrol bar shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gi thabs mkhas myur du thob par shog/ 
196b7(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis shes rab myur du grub sgrol shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis sdug bsngal
196b8(gzungs 'dus): mtsho las thar bar shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje tshe// bdag gis myur du ngang tshul lam rdzogs shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs
196b9(gzungs 'dus): che/ bdag gis myur du 'dus med mkhar phyin shog/ phyag 'tshal spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che// bdag gis myur du chos nyid lus thob shog/ gal te ral gyi'i
197a1(gzungs 'dus): 6/ ri de rang bzhin nyil bar shog/ gal te chu tshan me ma mur// chu tshan me ma mur de rang zhi shog/ gal te sems dmyal bdag song na// sems dmyal gnas de med par shog/ gal te
197a2(gzungs 'dus): bdag lus yid btags gyur// yi dgas yid las 'dren par shog// gal te lha ma yin du gyur// gnod sems rang gis 'dul bar shog/ gal te bdag nyid byon song 'gyur// shes
197a3(gzungs 'dus): rab chen po thob par shog/ smon lam de skad ces btab pa dang // sems rtse gcig tu mtshan nyid lnga byed pa dang / bdag gi sten pa de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyang mngon
197a4(gzungs 'dus): dadu yid la bsams te/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di lan grangs lnga bton na/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i sdig to mi dge ba'i las rnams gsal bar 'gyur ro// 
197a5(gzungs 'dus): yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang yang lnga dang mi rnams kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin// mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i de
197a6(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rkyang ste// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'dod pa dang der skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ gang yang
197a7(gzungs 'dus): thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin pa ngan song rgyud gsum du ltung bar gyur na/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shig/ thugs rje chen po'i gzung sngags
197a8(gzungs 'dus): 'di 'don pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu ma skyes na/ gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgya shig/ gzungs sngags 'di 'don pa des ti nge 'dzin dang spobs pa tshad med par ma gyur
197b1(gzungs 'dus): na// gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shig/ thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di 'don pa dang / 'dzin pas da ltar rdza gnas pa'i tshe 'di nyid 'dod pa thas cad ma grub na// / 
197b2(gzungs 'dus): 'di thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don pa dang / 'dzin pas da ltar gnas tshe 'di nyid 'dod pa thams cad ma grub pa ni/ 'di thugs rje chen po'i gzungs sngags zhes mi bgyi'o// de
197b3(gzungs 'dus): yang gang mi dge ba rnas dang / bsam pa gcig tu mi byed rnams ni gam rtogs// gang bud med la la zhig bud med kyi lus kyis ni skyo zhing por gyur par 'dod pas/ thugs rje
197b4(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di dag gi tshig 'di 'don cing 'dzin pa de'i lus su ma gyur na/ bdag mngon par sangs ma rgya shig/ de yang the tsom du gyur pa'i tshig/ sems kyis ni ma yin// 
197b5(gzungs 'dus): gang yang sres can la la zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang / bkor la chud gson pa ni/ sangs rgyas stong 'jig rten du byon pa la 'gyod cing 'thol bas tshangs par mi 'gyur// thugs
197b6(gzungs 'dus): rje chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di 'don pos sel bar 'gyuraro// yang dge 'dun gyi zhal zas dang bkor nor chud gson pa ni phyogasu ston pa rnams mngon du byas te/ gzung sngags 'di
197b7(gzungs 'dus): 'don na phyogs bcu'i ston pa rnams byon cing mngon du ston to// mi bde ba dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang b.re 'gyuraro/ mi dge ba bcu dang / 'tshams med pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / 
197b8(gzungs 'dus): gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sdom pa nyams pa dang / mchod rten 'jig pa dang / dge 'dun gyi zhal zas rku ba dang / tshangs par spyod pa nyams pa la sogs te/ sdig pa mi dge
198a1(gzungs 'dus): pa'i las rnams sel bar 'gyur na/ gzungs 'di la the tsom skye ba ma rtogs te/ des kha na ma tho ba'i las chung ngu yang sel bar mi 'gyur na/ las lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'di
198a2(gzungs 'dus): 'don pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon du ma gsal kyang // bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi nye ba'i rgyur yang 'gyur/ yang 'di skad ces gsol to// gang yang thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di
198a3(gzungs 'dus): lha dang mi rnams ni dge bar skye ba rnam pa bcwo lnga thob ste/ gshis ngan ma rnam pa bcwo lnga thob par mi 'gyur/ de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ltogs pas nyon mongs te mchi bar mi 'gyur ba
198a4(gzungs 'dus): dang / rdeg cing nan gyis mnan pa dang / mtshon chas mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dag lag tu mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / g.yul nang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / stag dang spyang khyi dang / gcan
198a5(gzungs 'dus): gzan ma rungs pa'i khar mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sbrul dang sdig pa'i nang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / me dang chu'i nang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dug gis mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 
198a6(gzungs 'dus): srin bu gdug pas mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyo zhing dran pa nyams te mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ri dang ngam 'brog dang / shing las ga yang du lhung zhing mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byed sdems
198a7(gzungs 'dus): kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'gre gdon ma rungs pas glags rnyed cing mchi bar rimi 'gyur ba dang / nad ngan gyis btab cing mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin par mchi ba la sogs te/ 
198a8(gzungs 'dus): gshis ngan bcwo lnga po de dag gis mchi bar mi 'gyuraro/ dge bar skye ba rnam pa bcwo lnga thob yang 'di lta ste/ skye ba thas cad du rgyal po dge ba dang phrad pa dang / yul dge bar skye ba dang / 
198b1(gzungs 'dus): dus bzang po dang phrad pa dang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / rtag tu lus kyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang / rtag par chos la dga' ba dang / sdom pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba
198b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / gnyen dang 'dum par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu mtsho ba'i yo byad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu mis bkur zhing gus par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu nor bu rin po che mis mi 'phrog pa dang
198b3(gzungs 'dus): yid la bsam pa grub pa dang // / ku tra d+ha ra ya swA hA/ d+ha ya ra swA hA/ tsakra a yu d+ha ra ya swA hA// ma hA tsa kra a yu d+ha ya swA hA/ sang kA ba d+ha nir bo d+ha na ya swA hA/ ba ma skan d+hi da
198b4(gzungs 'dus): sha s+thi ta kriShA a tsa na ya swA hA/ ba pa ha s+thA byA kra tsarma ni ba sa na ya swA hA// lo ki sha ra ya swA hA/ ma hA yo g+hi shA rA yA swA hA/ sarbA sid d+ha sha rA yA swa hA/ sid d+he yai ki shA rA yA sA hA/ 
198b5(gzungs 'dus): rak+Sha rakA mi/ na mo b+ha ga wa tai/ ar+ya pa lau ki ti shwa rA yA/ b+ho ti sAd tA yA/ ma hA swe tA yA/ ma hA ka ru ni kA yA/ sid d+han du ma man tra pa dI ni sA hA// / byang chub sems dpa'
198b6(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sa chen po 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha'i me tog rin po che yang char bzhin du 'bab// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
198b7(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyang rje su yid rang ba mdzad// lha'i bdud dang mu stegs mang po ni 'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ 'khor mang po de dag kyang / la las ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ 
198b8(gzungs 'dus): la las ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// la las ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// la las ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// kha cig ni sa dang po dang / gnyis pa dang // 
199a1(gzungs 'dus): gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / sa bcu pa'i bar du thob par gyur te/ sems can grangs med pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po stan
199a2(gzungs 'dus): las langs te/ dri gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la skyes bu chen po dag go zhes smras te/ bdag sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin
199a3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa grangs med pa las chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzungs rnam pa sna tshogs mang du yang thos na/ 'di lta bu'i thugs rje chen po thogs pa med pa'i gzungs
199a4(gzungs 'dus): kyi tshig 'di yang mang du ma thos na/ skyes bu chen po khyod kyis gzungs 'di'i mtshan nyid bdag dang / 'khor mang po la bshad de thos par smon to// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
199a5(gzungs 'dus): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'di skad ces smraso/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po khyod thabs la mkhas pas/ ses can thas cad la phan pa'i phyir/ dri ba shin du legs par nyon dang / 
199a6(gzungs 'dus): khyod la mdo tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i sems dang / ma chags pa dang stong pa nyid la
199a7(gzungs 'dus): dmigs pa'i sems dang / gus pa'i sems dang / dam pa'i sems dang / ma 'dres pa'i sems dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa de dag ni sems kyi mtshan
199a8(gzungs 'dus): nyid ces bya'o// khyod kyis de la gnas shing sgrub par bya'o// tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos smras pa/ bdag dang 'khor phal po che rnaMs kyis/ bzod gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'tshal te/ de mnos
199b1(gzungs 'dus): shing 'dzin te/ mi bskyud par 'tshalo// byang chub seMs dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'di skad ces smra so// gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gzungs 'di
199b2(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin cing klog par 'dod pas/ sems can thas cad sgral bar byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed de/ lus sdom pa la gnas shing ses can tha da la btang snyoms kyi sem su byas nas/ 
199b3(gzungs 'dus): gos gtsang ma gos la gnas khang na rtag par 'dug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / me tog dang / zhal zas de dag la sogs pas mchod cing // gzhan
199b4(gzungs 'dus): mi g.yeng bar sems rtse gcig tu byas te/ sngags 'di rgyun ma chad par bzlas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i 'od dang / lha mang po dang
199b5(gzungs 'dus): thabs gcig byon cing de la mngon par rtags ston to// ngas kyang de la spyan stong gis gzigs pa dang / phyag stong gis bsrung ba mdzad de/ ji snyed 'jig rten gyi chos dang / gtsug lag dang
199b6(gzungs 'dus): bram ze dang mu stegs kyi chos smras pa dang / rig pa la sogs pa thad chud cing 'dzin par mdzad do// gzhan yang gzungs 'dzin pa dang / klog pas 'jig rten gyi don dang / nad brgyad khri
199b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhi stong thas cad med par mdzad do// gzhan yang lha 'dre thad dang / lha'i bdud la sogs te mu stegs can thams cad kyang 'dul zhing tshar gcod par 'gyur/ gangs kyi ri dang dgon pa
199b8(gzungs 'dus): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la 'dre gdon mang po mche zhing sems 'khrugs pas mi bde bar gyur na/ gzungs 'di lan gcig glegs pas 'dre gdon de dag bcings par 'gyur/ gang la
200a1(gzungs 'dus): zhig sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skye zhing 'dod pa de la lha dang / klu dang / gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas de la rtag tu 'bral zhing bsrung ba ni mig gi 'bras bu dang / 
200a2(gzungs 'dus): ba'i dbang po bzhin du skyobs shig par bka' stsal pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de gsungs pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag po dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang sle brtsegs lcags kyu can/ 
200a3(gzungs 'dus): mthu chen shang ka ra sde brgyad dang / gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar sgo// / mthu'o che dang dbang phyug chen po dang / kum bai ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dang / gzungs 'dzin de la rtag
200a4(gzungs 'dus): tu bsrung bar sgo// / ngas ni nor 'dzin dag dang chu lha dang / dge rgyas dang ni ba ri dzi ta dang / gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo// sra ba dang ni lto 'phye chen po dang / kun lan da dang
200a5(gzungs 'dus): ngas ni gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo// ngas ni phyi ba la kwa'i bdag po dang / pa lan byi ta sa ha la dag kyang / gzungs de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo// tshangs pa dang ni bdud dang
200a6(gzungs 'dus): sa b+ha ra/ ngas ni gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo/ brgya byin bdag po sum bcu rtsa gsum lha/ lha mo chen po dpal chen spobs chen yang / gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu
200a7(gzungs 'dus): bsrung bar bsgo// ngas ni rgyal po chen po gnas bsrung dang / ma mo wA la sogs pa mthu chen rnams dang / gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo/ ngas ni rgyal po chen po 'bagra
200a8(gzungs 'dus): skye dang / rgyal chen mig mi bzung dang rnam thos bus// gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo/ gser gyi mdog can cha bya'i rgyal po dang / sde bdag nyi shu rtsa brgyad drang srong rnas/ 
200b1(gzungs 'dus): gzungs 'dzin rtag tu bsrung bar ngas kyang bsgo// gzhan yang dus ni nor bu bzang po dang / sde bdag sa dz+ri ka dang ba stu tsa/ gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo// ngas ni dga' bo
200b2(gzungs 'dus): dang ni nye dga' dang / klu bdag e la ba tra sa ga ra/ gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsko// ngas ni lha dang ma yin dang dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / gzungs
200b3(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo/ ngas ni me dang chu dang klog gi lha/ grub bum bdag po sha za dag kyang ni// gzungs 'dzin de la rtag tu bsrung bar bsgo// lha dang klu'i bdag po ma
200b4(gzungs 'dus): mo'i tshogs kyi dge ba'i lha de dag kyang 'khor lnga brgya dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang bcas te thugs rje chen po'i gzung sngags 'dzin cing / klog pa de la rtag tu 'brang zhing
200b5(gzungs 'dus): bsrung bar byed do// gang zag de ringa'am dgon pa zhig na gnas shing gnyid kyis log na yang lha de dag re can gyis bsrung zhing bgegs dang bar chad med par byed do// gang zag
200b6(gzungs 'dus): de la nyam nga bar 'brog 'chol bar 'gyur na/ gzungs 'di klags pas lha dang klu rnams sprul cing lam ston par 'gyur/ de brgya la ri dang nags dang / 'brog dgon par gan ti/ 
200b7(gzungs 'dus): chu dang mes phongs par gyur na/ de bsrung ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po sa dang / chu dang mar sprul te 'byin to// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
200b8(gzungs 'dus): kyi gzungs 'di 'dzin cing / klog pa'i bar chad rnam par sbyong ba'i legs pa'i tshig su bcad de smras pa/ gang zhig ri dang 'brog dang dgon pa la/ stag dang sbyang khyi rdum po// 
201a1(gzungs 'dus): rnams/ sbrul dang 'dre gdon sna tshogs phrad gyur na// gzungs sngags 'di thos gnod par mi nuso// gang zhig chu bo gtsang po'i rgya mtshor bzhugs// gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin
201a2(gzungs 'dus): ma rungs pa// gnod pa srin po nya dang rus sbrul dag/ gzungs sngags 'di thos so sor 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang zhig yul khrod dag yis bskor ba yang / gang yang rkun pos nor dag chog
201a3(gzungs 'dus): gyur na/ rtse gcig du klags thugs rje chen po'i gzugs// de nyid snying rje'i sems kyis btong bar 'gyur// gang yang rgyal po'i khrims kyis bzung ba dang // lcags sgrogs khong sprul
201a4(gzungs 'dus): btson rar bcug pa na// rtse gcig tu blags thugs rje chen po'i gzungs// rgyal po'i thugs kyis de yang gtong bar 'gyur/ gang yang byams sdems dug ma'i khyim du zhugs/ kha zas
201a5(gzungs 'dus): dug can dag gis gsod par sems// rtse gcig tu blags thugs rje chen po'i gzungs// dug de zil dngar khu ba nyid du gyur/ bud med sbrum ma gang zhig bu btsa'i tshe/ gi don gyis bgegs
201a6(gzungs 'dus): byas sdug bsngal mi bzod na/ rtse gcig tu blugs thugs rje chen po'i gzungs// gdon de kun bsal bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ klu dang gnod sbyin gdug pa'i dbugs gtong zhing / tsha ba'i nad
201a7(gzungs 'dus): kyis blugs te shing nyen/ rtse gcig tu thags thugs chen po'i gzungs/ nad dang rims kun sel te tshe ring 'gyur// klu dang gnod sbyin gyis rtses skrag pa dang / 
201a8(gzungs 'dus): shu ba mi bzad rnag dang khrag 'dzag na/ rtse gcig tu blags thugs rje chen po'i gzungs// lan gsum skus pas skrangs po zhi 'a gyur// gang zhig mi bde ngan sems skye ba yis// byad snga mas
201b1(gzungs 'dus): dag gis gnon par byed gyur na// rtse gcig tu blags thugs rje chen po'i gzungs// byang sems de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du// sems can ma rungs dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe// 'dod pa'i mi
201b2(gzungs 'dus): mched bsam pa rmongs gyur te/ khyo dang chung ma songs te gzhan tshol zhing / nyin mtshan mi gtong bar sems pa dag/ thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'di klog nus na/ 'dod pa'i me zhi logs
201b3(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sems med 'gyur/ gzungs sngags 'di gnyis legs pa ni de la ngas rgyas par bshad pas rdzogs par mi 'gyu ro// gzungs 'di sngar lan lnga zhig bzlas te mtshon sna lnga'i
201b4(gzungs 'dus): skud pa 'dud pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bcings te/ sngags lan re bzlas shing mgul du btag so// gzungs 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo gang ga'i bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus
201b5(gzungs 'dus): gsungs te/ gang rnal 'byor pa rnams pha rol du phyin pa drug rdzogs par myur du gyur pa// byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa myur du bskyed par bya ba dang / gang nyan thos pa'i gang zag 'bras
201b6(gzungs 'dus): bu mngon du ma grub pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha dang drang srong rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems mo bskyed pa myur du bskyed pa dang / gang yang
201b7(gzungs 'dus): sems can theg pa chen por dad pa'i dbang po ma rnyed pa// theg pa chen po chos kyi myu gu dang / sa bon bskyed pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di'i byin brlabs dang / nga'i thabs dang snying rje'i
201b8(gzungs 'dus): mthus de dag gis dgongs pa yongasu grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun nag thibs po'i gnas dang / ngan song rgyud gsum
202a1(gzungs 'dus): sems can gyis gzungs 'di thos na/ de dag sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyuraro/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
202a2(gzungs 'dus): sar 'bar ba rnams kyang der gnas par 'gyur zhing / mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po rdzogs par 'gyuraro/ gang nyan pa rnams gzungs 'di rna lam du lan cig zos
202a3(gzungs 'dus): te yi ger bris nas bsgrubs te/ tshul bzhin du gnas na dge slong gi 'bras bu chen po bzhi ched du ma brtsal ba yang thob par 'gyur ro// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
202a4(gzungs 'dus): khams na brgya mtsho dang tshe 'o bzhi la sogs pa yang khol zhing lud par nus/ ri dang ri rab dang lcags ri khor yug la sogs pa yang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du gshig par yang nas/ 
202a5(gzungs 'dus): de dag na gnas pa'i sems can yang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur/ gang sems can da ltar gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ 'dod pa sgrub pas/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar/ 
202a6(gzungs 'dus): du sdom pa bsrungs shig za gcig par byas la gzungs 'di klags na/ 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur/ ji snyed 'khor ba'i mtha' nas mtha'i bar du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bsags
202a7(gzungs 'dus): pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ji snyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / rgyal
202a8(gzungs 'dus): po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang dgongs shing gzigs par 'gyur/ gang gzungs 'di 'don pa'i lha dang mi rnams mtsho dang gtsang
202b1(gzungs 'dus): po la sogs par khrus byas nas// chu de la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus la chu de reg na/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams byang bar 'gyur te yongasu dag pa'i zhing kham su pad ma/ 
202b2(gzungs 'dus): la rdzus te skye zhing // mngal dang shu ba dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skye bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag nyid klog pa dang / 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gzungs 'di 'don cing 'chad de
202b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ba'i lus dang / skra dang spu dang lus la rlung gis bus te/ rlung des sems can gzhan la reg na/ de'i lus kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar gyur te/ ngan song gsum du mi ltung zhing
202b4(gzungs 'dus): rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa rnas kyis sbyin sngar skye bar 'gyur bas// gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// gang gzungs 'di 'don
202b5(gzungs 'dus): pa'i khams ji snyed dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshig rnam pa thams cad lha dang / bdud dang mu stegs dang / klu dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi sgra nyid thos par
202b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang / snying rje che ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro/ gzungs 'di 'don pa'i gang zag de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du lta ste/ 
202b7(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa chu'o gang ga'i bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir ro/ gang zag de 'od can gyi lus su lta ste/ ji snyed gzungs kyi tshig de bzhin gshes
202b8(gzungs 'dus): ba thams cad kyi 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de byams pa dang snying rje'i mdzod du lta ste gzungs 'dis sems can thams cad la skyob pa'i phyir ro// gang
203a1(gzungs 'dus): zag de dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod du lta ste/ ji snyed gzungs kyi tshig rnams bsdud pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mdzod du lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong // 
203a2(gzungs 'dus): rtag par mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de na mkha'i mdzod du lta ste/ rtag pa'i bar stong pa'i ye shes sems can rnams la lta ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du lta/ 
203a3(gzungs 'dus): ste/ lha dang klu dang / dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par bsrung ba'i phyir ro/ gang zag de 'phrul gyi mdzod du lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing rnamasu 'gro ba la dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bas
203a4(gzungs 'dus): na gang zag de'i yon tan sngags pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// gang yang rigs kyi bu la la zhig 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing rtag par mi mchi ba'i sman tshol bar 'dod pas gang
203a5(gzungs 'dus): dben pa'i gan su 'dug ste/ 'tshams bcad nas gos dang chu dang kha zas dang sman dang / sngon rnams sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis rtag tu bsngags shing spyod na tshe ring por 'gyur ro// gzhan
203a6(gzungs 'dus): yang tshul bzhin du 'tshams bcad de/ cho ga bzhin du 'dzin cing 'don na thams cad kyang grub par 'gyuraro// de la 'tshams gcod pa'i cho ga ni ral gri la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa cig
203a7(gzungs 'dus): tu btab ste sa la bris na 'tshams bcad pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa cig tu bsngags te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na 'tshams bcad par 'gyuraro/ yang na yungs
203a8(gzungs 'dus): dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te gtor na// 'tshams bcad par 'gyuraro// yang na yid kyis dmigs pa rnams 'tshamasu 'gyuraro/ yang na thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
203b1(gzungs 'dus): te bcad na 'tsham su 'gyur ro// yang na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir bskor bas 'tshamasu 'gyur ro// gang yang gzungs 'di tshul bzhin du 'dzin cing
203b2(gzungs 'dus): 'don na/ dgos pa de 'bras bu can du 'gyur ro/ gzungs sngags 'di'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang / bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba'i las rnams byang bar 'gyur na/ rtag par
203b3(gzungs 'dus): 'dzin cing klog pa lta ci smos/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag gis ni// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad
203b4(gzungs 'dus): med pa bskyed par bya'o// gang zag 'ga' zhig sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyis las 'don pa' bsam pas// gzungs 'di tshul bzhin du 'dzin na/ gang zag de snying rje
203b5(gzungs 'dus): chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyasu grub par mi dka' 'o// gzungs 'don pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du grags par byas na/ bla na med pa'i byang
203b6(gzungs 'dus): chub kyi rgyur gyur pas de dag gi bsod nams tshad med grangs med de/ brjod kyis mi lang ngo // gang yang sems rtse gcig tu sdom pa 'dzin cing za cig pa byas te/ bdag dang
203b7(gzungs 'dus): sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad bshags te/ gzungs 'di 'don pa'i sgra rgyun ma chad par byas na/ tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu gauzhi mngon du 'gyuraro// de
203b8(gzungs 'dus): la dbang po can thams cad dang / shes rab dang ldan pa zhig na sa bcu pa'i gnas rnams kyang thob par mi dga' na/ 'jig rten gyi dgos pa dang sgrub pa phran tshegs 'bras
204a1(gzungs 'dus): bu can du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag sgrub pa yang byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthu chen po dang / gzungs
204a2(gzungs 'dus): 'di'i byin gyis brlabs chen pos grub par 'gyur ro// bco ldan 'das kyis dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ gang yang yul phyogasu nad dang / mu ge la sogs pa byung de tshe/ 
204a3(gzungs 'dus): yul de'i rgyal srid chos bzhin du 'dzin cing 'gro ba mang po skams las mi gcod/ nyes pa byung ba rnams klod cing ba dang ste/ nyin bdun mtshan bdun du thugs rje chen po'i
204a4(gzungs 'dus): gzungs 'di 'bad pa dang bcas pas 'dzin cing 'don na/ yul de'i nad dang / mu ge la sogs pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur la/ lo legs shing 'gro ba mang po
204a5(gzungs 'dus): skyid par 'gyuraro/ gzhan yang phas kyi dgras rtag tu mche ba dang / blon po log par sems pa dang / rims nad rlungs pa dang / nyi zla rgyu ba'i dus 'khrul cing drang dro ma smos
204a6(gzungs 'dus): baM dang / de lta bu'i bgegs kyis 'gro ba mang po mi bde bar gyur pa'i tshe/ thugs rje chen po'i phyag stong spyan stong gi sku'i zhal de phyogasu ston la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
204a7(gzungs 'dus): dang / ba dan dang / bdugs dang / me tog dang / zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mchod cing / rgyal po de nyid mtshan bdun dun du gsung rab dam pa'i chos gzungs 'di 'bad pa
204a8(gzungs 'dus): dang bcas pas/ 'dzin cing 'don na/ rgyal po pha rol po'i dpung yang mod la so so'i yul bsrung zhing 'dum pa dang / byams pa'i sems kyis lta zhing ldog par 'gyur/ sra
204b1(gzungs 'dus): dang / blun po dang / btsun mo dang / zla rnams kyang sri zhu che zhing snying nye ba la gus par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis yul bsrung zhing char chu dus su 'bebs
204b2(gzungs 'dus): pas lo thog rgyas shing phyogasu skyid par 'gyu ro// gzhan yang nad dang / ltas dran pa byung ba dang / bdud dang lha 'dres khyim dkrug cing / mi ma rungs kha kA rare skur pa 'debs
204b3(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / khyim de'i phyi nang mi che chung mi 'dum par gyur na/ thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
204b4(gzungs 'dus): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rtse gcig tu dmigs shing / gzungs 'di tshang bar bzlas na/ nyes pa lhag ma rnams med par 'gyur ro// de nas dga' bos sangs rgyas la 'di skad
204b5(gzungs 'dus): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i mtshan ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'o la bka' stsal pa/ 
204b6(gzungs 'dus): gzungs sngags 'di'i ming rnam grangs mang po yod de/ shin du rgyas pa chen po zhes kyang bya// thugs rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya/ sdug bsngal skyob pa'i gzungs
204b7(gzungs 'dus): zhes kyang bya/ che rnam par sring ba zhes kyang bya// ngan song rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes bya bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong gzungs zhes kyang bya/ re ba kun
204b8(gzungs 'dus): skong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya/ 'dod pa dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya/ sa bla mar myur du 'bar ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya/ khyod kyis de ltar bzung shig/ 
205a1(gzungs 'dus): yang dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi na/ gzungs 'di smra ba la// 
205a2(gzungs 'dus): spobs shing mkhas par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes kyang
205a3(gzungs 'dus): bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya/ phyag stong spyan stong zhes kyang bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'di'i mthu dang / 
205a4(gzungs 'dus): byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med nas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mtshan yang dag pa'i chos snang ba zhi
205a5(gzungs 'dus): bya ba de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ sems can mang po la sman par gyur to/ bde ba'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' byed pa/ 
205a6(gzungs 'dus): yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang lha dang klu dang / 'khor phal po che khyod kyis kyang the tsom spongs la gus par ma chod cig
205a7(gzungs 'dus): mtshan nas brjod de rim go byas na/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob cing / sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyuraro/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sangs// 
205a8(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ yang dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang yang nor bu rin po che dang / long spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'byor par 'dod na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
205b1(gzungs 'dus): che snams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ mi bde ba sna tshogs kyis rtses nas bde bar 'dod na/ phyag zhags pa can la mchod do// nad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtses na// rin po che'i
205b2(gzungs 'dus): lhung bzed rnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ 'dre gdon rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar 'dod na/ bshan rin po che snams pa'i phyag la mchod do// gang yang bdud 'dul bar 'dod
205b3(gzungs 'dus): na/ rdo rje snams pa'i phyag la mchod do// phas kyi dag dang rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na/ tri shul bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ 'jigs shing bgra tsha ba'i gan
205b4(gzungs 'dus): las thar bar 'dod na/ skyob pa'i phyag la mchod do/ mig ling rtog gis khyebs shing 'od mi gsal na/ me shel snrums pa'i phyag la mchod do/ tsha ba'i nad kyis gdungs/ 
205b5(gzungs 'dus): te bsil bar 'dod na/ chu shel snams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ thabs dang blon bral zhing sgrub par 'dod na/ gzhu rin po che bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ dge ba'i
205b6(gzungs 'dus): bshes gnyen dag dang myur du phrad par 'dod na/ mda' rin po che bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod/ lus la nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mtsho na/ lcug ma yal ga snam+ba pI phyag
205b7(gzungs 'dus): la mchod do/ lus bgegs dang bar chad las thar bar 'dod na/ bsil ya ba dkar po snams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ gnyen dang 'khor gyi phyir ni bum pa bsnams pa'i
205b8(gzungs 'dus): phyag la mchod do/ stag dang spyang khyi dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa spong na/ bu bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ gnas dang dus thams cad rgyal po'i bgegs la thar
206a1(gzungs 'dus): par 'dod na/ dgra rta bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ phu nu dang bran g.yog gi phyir ni shel gyi gdu bu bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ bsod nams rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
206a2(gzungs 'dus): phyir ni pad ma dkar po bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnam dag tu skye bar 'dod na/ pad ma sngon po snams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ shes rab chen po dag dang
206a3(gzungs 'dus): ldan par 'dod na/ me long rin po che bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na/ pad mo snams pa'i phyag la
206a4(gzungs 'dus): mchod do/ sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na/ rin po che za ma tog bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ gang rigs 'dzin sgrub par 'dod na/ sprin tshon sna lnga pa bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod/ 
206a5(gzungs 'dus): tshangs par skye bar 'dod na/ ril ba bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ lha'i pho brang dag tu skye bar 'dod na/ pad me le ba rgan bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ phyogs gzhan
206a6(gzungs 'dus): gyi dgra dang rgol ba las thar bar 'dod na/ rin po che'i gdu bu snams bI phyag la mchod do/ dge ba'i lha dang lha phran thams cad dgug par 'dod na/ rin po che'i dang bsnams
206a7(gzungs 'dus): pa'i phyag la mchod do/ lha 'dre thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na/ thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gis byug par 'dod na/ 
206a8(gzungs 'dus): brang phreng 'dzin pa'i phyag la mchod do/ tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa sgrub par 'dod na/ rin po che dril bu bsdams pa'i phyag la mchod do// tshig gi spobs pa dang ldan pa 'dod na/ 
206b1(gzungs 'dus): rin chen phyag rgya bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do// dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams kyis bsrung bar 'dod na// lcags kyu bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do// sems can la snying rje skyed
206b2(gzungs 'dus): par 'dod na/ mkhar sil snams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ sems can thams cad kyis gus shing rim gro bya bar 'dod na/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag la mchod do/ skye ba thas cad/ 
206b3(gzungs 'dus): du de bzhin gshegs pa las mi 'phang bar 'dod na/ sangs rgyas bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ gang dang gang du skye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal med khang snams
206b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i phyag la mchod do/ mang du thos shing shes rab che bar 'dod na/ rin po che'i gle gos bam snams pa'i phyag la mchod do// da ltar lus 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi skur gyur
206b5(gzungs 'dus): gyi bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'dod na/ mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
206b6(gzungs 'dus): byugs shing lung bstan par 'dod na/ sangs rgyas spyi bo la bsnams pa'i phyag la mchod do/ lo thog dang shing thog grub par 'dod na/ dgun 'brum bsnams pa'i phyag la
206b7(gzungs 'dus): mchod do// de la sogs te ci dang ci 'dod na de dang de spyir ba rnam pa stong mnga' ba las mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin/ yang dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang khyod rnam par dag
206b8(gzungs 'dus): ba'i bsam pas gzungs 'dzin cing / 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyun mi mchad par 'tshang rgya bar ston na/ khams gsum gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa rnams gzungs
207a1(gzungs 'dus): 'di bton na mi 'tshe mi srid de/ gzungs 'di shing skam po la bdab na/ yal grwa dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pas zin pa
