207a2(gzungs 'dus): sems can gyi nad sos pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ mi mtsho ba'i lus dang skabs med do// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab brjod
207a3(gzungs 'dus): kyis mi long ngo // sngon 'das pa'i yun ring po'i dus na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas ni gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur na/ mngon du mthong ba lta ci smos/ lha dang mi
207a4(gzungs 'dus): rnams dang / mi ma yin pa dang / klu la sogs te 'khor mang po khyod kyis gzungs 'di'i yon tan bsngags pa la rje su yid rang bya'o// gang dag gzungs 'di la skur ba ni
207a5(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dgu la skur ba nyid du 'gyur ro/ gang gzungs 'di la the tsom za zhing mos pa mi skye bo'i gang zag de ni don chen po stor ba ste// 
207a6(gzungs 'dus): skal pa bye ba brgya stong du mar rgyun du ngon par 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med do/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun mthong zhing thos pa'i dus med do/ byang chub ses dpa'/ 
207a7(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' chen po dag dang / gsang ba ba'i rdo rje 'dzin dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa 'khor mang
207a8(gzungs 'dus): po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di bsngags pa thos te/ blta zhing mngon du spyod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i
207b1(gzungs 'dus): gzungs 'di 'dzin pa rnams yongasu bsrungs pa'i phyir sngags 'di gsungaso// // na mo b+hud d+ha ya/ kur be na mo d+harmA ya/ tA yi ne/ na mo sang ga ya ma ha te/ tri b+h+yo bI sa
207b2(gzungs 'dus): tA ta na na ma// // sngags 'di klags pas bdud dang bgegs thams cad gsal te/ sdig pa thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro/ bsngags 'di lan klags shing
207b3(gzungs 'dus): phyag lan re byas pa las de bzhin gshegs pa/ nyan re bzhin du dus gsum du sngags 'di 'don cing sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal na/ ma 'ong ba na lus mtshan dang dpe
207b4(gzungs 'dus): byed bzang po yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i 'od kyis gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'di gsungaso// / 
207b5(gzungs 'dus): sin ti te/ du so da ang nya/ mi de o do ShA/ sin tsa ta pa lai te/ ya mi nya tA/ o to shru ku la te hri maSh+Ta swA hA// // sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas te/ tshon skud bdun la
207b6(gzungs 'dus): sngags shing gang du na ba'i sar bcings par bya'o// sngags 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo gang ga'i bye ma bzhi bcu snyed kyis gsungaso/ dngas kyang rnal
207b7(gzungs 'dus): 'byor pa dag bsrung ba dang / sgrib pa thams cad gsal ba dang nad thams cad bzhil ba dang / dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs pa thas cad rnam par
207b8(gzungs 'dus): spangs pa'i phyir 'di gsungaso// de nas yang bco ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub seMs dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos smras pa'i
208a1(gzungs 'dus): gzungs sngags 'di yang dag par bden pa nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs shing dbab par 'dod na/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngag/ 
208a2(gzungs 'dus): shing bsregs na/ byang chub seMs dpa' de blon par 'gyuraro/ gang byi la'i gdon gyis zin na/ byi la'i mgo rus pa'i thal ba dang / sa gtsang mar bsres te/ 'byim pa la byi la
208a3(gzungs 'dus): gzugs byas te/ phyag steng spyan stong gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ur mong gi dri la bsngags kyis/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags la na re zhing nad pa'i ming nas phyung ste/ lan re re
208a4(gzungs 'dus): gdugs na/ gtan mtsho bar 'gyuraro/ gang dug gis phog po la ga bur dang / gu gul cha snyams ste/ chu gtsang ma bre gang nang du skol la/ sgyogs gang lus pa dang / phyag stong spyan
208a5(gzungs 'dus): stong gi spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te blud na mtsho'o// gang sbrul dang sdig pas zin na/ sgo phye la sngags kyis lan dgu bsngags te/ rma khar skus na mod la sos so// 
208a6(gzungs 'dus): gang pha rol gyis dgrar byed cing gnod pas mtshe ne/ sa gtsang ma 'am bag zan nam/ sgra tshil la pha rol po'i gzugs byas la/ phyag stong spyan stong gi spyan sngar bzhag la/ ur
208a7(gzungs 'dus): mor ba ral gyi la sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ sngags ldan re zhing pha rol po'i ming nas phyung zhing / lan re rngubs la sreg pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ pha rol 'gro
208a8(gzungs 'dus): zhing nam du yang mthun zhing gus par 'gyuraro// dmus long du gyur pa dang / ling tog byung ste/ mi mthong bar gyur na/ a ru ra dang bai ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / 'brum re zhib du bdagra la snang rtsi/ 
208b1(gzungs 'dus): bu pho byung ba'i nu zho dang sbyar te/ phyag stong spyan stong gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar stong rtsa brgyad kyis sngag pas/ zhag bdun gyi bar du mig la skus na/ mig gi 'bras bu gsal zhing 'od
208b2(gzungs 'dus): can du 'gyuraro// sman sbyor ba'i tshe bud med dang khyi la sogs pa mi gtsang ba'i bag bsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod cing sbyar ro// gang mdar bu'i nad kyis btab pa
208b3(gzungs 'dus): la stag gam/ seng ge 'am gcan zan gyi lpags pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sdug te/ nad pa'i lus la bkab na de ma thag tu mtsho'o// snying khar gzer zhing mi dran par gyur na/ ka pa
208b4(gzungs 'dus): lag pa tsam chu skyogs gang gi nang skol te/ phyed tsam du ba dang la ni bdun sngags te lo cig dang mchi bar 'gyur ro// gdon bag tu mgo ba'i nad gang gis btab kyang rung ste/ gu gu la la
208b5(gzungs 'dus): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags te snar yang 'dug/ ri lu bdun yang de bzhin du khong du btang ste/ kha zas ma rtags pa rnas zar mi rung ngo // yang ldong ros dang yungs dkar dang / 
208b6(gzungs 'dus): la na tshwa gru bzhi la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags te nad pa'i drung du sregs na/ gdon de dag lus 'jig cing so sor phye bar 'gyu ro/ gang bzhogs na zhing rkang lag skyod
208b7(gzungs 'dus): mi nus na/ ru rta til mar nang du skol te sngags kyis lani nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags te lus la skus na/ brtan du mtsho bar 'gyur ro// yang mar la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa
208b8(gzungs 'dus): gcig tu sngags te lus la bskus na mtsho'o// gang bu btsa' ba bka' bar gyur na/ til mar la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te/ mo mtshan dang lte ba la skus na/ 
209a1(gzungs 'dus): de ma thag tu 'byung ngo // bud med gang bu mngal du shi bar gyur na/ rtswa a bi ma ri ka srang cig chu skyogs de'i nang du skol te/ sgyogs gang du song ba dang / sngags
209a2(gzungs 'dus): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du bzlas te blud na rang 'byung ngo / bud med sha ma mi 'byung na/ 'di bzhin du byas na 'byung ngo // gang ro langs kyi nad gyis btab ste/ 'chin pa ngogs
209a3(gzungs 'dus): rdul zhing na na/ pog dkar po la sngags kyis la ni nyi shu rtswa gcig tu sngags de byin na/ skyugs te mtsho bar 'gyuraN+DaM gang la la mes tshig na/ ba yi lci be sa la ma ldum
209a4(gzungs 'dus): pa la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa cig bsngags te/ mes tshig pa'i rmi la skyes na/ myur du mtsho bar 'gyur/ gang srin bu khong du bzhugs te nA narta dkar po
209a5(gzungs 'dus): sbyin phul gang la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsngags te blud na srin bu rang 'byung ngo / gang shu chen byung ba la me tog leng se'u'i 'dab ma zhib tu
209a6(gzungs 'dus): brdungs de khu bar btsir la sngags la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te shu ba la bskus na myur du mche'o/ mig sbrang bus zin na zong bu'i rtal ldangs sa la ma lhung ba khu ba rtsir
209a7(gzungs 'dus): te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du sngags te nyal khar mig la skus na mtsho'o/ gang lho mi bde zhing na na/ lan tsha gru bzhi'i rdog bA la nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags kyis de
209a8(gzungs 'dus): bzhin du bsngags te/ skyor chu sgyogs phyed tsam gyi nang du dkrugs te mthungs na mtshe'o// grang mig tshig por gyur na mig tu mig ru dang / ling toge byung na/ sman na
209b1(gzungs 'dus): sha'i lo ma'i khu ba btsir te/ sngags kyis lan bdun bsngags te mnan pa'i khu ba'i nang du dong tse cig skams la sngags kyis lan bdun du bsngags te/ mig tu bskus mtsho'o// 
209b2(gzungs 'dus): yang rtag tu dngangs shing mi bde 'jigs na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sngags te/ sngags la lani re 'dod pa lan re 'dud la mgul du btags
209b3(gzungs 'dus): na/ 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing bsod nams skyes la sdig bla khyad par 'gyuraro/ gang khyim 'khor du nad dang blo bur gyi lngas ngan pa la sdigs pa byung na/ 
209b4(gzungs 'dus): bal po se'u'i shing la ya ma shing byas te mar dang zho dang / sbrang rtsi'i nang / bsngags shing / stong rtsa brgyad du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bsreg pa byas na/ 
209b5(gzungs 'dus): nad dang ltas ngan thams cad med par 'gyuraro// shu dag la lani brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags te/ dpung pa la btags ni/ g.yul du 'thub cing rtsod na/ thams cad
209b6(gzungs 'dus): las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// sha sha'i lo ma 'am/ shing la yam shing byas te/ ba yi mar dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhol sngags shing dus gsum de de sreg la lan sdong rtsa brgyad
209b7(gzungs 'dus): zhag bdun byas na/ sngags mkhan rig pa shes pa skye bar 'gyuraro/ gang gnod sbyin mthu bo che 'dul bar 'dod na/ lung btang la sngags te sA la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur
209b8(gzungs 'dus): bsngags te/ mar dang sbrang rtsir bsngags shing / thugs rje chen po can gyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bsreg par bya'o// sman gyi 'ung srang cig 'ching bum gyi nang du bcug
210a1(gzungs 'dus): ste/ thugs rje chen po can gyi spyan sngar zhog la/ bsngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsngags te/ lus la sku zhing dpral ba la thig le byas na/ lha dang klu dang / 
210a2(gzungs 'dus): lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ gang zhig lcags dang khong sgril du bcug na/ phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad du sngag
210a3(gzungs 'dus): te/ lag pa la skus la lcags dang khong sgril la byugs na/ rang grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyo ba shugs gcig la gcig chu dang me bzhin du gyur te/ mi 'dum
210a4(gzungs 'dus): par gyur na/ mi dum pa la dur pa'i sgo 'am/ mjug ma'i sgrol thugs rje chen po'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad du bsngags te/ lus la
210a5(gzungs 'dus): thogs na/ de bzhin gsang du dam zhim dga' bar 'gyu ro// lo thog dang / shing thog la srin bu zhugs te nA na/ bye ma 'am/ thal ba gtsang ma la
210a6(gzungs 'dus): bsngags kyis stong rtsa brgyad de de bsngags te/ zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na/ srin bu med par 'gyur ro// shing thog la srin bu mi za'o// 'phags pa
210a7(gzungs 'dus): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong du sprul pa/ brgya chen po yongasu rdzogs shing thogs pa med par thugs rje dang ldan pa'i gzungs rdzogs
210a8(gzungs 'dus): s+ho// / bskyed tshal lha gnas lta bu'i gnas chen zur po che 'dir// yon gyi bdag po rgyal mgon gyis mdo mangs bzhengs pa ngo mtshar che legaso// 
211b1(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya pra tid t+ya sa mun ta/ pa ri hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ 
211b2(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni// rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs
211b3(gzungs 'dus): pas bka' bstsal te/ de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong chen po// tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// las kun grub par
211b4(gzungs 'dus): byed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs// rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni dang por bcom ldan sangs rgyas la// gus shing dang
211b5(gzungs 'dus): ba'i sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rten 'brel zab mo'i cho ga bshad// thams cad las dang 'thun par gsungs
211b6(gzungs 'dus): dang po 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa tu 'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur na/ sems can rnams ni khro 'gyur la// las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba
211b7(gzungs 'dus): las kyang ldog/ bden pa 'di yis bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag
211b8(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal/ 
212a1(gzungs 'dus): dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// rgyun du bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// 
212a2(gzungs 'dus): brtul bshugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// sems can gyi sman rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ na mo rad na tra ya yAM/ oM
212a3(gzungs 'dus): ye d+harmA he du pra b+ha wa/ he han te Shon/ ta thA ga to t+ya wa dang te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ e baM b+ha ti ma hA shra maM Na ye swA hA// l-is rnams kun gyi cho ga la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
212a4(gzungs 'dus): brjod// bas ma rgyud rang gi lag mthil la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus spras/ me yi
212a5(gzungs 'dus): khams par sgom/ de ni lha dag rje su dran// da ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan/ rims kyis btab ste na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / 
212a6(gzungs 'dus): mig na de dang / khong na la sogs pa nad rnams la/ tshig su bcad 'di dang snying po 'di// mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/ lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ dbyung
212a7(gzungs 'dus): ba'i thab su sbyar bar bya'o// nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/ nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang / nyin bzhi rtag pa'i rims rnams las/ bu mo gzhon nus
212a8(gzungs 'dus): bkal ba yau// skud pa dkar po sum sgril la// bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul tu btags na bde bar mtsho// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags
212b1(gzungs 'dus): 'di dag bzlas shing btang // snying nad rtsi ba logs na ba dang / khong ba'i nad rnams ci yod la// chu la bsngags shing mang bzlas nas// blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur// nad la phan pa'i sman
212b2(gzungs 'dus): rnams la// bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur// g.yan pa dang ni/ 'brum bu dang / phol mig dang ni rma rad la/ grog tshangs la snying po 'di// mang du bzlas te btab na 'tsho// gzha'
212b3(gzungs 'dus): 'brum gzhad nad za khu dang / pho mtshan skrang zhing na ba la// skyer pa'i khan da'i ri lu 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i ri lu la/ nyi shu bzlas shing dkrugs na phan// nad kyi rnam pa gang
212b4(gzungs 'dus): na yang / nad tshabs che chung tshod stabs nas/ tshig su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/ mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas kyang / lus la byab cing bzlas na phan/ 'khru bag nad kyis
212b5(gzungs 'dus): btab pa la/ sman nam ri lu kha zas la/ bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang / khong du btang na phan por 'gyur/ de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste/ 'di dag rab tu bzlas par
212b6(gzungs 'dus): bya// // na mo rad na tra ya yA/ au ye d+harmA hi du pra b+ha we he dun te Shan ta thA ga to/ h+ya wa dad te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ e baM b+ha ti ma hA shrA ma Na ye swA hA/ de dag bzlas na nad rnaMs
212b7(gzungs 'dus): mtsho// de nas yang ni bka' bstsal pa// nas dang br-i dang sman ma dang / 'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang / shing thog dgun 'brum a ru ra de dag kun la za ba yi/ srin bu sbur du
212b8(gzungs 'dus): phye ma le ba/ bye'u byi ba ni tso dang / lo thog za yi kha mchid na/ zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang / bye mas dang thal ma la/ bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsi brgyad bzlas/ zhing dang shing / 
213a1(gzungs 'dus): thog gtor bas la/ de dag kun kyang kha 'ching 'gyur/ ha bcang char pa ches pa na/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi// me tog sman ma re re la// bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig
213a2(gzungs 'dus): bya/ gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu// bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu// kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang // me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/ 
213a3(gzungs 'dus): bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/ ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/ se nya pri ka lcug ma la/ bzlas brjod brgyan rtsa brgyad bzlas/ ser ba gang nas 'ong ngos su// klad pa la bskor zhing
213a4(gzungs 'dus): byabs na 'chad// yang na thal chen yungs dkar la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad/ bya// thum po byas te lcug ma la btags te btsugs na/ ser ba 'chad/ 'byung po sha za yid
213a5(gzungs 'dus): btags dang / brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grub bzhi la// bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/ gu gul dud pas bdug nas kyang // yungs dkar
213a6(gzungs 'dus): ga bur tsan dan dang / bla rtsi la sogs sman sbyar te/ bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar por sbyar/ dkyil 'khor de yi nang du zhugs/ bum pa'i chu yis bkru
213a7(gzungs 'dus): bar bya/ sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chus/ bkru zhing blud na rab tu phan/ nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/ 'byung po rjed byed sha za yis/ glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// khyis
213a8(gzungs 'dus): pa gau don gyis zin pa la/ g+hi l+r-ing la ni sngags bzlas nas/ snying po stobs mtshan 'di bris gdags// / oM badz+ra kau d+ha ma ha ba la/ ha na da ha/ pa tsa bidi d+hA na sa ya/ dza ti
213b1(gzungs 'dus): sum pa gas yang sum sa ma mangs pa nga rgya
213b2(gzungs 'dus): la lam b+ho d+ha ra tsu ru sh+ma/ kro ta hu 'um phaT swA hA// / gtsang sbra byas te mgul bar btags/ dud pas gdugs na mche bar 'gyur/ de la the tsom mi za'o// byis pa gdon dang
213b3(gzungs 'dus): nad las thar/ bud med bu ni thogs gyur na/ chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/ blud na legs par btsas par 'gyuraro// bud med sham bu med la// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas
213b4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i chu// de la bzlas brjod nyi shu byas/ khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/ chu de blud na bu tsha 'phan/ rigs rgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/ 
213b5(gzungs 'dus): skud pa dang ni gos kyi grwa ra/ bzlas brjod bdun bzlas 'dud pa bdun// 'dud/ cing bzlas te song ba na/ bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/ dgra dang nyes gzhom med par
213b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ shu dag mtshon gang tsam dag la/ bzlas brjod sum brgya tsam bzlas la/ mar srang sum brgya drug bcu la/ bzlas brjod byas te sres nas kyang
213b7(gzungs 'dus): bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrug/ nyi ma re re lo gcig du/ shu dag gi ni dum re dang / mar srang dag ni re re la/ bzlas brjod re re byas shing bza'/ des ni yid gzhungs glo ldan
213b8(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ de bzhin pa ni ser skya yi/ mar dang 'o ma dag la yang / bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ bzlas te 'o thugs dkrug cing za/ yid bzhugs dam pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ mi dang 'grog
213b9(gzungs 'dus): shing mdza' 'dod na/ gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la/ me tog dang ni rtse shing la/ 'bras bu 'am ni 'jim bag dag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i tshangs par bcug/ de la bzlas brjod
214a1(gzungs 'dus): rtsa gcig btab/ gang gi lag tu phyin pa na// de dag rtag tu mdza' bar 'gyur// rta la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams kun// 'cha ba'i nye bar gnas pa na// chu dang yungs dkar
214a2(gzungs 'dus): bcas pa la/ bzlas brjod brgya na rtsa brgyad byas// de la gtor nA sos par 'gyur// yang na yungs dkar brgyad brgya la// bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gtags// de ni nad med bde bar
214a3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na// yungs dkar la ni bzlas brjod bya// thum po byas te sgo la gdags// bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas// mi yi nad dang phyugs
214a4(gzungs 'dus): nad kun// ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni// 'di dag kun du rgya cher gsungs// / na mo rad na tra ya yA/ oM ye d+har+m+ma he du pra b+ha lA/ 
214a5(gzungs 'dus): he dun te ShAn ta thA ga to/ h+ya wa dad te/ ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+hi/ oM baM b+ha ti ma hA shrA mA na ye sa/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pa nu// bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
214a6(gzungs 'dus): glanod pa cis kyang tshugs mi 'gyur// dmi ches yongasu bzung bar 'gyur// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag ni// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la dad pas
214a7(gzungs 'dus): yid ches na// 'grub par the tsom med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i
214a8(gzungs 'dus): cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra tshing+ka ka pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi
214b1(gzungs 'dus): pha rol du phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcigan
214b2(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa ni/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal// mgon med zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 
214b3(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu byung ba mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gso/ 
214b4(gzungs 'dus): lhung zed bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyi/ zhugs pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyos
214b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi phyir gshegs nas/ zhal zas 'jug tu gsol te zas kyi bya ba mdzad/ ltung zod ches gos bzhag nas zhabs bsil te/ gdan bshams pa la dkyil mo dkrung bcas
214b6(gzungs 'dus): nas/ sku drang por srang nas dran pa mngon du bzhag nas bzhug so// de nas dge slong mang po bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i
214b7(gzungs 'dus): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar
214b8(gzungs 'dus): ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pI sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' ses
215a1(gzungs 'dus): dpa' chen po rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i dam pa/ ji snyed pas pan gdags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
215a2(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongasu btad pa'i dam pa ji snyed pas yongasu gtad pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// 
215a3(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces
215a4(gzungs 'dus): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor legaso leg so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin
215a5(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pas phan 'dog so/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
215a6(gzungs 'dus): po rnams la yongasu gtad do// rab 'byor de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la bzung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas/ ji ltar gnas par
215a7(gzungs 'dus): bya ba dang / ji ltar sgrub par bya ba dang / ji ltar sems rab tu bzung ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'ad
215a8(gzungs 'dus): kyi ltar gnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pas/ 'di snyam du bdag ni
215b1(gzungs 'dus): ci tsam du sems can sdug bsngal bas bsdu bas bsdus pas/ sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs
215b2(gzungs 'dus): can nam/ gzugs med dam/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med min nam/ 'du shes med min nas sems can gyi khams ci tsam/ sems can du gdags pas sems can du/ 
215b3(gzungs 'dus): gdags pa de dag thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar sems can tshad pa yongs mya ngan las bzlas kyang / seMs
215b4(gzungs 'dus): can gang yang yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa bzla bar 'gyur ba med do// snyam du semasabaskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems can du 'a
215b5(gzungs 'dus): shes 'jug na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang sems can du 'du shes 'jug pa 'am/ gang zag tu 'du shes pab 'jug
215b6(gzungs 'dus): na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dngos po la mi gnas par sbyin pa byin no// sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la yang mi
215b7(gzungs 'dus): gnas par sbyin pa byin no// rab 'byor ci nas mtshan mar 'ud shes pa la yang mi gnas par de ltar byang chub sems dpes sbyin pa byin no// // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
215b8(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' gang mi gnas par sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ rab 'byor tshad bzung bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ shar phyogs
216a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi na mkha' la tshad bzung bar smra ba 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / 
216a2(gzungs 'dus): byang dang / steng gi phyogs dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i tshad bzung bar slar snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni
216a3(gzungs 'dus): ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang mi gnas par sbyin pa byin pa de bsod nams kyi phung po yang tshad bzung bar sla
216a4(gzungs 'dus): ba ma lagaso// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par lta 'o ma/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
216a5(gzungs 'dus): lag so// mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan phun sum tshogs par gsungs pa de nyid mtshan phun
216a6(gzungs 'dus): sum tshogs par ma mchis pa de'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad
216a7(gzungs 'dus): du de tsam du brdzun no// ji tsam du mtshan phun sum tshogs pa de tsam du mi brdzun no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan med par lta'o// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan
216a8(gzungs 'dus): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba na/ seMs
216b1(gzungs 'dus): can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod 'di skad
216b2(gzungs 'dus): du ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par gyur na ni/ sems can gang la la dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes bskyed
216b3(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ba mchis sam zhes ma zer cig/ yang rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu 'jig par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216b4(gzungs 'dus): chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa shes rab dang ldan pa dag byung ste// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sangs rgyas gcig
216b5(gzungs 'dus): bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas gcig la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin gyi rab 'byor sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la bsnyen bkur byas shing / sangs rgyas brgya stong
216b6(gzungs 'dus): du ma la dge bo'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di la dad pa gcig tsam rnyed par 'gyur ba dag na/ de bzhin
216b7(gzungs 'dus): ga shegs pas mkhyen to// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzig so// rab 'byor sems can de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed cing / rab tu
216b8(gzungs 'dus): bsdud par 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni bdag tu shes 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'du shes pa mo yin no// srog
217a1(gzungs 'dus): 'du shes pa ma yin/ gang tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag chos 'du shes pa dang / chos med par 'du shes
217a2(gzungs 'dus): mi 'jug ste/ de dag ni 'du shes dang / 'du shes par yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag chos 'du shes
217a3(gzungs 'dus): 'jug na/ de nyid de dag gi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// gal te chos med par 'du shes 'jug
217a4(gzungs 'dus): na yang / de nyid de dag gi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog/ tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang
217a5(gzungs 'dus): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyang bzung bar byas na/ chos ma yin pa yid mi bzung bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de bas na de las dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
217a6(gzungs 'dus): kyai rnam grangs gzigs pa lta bu'i shes pa rnams kyang spang bar byas na/ chos ma yin pa rnams lta ci smos zhes gsung so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
217a7(gzungs 'dus): bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang
217a8(gzungs 'dus): yang yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang bstan nam/ de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
217b1(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis
217b2(gzungs 'dus): so// de bzhin gshegs pas gang bstan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchiso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i/ bstan pa de bzung du ma mchis
217b3(gzungs 'dus): brjod du ma mchis te/ de ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma mchis pa ma lags/ pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'phags pa gang zag rnams kyis 'dus ma bgyis kyis rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// 
217b4(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ narigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
217b5(gzungs 'dus): rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byin na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi rab mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
217b6(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
217b7(gzungs 'dus): kyi phung po de nyid phung po lhag ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phung po zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
217b8(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byin pas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig gzhi
218a1(gzungs 'dus): pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam bzung nas gzhan la yang mchod cing yang dag par ston par byed na/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi phung po ches grangs med dpag tu med
218a2(gzungs 'dus): pa bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di
218a3(gzungs 'dus): las byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di las skyes pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya
218a4(gzungs 'dus): ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag med par yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro// des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du seMs/ 
218a5(gzungs 'dus): rgyun du zhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mau lagaso// de ci'i spyad
218a6(gzungs 'dus): dri zhe ni/ bcom ldan 'das de ni d+ha zhugs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// gzugs lam zhugs/ sgra la yang ma lags/ dri la ma lags/ 
218a7(gzungs 'dus): maM lags/ reg bya la ma lags/ chos la yang ma zhugs te/ de bas na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyun du zhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun du zhug
218a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du sems par 'gyur na/ de nyid de'i bdag nyid tu 'dzin par 'gyur// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
218b1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'o snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
218b2(gzungs 'dus): de ni ma lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos de yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ des na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
218b3(gzungs 'dus): bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'di snyam du bdag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
218b4(gzungs 'dus): de ni ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'o smad du ste/ des na phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab
218b5(gzungs 'dus): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ yang dgra bcom pa 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob po snyam du sems sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
218b6(gzungs 'dus): so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ dgra bcom po 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob po snyam
218b7(gzungs 'dus): du sems par gyur pa de nyid de'i bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
218b8(gzungs 'dus): baM dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod chags dang bral ba dgra bcom pa
218b9(gzungs 'dus): lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du dgra bcom pa thob po snyam du mi sems lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'di snyam du bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid thob po snyed sos
219a1(gzungs 'dus): par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la rigs kyi bu rab 'byor ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog yin te ci la yang mi gnas pas
219a2(gzungs 'dus): nanyon mongs par gnas pa nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa zhes lung mi ston lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du seMs
219a3(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las gang blangs pa'i chos de gang yang yod snyam 'am/ 
219a4(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs te/ de bzhin// gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad lnga
219a5(gzungs 'dus): gang blangs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig 'di skad du/ bdags
219a6(gzungs 'dus): zhing bkod pa rnams sgrub par bya'o// zhes zer na de ni mi bden par smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni bkod pa de dag med par de
219a7(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar
219a8(gzungs 'dus): mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// gzugs la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang chos la yang mi gnas par seMs bskyed
219b1(gzungs 'dus): bar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig lus 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di lta ste ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ lus de
219b2(gzungs 'dus): dngos po ma mchis par gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na lus de che zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang ga'i klu
219b3(gzungs 'dus): gi bye ma snyed pa gang ga'i klung yang de snyed kho nar gyur na/ de dag gi bye ma snyed gang yin pa de mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldani 'das gang ga'i klung de/ 
219b4(gzungs 'dus): dag nyid kyang mang ba lags na/ de dag gi bye ma lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis mos par bya/ khyod kyis
219b5(gzungs 'dus): khong du chud par bya'o// gang ga'i klung de dag gi bye ma ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu
219b6(gzungs 'dus): gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes pa 'am/ 
219b7(gzungs 'dus): bud med de'i gzhi de las bsod nams ming du bskyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lag so/ bde bar gshegs pa med lagaso// skyes pa 'a
219b8(gzungs 'dus): bud med de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis
220a1(gzungs 'dus): rab tu gang bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa pas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las
220a2(gzungs 'dus): tha na tshig bzhi po'i tshig su bcad pa tsam gcig bzung nas/ gzhan dag la yang bshad de/ yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ de nyid de'i gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches
220a3(gzungs 'dus): mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do/ yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa cig tsam 'don tam/ ston pa'i
220a4(gzungs 'dus): sa phyogs der lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchog tu gyur/ pa yin na/ su zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang // 
220a5(gzungs 'dus): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ngo mtshar rangadang / ldan par gyur pa lta ci smos/ sa phyogs de na ston pa yang bzhugs te/ bla ma'i gnas nan/ 
220a6(gzungs 'dus): dag kyang gnas// de skad ces bka' bsngal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
220a7(gzungs 'dus): lpags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs
220a8(gzungs 'dus): 'di ni shes dus kyi ma rol du phyin pa zhes bya ste/ 'di de ltar btsung shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs kyis shes la kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang gsungs pa de
220b1(gzungs 'dus): pha rol du phyin pa'i phyir te/ des na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir chos de gang yang
220b2(gzungs 'dus): yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa
220b3(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bco ldan
220b4(gzungs 'dus): 'das sa'i rdul dri ma lag so/ bde bar gshegs pa mang lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i rdul gang lags pa de'i rdul ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs
220b5(gzungs 'dus): pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na sa'i rdul zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gang lags pa de khams ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des
220b6(gzungs 'dus): na 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag de bzhin
220b7(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pas dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu lta 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyes bu chen po'i
220b8(gzungs 'dus): mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dra/ 
221a1(gzungs 'dus): kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang gis lus gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongasu btang ba bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig su bcad
221a2(gzungs 'dus): pa gcig tsam bzung ste/ gzhan dag la yang bstan na/ de gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du gangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos kyi shugs
221a3(gzungs 'dus): kyis mig nas mchi ma byung ste/ de'i mod la mchi ma phyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni
221a4(gzungs 'dus): ngo mtshar lag so/ bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar log so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ye shes skyes tshun chad bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon nam yang ma thos so// bco ldan
221a5(gzungs 'dus): 'das mdo bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
221a6(gzungs 'dus): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa la rtog cing mos pa ni/ bdag ngo mtshar lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
221a7(gzungs 'dus): 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur lagaso// yang bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jug par
221a8(gzungs 'dus): mi 'gyur/ sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes 'jug par mi 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu 'du shes
221b1(gzungs 'dus): 'jug pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa gang legs pa de dag nyid du 'du shes pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
221b2(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'du shes thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
221b3(gzungs 'dus): bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhi ni de de bzhin te/ mdo sde bshad pa 'di la gang dag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par 'gyur// de ci'i phyir
221b4(gzungs 'dus): zhe na/ rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa dam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ pha rol du phyin pa dam pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
221b5(gzungs 'dus): 'das dpag tu med pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na pha rol du phyin pa dam pa zhes bya'o// yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin
221b6(gzungs 'dus): pa de nyid pha rol du phyin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang gi tshe ka ling ka'i rgyal pos nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnam par bcad par gyur pa de'i tshe/ nga lo bdag tu 'du shes
221b7(gzungs 'dus): sam/ sems can du 'du shes sam/ gang zag tu 'du shes kyang ma byung zhing / nga la 'du shes ci yang med la// 'du shes med par gyur pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe
221b8(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor gal te de'i tshe nga la bdag tu 'du shes byung na/ de'i tshe gnod sems kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung la/ sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu
222a1(gzungs 'dus): 'du shes byung na de'i tshe/ gnod sems kyi 'du shes kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus nang tshe rabs lnga brgyar bzod pa smra ba zhes
222a2(gzungs 'dus): bya ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de na/ yang nga la bdag tu 'du shes ma byung / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa ma byung ngo // rab 'byor
222a3(gzungs 'dus): da lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos 'du shes thams cad rnam par spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// ra
222a4(gzungs 'dus): 'byor gzugs la mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o// sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la yang mi gnas par sems bskyed par bya'o/ ci la yang mi gnas por sas
222a5(gzungs 'dus): bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas pa gang yin pa de nyid mi gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas par sbyin
222a6(gzungs 'dus): pa byon par bya'o zhes gsung so/ yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir byin pa yongasasu btang bar bya'o// sems can du 'du shes
222a7(gzungs 'dus): gang yin pa de nyid kyang 'du shes med pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad ces gang gsungs pa de dag nyid kyang med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
222a8(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs pa/ bden par gsungs pa de bzhin du gsungs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro// 
222b1(gzungs 'dus): yang rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ bstan pa de la ni bden pa yang med brdzun pa yang med do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
222b2(gzungs 'dus): pas chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ bstan pa de la ni bden pa yang med brdzun pa yang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig
222b3(gzungs 'dus): mun par zhugs na ci yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du/ gang dngos por lhung ba'i sbyin pa yongasu gting ba'i byang chub sems do par mi blta'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na nam
222b4(gzungs 'dus): longs te nyi ma shar nas/ mig dang ldan pa'i mis gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dge mthong ba de bzhin du/ gong dngos por ma lhung bas sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i byang chub sems
222b5(gzungs 'dus): da par lta'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam glengs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub por byed pa dang / 
222b6(gzungs 'dus): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can de dag thas cad ni
222b7(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyuraro/ yang rab 'byor skyes pa 'am bud med gang zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ lus gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus yongs
222b8(gzungs 'dus): gtong la/ phyed kyi dus dang / phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang ga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongasu gtong ste/ nam grangs 'di lta bur bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lus yongs
223a1(gzungs 'dus): gtong ba bas/ gang gis chos pa kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi spong na/ de nyid bzhi de las bsod nams ches mang grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed na/ gang gis yi ger
223a2(gzungs 'dus): bris nas len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos/ yang rab 'byor chos kyi rnam
223a3(gzungs 'dus): grangs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni theg pa mchog la yang dag
223a4(gzungs 'dus): par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungaso/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
223a5(gzungs 'dus): chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ tede dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sems can
223a6(gzungs 'dus): de dag thams cad ni bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa
223a7(gzungs 'dus): dang / tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad de'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis chos kyi rna
223a8(gzungs 'dus): grangs 'di mnyan par mi nus te/ bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis ma yin/ sems can du lta ba rnams kyis ma yin/ srog tu lta ba rnams kyis ma yin zhing / gang zag tu lta ba rnams kyis
223b1(gzungs 'dus): mnyan pa dang / klang ba dang / gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed mi nus te de ni gnas med pa'i phyir ro// yang rab 'byor sa phyogs gang na mdo sde 'di ston pa'i sa phyogs
223b2(gzungs 'dus): der lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de phyag bya bor 'os pa dang / bskor ba bya bar 'os par yang 'gyuraro/ sa phyogs de ni
223b3(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten lta bur 'gyu ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig 'di dag len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
223b4(gzungs 'dus): byed pa de dag ni mnar bar 'gyur/ shin du mnar bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can de dag gis tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i las ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba gang dag
223b5(gzungs 'dus): tshe 'di nyid la mnar bas/ tshe rabs snga ma'i dge ba'i de dag byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
223b6(gzungs 'dus): gang ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i ches grangs med pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
223b7(gzungs 'dus): kyi yang snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gang dag byung ba ngas mnyes par byas te/ mnyes par byas nas thugs dbyung bar ma byas
223b8(gzungs 'dus): te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ngos mnyes par byas nas/ thugs dbyung bar ma byas pa gang yin pa dang / phyi mo'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa na/ mdo sde 'di lon/ 
224a1(gzungs 'dus): dang / 'tshong ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa gang yin pa las/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang
224a2(gzungs 'dus): mi phod/ sdong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang zla dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// rab 'byor gal te de'i tshe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag bsod
224a3(gzungs 'dus): nams kyi phung po ji snyed rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ngas brjod na/ sems can rnams myo mye bor gyur te seMs
224a4(gzungs 'dus): 'khrugs par 'gyur/ yang rab 'byor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pa de nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
224a5(gzungs 'dus): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar sems rab tu bzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bco
224a6(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal te/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pas 'di snyam du bdag gis seMs can
224a7(gzungs 'dus): thams cad phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o// de ltar sems can rnams yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongasu
224a8(gzungs 'dus): mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba med do snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems can du 'du shes 'jug na yang de byang chub
224b1(gzungs 'dus): dpar zhes mi bya ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rabu 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ji
224b2(gzungs 'dus): snyam du sems// de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs po ma re me mdzad las gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang
224b3(gzungs 'dus): yang yid snyam 'am/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin
224b4(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa mar me mdzad las gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
224b5(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las
224b6(gzungs 'dus): gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang med do// rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par
224b7(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas pa'i chos de 'ga' zhig yod par gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
224b8(gzungs 'dus): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyura'o zhes lung ba ston pa zhig na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
225a1(gzungs 'dus): sun ngon pa sangs rgyas pa'i rlos de gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis la zlus pa'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshes
225a2(gzungs 'dus): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur/ zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi tshig tha dgas yin pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gangal ldan// 
225a3(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// zhes ra/ 
225a4(gzungs 'dus): nade log par smra ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de
225a5(gzungs 'dus): gang yang med pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de la bden pa yang med de/ brdzun pa yang med de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
225a6(gzungs 'dus): chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes gsung so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni de dag thams cad chos med pa yin te/ de bas na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'o// 
225a7(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig lus dang ldan zhing lus chen por gyur pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mi zhig lus chen
225a8(gzungs 'dus): po zhes gang gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pas lus ma mchis par gsungs te/ des na lus dang ldan zhing lus chen po bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
225a9(gzungs 'dus): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di skad du bdag gis sos can rnas yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes zer na/ de byang chub ses dpa' zhes mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chu
225b1(gzungs 'dus): sos dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas chos zas chud ni seMs can med
225b2(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / srog med pa/ gang zag med pa'o zhes gsungs// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di skad du bdag gis zhing bkod pa rnams sgrub po zhes zer na/ de yang de bzhin
225b3(gzungs 'dus): du brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zhing bkod pa rnams zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya ba ni de dag bkod pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ 
225b4(gzungs 'dus): na zhing bkod pa rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos rnams ni bdog med pa'o// chos rnams bdag med pa'o zhes mos pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ 
225b5(gzungs 'dus): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' se saM dpa' chen po zhes brjod do// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam dang sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sha'i spyan
225b6(gzungs 'dus): mnga' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sha'i spyan mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni
225b7(gzungs 'dus): snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i sbyin mnga' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i spyan mnga'o// bcom
225b8(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rabaspyan mnga' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gzil pa bcom ldan
225b9(gzungs 'dus): 'das de de lags te// de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi spyan mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
226a1(gzungs 'dus): ji snyed du seMms/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi spyan mnga'a'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sbyin ma'o// bcom ldan
226a2(gzungs 'dus): dadus kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi spyan mnga' 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/ de
226a3(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi spyan mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa gang ga'i klung gi de snyed du gyur la/ de dag
226a4(gzungs 'dus): gi bye ma ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mang ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
226a5(gzungs 'dus): mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag gi bsam pa dang ba'i sems kyi rgyun ngas rab tu shes
226a6(gzungs 'dus): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems kyi rgyun ces bya ba de ni rgyun med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na sems kyi rgyun ces bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
226a7(gzungs 'dus): 'byor 'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su med/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigasu med/ da ltar byung ba'i sems kyang dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
226a8(gzungs 'dus): gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu gang bar byas te/ sbyin pa byin na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams med du bskyed
226b1(gzungs 'dus): dram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 
226b2(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed do// rab 'byor gal te bsod nams kyi phung por gyur na/ bsod nams kyi phung po zhes de bzhin gshegs pas mi gsung ngo // / 
226b3(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi sku yongasu grub pas de bzhin gshegs par lta snya ma 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// gzugs kyi sku
226b4(gzungs 'dus): yongasu grub pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das la gzugs kyi sku yongasu bgrub pa/ gzugs kyi sku yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de yongasu grub pas
226b5(gzungs 'dus): ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ba'i slad du ste/ des na gzugs kyi sku yongasu grub pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
226b6(gzungs 'dus): mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan phun sum tshogs par gang gsungs pa de/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa ma mchis
226b7(gzungs 'dus): par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na mtshan sum pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di
226b8(gzungs 'dus): snyam du ngas chos ston to zhes dgongaso snyam nas/ rab 'byor de ltar mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bstan pa'i chos de gang yang med do// rab 'byor su zhig 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs
227a1(gzungs 'dus): pas chos bstan to zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ni med pa dang log par zin pas nga la bskur bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dmigs par
227a2(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba de gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
227a3(gzungs 'dus): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mngon par yid ches par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das
227a4(gzungs 'dus): kyis bstsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag sems can yang ma yin/ sems can med pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can rnams zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas
227a5(gzungs 'dus): sems can de dag med par gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na sems can rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
227a6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang yod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang bla na med pa yang dag
227a7(gzungs 'dus): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de chos cung
227a8(gzungs 'dus): zad kyang med cing mi dmigs te/ des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa ces bya'o// yang rab 'byor chos de ni mnyam pa ste/ de la mi mnyam pa gang yang med pas/ des
227b1(gzungs 'dus): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang
227b2(gzungs 'dus): mnyam pa ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni de dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos med pa nyid du gsungs te/ 
227b3(gzungs 'dus): des na dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang
227b4(gzungs 'dus): dag ji snyed yod pa de tsam gyi rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po mngon par bsdus te sbyin pa byin pas/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa/ 
227b5(gzungs 'dus): tsam gcig bzung nas/ gzhan dag la yang bstan na/ rab 'byor bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang
227b6(gzungs 'dus): mi bzod do// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs 'di snyam du ngas sems can rnams dkrolo zhes dgong so snyam na/ rab 'byor de de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
227b7(gzungs 'dus): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas gang dkrol ba'i sems can de dag gang yang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang la la zhig dkrol bar gyur na/ de nyid de bzhin
227b8(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pas bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor bdag tu 'dzin ces bya ba ni 'dzin pa med par
228a1(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/ de yang byis pa so so'i skye'o rnams kyis bzung ngo // rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya ba ni/ de dag skye'o med pa nyid du de
228a2(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ de na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par lta snyam 'am/ 
228a3(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
228a4(gzungs 'dus): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// rab 'byor gal te mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par lta bar gyur na/ 
228a5(gzungs 'dus): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ de bas na mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
228a6(gzungs 'dus): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi lta'o// 
228a7(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal to// gang dag nga la gzugasu mthong // gang dag nga la sgra shes pa// log pa'i la du zhugs pa ste// skye bo de dag nga mi thong
228a8(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lnga// 'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid sku// chos nyid shes par bya min pas// de ni rnam par shes mi nus// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// mtshan phun sum
228b1(gzungs 'dus): tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu snyam du 'dzin na/ rab 'byor khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste/ rab 'byor mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin
228b2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa med do// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos la la
228b3(gzungs 'dus): zhig rnam par bshig gam/ tshad par btags pa tsam du 'dzin na/ rab 'byor de ltar mi lta ste/ byang chub sems dpe'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos gang yang rnam par
228b4(gzungs 'dus): bshig pa'i chad par btags pa med do// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/ 
228b5(gzungs 'dus): sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems tha gang zhig chos rnams bdag med cing skye ba med pa la bzod pa thob na/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do// yang rab 'byor
228b6(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi phung po yongasu bzung bar mi bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi phung po yongasasu bzung
228b7(gzungs 'dus): bar mi bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor yongasu bzung mod kyi/ log par mi bzung ste/ de nas yongasu bzung ba zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad
228b8(gzungs 'dus): du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhad dam/ byon nam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ brnal par mdzad// zhes de skad zer na/ de ngas bshad pa'i don mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin
229a1(gzungs 'dus): du' rigs kyi bu mo gang gis thong gsum rgya myo chen po'i 'jog da kyi khangos nasa'i tshus rnams ji srid 'od pa de dag 'di lta ste dper na/ rdul phra rab kyi tshogs bzhin du phye mar byas nas/ rang gyu
229a2(gzungs 'dus): sa rgya la/ rdum skye sa bu din/ kyis pa/ ldan di ltar lags te/ dul byar kyi gsu tshutshogs de mang ba legs/ 
229a3(gzungs 'dus): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te tshogs zhig mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs zhes bka' mi bstsal pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
229a4(gzungs 'dus): rdul phra rab kyi rtogs zhes gang gsungs pa de/ tshogs pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs zhes bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pas stong
229a5(gzungs 'dus): gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ne na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te khams zhig mchis par gyur na/ de nyid ril por 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de
229a6(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pas ril por 'dzin par grang gsungs pa de/ 'dzin pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ des na ril por 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
229a7(gzungs 'dus): bstsal pa/ rab 'byor ril por 'dzin pa nyid ni tha snyad te/ chos de ni brjod du med pa yin na/ de yang byis pa so so'i skye'o rnams kyis bzung ngo // rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
229b1(gzungs 'dus): dges smra ga dus byang gas su/ de ban gshegs pas sems can la bdang / skrag sa pa dang / gang thagan smra par gsu ma zhes zer na/ rab 'byor desang da ngas par smra sa
229b2(gzungs 'dus): smra ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
229b3(gzungs 'dus): bdag tu lta bar gsungs pa de lta bu ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/ des na bdag tu lta bar zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor
229b4(gzungs 'dus): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad shes par bya/ blta bar bya/ mos par bya ste/ ci nas cho su 'du shes pa la yang mi gnas pa de ltar
229b5(gzungs 'dus): mos par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor cho su 'du shes chosu 'du shes zhes bya ba ni/ 'du shes med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir te/ des na chos 'du shes zhes bya'o// yang
229b6(gzungs 'dus): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi
229b7(gzungs 'dus): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig suM bcad pa tsam blangs nis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gas/ kun chub par byed dang / gan
229b8(gzungs 'dus): dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston na/ de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed do// ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston ce na/ ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bzhin
230a1(gzungs 'dus): bya ste/ des na yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o// skar ma rab rib mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam klog dang srin lta bu// 'dus byas chos rnams de
230a2(gzungs 'dus): ltar lta bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'khor bzhi po dge slong
230a3(gzungs 'dus): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bzar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

230a6(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje gcod pa'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas na/ rdo rje gcod pa khri dgu stong klags par 'gyur ro// mag+ha laM/ rgya gar skad du/ d+hi men du a lang kA ra na ma d+he ra nI
230a7(gzungs 'dus): u pa tsa yA/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
230a8(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das grong khyer ba ra na so'i 'khor gyi khyams nang yangs pa na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas
230b1(gzungs 'dus): pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// 
230b2(gzungs 'dus): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zla ba nya'i tshes bco lnga la chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam gyi slad du bzhugs pa dang / sems can bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag 'dus par gyur te/ bram ze dang / 
230b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyal rigs dang / spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu ba dang / gcer bu dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / rgyas pa dang / bye brag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / dur khrod pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / 
230b4(gzungs 'dus): baglang gi rdul shugs can dang / ri brag na rtul zhugs spyod pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
230b5(gzungs 'dus): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar bzhin du 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das las mi 'jigs par zhus pa'i lan nyan par 'dod nas/ 
230b6(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag gis yongs su bskor ba dang / mi 'jed kyi
230b7(gzungs 'dus): bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong dang lhan cig tu lhags so// nyi ma dang zla ba dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / lha chen
230b8(gzungs 'dus): po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / gshin rje dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal po chen po gzhan dag dang / dpol dang dam tshig ldan ma dang / dung can dang / me tog gi so can ma dang / 
231a1(gzungs 'dus): 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo klu'i rgyal po stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar ba de dag kun kyang 'dus
231a2(gzungs 'dus): te 'khod do// 'khor na mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bal po ches yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang
231a3(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor te/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba byas nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// yang 'khor mang po de na
231a4(gzungs 'dus): bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin zhes bya ba/ grong khyer dmar bu can na gnas pa phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/ mkhas pa bzo ShAM/ gsal ba
231a5(gzungs 'dus): yid bzhungs pa/ dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ dad pa can/ bsam pa dge ba 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba/ dge bsnyen dam pa zhig 'dug pa de/ bud med
231a6(gzungs 'dus): ra gyur nas/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi khyim nas bu byung ba med do// gzhan yang bram ze rnams kyi rang bzhin 'di lta bu yin te/ rigs kyi bu sa nyon med par sems par byed/ rigs/ 
231a7(gzungs 'dus): med pas de'i phyir/ 'gro ba rnams rigs kyi sa bon med par sems par byed do snyam du sems so// yang bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin de 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'ongs ni bdag
231a8(gzungs 'dus): gi pha yin/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras yin/ dam pa'i chos ni bdag gi ma yin/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni phu nu yin pas/ 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du yang bdag
231b1(gzungs 'dus): gi skye ba shin tu shis pa yin no// gzhan yang bdag gis chos gang zhig gnas par bya ba bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar bya zhing / chos gcig po gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thun mong //

232b1(gzungs 'dus): rnam par phye nas/ me tog sna tshogs dag bkram/ bum pa gang ba bzhi yang bzhag/ pog byor bzhi dang / lta bshos kyi bum pa bzhi yang bzhag/ phyogs bzhir mar me'i sdong

232b8(gzungs 'dus): 'das 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshalo// thub pa sems can kun la byams mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// ngo mtshar 'byung ba chos nyid can//
