234b7(gzungs 'dus): par 'du bya ba chen pos mchod/ 'khor byang chub sems ba'i tshogs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun nang bcas pa dang / 'khor lho dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po de dag thams cad la yang
234b8(gzungs 'dus): mchod nas/ dus la thab par rig pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod la 'tha' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ngamang po mang ba dag 'drim par byed do// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang
235a1(gzungs 'dus): bcas pa yang dag par tshig par byas cing bder sngabs nas/ lhung bzed zhag phyag bcabs pa dang / na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba chen po mchod/ 'khor mang po
235a2(gzungs 'dus): de dag kyang mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer dmar bu can 'di'i shar sgo'i phyogs bzhin
235a3(gzungs 'dus): lha ma yin gyi nags tshal zhes bya ba ni bskyed tshal gyi nang na srin mi me tog lha ma yin zhes bgyi ba drag mo zu lums can gtum mo/ skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo la 'tshe ba/ mdangs 'phrog pa'atshe
235a4(gzungs 'dus): bar bgyid pa/ gdugs mtshon rtag tu rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa la brtson pa zhig gnas lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs cis zlog tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
235a5(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa 'on rab tu mdzes pa'i tog gis skye bo'i tshogs mang po dbugs byung ste/ cang mi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa
235a6(gzungs 'dus): bstan pa des/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa dag mthon te/ 'od zer gyi sdang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byas/ lha ma yin gyi nags
235a7(gzungs 'dus): ces bya ba'i bskyed mos chel de dang / srin mo me tog lha ma yin ces bya ba 'khor brgya stong can gyi gnas thams cad kyang snang bar byas nas/ gnas thams cad 'babo pa gcig tu gyur pa dang / lham
235a8(gzungs 'dus): yon thams cad blong blong por gyur te/ rgyug rab tu rgyug kun tu rgyug cing / phyogs bzhir 'byer bar byed/ phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su rgyug cing / nyams thag pa'i nga ros bdag cag su la skyabasu
235b1(gzungs 'dus): sgrub/ su zhig gis ni skyob par 'gyur zhes 'dod 'bod do// de nas grong khyer de'i lha zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog la skyabasu nye bar deng shig dang / de nas khyed cag 'tsho bar 'gyur
235b2(gzungs 'dus): ri zhes smraso// de nas srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba'i 'khor brgya stong dang / rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud te phyag
235b3(gzungs 'dus): btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la skyab tu gsol/ byede par gshegs pa skyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das slan chad sems can rnams la
235b4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshe bar yang mi bgyid/ gnod par yang mi bgyid lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog gis/ srin mo la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar
235b5(gzungs 'dus): mdzad de/ byang chub kyi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur
235b6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang zhing 'khor dang bcas pa chos ston pa yang grag/ byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs de yang bshad par brtsams pa dang / phyogs bcu
235b7(gzungs 'dus): na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog leg so leg so// bcom ldan 'das
235b8(gzungs 'dus): khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po bshad pa dang / srin mo me tog lha ma yin 'khor dang bcas pa btul te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
236a1(gzungs 'dus): ag dgrod pa dang / skye bo dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sal bkod cing dge ba'i lam la bzhag pa ni/ legs par bka' stsal to// de'i chos gzhi chen po yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas
236a2(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur/ rin po che sna bdun gyi char yang bab ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang lo legs par gyur to// bram ze chen po de'i dus kyi tshe/ nga tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du bram ze gnon
236a3(gzungs 'dus): nur gyur to// de'i 'og tu ngas gzungs 'di thos te/ phyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bo// yang bram ze
236a4(gzungs 'dus): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyang srin mo me tog lho ma yin zhes bya bar gyur to// 
236a5(gzungs 'dus): yang de'i tshe de'i dus na grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhan yon snyam du smos sam/ yid gnyis za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyang srin mo me tog lha ma yin/ de dag
236a6(gzungs 'dus): nyid lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di yin no// yang bram ze chen po de'i dus na/ srin mo me tog lham
236a7(gzungs 'dus): yin gyi 'khor brgya stong de dag gzhan yin no// snyam du som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis za na de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid 'dus pa 'dir bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyu
236a8(gzungs 'dus): dang / gcer bu pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bye brag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / dur khrod pa dang / phyag dar khrod pa dang / ri brag na rtul shugs spyod pa lhags pa 'di dag yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
236b1(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gtam 'di bka' stsal nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs bzhug so// de nas 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi gtam 'di thos nas/ thams cad ya mtshan du gyur
236b2(gzungs 'dus): nas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dag thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
236b3(gzungs 'dus): la mchod pa mngon par 'du bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sal phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po
236b4(gzungs 'dus): brgyan ces bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa rig pa'i rgyal po gang gis na sems can rnams la snang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can
236b5(gzungs 'dus): rnams kyi re ba yongasu bskang bar 'gyur ba 'di bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad na 'dzum pa bstan to// 'dzum pa bstan ma thag tu
236b6(gzungs 'dus): 'od zer sna tshogs dang thon te/ 'od zer snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
236b7(gzungs 'dus): rnams kyang snang la/ de dag chos bstan pa'i gzungs kyi tha snyad kyang drag go// sa 'di la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams skyes/ me tog sna tshogs bkram/ 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa sna
236b8(gzungs 'dus): tshogs kyis brgyan nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlabs bzang po dga' ba dga' ba lta bu shin du mdzes pa dag snang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe'i brul
237a1(gzungs 'dus): chen por yang mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan pa yang mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal pa der songs phyin napa/ bcom ldan 'das sa spyan 'tshal te// lan gsum bskor ba
237a2(gzungs 'dus): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i
237a3(gzungs 'dus): rgyal po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa sems can rnams la sman pa'i don dang / yongasu sbyang ba mdzod cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskrun pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags// de nas
237a4(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzigs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
237a5(gzungs 'dus): snyoms par bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu skad cig thang cig de nyid la/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thas
237a6(gzungs 'dus): cad mda' rgyang gang tsam gyi thad na snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu snyeng gshegs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs/ 
237a7(gzungs 'dus): pi dgra bcom pa shAk+Shu thub pa legs so// zhes bya ba bos te/ de bzhin gshegs pA shAkya thub pa legs sa legaso// khyod gzungs chen po rtogs pa'i rgyal po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
237a8(gzungs 'dus): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis hU~M shad/ byin gyis rlabs/ rjesu yid ring ba mdzad pa 'di shad dpar bzhed pa ni legs par gsungs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po 'o/ 
237b1(gzungs 'dus): brlan ces bgyi ba'i gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs rtogs pa'i chog chen po yangs pa shin du byache ba babyung du gsol/ de nas 'angam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas ltung ba dngas te/ de bzhin gshegs
237b2(gzungs 'dus): byams 'khrungs pa'i chos kyi ring sal gyis kang bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pas phyag gisar phyi mdog can brkyang ste/ 'jam
237b3(gzungs 'dus): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las lhung bzed bzhes nas na mkha' la 'phang so// lhung bzed de 'phangs ma thag tu na mkha' khyebs nas/ skad cig thang cig de nyid la chos kyi ring srel de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237b4(gzungs 'dus): sku sha stag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ bcom ldan
237b5(gzungs 'dus): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legaso leg so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re'i spyan snga na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs la/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad na
237b6(gzungs 'dus): yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhung bzed chos kyi ring sril gyi sku gdung gis bkang ba'i 'bul por byed pa/ 'jig rten du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po byung bar gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
237b7(gzungs 'dus): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shin du ya mtshan che ba'i cho 'phrul yang snang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po
237b8(gzungs 'dus): 'dus pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang snang na/ 'di ci'i snga ltas shig snang / rgyu ni gang / rkyen ni gang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po 'dus par snang ba 'di ni su'i mthu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
238a1(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje'i cho 'phrul gyi snga ltas 'di ji ltar mi shes/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos ni cho 'phrul chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pa 'di mthong ba'am/ thos
238a2(gzungs 'dus): pa'am/ shes pa yang med de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni sngon ma mthong ba zhig snang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
238a3(gzungs 'dus): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gsung bar bzhed na/ cho 'phrul chen po'i snga ltas zhig 'jig rten du byung ba lags/ bcom
238a4(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje cog tsam sdod cig dang de'u re khyod kyi mngon sum du snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che sna
238a5(gzungs 'dus): bdun gyi mchod sdong 'phang du dpag tshad bdun stong pa rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong pa/ bzang po dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa shin du mdzes pa legs par rnam par phye ba/ mtsher bar 'bar ba/ dar dang phreng ba bzang
238a6(gzungs 'dus): bas mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rgyus pa/ gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa/ me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ shings la rtol nas byang ste/ lha'i bu brgya stong bye ba
238a7(gzungs 'dus): phrag du man mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdong de la mchod pa byed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan
238a8(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod song la mchod sdong gi dbus su sgo phye shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje thor tshugs 'bar bar byas pa/ cod pan 'bar
238b1(gzungs 'dus): ba mgo la bcings/ rdo rje 'bar ba lag na thogs/ gdong bsgyur khros pa'i gzugs bya nas/ mchod sdong de'i drung du song ste/ lag pa brkyang nas de'i sgo phye'o// sgo da phye ba dang / mchod stong gi nang de
238b2(gzungs 'dus): na seng ge'i khri 'dzam bu'i chu'o gser la byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis smras pa/ shing bal ltar 'jam pa'i gos sna tshogs bting ba zhig bshams te/ de'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
238b3(gzungs 'dus): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhal chen po spyi gtsug 'od zer gtor ba'i mdog can zhes bya ba bzhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du snyoms par bzhugs pa snang ngo // de nas
238b4(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa zhal chen po spyi gtsug 'od zer gtor ba'i mdog can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba
238b5(gzungs 'dus): khos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du cho 'phrul byung bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus par gda' ba legs so legaso// bdag
238b6(gzungs 'dus): gis kyang sngon 'dus pa dang / cho 'phrul 'di lta bu bstan to// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
238b7(gzungs 'dus): pa mang po 'dus pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstan to// de lta bas na leg so legs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po bshad par mdzad cag
238b8(gzungs 'dus): dang / sman chen po bgyis par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse bar 'gyur lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa
239a1(gzungs 'dus): 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa dang / mchod sdong gda' ba 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs 'di nyid kyi mthus cho 'phrul gda' ste/ 'di nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi
239a2(gzungs 'dus): sngaltas su gda' lag so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
239a3(gzungs 'dus): bde bzhin gshegs pa zhal chen po'i spyi gtsug 'od zer gtor ba'i tog can gyis bcol bar mkhyen nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs 'di dka' stsal te/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ bi bul ba ded kAn
239a4(gzungs 'dus): tsa nod k+Shi pa ta pra ba ta pra bA pa kI du m+bA ra d+h+wa yau/ ta thA gA ta ya/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga ta yA/ a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo d+hi b+ho d+hi/ bo d+hi b+ho d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ko tsa ra d+ha ri/ 
239a5(gzungs 'dus): ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsid tA da re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta ra sh+mi san tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+he shi ga te/ gu ne na ma te/ sarba bud d+ha ku NAM ba b+ha se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a
239a6(gzungs 'dus): d+haSh+Thi te/ na b+ha sta la sha ma sha me/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba pa pAM pra sha ma ne/ sarba pA pAM bI sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu/ many+dzu b+ho d+hi marga saM/ pra sta te/ sarba ta thA g+hA te su pra tiSh+Ti da/ shud de sA hA/ 
239a7(gzungs 'dus): de nas byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs
239a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sku mang po de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa leg so leg so// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gzungs kyi rgyal po
239b1(gzungs 'dus): bshad pa ni legs par gsungaso// de'i tshes 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// me tog gi char chen po yang 'bab par gyur to// spos kyi char chen po dang / gos dang brgyan gyi char chen po dang / gse
239b2(gzungs 'dus): gyi bskud pa dang / mu tig gi chun po dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan 'byang dang / se mo de'i char dag kyang 'bebs par gyur to// lha'i bu rnams kyang na mkha' la rnga dang phag dag rdob cing / ku co dadag
239b3(gzungs 'dus): zha'i sgra chen po byung nas/ me tog su dpal dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dang / mnad ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dz+re sha ka
239b4(gzungs 'dus): chen po dang / ba re sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / dri zhim pa la sogs pa'i char dbab par brtsams zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya bar mngon par brtson par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das
239b5(gzungs 'dus): kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'dus pa de'i nang nas kha cig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas kha cig gis ni rang byang chub/ kha modo gas na rang kyang chu ba/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong
239b6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po/ kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob/ 
239b7(gzungs 'dus): kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos/ kha cig gis ni lhar skye ba thob/ sems can gang dag dmyal bar skyes pa de dag gis ni/ dmyal ba rnams nas yongasasu
239b8(gzungs 'dus): thar/ gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams dang / gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa rnams dang / gang dag yid btags kyi skye gnas las yongs thar te/ de dag thams cad bde
240a1(gzungs 'dus): 'gro'i lam la bkod par gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling du yang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po byung bar gyur/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa chen po dang / lo legs
240a2(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / skye bo ngal po che dang / mis gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad bde bar tshim par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das gal ba de log su
240a3(gzungs 'dus): thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ shin du rnyed par dka' ba lags ni/ bcom ldan
240a4(gzungs 'dus): 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gzungs 'dzin par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin yid
240a5(gzungs 'dus): la bgyid pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam skye bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje leg so// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis yongs zhus pa ni
240a6(gzungs 'dus): legs par yongasu zhus so// yang lag na rdo rje song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yongasu dris shig dang / 'di des ston par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje 'jam dpal
240a7(gzungs 'dus): gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang zhig byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan
240a8(gzungs 'dus): ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed dekun chub par byed/ tshal bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ 
240b1(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje gson cig dang / don de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod la dpe bstan to// lag na rdo rje gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa phyogs sam/ ri 'am/ ri khrod kyang rung / 
240b2(gzungs 'dus): sa phyogs de thams cad skra'i rtse mo tsam du bshags pa 'am/ lug gi spu nyag ma gcig gis reg par byed na yang / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi sku gdung mi zhugs pa'i gnas kyi sa phyogs de ni rdul phra
240b3(gzungs 'dus): rab tsam yang ma mthong zhing / nam mkha' la yang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi ring srel dang / gdung gi ring srel dang / chos kyi ring srel dang / yungs 'bru tsam gyis ring srel gyis ma gang ba skra'i rtse mo zug
240b4(gzungs 'dus): pa tsam yang med la/ sems can mthu chen po 'ga' zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel thams cad kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed/ spyod par byed la/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang ba'i rdul rnams
240b5(gzungs 'dus): kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed spyod par byed la/ lag na rdo rje ci sems can de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ snyam du rig par bya'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni shin du ya
240b6(gzungs 'dus): mtshan che ba dang / dkon pa yin snyam du rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje gson cig/ de thams cad bgrang ba dang / gzhal ba dang / spyad par nus mod kyi/ lag na rdo rje
240b7(gzungs 'dus): ring srel gang dag yin pa dang / rdul phra rab gang dag yin pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa'am/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ stong du gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal
240b8(gzungs 'dus): po 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po brjod du zin kyang / brjod pa'am dpe mtshon par mi spyod de/ lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di mthu che ba yin pas/ klag pa dang mchod pa dang / kun
241a1(gzungs 'dus): chub par byas nas bsod nams kyi phung po skye bar 'gyur/ de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phya
241a2(gzungs 'dus): chen po gnas pa'i sems can de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas de dag thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 
241a3(gzungs 'dus): tu lung bstan pa thob nas/ lan gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rmang
241a4(gzungs 'dus): du byung ba'i mngon par shes pa can de la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba'i phrin las mdzad pa de la phyag 'tsha'o// phyag 'tshalo// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do// 
241a5(gzungs 'dus): des na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje don gyi dbang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
241a6(gzungs 'dus): la yongasu zhus shig dang / don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// dris na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum 'askor
241a7(gzungs 'dus): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
241a8(gzungs 'dus): bstsal pa/ lag ni rdo rje gzungs 'di las dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pa nyon cig/ log ni rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod par 'dod zhing / byang chub kyi
241b1(gzungs 'dus): lam yong su rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can des bsam pa dge bas gzungs 'di legs par gsungs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya ste/ lag na rdo rje
241b2(gzungs 'dus): dad pa can gyi rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang gtsang ma/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ 
241b3(gzungs 'dus): rnam pa lnga bsten pa de 'jim pa dang / ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ ji ltar 'byor pa 'dod pa'i me tog bkram zhing spos dang / bdug pas gdugs nas/ bcom
241b4(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyi sku bsil bar bya'o// chu de la yang byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyis lan bduni bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tsan dan dkar pos byug par bya'o// gur
241b5(gzungs 'dus): gum gyi mchod par bya zhing / ci 'byor pa mchod pa yang ba/ bskor bar yang bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs kyi rgyal po de yang lan cig dran par bya'o// 
241b6(gzungs 'dus): me gcig kyang sbyar bar byas te/ log na rdo rje de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// dpe yang bsnyen par bya'o// lag ni rdo rje gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
241b7(gzungs 'dus): rten gyi khams kyi klu'i rgyal po chen por gyur nas/ char gyi rgyuni gcig gis zim bu phra mo 'bebs par byed la/ skyes bu mthu chen po dang ldan zhing 'ga' zhig zim bu dang / char gyi
241b8(gzungs 'dus): rgyun de dag bgrang bar byed/ dper yang byed la/ bgrang ba des zim bu thams cad bgrangs/ zhal sdoms nas de bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rigs kyi bu
242a1(gzungs 'dus): #/ 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des mchod pa byas/ mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
242a2(gzungs 'dus): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas/ bkur bsti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba ni re shig bsod nams kyi phung po 'di tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur ro// 
242a3(gzungs 'dus): zhes bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag pa gcig la snyad par nus kyi/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshod bzung bar mi spyod do// lag na rdo rje gnyis pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba
242a4(gzungs 'dus): mi nyung ba zhig skye bar 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje sems can rnams gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ byang chub kyi snying po'i borgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/ gro ga 'am ras sam/ gang
242a5(gzungs 'dus): yang rung ba 'ga' zhig la bris la/ mchod rten gyi las byas la/ mchod rten de'i dbus su bcug na/ des na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las 'bum byas par
242a6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur zhing / lag na rdo rje de snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skye bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
242a7(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu mo gang mdo dang rtogs pa thams cad rdzogs par byed cing / lam gyi gzhi mdo'am/ ri drung ngam/ chu 'gram 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgo 'am/ lam po cher mchod rten legs par byas te/ 
242a8(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten gyi dbus su gzungs 'di'i phyag rgya yang 'jug cing srog shing yang 'dzugs cing byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mchod rten ni/ dpe gong ma rdul phra rab dang / 
242b1(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten ces bya/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po mchod rten ces bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ces bya'o// zhes de
242b2(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa'i mchod rten la bdug pa'am/ me tog gam/ mdud pa 'am/ 
242b3(gzungs 'dus): thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / lan cig tsam bskor bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma tsam skye bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral
242b4(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// lus shin tu
242b5(gzungs 'dus): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po mthar thug gib tu dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par 'gyur ro// phyin chad ma'i mngal du mi skye bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub kyi snang
242b6(gzungs 'dus): bo'i brgyan gyi gzungs 'di rnyed par dka' ba yin no// lag na rdo rje gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bstan 'jim pa las byos pa'am/ ri mor bris pa'am/ shing las byas pa 'am/ 
242b7(gzungs 'dus): spros las byas pa 'am/ ra gan las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa'am/ dngul las byas pa 'am/ gser las byas pa 'am/ gos las byas pa
242b8(gzungs 'dus): zhig byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i nang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang thams cad rdzogs par bris te bcug nas/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba byed cing phyog
243a1(gzungs 'dus): kyang 'tshal na/ lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa dper mdzad pa dang / de bzhin
243a2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pas bsgrags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnyed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen
243a3(gzungs 'dus): po'i thigs pa'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas par 'gyur ro// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu
243a4(gzungs 'dus): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti byed na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byas/ gus par byas/ bla mar byas
243a5(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur te/ bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs
243a6(gzungs 'dus): kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'di ni phan yon che ba mthu tsho ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i ming brjod pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skye bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur
243a7(gzungs 'dus): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
243a8(gzungs 'dus): bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par 'dod cing / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
243b1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la mchod par 'dod pa des gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i mdo 'di thams cad rang gi lag nas glegs bam du bri bar bya/ za ma tog byas te/ 
243b2(gzungs 'dus): de'i nang du gzhug par bya/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod par bya/ bstod par bya/ bskor bar bya ste/ de nas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
243b3(gzungs 'dus): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la mchod par 'gyur/ yo byad thams cad kyis
243b4(gzungs 'dus): mchod par 'gyur/ sems can de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de
243b5(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar
243b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur te/ sems can do ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
243b7(gzungs 'dus): lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rgyal ba'i sras dag phyi ma'i dus na/ gzungs kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'di nub par ma 'gyur bar
243b8(gzungs 'dus): rjes su gtad kyis/ sems can 'di dag kyang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab par gyis la/ rang rang gi bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / gsang bsngags dang / phyag rgya dag kyang byin cig
244a1(gzungs 'dus): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
244a2(gzungs 'dus): zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi med rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'das bdag cag la sman thogs lags te/ dam pa'i chos kyi
244a3(gzungs 'dus): gzungs kyi rtog pa 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa'i skyes bu dam pa yang yongs su bskyang ba dang / yo byad thams cad kyis mi bral bar 'tshal/ phyag rgya dang / gsang bsngags kyang gsal
244a4(gzungs 'dus): bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi 'khor lo bskor gyi bar du bsrung bar yang 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
244a5(gzungs 'dus): chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das
244a6(gzungs 'dus): kyis thugs su chud de dka' bsngal nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di gsungs so// de nas 'di'i cho ga las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba sgrub slab/ sdig pa thams cid rnam par
244a7(gzungs 'dus): 'jig par byed pa bshad par bya'o// gtsang ma gtsang ma'i gos bgos te/ legs bkrus bzlas brjod byed pa ni/ gang dang gang du sbyar ba li/ yas ni 'bras bu yod par
244b1(gzungs 'dus): byed/ de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur/ nad thams cad
244b2(gzungs 'dus): dang bral bar 'gyur/ de la lha thams cad rtag tu bsrung ba dang / sred par byed/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang rtag tu
244b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ shi 'a'ophos nas kyang mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar

244b5(gzungs 'dus): cad las thor bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ phyin chad nam yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// 
244b6(gzungs 'dus): lan bdun brjod pas 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag la lan thebs par 'gyur/ zla ba nya ba'i tshes bcwo lnga nyin zhag gcig tu srung ba byas nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos
244b7(gzungs 'dus): te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar mes mchod pa
244b8(gzungs 'dus): zhing / byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang lan stong du brjod par bya'o// bzlas brjod stong tshang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa
245a1(gzungs 'dus): shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi mdag can btang ste/ spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ dbugs mabyin par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang gsal to// rigs sngags 'dzin
245a2(gzungs 'dus): chen po le gso logs so// khyad kyis legs par spyad pa byas so// skyes bu chen po khyod kyis byang chub kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i brgyan gyi gzungs grub po// rig sngags 'dzin chen po khyod kyis
245a3(gzungs 'dus): brtson 'grus shin du sbyangs so// // 'bad pa bso// khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos yongasu bskong gis// khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'gro 'dod pa der song shig dang / bdag nyid
245a4(gzungs 'dus): kye lus kyang rig sngags 'dzin gyi 'bar ba can du 'gyu ro// gsang sngags dang rtogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ dam pa'i mchog thams cad kyang ci bder spyod par 'gyur/ 'di ni sngon
245a5(gzungs 'dus): bsnyen pa byas pa'i sgrub pa yin te/ gal te 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa zhig yin na yang / de bsrung ba byas pa'i bzlas brjod cig 'grub par 'gyuraro// /
