245a7(gzungs 'dus): gyis bkang la lan stong du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas thams cad du spyad par byas ste/ yungs dkar tshangs par blangs nas/ klu'i gnasu gtor na/ klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ klu'i gnas
245a8(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ba ster te/ thams cad rkang pa 'dud cing gang bsgo ba do nyan ti/ gan mo lpags mi 'bab par 'gyur/ chub ma mi ldang 'gyur/ phyogs bzhir gtor na/ klu dang cha dang she sdang rdzi
245b1(gzungs 'dus): sbrang bu dang ri srog dang / bye ba dang / gcan zan gtum po la sogs pa thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro// mer gtor na me dpal zhi bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen por gtor na/ brtan par 'gyur ro// chu rgyun chen por
245b2(gzungs 'dus): gtan na rgyan chad 'gyur ro// 'gron po'i nang du gter na chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / mi rgad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// lam drang por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na/ rgyal po
245b3(gzungs 'dus): dang / blon po dang btsun mo dam pa dbang du 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// demag gi nang du gtor na thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// tshong dus kyi nang du
245b4(gzungs 'dus): ga ta ra ne/ thams cad rangs par 'gyur ro// zhing la gtor na zhing gi srin bu med par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu gnas pa'i mtshe 'ur gtor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang ches
245b5(gzungs 'dus): pa'i ches pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na char 'chad par 'gyur ro// dgra'i khyim du gtor na phyis dgra mi ldang bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar
245b6(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro// yul gyi nang du gtor na thams cad rengs par 'gyur/ rgyal bar 'gyur/ khar blugs na 'thab pa dang / brtsod
245b7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la lan thebs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la yungs dka ra gyi chus bkrus na nad med par 'gyur ro// gnod thams cad la bu ram dang bsres te bdugs
245b8(gzungs 'dus): ne/ gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyu ro// ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo 'chi ba la lam gyi bzhi mdor mar yungs dkar gyis sbyin sreg byas na/ 
246a1(gzungs 'dus): nang thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rang la gtor na mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// mchod rten gyi gnas thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// zla nya ba'i chos bco lnga la 'phags pa 'jam dpal
246a2(gzungs 'dus): gyi zhabs la mnan te/ srid nas nam langs kyi bar du gu gul gis bdug cing / bzlas brjod byas nas/ nam langs pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du 'dug cing dam pa thams cad sbyin par byed/ 
246a3(gzungs 'dus): yid la re ba thams cad yongs su bskong bar byed/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la mnan te/ yungs dkar dang / gu gul dang / mar gyis bdug cing lan stong rtsa rgyad du bzlas rjod byas na/ rang
246a4(gzungs 'dus): gi gzugs kyi mdun na bzhugs shing rigs sngags rtog pa dang ma bral ba thams cad kyi grub pa gsol par mdzad/ ra ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol mdzad/ bu gzhin du yongs su skyob par mdzad/ 
246a5(gzungs 'dus): nor bu bzang po'i bu'i rkang pa mnan/ lan stong du bzlas brjod byas na/ nor mang po ster bar 'gyur te/ re ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// bu'i gzugs su mdun na 'dug cing gang
246a6(gzungs 'dus): bsgo ba de nyan to// rnam thos bu'i spyi bor man te/ a ka rus bdug cing lan brgya rtsa gnyisu bzlas brjod byas na/ nor bu bzang po'i gter ster bar 'gyuraro// tshon sna lngas gnod sbyin mo bris te/ 
246a7(gzungs 'dus): de'i mdun du sAl gyis 'dug cing / lan stong rtsa nyi shur zlas brjod byas na/ mdun na 'dug cing dag gzhu bar 'gyur ro// gang spro ba de nyan cing ji srid mtsho'i bar tu 'dug par 'gyuraro// 
246a8(gzungs 'dus): gzhan dag gis kyang las stong phrag dang / de bzhin du las brgya phrag dag byed cing / thams cad du dngos grub la sbyar bar 'gyuraro// de nas mo'i sku gzugs dam pa don thams cad grub par
246b1(gzungs 'dus): byed pa bshad byaso// ras khru bzhi pa khA char ma cad pa skyon med pa la rI med mkhan gtsang ma gos la/ bsnang ba byas pa/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
246b2(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rin pa chen shing ljon pa'i drung na/ seng ge'i khri la zhugs pa bri'o// de'i 'og du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs shig bri'o// bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston par mjed pa
246b3(gzungs 'dus): bri'o// rin po che'i shring ljon pa de'i lo ma ni byang chub kyi shing lta bur bya'o// g.yas logasu 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pad ma'i steng du pus me btsugs nas/ bcom
246b4(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das la lhung zad 'bul ba bri'o// g.yon phyogs phu 'phags pa lag na rdo rje pa bsgyur ba khros pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa pad ma'i steng du pus mo btsugs te/ 
246b5(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje gsor bar byed cing / bcom ldan 'das lta bo bri/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyab du mchod rten stong chu zheng gi ba pi ldan kon gyis brgyan pa bri'o// mchod sdong gi nang du sangs rgyas bcom
246b6(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la zhugs shing / dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i rgyab logs su byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi ma de za ma tog gi nang du bcug nas/ seng ge'i khri'i
246b7(gzungs 'dus): nade bzhag pa bri'o// de'i drung dud bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bri'o// de'i 'og logs su rdo rje'i pho nya mo bag bzhad lhag lhaga'i'adon par bri'o// mchod stong gi 'og tu lha mo dpal dri'o// gnas kyi nang du
246b8(gzungs 'dus): rgyal po chen pa pa ni gos bshes pa khros pa'i gzugs su 'dug pa bri'o// de dag gi'i galal su rig sngags 'dzin pus mo btsugs nas/ lag na pog por thigs dgrang 'bring grang zhing bcom ldan
247a1(gzungs 'dus): 'das la blta ba bri'o// gal te mnar med par 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / 'jams med pa lnga byed pa zhig yin kyang / mi
247a2(gzungs 'dus): ma'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis mad thams cad yongasu bdugs par 'gyur te/ sems can de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par byad/ lhag par bya ba mad pe byas pa lta smos kyang
247a3(gzungs 'dus): dgos te/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'tshungs par reg par bya'o// da na dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ lha'i gnas dag kyang rung / ba lang
247a4(gzungs 'dus): gyi 'jim pa lci ba dang / bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa 'khor yug du phru bcu drug pa shin du bster ba/ gnas bzang po dang / 'tsham par legs par byi dor byas shing / ri mor mkhan gtsang ma
247a5(gzungs 'dus): gos gtsang ma gos pas mtshon sna lnga khor yug du sgra bzhi dang / gru bzhi cha mnyam par brgyan pa bri'o// gru bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
247a6(gzungs 'dus): gzhag go// sgo sgor rin po che'i shing ljon pa shing du 'dzes pa bris la/ shar skor lha mo dpal gzhag gi// lho sgor tshig ldanA ma zhag go// nub sgor dung canA ma bzhag go// byang sgor me ta ges
247a7(gzungs 'dus): can ste/ 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar sres pas gtor bar bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya/ bum pa gang bzhi dang / dri bzhin du lta bshos kyis gang ba bzhi yang bzhag par bya sku
247a8(gzungs 'dus): pog por bzhi yang bzhags par bya// sna tshogs ro dang legs bshams pa'i// sna tshogs gter ma bzhag par bya// me tog 'phreng ni sna tshogs bzhag/ lha bshos rtag tu dkar po bya// sku gadrug
247b1(gzungs 'dus): shar phyogs zhal bstan te// phyogs bzhir mar ma gzugs par bya/ rigs 'dzin nub phyogs khaltas nas// bzlas brjod kyi ni las bya'o// bsrung ba'i cho ga las byas nas// nub kyi sgo nas 'jug
247b2(gzungs 'dus): par bya// zhugs pa tsam gyis mdo las ni// sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig/ drangos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// bsod nams thams cad rab tu ste// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub
247b3(gzungs 'dus): 'tho bo// ngan 'gro kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyis mi thub 'gyur/ nyin ma dang ni mtshan mo yang // lha rnams thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur// rigs sngags 'dzin pa'i grogs
247b4(gzungs 'dus): po dag/ brtag tu srung phyir bstan par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs pa'i// sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur// yang 'di gsang sngags kyi le'u rigs sngags thams cad
247b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi don sgrub par bya'o// oM sArba ta thA ga te/ bya ba lco ki te dza ya dza ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// oM dza ya mA ri le dza ye swA hA// gtor me'i gsang sngagas+ho// oM sarba sran d+ha ra
247b6(gzungs 'dus): mi la dzaM ye swA h+la// spyan drang ba'i gsangad+ma sngags so// oM sarba bud d+ha ku su mas hi// me tog gi gsang sngagaso// oM dza ya gan d+he swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags so// A~M bi dza ya garbe sa hA/ 
247b7(gzungs 'dus): dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags so// oM sarba ta thug dza ye swA hA/ s+yai gtsug bcing ba'o// A dza yA prad dre swA hA/ gos bgro bo'i gsang sngags// oM ku lan+da d+ha ri srahA/ slob ma'i gras
247b8(gzungs 'dus): sngags// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi li dza ye swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsil pa'i gsol sngags// oM su sa~M b+hA dza ye swA he/ grong 'phreng gi gsang sdig so// oM su~Md+hA ri dzi ye sa~Mha/ ba nig
248a1(gzungs 'dus): gsang sngags so// sau pra ni b+hI ra dza me d+mo/ log 'dren pa cing ba'o// oM prA par rnga mra sa d+hes hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyun drang bu'i gas sngags/ oM rag shan rdza
248a2(gzungs 'dus): bdag srung ba'i gsang sngags so// oM bi dzas dri ba nes d+hu/ mar mI'i sngagaso// oM mra ma la bi ma me dze le sihA// sbyin bsreg gi gsang sngags so// oM ba las dzes sid des hA/ dang na
248a3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab pa'i gsang sdig so// snying po'i tshig yin te/ lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas pas/ rigs sngags 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po
248a4(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// ldong gros la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas te/ mig la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bug gi gnas thams cad sgrib pa med par mthong ste/ gang
248a5(gzungs 'dus): 'gro 'dod pa der 'jug la rag gro/ tshe bskul ba thub par 'gyu ro// snyun se'u bi ri la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ mi snang bar 'gyu ro// 'byung po'i gnas thams cad sgrib pa
248a6(gzungs 'dus): med par mthong bar 'gyur/ lan khri bzlas brjod byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthing bar 'gyu ro// 'jam dpal gi no nur gyur pa'i lhung bzed blangs te/ lan drug slong
248a7(gzungs 'dus): brjod byas la/ 'u thug gis bkang nas/ 'jam dngol gyi lag tu bzhag na/ skye'o slong gis chos kyang mi mdzad par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang 'i ltar yid la shin tu 'dzud pa'i don dag grub parla
248a8(gzungs 'dus): de nas phyog rgyal shad par bya'o// lag pa gnyis mnyam par gzhig ste/ lag pa g.yon pas gangs pa gzir bar bya zhing / snyi lar gzhag par bya'o// 'di na byang chub kyi snying ba'i rkyen
248b1(gzungs 'dus): sa bya ba'i byang tu sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ dbugs 'byin byed dang sa san+ti/ kun la stsa gsol pa 'debs pa yin/ phyug tu 'di ni la sa rnams kun/ byed pa bla ma sa
248b2(gzungs 'dus): pa yin/ laglog yas dbugs 'byin lta bu yi phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad du// sangs rgyu sa kun gyis byin gyis rlabs// mkhas pa lag pa g.yas pa ni// lte ba'i thang khar bzhag nas
248b3(gzungs 'dus): grang mo yis ni gzir ba zhing // 'dzub mo yis bsdigs par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// kun la bstan bya de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyis ni byin gyis rlabs// phyag rgya 'di ni
248b4(gzungs 'dus): mthong tsam gyis// sdig pa kun las rnam par gro le// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis nA~M// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ byin
248b5(gzungs 'dus): gyis rlabs par tha tsim+ba me// da nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par rtogs pa'i rgyal pos 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs smras pa// na mo many+dzu shri yA yA// ku ma ra byA
248b6(gzungs 'dus): tAs+sa/ tad+yaD+D+h+ya/ dza ye bi dza me/ dza ye shri dz+raHsa hU~M/ sgrub pa'i tshe/ sder lan bdun rjes su dran par bya'o// de nas gnad sbyin gyi sdeng pa ni chen paM lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po 'di bsru
248b7(gzungs 'dus): ba'i phyir// gis sngags smras pa/ d+d+hom+me/ badz+nyA mAn+tha/ rgyan byed/ pas brje seM / yu s+yAd sbrul lan bdun ba sgos da dbus te/ phyogs pa ni ga ta nA/ 'tshams
248b8(gzungs 'dus): bcad par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal ba chen po ban dag gis rigs sngags 'di ba rnaMs/ d+ya kyi la me 'iHsa ra pras ra/ b+h+r-i b+hai ri sat+ya/ yungs yul med kyi nu rtsa gcig rna
249a1(gzungs 'dus): brjod byas te/ bdag nyid la dbang bsgyur na 'byung po dang / nod sbyin dang / srin po la srogs thams cad 'byer bur 'gyur// rdzogs s+ho// 3// rgya ga na a r+yas pa
249a2(gzungs 'dus): ra mi ta a yur dz+nyA na/ na ma mA hA ya na su twa/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad
249a3(gzungs 'dus): badrag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bro com ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ mdza ta'i tshul mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong
249a4(gzungs 'dus): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub seMs dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po drang thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jom dpal gzhan nur gyur pa
249a5(gzungs 'dus): la bka' bstsal pa/ 'jom dpal shar phyogs logs na/ yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khas yod de/ dri na tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin du rnam
249a6(gzungs 'dus): par gradon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs zhugs te/ mtsho zhing skyong ba sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 
249a7(gzungs 'dus): nyon cig 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa/ 'dzam bu'i k+Shing 'di'u mi rnam sna na thung ba la tshol brgya pa shu sta ga de dgu ye 'brog mang par bskrun to// de ltar na 'jam dpa'i
249a8(gzungs 'dus): sems can gang gis tshe dang ye shes dpag du med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dpag du med pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi gzungs 'di bris ma/ 'drir 'jug gam/ mdzar
249b1(gzungs 'dus): tsam thos bu'am/ 'dzin pa'am/ klog bam la bris te/ khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/ me drug dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa
249b2(gzungs 'dus): de dag gis tshe yongasu zad pa las/ tsha lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// 'jam dang la seM sa can gang dgra tshe dang ye shes dpag du med pa/ shin du rnam par gdun mi zla bu'i rgyal po
249b3(gzungs 'dus): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag gi tshe rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes zad khar mtshan 'chang por 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe rnam par
249b4(gzungs 'dus): 'phel bar 'gyuraro// 'jamra dpral de lta bsran rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa dag blo drag/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang dpag tu med pa'i mtshan brgya
249b5(gzungs 'dus): rtsa brgyad ny+dzan tAma?/ yi ge 'bri'am/ 'brir 'jug na/ de dag gi yon tan dang / legs par gyur pa nI 'dra dag go// AM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ra mi ta/ a yur dz+nyA na// 
249b6(gzungs 'dus): su b+hI ni shIt+ya de dze rA dza yA/ ta thA ga ta yA/ a ra ha ta/ sA myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya tha/ oM sarba saM ka ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga gr-i na/ sa munga? ga te/ sa b+ha wa b+hi shudra d+haM/ maha
249b7(gzungs 'dus): yin pa rI wA ri swAhA// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ngargya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag/ gang la la bzhig yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi gar 'drir 'jug gam/ glags
249b8(gzungs 'dus): bamal bris te/ khyim na 'chang ngam/ klog par 'gyur na/ tshe zad pa las tshel brgya thub par 'gyur ro// de shi 'phos nas/ de bzhin gshegs tshe dang shes dang gi du
250a1(gzungs 'dus): shA/ med pa'i sangs kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan dpag med pa dag la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pA ra mi ta/ a yur dzA
250a2(gzungs 'dus): na su b+hi ni/ shInyate dzo rA yau/ tu tha ga ta ya/ a ra ha ta/ samyaka sa bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM swarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+har+m+ma te/ ga ga nu sra mu da ga te/ sa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA ya ne
250a3(gzungs 'dus): pa re wa re sa hAM/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tsha dang ye shes dpag du med pa'i mdo sde 'di
250a4(gzungs 'dus): gsungs// ai na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ma ta/ a yur dzA na/ su b+h+r-i ni sh+tsi te taM dza ra dza ya/ ta thA ga da ya/ a ra hi ta/ samya ka saM bud dA ya/ dad+ya thA/ oM sarba si skA ri pa ra shu da dwe dwerma de ga
250a5(gzungs 'dus): ga na/ sa mud ga te/ sa b+ha wa bA shud d+he/ ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swa hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyings gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
250a6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso// AM na mi b+ha ga wa ti/ a pa ra mi ti/ a yur dz+nyA na/ su b+hi ni shr-I ta te dzo rA dza yaHta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te/ samyaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thAHoM sarba saM ska ri/ pa r-i
250a7(gzungs 'dus): shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na/ sa mud ga taM/ sa b+he wa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wa raM sahA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa bdun gyi dgongs pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis/ tshe
250a8(gzungs 'dus): dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungaso// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa re mi ta/ a yur dz+nyA na/ su b+hi ni sh+tsi to dzi rA dza yaM/ te thA ga tA ya/ a ra hi hi/ samya ga se bud d+ha ya/ dad+ya thA/ 
250b1(gzungs 'dus): oM sarba saM ska ri/ pa ri shud d+he/ d+harma te gu ga na/ sa mu ga t+ye/ saM b+hA wa b+hI shud d+he ma dA ya na pa ri wa re sa hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa lngas dgongs
250b2(gzungs 'dus): pa gcig dang / dbyangs gcig gis/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so// o na mo b+ha ga wa de/ a pa ra mi tra/ A yu ra dzA ne su b+hi nAM/ sh+tsi ta te dza rA dza ya/ 
250b3(gzungs 'dus): tra thA ga ta ya/ a rA ha te/ saM myaka saM bud d+ha yA/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri/ pe ri shud d+hi/ d+harmA ta ga ga na/ sa mud ga te/ sa b+hA wa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA ye nA/ pa ra wa ri sA hA// yang
250b4(gzungs 'dus): de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtse lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis/ tshe dang ye shes dpag du med pa'i mdo sde'i de gsungasaM// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa
250b5(gzungs 'dus): rA mi ta/ a yur dzA na/ su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta tai dza rA dze ya/ tra thu ga ta ya/ a rA ha te/ swamaka saM bud dA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o sarba so ska ri pa ri shud d+he/ da r+m+ma tai gA gu na/ sa mu daM g+h+r-i tre/ sa byA wa
250b6(gzungs 'dus): b+hi shud d+he/ mra hA ya na/ pi ri wa re sa ha// yang de'i tshe srangs rgyas bye ba bzhi btsurtswa lngas dra grangs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang shas dpag du med pa'i
250b7(gzungs 'dus): me di swai 'di gsungaso// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ra mi ta/ oM yur dzA na/ su b+hi ni/ sh+tsi ta tra dza rA dza ya/ dathA gra ta yaM/ a ra dA da/ saM myaka saM bud dA/ tad+ya tha/ a sarba sa?
250b8(gzungs 'dus): ska ri pa ri shud d+he/ dA ma de ga ga na/ sa mud ga te/ sa b+hA wa b+hi shud d+hi/ ma hA yo na pa ri wa re swA hA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa lngas gongs pa gcig
251a1(gzungs 'dus): dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag du med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsung so// oMn mo b+ha ga wa te/ a par mri ta/ a yur dz+nyA na/ su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dz+re ra dzA yA/ ta thAg
251a2(gzungs 'dus): dA yA/ a rA ha te/ saM myaka saM bud d+ha yA/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saMskaM ri pa ri shud d+he/ d+harma te gau ga na/ sa mung gA te/ sa b+hA lpa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA yA na pi ri wa raM swahA/ ya~Mng de'i tshe sangs rgya ste
251a3(gzungs 'dus): bye ba phragA nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag du med pa'i mdo sde'ang gsungs so// oM nu mo b+ha gA wa te/ a pa ra mi ta/ a yur
251a4(gzungs 'dus): dz+nyAnaHsu b+h+yAM naM sh+tsi te ti dzA rA dza ya/ ta thA ga da yu u ra ha te/ samyaka bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ A nA mr-i b+he gra wa tra/ oM sarba saM skaM ri pa ri shud d+he dArma te/ ga gran su mung gra da?/ saM b+ha ba b+hI
251a5(gzungs 'dus): shud d+he/ mU hA yin pa ri wa re satwA/ yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba brag gang ga'i klung gi bye mA snyed kyis dgongs gcig dang / dbyings gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag
251a6(gzungs 'dus): drimyed pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs// oM nu ma b+ha ga lpA te/ oM pa rom te/ A sur dzAn/ su b+h+r-i na shrI ti te dz+re ra dza ya/ da thA ga tA ya/ Ar hr-i de/ sa muka sa drung dAy+Ya/ a sarba saski ring
251a7(gzungs 'dus): pori zung d+he d+hAm ti/ g+hag na si mu ga te/ d+he/ mnA ma nA pa ri m+b+ha sbe / gang ba zhig med du ng+ge shes dpag med pa'i ma ste 'dri gsung so// yi ger 'drir 'am/ 'dzir 'thun
251a8(gzungs 'dus): gam/ 'i ching ngam/ klog na/ tshe ma pe las tshel brgya thu par 'gyur ro// oMn mo b+ha ga wa te/ a par mid/ a sur d+hiH/ su b+hi ni shrI de dzo ra~M dzas/ dgra gtal/ a na
251b1(gzungs 'dus): sa~M mu ka saM bud dA ya/ tud+ya thA/ oM sarba sa~M skA ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te gra ga na/ sa mudak+te swa b+ha wa b+hI shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swAt+ma// / gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu
251b2(gzungs 'dus): med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi gerarwa 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nam
251b3(gzungs 'dus): du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyu ro/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dze
251b4(gzungs 'dus): ra dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ u ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+hi ya/ titad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA rA pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na/ sa ma mud ga te sa bA wa b+ha shud+d+he/ ma hA ya na pa ri wa re
251b5(gzungs 'dus): swA hA/ gang la la zhig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'jug na/ nges chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur
251b6(gzungs 'dus): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pA ra mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni/ sh+tsi ta twe dzo re dzA ya/ tA thA ga ta ya a ra ha te si myak+ka saM b+hud d+ha yaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM saHsaM skA ri pa ri shud d+hi
251b7(gzungs 'dus): rme t+te ga ga nA sa mu dag te swA b+hA wa bi shu daM d+he mahA ya na pa re wa re swA hA/ ga zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ des
251b8(gzungs 'dus): chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du ba cug pa dang / rab tu gnas pa byas pa yin no// oMn mo b+ha ga la ti u pa ra mi ta a sur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni sh+tsita te dzo dza yan ta nA
252a1(gzungs 'dus): ta ya/ a ra ha te saM myak+ka sau b+hud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba sau skA ri pa ri shud d+ho d+harmA te ga gra na sa mud ga te/ swa b+ha l+yA b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shre
252a2(gzungs 'dus): dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de'i 'tshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyu ro/ o na mo b+ha ga wa tai a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi na shI ta ta
252a3(gzungs 'dus): dzo rA dza ya/ ta tha ga ta ya a ra ha te saMmyak+ka saM b+hud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud d+he d+harme taM ga ga na sa mud ga te sa b+ha wa bi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig
252a4(gzungs 'dus): tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am yi ger 'dir 'jug na/ de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongasu byung 'gyuraro// // oM na mo d+haM ga wa te a pa
252a5(gzungs 'dus): ra mi ta a yu ra dz+nyA na su bi ni/ sh+tsi ta te dzo ra dzA ya ta thA ga ti yA a ra ha te saMma?ka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga d+he sa b+ha wa b+hi shu da d+he ma hA
252a6(gzungs 'dus): ya na pa ri wa raM swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyi
252a7(gzungs 'dus): srin pos glags be tsa lA klags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a ba ra mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dza yA/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud d+ha
252a8(gzungs 'dus): thA/ oM sarbas skA ri ba ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na/ sa mu dag te swa b+ha la b+hi shud d+he ma hA sa na bai raM lo ra~M sI// gang zhig tshe dang ye shes rapag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'i
252b1(gzungs 'dus): 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis kyang de la phyag skyong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
252b2(gzungs 'dus): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur to/ de dag 'di la the tsom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ oM na mo b+ha gA wa te a pa ra mai ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni
252b3(gzungs 'dus): ta te dzo ra dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra hA te saM myAk+ka se bud d+ha ya/ tad thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te sa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re sA hA/ ga
252b4(gzungs 'dus): zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'di 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyur/ 
252b5(gzungs 'dus): oM na mo b+ha ga we twe a pa ra mi ta a yur dzA na su b+hi nai sh+tsi ta te dzo ra dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya a ra ha te saMmyak+ka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+hai d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga
252b6(gzungs 'dus): te sa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa ri swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med
252b7(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro/ o na mo b+ha ga te a pa ra mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dza ra dza ya/ ta tha ga ta ya a ra ha te saM mya ka saM
252b8(gzungs 'dus): bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te sarba wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang na mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba'i sa phyogs
253a1(gzungs 'dus): de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/ byol song gi skye gnasu song ba'i bye dang / ri dgas gang gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
253a2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ra mI ta a yur dzA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dze ra dza ra ya/ t+ya thA ga ta ya/ a ra ha te saM myaka saM bud
253a3(gzungs 'dus): d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga ga nA sa mud g+ha te/ swa b+hA wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA yaM na pe ri waM re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di
253a4(gzungs 'dus): yi ger 'dri 'am yi ger 'dir 'jug na// de bud med kyi dngos po rI nam du yang skye bar mri 'gyur/ o na mo b+ha ga wa te e pa ra mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dz+ro ra dza ya/ taH
253a5(gzungs 'dus): ga ta ya a ra he te saM mya ka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thAM/ oM sarba saMska ri pa ri shud d+ha d+harma tag ga nA sa mud gA te/ swa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa rai sA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag du med
253a6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i mdo sde 'di'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir dkar sha pa ni gcig byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ste/ sbyin par 'gyuraro// oM na
253a7(gzungs 'dus): mo b+ha gra wa te/ a pa ra mI ta/ a yur dzA na/ su b+hi nri sh+tsi da tre dz+re rA dza ya/ ta thA tra yA/ A ra ha de/ sa myaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska rI pa ri shud d+he/ d+harma ta ga ga no sa mud gA te/ swa b+hA wa
253a8(gzungs 'dus): b+hi shud d+hen ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos thams cad byang chub par 'gyur ro// 
253b1(gzungs 'dus): a namo b+ha ga wa de/ a ra me ta/ a yur dz+nyA na/ u b+hi ni sh+tsi tid dze ra dza ya/ da thA gra yA/ a rA d+ha te/ samyaka saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud d+he/ d+harma de ga ga na sa mud g+ha / sab+hA
253b2(gzungs 'dus): wa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA ya na pa ri wa re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub
253b3(gzungs 'dus): dang / gser thub dang 'od bsrungs dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i
253b4(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nu so/ o na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa ra mi ta a yu rA dzA na su b+hi ni sh+tsi ta te dza rA dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya a ra ha te saM myag saM bud d+ha ya/ ta d+ya thAH
253b5(gzungs 'dus): oM bams skA rI bo ri shud d+he d+ham te ga gan/ sa mu dag te swa b+hA b+hI shud d+he ma hA yin pa ri si She swA hU~M/ 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyam po'i rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i bu ba byang
253b6(gzungs 'dus): sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te a pa
253b7(gzungs 'dus): ra mi ta a yur dzA na su b+hi ni shrI ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga taM ya/ a ra ha te saM myag saM b+hUd ya/ tad+ya thA/ o sam rbA sa ska ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te ga gaM na sa mud g+ha te swa b+ha wa b+hi
253b8(gzungs 'dus): shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa ri swA hA// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po chus yongasu bkang ba'i thigs pa re re bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
254a1(gzungs 'dus): mang ni bgrang bar mi nus so// srin pa b+ha ka wa te/ a par myin umamadzon su byin kye+e ti trar jug tu thA ga ta ya/ a ran te/ samyags bud d+ha la/ dad+ya/ oM sarbas
254a2(gzungs 'dus): ri shud d+hA d+harma te ga ga na/ sa mud gA te/ swa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he ma hA ya na pa ri wa re sa hA// gang zhig tshe dang yaM shweswa dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di ya ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gus par byas de margod
254a3(gzungs 'dus): par byed pa de dag gi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gi shaM gas pa thams tsa dza la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byA saM pa yIn// AM nam b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ra ma ta/ a yur dz+nyA na/ su b+h+r-i na shwA ta
254a4(gzungs 'dus): ta dza ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta yA/ a ra ha te/ samya kra sa bud dA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba sa swa ri pa ri shud d+he d+harma te/ ga gr-i ne sa mud gA te/ swa b+ha wa b+hi bud d+ha ma da ya na pa ri wa re swa ha// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyasa? yang dag 'phaH
254a5(gzungs 'dus): mi'i seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grang khyer 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sgra ni grogs par ka tshul khrims stobs kyi sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// ma yI seng ge tshul khris
254a6(gzungs 'dus): stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi gro khyer 'jug pa na// tshul khris stobs kyis spangs rgya sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzad pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mI yi seng ge bzod pa
254a7(gzungs 'dus): stabs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grang khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i sdebasra kyis sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bcan 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ge btsan 'grus
254a8(gzungs 'dus): stobs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa ni// btsan 'grus stobs kyis skra ni grags par 'gyur// bas gdan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dga'aphags// mi yi seng ge bsam gtan
254b1(gzungs 'dus): stobs rdzogs nas/ snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// dus gtan skabs kyi sa ni lpags pa na 'gyur gyi she sbyar bstobs kyi sa sangs rgyas yang dge 'phags/ mI yi sred ge shes rab sums
254b2(gzungs 'dus): stobs stsogs nas// snying rje rngan gyi grong khyer 'jug pa ni// shes rab stobs kyis sgra ni grags par 'gyur/ oMn mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa rA mi te/ a yu dz+nyA na/ su b+hi nI shrIng+ga de dza~M ra dza ya \u0f7f/ 
254b3(gzungs 'dus): ga ta yA/ a ra ha ta saM myaka saM bud d+ha ya// tad+ya thA/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+he drA ma te ga gats+tshan+da su mud gA te swa b+ha wa b+hi shud d+he/ ma hA yan pa ri wa re sA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
254b4(gzungs 'dus): bstsal pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thes cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lce dang mAM dang lha ma yin de dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs
254b5(gzungs 'dus): la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa tshwa dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya grar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ra mi t+yA/ a yur dzA na na mA mra hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang
254b6(gzungs 'dus): ye shes dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po 'chi med rnga sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub seMs dpa' thos cad la phyag 'tshu la nr-i/ 'di skad dag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
254b7(gzungs 'dus): yul tsam pa na/ gang ka tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang brjes thabs gcig tu zhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' bskul
254b8(gzungs 'dus): pa/ dge slong dag bco ldan 'das kyi lngar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dog la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// 'di nas nub kyi phyog lon/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khas// de na/ 
255a1(gzungs 'dus): sngag/ rdzogs pa'i sangasu bcugs// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med// su zhig de'i mtshan brjod na// di ni de ru skye ba 'dzin// 'chi ba'i dus tshe ston pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong // den bud mang yod sa
255a2(gzungs 'dus): rga yin/ mngal na gnas pa srid pa yin/ rin can rnams kyi pad ma lung// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// gas dang zas dngon ma rnaMs dang / chosu gos dang ni mal cha rnams// sems skyed bya sra ma thag du ni// des
255a3(gzungs 'dus): thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bde can gyi sngags pa brjod// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam khyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun pas mi khyab
255a4(gzungs 'dus): bsam mi khyab la dad bcas nas// rnams par smin pa'ang med pas mi khyab// dge slong dug de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rgyas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshwa dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang
255a5(gzungs 'dus): bcas pa zhes bya ba// rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/ rgyal rigasu skyed so// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag du med pa'i yab ni/ 'kho
255a6(gzungs 'dus): lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang mchog ces bya bar gyur to// de'i yumA ni gr-izo rjid can nas bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// ram/ 
255a7(gzungs 'dus): ma tha ba ni kun pa'i drim med ces bya bar gyu // don slong da ga di bzhin gshegs pache pag srid kyi gis rjeb can gyi mchog tu gyur ba ni ldang po tig ces bya bar gyur to/ mu phrul dang ldan pa'i tshog
255a8(gzungs 'dus): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pached pag med kyi dadud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to// lha byin gyi ming ning
255b1(gzungs 'dus): ba zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dgra de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thas 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos drug khri yang // dge slong dag sas can thams cad kyis legs par bsas te/ 
255b2(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjesu dran par skams zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams badri ba can na zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du
255b3(gzungs 'dus): yid la bya'o// 'chi med rnga sgra'i gzungs 'di brjed par bya'o// han+da lan gsuM mtshan lan gsum du yan lag la gdugs nas/ phyag 'tshal te/ sems can thos cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag mad
255b4(gzungs 'dus): bsams nas/ zhag bcu 'das na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba
255b5(gzungs 'dus): sa cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yang su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa tsha dprag ming de'i sangs
255b6(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur// dge slong dag 'chi madra rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na// dad+ya thA/ sha ba la/ a ba li/ sa mdzal shi ni ri shai/ nir dza da/ nir dza ta/ ni ru ga te/ nan mu khe/ dzam
255b7(gzungs 'dus): pa ra tshe da ni/ su khro ba ti/ nI ra ta shwa/ A mri ta a yUr la le/ a yurag+ha rbe ni ra hU re/ armA ti/ a yurA pra sA da ni/ nir bud d+he a ka 'byung d+he/ a kAr sha ne/ a ka sha ni dza te/ a kASha ku sha laM/ aM kar
255b8(gzungs 'dus): ne a ka sha d+h+r-i ka ni/ sug nyi a ng+ging+ka ni/ mu rba ba ni dze shi kye/ dram bri sa da ni/ tsa d+hi ri/ ma rus t+ya pranas ni na riman pa ni/ bres naM/ pa la bIr+ya pra sa da ni/ dram ce d+ha ni/ ku sha le ku sha la ne/ dzi sha ku she la/ pra
256a1(gzungs 'dus): rba / se/ TI drang chub / ga / ni d+hini bung m+bi ma la rnas par sa klas d+ham le/ wA ra \u0f7f/ ma d+h+wi shi nI sh+'u le rba ha~MkAk+She/ b+h+ri kA le/ dan tes d+hun/ hi c-i pa
256a2(gzungs 'dus): ti sha ta su li su mu lwa d+him che / ba letsA pa le/ A nu sha ya ba l+le/ b+hu d+hi/ a~M ka sha pA le/ b+had+ha a b+h+re sha kun/ a mri ta/ dun b+hi sa re swA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
256a3(gzungs 'dus): la la drag/ 'tsho med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ji skad bstan pa bzhin du kha don byed na/ gos btsung mar bkas te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar bags shing dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa
256a4(gzungs 'dus): tshe dpag med la me dang spos kyis mchod par bgyi'o// byang chub kyi snying po la pad ma'i gdan dang // byang chub kyi phun sum tshugs pa yang yid la bya'o// de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par bya ste/ 'dod pa bskyed pa
256a5(gzungs 'dus): bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal ba ni/ rin po che pad ma'i snang ba'i chu zhes bya
256a6(gzungs 'dus): stetem togra dang 'bras bu thas cad phun sum tshogs pa'i pad ma'i gdan dag cing / bzang la bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba da la de bzhin gshegs pa tshad pag med bzhugaso// 
256a7(gzungs 'dus): g.yas na ni byang chub seMs dpa'i tshogs mang ba grangs med pas bskur ro// dad pa'i rigs kyi 'am rigs kyi bu ma gang drer mos pa mang ba der skye bar gyur te/ gser gyi mdog gis sa chen po la rin poche
256a8(gzungs 'dus): sna bdun gyi pad me dag las 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dge slong dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med
256b1(gzungs 'dus): de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de la/ me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'gyu
256b2(gzungs 'dus): sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin ni ma rtog so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkar bstsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / zas cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa
256b3(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten yid rings te/ bcoM ldan 'das kyis gsungs bral mngon par bstod// 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'chi med rnga sgra zhes pa'i gzungs rdzogs skyo// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya d+ha shi dag srang
256b4(gzungs 'dus): d+ha kA ra b+hid dA sA na/ na ma mA hA ya na su kra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par selwa ba zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zas cad la phyag 'tshal/ 
256b5(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad dag gis thos pa'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal po ser skya'i gnas/ shing n+ya gro ta'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa dang / 
256b6(gzungs 'dus): byams dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang po dang / thabs cig tu zhugaso// de nas bco ldan 'das snga dro'i dus tshe/ sham thabs sku la gsol nas/ 
256b7(gzungs 'dus): lhung zad dang chos gos smras te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / dge slong rnams la bka' bstsal nas/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gsheg so// de'i tshe bkya
256b8(gzungs 'dus): gzhon nu bzhin rab bsal zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig gang gi'i phyir/ shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas phyir 'byung ba dang / shAkya bzhon nu bzhin rab bsal gyis/ bcom ldan
257a1(gzungs 'dus): ga / nga ring bangs gshegs pa mthong / mthong nas kyang shing ngal babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thul mo spya pa bdu
257a2(gzungs 'dus): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bsum bskor ba byas te thal ma sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug// de nas bco ldan 'a
257a3(gzungs 'dus): la shAkya bzhon nu bzhin rab bsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bam gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log pa dag la/ mi dang mi ma lags pa rnams rnas
257a4(gzungs 'dus): par 'tshe bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs bzhin du phyin pa'i tshe/ bdag la yang chom kun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ gcan zan dag kyang nam/ 
257a5(gzungs 'dus): par 'tshe bar bgyid na/ de'i slad du bcom 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs rdza ba'i slad du/ ci nas kyang bdag la mi dang ma lags
257a6(gzungs 'dus): pa dbang bdud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa 'ga' yang / rnam par 'tshe bar bgyin pa de ltar/ dag cag lnga legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya
257a7(gzungs 'dus): gzhon nu bzhin rab thos la lo 'di skad ces bka' bstsal te// gzhan du de'i phyir legs par du can la yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyed la bshad// bco ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol na/ 
257a8(gzungs 'dus): shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab bsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// gzhon nu shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing 'di nas // 
257b1(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri stong bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas nyon mongs pa thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
257b2(gzungs 'dus): rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing naso// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs na/ 'gro na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ ngan par byas shing mdun
257b3(gzungs 'dus): du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed pas sang na/ khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal to// rdzogs bla'i sangs rgyas
257b4(gzungs 'dus): thob pa rje la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// de la rtag tu de ni mngon byed cing // 'gro ba khyod la 'jigs ma 'byung // gzhon nu lho phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na/ 'jig
257b5(gzungs 'dus): rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seMs dang po skyed pa yid la mdzad pa/ rnam grangs snyems
257b6(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / bag tsha ba dang bral bas/ mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig yod de 'tsho zhing zhes// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyogasu 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
257b7(gzungs 'dus): pa de lnga phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byas shing / khyim la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ rnam par ma yangs pa'i yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba
257b8(gzungs 'dus): gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bsngal to// 
258a1(gzungs 'dus): gagi bsam pa rnams dang ni// kun nas ldang bkun bral ning // lho phyogs su ni 'gro bran// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon du nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi ning gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
258a2(gzungs 'dus): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yul khebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod// dra na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsum pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na dang rgyags pa rnam par gnor pa zhes bya ba dalta
258a3(gzungs 'dus): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhis so// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig phyir nub byos su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas/ sas
258a4(gzungs 'dus): kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing / zag pa med pa dang / rnam par ma yengs pa dang / dran pas song la/ khyod la 'jigs pa dang nad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu
258a5(gzungs 'dus): bcad pa 'di dag skad ces bka' bstsal to// chos 'ga' skye bo yod min zhing // 'ga' yang 'gags par mi 'gyuraro// gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes// de la 'jigs gang yang med// gzhon nu nub phyogs
258a6(gzungs 'dus): log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas sangs rgyas kyi rlabs can zhes bya ba zhig yod/ dri na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
258a7(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkad 'ad gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing nas so// gzhon nu khyod gang gI bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyisang
258a8(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran pa byas shing mdun du byas ste/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon sum du byas shing / rnam par ma yengs par ma
258b1(gzungs 'dus): ma byed pas sod na// khyod gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub 'gyur dpa/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
258b2(gzungs 'dus): dag bka' bstsal to// rtag tu sems can thos cad la// mnyam pa nyid la sems byos la// sems can de la ma rnyas dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu byang shar phyogs log su sangs
258b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khes bdud kyi sde 'joms pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
258b4(gzungs 'dus): rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis 'joms rnam gnon ces bya ba de ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drang du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten
258b5(gzungs 'dus): gyi khams na/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/ bzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub
258b6(gzungs 'dus): kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no// bzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe/ 'ga' zhig gi phyir/ byang shar gyi phyogasu 'gro ni/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pA da la phyag 'tshal te/ dran
258b7(gzungs 'dus): par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma yengs pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir byang shar du 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs
258b8(gzungs 'dus): pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal to// gang gis dad pa'i thugs kyis ni/ bdud rnams phas 'dzad sangs rgyas de/ dran
259a1(gzungs 'dus): thug/ bzhin du ni khrod srong na// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur// gzhon nu shar lho'i phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas rtag du snu
259a2(gzungs 'dus): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de ltar
259a3(gzungs 'dus): bzhugs de 'tsho zhing bzhes so// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nus bzung ste/ sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun tu
259a4(gzungs 'dus): bsten/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab spyad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu 'byung ba yin no// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig
259a5(gzungs 'dus): phyir shar lho'i phyogasu 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te/ phyis khyim nas song shig dang / khyod la phyis 'gyod pa 'am 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar
259a6(gzungs 'dus): mi 'gyur ro// rnam par ma yengs par yid la byed na/ khyad bya ba gang gi tshe phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal
259a7(gzungs 'dus): to// yan lag lngas ni phyag btsalA te// phyis khyim nas sang shog dang / tsas kun rnams kyis khyod kun du/ bil gyis mi gan du 'gro bar 'gyur// gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs lo ga su sangs rgyas ni
259a8(gzungs 'dus): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing su khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas gser dri bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa das bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
259b1(gzungs 'dus): rin chen gdugs dam pa nas bya ba dag bzhugs te 'jogs so// bzhon nu khyod gang gi che byu 'dra 'a jig gi phyir ma nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bani gshegs pa drel phyag 'chal te/ 
259b2(gzungs 'dus): dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rkyen de mngon du byed cing / rnam par ma yangs pa'i yid la byed pas song na/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung / khyed dang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bye ba de 'grub par 'gyur
259b3(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bsngal to// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// me dag bsil mas gdor cig dang // khyod na lho nub 'gro ba na// 'jigs pa 'byung bar ma
259b4(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ bzhon nu byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas yongs su dag rab gnas mngon 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod
259b5(gzungs 'dus): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems 'dul zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so// gzhan nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi
259b6(gzungs 'dus): snying dri ni mi gtsang ba med pa/ 'khrig pa med pa/ bud med med pa/ tsher ma med pa/ bseg ma drang / gyo mo med pa/ stegs mi lnga med pa yin no// bzhin nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang
259b7(gzungs 'dus): gi phyogs su 'gro na/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas/ phyis khyim nas rnam par ma yid la song shig dang / gzhon nu khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur sring/ khyod
259b8(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe chags su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bsngal to// tshangs spyod yang dag blangs byas de// phyis khyim nas nis
260a1(gzungs 'dus): shig dang / khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang / chos kun rnams kyis zil mi non// gzhon nu steng gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi ning gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
260a2(gzungs 'dus): pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs par med pa yid la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku ming mun bral ting 'dzin
260a3(gzungs 'dus): mngon par 'phags pa rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing zhes so// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// dran
260a4(gzungs 'dus): bar byas shing mdun du byas te'udug kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / sems can thos cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas/ rdzogs par byas shing gnas na/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar ma 'gyur/ 
260a5(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom 'das kyis de'i tshe tshagasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal do// khyod kyis ma yengs yid byed kyis// rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing / rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos la// khyod la 'jigs
260a6(gzungs 'dus): pa 'byung mi 'gyur ro// gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'dus pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon dan thas cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i zhig
260a7(gzungs 'dus): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa nas the tsom thams cad bcod mdzad nyon mongs bcod ces bya ba de lngar zhugs de 'tsho zhing
260a8(gzungs 'dus): zhes par bya'o// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba bcom par thams cad kyang 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung spyod lam thams cad du phyag 'tshalo// yang la
260b1(gzungs 'dus): byos shig/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems sgrubs shig dang / gzhon nu khyod gang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad 'bad mi
260b2(gzungs 'dus): gos par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' bstsal to// bye ba kan la nyin mtshan du/ sangs rgyas de ni dran byas shing // byang chub sems dang ma ba dang
260b3(gzungs 'dus): dang // khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung 'gyur// gzhan nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs popa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar gyis shig/ legs par
260b4(gzungs 'dus): bcang bar gyis shig/ legs par kun 'byung bar gyis shig/ 'jigs pa dang ga tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thas cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// de skad ces bka'
260b5(gzungs 'dus): bsgral pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab bsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
260b6(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags ste/ bco ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
260b7(gzungs 'dus): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyus de dag kyang / dper na de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chis ston pa de bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas 'khor
260b8(gzungs 'dus): las shAkya bzhon nu bzhin rab bsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs/ bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grang
261a1(gzungs 'dus): 'di nyan pa'i phyir/ 'khor der 'dus pa'i gyur pa'i srog chags stong chang bar de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig du zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang ngas la bcugs
261a2(gzungs 'dus): de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lo gsu thal mo sbyar de btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam
261a3(gzungs 'dus): grangs 'di bshad pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdug cag phyogs der de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khas de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khes de dag dang
261a4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das deng dge kyang dper na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gang lo// de nas bcom 'das kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
261a5(gzungs 'dus): du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dri lags su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am
261a6(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu mo de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas/ mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khas gang dag 'chis pa
261a7(gzungs 'dus): de dag dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ de dag mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshe rabs gzhan du 'phos nas/ 'phos na bral bar 'gyur ram/ 'on
261a8(gzungs 'dus): mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ sha ra da ti bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i 'bras bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa
261b1(gzungs 'dus): dag ni// sgrib pa mang pa'i tshul bgyis shin du rnam par dag pa nyid du 'gyur// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong chung ba 'dri mthong ngas// shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bzung
261b2(gzungs 'dus): nga ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di re res kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma la dang / lus tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs thas cad rdzogs par
261b3(gzungs 'dus): byas te/ skal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas sbyin pas brgyan phra zhes bya rab mthun pa sha stag ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
261b4(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams la lung bston pa bshad pa 'di bka' bstsal ma thag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
261b5(gzungs 'dus): rnam pa drug du g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab du 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab du g.yas/ 'ur rab du 'ur/ kun du rab du 'ur/ ldag rab du ldeg/ kun du rab du
261b6(gzungs 'dus): ldegs/ chematshim rab du chem/ kun du rab du tshe me/ 'khrugs du'i khrugs/ kun du rab du 'khrugs/ sa zla'i lha rnams kyis kyang kye ma grags po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis/ 
261b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis/ bla nI med pra yu dgra par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu yong su sngo ba bzung nang chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas/ don thams cad
261b8(gzungs 'dus): thugs su chud pas/ de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes sgra sgrogs so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnaMs dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnaMs
262a1(gzungs 'dus): dang/ 'thab rdul pa rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i ris kyi lharnams dang / tshangs sa rnams dang / tshangs pa 'dun na man
262a2(gzungs 'dus): pa rnams dang / tshangs rten rnams nas 'og mer lce rjes kyi bar gyis/ sa ng+ge'i lha rnams kyi skad de thos nas yid rangs/ rab du dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grags po da/ 
262a3(gzungs 'dus): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bzung zhing / chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas/ don
262a4(gzungs 'dus): thos cad thugs chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo 'tshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smraso// de nas bzhin gsheg bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
262a5(gzungs 'dus): bo la bka' bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa/ rigs bu 'am rigs bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/ 'chang
262a6(gzungs 'dus): bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
262a7(gzungs 'dus): dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs pa dang / sngon gyis rgyal ba la lpags par bya ba byas pa yin par rig par bya'o// de dag la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o// de dag bshis ngan du
262a8(gzungs 'dus): 'chi bar mi 'gyur// de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar ma 'gyur ro// de dag la chu dang chom rkun dang / dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o// de nas lnga'i dbang
262b1(gzungs 'dus): khyon byung chub sems dpa' pos da rten po rnams kyi drung ba srung baban pa 'di ma bu sa kyinas grangs bzung ngan phyir/ lha'i bu stong chang bas yongs pan cing mdun dru
262b2(gzungs 'dus): nas/ bcom ldan 'ang mug la ba der logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'gro bros phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du phyogs g.yasu bskur
262b3(gzungs 'dus): byas nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags sdong tshang ba gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'das pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i tsan gyi phye ma dang / 
262b4(gzungs 'dus): lha'i me tog gi man d+ha ra ba dang / man dA rA ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig du 'dag nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
262b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / 'chang bar bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de bsrung bar bgyi'o// bco ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo
262b6(gzungs 'dus): de dag khyim na mchis sam/ dgon pa na mchis sam/ shing drung na 'chis sam/ khyim stong na mchis sam/ 'grog dgon pa na 'chis so/ lam dang lam gol pa na mchis sam/ gnyid log gam/ gnyid
262b7(gzungs 'dus): ma log pa dag na mchis sam/ de dag po la gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' bstsal pa/ kun dga' ba
262b8(gzungs 'dus): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing zhes pa la rig sa bu'am rigs bri mi gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho brar du chos gos dang / bsod sa/ 
263a1(gzungs 'dus): dang / gnas mal dang / snun pa'i gnas rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad rdzas kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas par mi 'gyur ro// rim gro
263a2(gzungs 'dus): byas par mi 'gyur/ mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin
263a3(gzungs 'dus): par byed dam/ 'chang bar byed dam/ klog par byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ tha na gleg bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis
263a4(gzungs 'dus): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dam pa dang / mchod pa dam pas bkur stir byas pa yin no// bla mar byas pa yin/ ri mor byas pa yin/ mchod par/ 
263a5(gzungs 'dus): byas pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla phrag pa gcig du zar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de lo gsu thal mo
263a6(gzungs 'dus): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kun dga' bo de'i tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i bzung shig/ 'di ni de bzhin
263a7(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa'i mtshon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang / mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar bzung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan kun
263a8(gzungs 'dus): dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu dang / shAkya bzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang / srog chags stong tshang ba de dag dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de
263a9(gzungs 'dus): dzin chos kyi ni grangs 'di'i semam chis ji lta chu gyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / badzin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 
263b1(gzungs 'dus): ngag dang / lnga dang mi dang lde ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stong // 'phags pa phyogs bcu mun pa sil ba zhes bya ba theg pa
263b2(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// @// 'phags pa stong 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso pra yang dag
263b3(gzungs 'dus): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrod dpag med la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po snying rje dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza yA dza ye/ 
263b4(gzungs 'dus): ma hA dza ye/ dza yA b+ha ha ni/ dza yod tA rA/ ka la ka lA/ bo ma la ma la tsa la tsa la/ k+Sha ni k+Sha ni/ sarba ka ma a pa ra Na ni mAM/ sarba da nya na/ a d+hiSh+Te te sA hA/ na ma b+ha gA we te/ swahA sra thA ba de sarba bud d+ha/ a lo kyi te dzaMH
263b5(gzungs 'dus): k+ShA shai gA Na dza ba ha ka ya mA/ ni bid dza na/ bi sho d+ha ni swa hA/ pu ru phu ru/ su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ phu ra phu ra/ pra pu ra pra phu ra/ sa b+ha bud d+ha/ a d+hik+Shi de swahA/ dArma dA ra du garbe sAhA/ a b+ha ba swahA/ sarba
263b6(gzungs 'dus): d+harma a b+ha b+ho d+hi sa hA// gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas/ skal pa stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thas cad byang bar byed// sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i tsa ba bskyed par 'gyur// 
263b7(gzungs 'dus): bskal pa stong du 'khor 'byor bsnyil bar byed// tshe rjes nas 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lan stong 'thob par 'gyu ro// 'chi ba'i dus na sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi yongasu dag rnam
263b8(gzungs 'dus): su skye bar 'gyur ro// mtshan dus gsuM nyin dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re brjod na/ de nas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la ci 'dod pa'i rmi lam rmi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dog 'dra bar
265a1(gzungs 'dus): mthong bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la de'i seMs kyi dad pa mi phyed par 'gyu ro// 'di'i phan yon dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa stong 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i
265a2(gzungs 'dus): gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya many+dzu shri ri b+han d+ha rag s+yad pradz+nyA b+hud d+he bar d+he na/ na ma d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang / blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
265a3(gzungs 'dus): bkan mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo many+dzu shwa yAM/ ku ma ra b+hU tA yA/ dad+yathA/ oM a ra tse/ bi ri tsi/ shud de/ bi shu dang / sha d+ha naM/ b+hi shud d+ha ni/ sho d+ha yA/ b+hi sho d+ha yA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ dza ya ba te/ ru
265a4(gzungs 'dus): tsa le/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sAhA/ gang zhig 'o 'dzin pa de zla ba cig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur// gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig klags na/ bskal stong gi bar
265a5(gzungs 'dus): du 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'khas par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ 'jam dpal gyi zhal
265a6(gzungs 'dus): mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yin/ 'grub par ma gyur na/ de'ing nyid 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing / rang nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnams bslus par
265a7(gzungs 'dus): gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab blo 'phel zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya a me d+ha ba na/ na ma d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa snang ba mtha
265a8(gzungs 'dus): yas zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bkon gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
265b1(gzungs 'dus): chen po rnams laM phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// oM tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta/ a mri te/ dA ba b+he/ oM mri
265b2(gzungs 'dus): a mri te/ sa ma ba g+h+r-i a mra te/ a mri te/ bi te bi gan/ ga ma ni/ kA gi na/ ki ri ta ka ra/ sarba b+he sha kA/ yang ka ri sA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni 'di rnams te/ skal pa stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang / 'di
265b3(gzungs 'dus): lan gsum klags na/ de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'i sdig pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thas cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskul bar 'gyur// bco
265b4(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das dgas shing / des skad ces bka' bstsal pas/ 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bzar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la

265b6(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi lnga bI dur+ya 'od gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ e bI shi dza e bI shi dz+ya/ ma hA bI sha dzanasu mud ga ta/ sman btong ba'i tshe/ bsngags kyis btab pa rdzogs spyo// 
265b7(gzungs 'dus): gon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// tid+yaH/ i mun na mr-i/ i nuH ha~M/ drA m+me/ bi mug d+he/ d+ha me/ sad+ha nu graha/ dI be shang+ka ma ma ni/ 
265b8(gzungs 'dus): tan d+ha me/ sarba kar+ya pa ra pri man/ d+harbe/ sa man+ta nu pa ri pa rta na/ d+harme swa hA/ oM br-i shru ti bI dza ye sahA/ d+hi d+hi ra ni sahA/ oM prad nye ba la sat+ma/ 'di gzung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'bum bzung bar
266a1(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// dkon gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// he gi bar b+ha ba ga pa na/ many+dzu shri ri/ ku ma ra garbe sahA/ oM a b+ha ba sa b+ha ba/ sarba dA pa
266a2(gzungs 'dus): rbarbaHa b+ha b+ho dI ni sa rba// gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig rjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa thas cad zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas stong gis bsags pa'i dge ba'i
266a3(gzungs 'dus): rtsa ba thob par 'gyur// skal pa stong du bsags pa'i 'khor ba las rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyuraro// tshe rjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po srid thob par 'gyuro// shi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas stong mthong bar 'gyuraro// 
266a4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag du skye bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod na/ ci 'dod pa'i rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can

266a6(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ur+ya a sta ma ha pa ya na na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen porgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thas cad
266a7(gzungs 'dus): la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sgros dri la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag
266a8(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bzhin
266b1(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sras dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ rad na gro tra/ oM ba ya kal te/ kas
266b2(gzungs 'dus): ba ni/ ga ni a nan ta/ ka la pe hUM ka sha rI/ a nan te mu ge/ a nan ta mug tsakra su mud g+ha te/ oM swa hA// rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag ni/ sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas
266b3(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa dang / byin gyis rlabs pa dang / rjes su yid rangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am byang chub sems dpa' gang la las gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed/ 
266b4(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yid dgas kyi
266b5(gzungs 'dus): 'jigs pa mtha' yas dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'dzegs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / lus yang dag par gda' bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i
266b6(gzungs 'dus): grangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyar spar skye bar 'gyur ro// zad mi shes pa'i lus thob
266b7(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur ro// nam sarba bir+ya sin den du ma/ man dra ba de swA hA// 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// rgya gor skad du/ ka ru sa ka s+ya/ ar+ya 'jam b+ha la dza lem
266b8(gzungs 'dus): s+ya ya shang ka ran NAM na ma d+ha ran/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gni 'dzin chung bang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde ba can ces bya ba/ thams cad 'khyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad dag gis thos
267a1(gzungs 'dus): pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i grong khyer gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang po'i dbu'i gnas na zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin
267a2(gzungs 'dus): gyi sde dpon chen po nor ba bzang po'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen na ma/ dge snyen ma 'am/ gang la la zhig/ bdag gi snying po nyin lan
267a3(gzungs 'dus): gsum mtshan lan gsuM sems par bgyid na/ bco ldan 'das bdag rtag tu de'i rje su 'brang bar bgyid/ dpag tshad brgyar yang gnod sbyin nas srung bar 'gyur ro// bas pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa
