267a6(gzungs 'dus): ni b+had kra e h+ye ta/ tISh+Tha tiSh+Thanam sad yA satwa/ tad+ya thA/ pu tin pu tin/ su rus/ su ma ni su ben na/ su ben ni/ su b+he byaM/ hi li mi li sahA/ cho ga ni bzla ba yar gyi nga'i chos bcwo lnga la tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor
267a7(gzungs 'dus): byas larta a ka ru bsregs nas bzlas brjod nas/ de'i 'og du gser thob par 'gyur ros 'phags pa nor 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed bye ba rdzogaso// rgya gar skad du/ ta ra b+ha br-i ni ka ya na ma/ 
267a8(gzungs 'dus): e stong tra ras ka kar/ bod skad du/ rje btsun ma sbrul ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa rgyad pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ji dpal ldan yid yong po ta la// sna tshogs khas kyis rnam par spras// sna tshogs
267b1(gzungs 'dus): ljon pas bkram pa ste/ skye gnas du ma'i sgra'i byin pa/ 'bab chu sna tshogs chu'o che// ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrungs pa ste// me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis// kun du dri zhim bkang ba ste// sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras
267b2(gzungs 'dus): bur ldan// rkang pa drug pu klu'i sgra// mi 'am ci'i klu stan len// glang chen mos pas yang dag khyengs// rigs 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnaMs dang // dri za rnams kyang klu len pa// thub pa 'dod chags bral rnaMs dang / byang chub
267b3(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang // sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis kyang / 'phags pa sgrol tshogs lha mo rnams// rig pa'i rgyal mo stong rnaMs kyi sra// rtag du legs par ston pa po// khro bo'i rgyal po chags gzhan
267b4(gzungs 'dus): dang / rta 'phrin la sogs kyis skor ba// seMs can kun la phan par btson// bco ldan spyan ras gzigs te// de phyir dpal dang ldan pa yi// pad ma'i snying po thub pa'i bad na// dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/ 
267b5(gzungs 'dus): byams pa yi ni snying rje ldan/ lA'i 'khor ni chen po rnams// chos gsungs pa ni yang dge bzhugs// de ru nye bar 'dus pa yang dag lus// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// mchog ster snying rje dang ldan pas// spyan ras gcin
267b6(gzungs 'dus): la zhus pa ste// rkun po sbrul dang seng ge mo// glang po stag dang chus 'jigs dang // zhi mdzad thub pa'i las rnams dang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnas/ 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnas// chags sdang ba ti
267b7(gzungs 'dus): mug dri ma las// gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba// de gsung bdag la mthu bo che// 'jig rten 'gon pas 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/ phyag na rdo rje stabs po che// snyan pa'i tshig 'di skad
267b8(gzungs 'dus): gsungs/ nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// skyob pa 'ong dpag med pa yi// smon lam stobs kyis 'byung ste// nga'i 'jig rten gsun ma rung shes// snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas/ 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa ma/ 
268a1(gzungs 'dus): nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra bar// bzla ba nya ba dang byad kyi 'od/ lhar bcas mi dang lha min rnams/ 'di rnams thas cad gsal bar byed// 'jig rten gsuM po g.yol bar byed// gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ 
268a2(gzungs 'dus): phyag na ud pal sngon po ste// ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma// bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas// 'gro ba yang dag bsrung don du// mtshon cha'i skal pa 'byung ba dang // 'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs
268a3(gzungs 'dus): don du// rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed// ming tsam dran pa nyid kyis ni// sems can rtag du bdag gis bsrungs// sna tshogs 'jigs pa brgya mtsho las// sas can thams cad bdag gis sprul// de
268a4(gzungs 'dus): nas bdag la 'jig rten du// rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol ma rtags// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// gus dang bcas par nye bar gnas// gang zhig rgyal ba'i sngon sbags pas// gsungs shig rgyal brgyas
268a5(gzungs 'dus): brgyad// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' la// sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang / bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed// brter dang nor rnaMs 'phel bar byed// nad rjes thams
268a6(gzungs 'dus): cad drug par byed// dpa la ldan shing la 'jog par byed/ nad med tshe dang 'phel bar byung // sems can rnams la byams rnams pas// de dag dbyangs sgrog thub chen pos// 'di skad zhus nas thub chen pos/ spyan
268a7(gzungs 'dus): gzigs dbang rab tu bshad/ mchog rnams zas cad nam gzigs nas/ 'di lta bu'i byams pa'i spros// phyag ni g.yas pa'i phyag thabs mdzad/ bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ 'di gsungs shes rab/ 
268a8(gzungs 'dus): shin du che/ leg sa legs po dka' thub che// sems can kun la gcig du brtse// brgal pa chen po'i ma rnams nyan// mi rnaMs gang zhig 'don sgrogs pa/ nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyus nang rnam thas/ 
268b1(gzungs 'dus): cad rnam par grol/ dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan// dus min 'chi ba nges par sreg/ 'chi ba bde ba can du 'gro ba// de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya// lha'i dge 'dun bdag la nyon// 'di la rjesu yid rangs
268b2(gzungs 'dus): gis/ legs par sdom par 'gyur lo nyan// oM dge ba can gyi gzi brjid che// 'jig rten mgon byed snyan pa che// dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma// shes rab spel dang blo 'phel ma// gsal byed ma
268b3(gzungs 'dus): dang rgyags byed ma/ swA hA oM gyis rnam par 'dod gzugs ma/ sems can kun la phan par brtson// g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo// lha ma shes rab pha rol phyin// 'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ 
268b4(gzungs 'dus): rnga dung ni rgyas pa mo// rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma// bzla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che// mi pham gos ni ser mo can// sgyu ma chen mo dkar chen ma// stobs chen la pha rol phyin// gtum mo chen mo tu
268b5(gzungs 'dus): chen mo/ sdang ba'i sems can rlag byed ma// rab du zhi ba zhi byed pa'i gzugs// rnam par rgyal bar 'phar ba'i 'od// klog gi 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan can/ ral dri 'khor lo zhu thogs mtshan/ 'tshol byed
268b6(gzungs 'dus): rengs byed nag mo ni// mtshon mo nag mo mtshun spyod ma// srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo// 'dzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lho// tshangs pa mo dang rigs byed ma/ gsang ba mo nI brag phug gnas/ bkra shis mdog
268b7(gzungs 'dus): byed zhi pra motaskyes na rigs byed yid 'gyogs ma// thod pa can ni shugs chen mo// tshangs pa bden ma gzhan ma rgyal// ded dpon chen po snying rje gnas// chud zos lam ni rab ston pa// mchog ster ston
268b8(gzungs 'dus): mchog byed ston pa mo// bud mod gzugs bzang dpag ming gnon// ro khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma// grub pa gtumo bdud rtsim/ des na nor can pas nams ma// banal chen brdal bzangs 'dzin
269a1(gzungs 'dus): ston ma/ mthar byed 'jigs byed sdug byed ma// brag dang hul shugs chen mo dag/ 'gro la gcig pa phan partson// skyabs byed gus la gsung ba mo// dgra gi dbang phyug zhi khro ma// rtog pa kun 'gro rjes
269a2(gzungs 'dus): 'gro ma// don kun grub byed bzang po ma// gsang byed gso'i byed nor ster ma// mi 'jigs bsod nams ku ta ma// spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid bskyed// mtshan rgya rtsa rgyad 'di dag ni// phan par byed
269a3(gzungs 'dus): ba grags pa ste// mchog dang rmad 'byung gsang ba po// lha yul na yang brnyed dka' ba// bskal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed// dug ni thas cad rab 'dzes ma/ nad rnaMs thams cad rab zhi nas/ sems can kun
269a4(gzungs 'dus): la bde ster ma/ blo ldan gang zhig lan gsuM klog/ mnyam bzhag btsang sbra byas pa yi// des ni dus mi ring bar du// rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/ rtag tu skrag pa bde bar 'gyur/ bsgres pa phyug po
269a5(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ba'o/ rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur// yid bzhungs gyur pa the tsam tshad// bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur// tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// dgra par shes par 'gyur
269a6(gzungs 'dus): ba ste/ rA tsan dang ni mche ba can/ rdog pa'i thal mo rgyul dka' dang / sna tshogs pa'i khrug pa las// mtshan ni 'di rnaMs dran pa yis// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar byed/ skyes bus snyan pa thob
269a7(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur/ de ni gcig pu'i phan yon gyis// gang zhig 'di ni sngar blags nas// skyes bu gang zhig sgrags byed dang // rtag tu snyan pa thob par 'gyur// mi ni dpal gyis dga' bar 'gyur te/ lha dang / mi dang / 
269a8(gzungs 'dus): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang ni lus bsgul po// 'byung po gshed byed sbrul po dang // ma mo bsrung ba'i seMs ldan ma// gnod sbyin ma dang yid dgas byed// snyo byed dang ni gdon rnaMs dang / grib gnon dang
269b1(gzungs 'dus): ni rded rjed dang dA sha za la sogs pa rnams dang / ro langs sna tshogs pa la sogs pa dang // skul byed gzhan ses sngar rnams dang / dri ba mA la yang 'gam mi 'gyur// sdang ba'i seMs can 'chi bar 'gyur
269b2(gzungs 'dus): nad la sngags pas thebs mi 'gyur// phyug dang longs spyod yon tan ldan// bu dang cho ba 'phel bar 'gyur// blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur// rigs dang ldan zhing mchod dga' 'gyur// gzi rdzing ldan zhing tshigasu bsal/ bstan
269b3(gzungs 'dus): bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes sten yang dag sten// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag rgyan/ gang dang gang du skyes par 'gyur/ rtag du sangs rgyas kyis mi spong / dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras
269b4(gzungs 'dus): gzigs dbang phyug gis// rje btsun ma sgrol ma'i mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ a rA dzA na s+thA na ma dA ra ni/ sarba garbe pi ra shau d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la la zhes
269b5(gzungs 'dus): bya ba'i gzungs// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba// thas cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes te
269b6(gzungs 'dus): la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od rtsegs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsungs pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rgyal
269b7(gzungs 'dus): po la phyag 'tshalo// de nas byang chub seMs dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dza dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs spyod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub seMs dpa'
269b8(gzungs 'dus): phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhi de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zla ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas na zhugs so// de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la zhugs
270a1(gzungs 'dus): cag ba dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gal ba der spong ba nas/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che po'i seng ge'i khro la bcugs pa rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'jam pa
270a2(gzungs 'dus): rgyal mtshan rtsegs pa de dag ni nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bkod pa mthar yas pa mthong // de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma gnyis gcig la gcig sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag cag de ngan
270a3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams las sos can thams cad la snang ba 'byin pa dang / mun pa mun nag gsal ba'i phyir/ shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcu ru/ khyab pa'o blo can zhes
270a4(gzungs 'dus): bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig gi snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lha'i bu zla ba dang
270a5(gzungs 'dus): nyi ma de dag gis sems kyis yong su rtag pa thugs kyis 'khyen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dang bcas de dag gis gzungs sngags 'di dag bka' bskul to// sid ya the
270a6(gzungs 'dus): dan cig zur dag cag klu pa shA pa~M ha pa gatshul meg// 'das yid med pan/ sa su // b.rA d+ha/ surba la/ in thanas/ bre la bre la/ bani tsa ru mu ti na/ a ra ni/ e ra nAM/ kA li bi ni/ kal pa ni tra/ 
270a7(gzungs 'dus): ru d+ha thu si/ dgu tid+hA su ti/ b+hai ri b+hai ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ka la kra la/ sadadas/ gi l-i gI l+r-i/ ki la~M bA yA/ d+hu sud+g+ha su sun d+hu sun d+hu/ sin tha su/ id tha su/ e tha su/ i tha te sa pa ni/ ye yu dA
270a8(gzungs 'dus): d+harme kai ra kara~M/ ka~M ra~M kor/ ku rus suM/ ku ni kum pa'i gum pa ni/ ke su ki mu/ ke pa pa ni/ kail ba ni/ ka ne+e dr-i/ kiki ru l-i ru ga ti lu mr-i b+hed+d+he/ d+hari ng+ga mad rdo ru ng+ge/ ka ra kara~M/ ki gaurA
270b1(gzungs 'dus): mau du rgya ma kyas wA kr-i kya kyim gsungs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu dag cig 'di dag su dum
270b2(gzungs 'dus): pa'i mi togra ni ches rnyed pa sla b+ha'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni/ da lta bu ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag ni ches rnyed pa sla'i 'ang dag 'chang ba dang / 
270b3(gzungs 'dus): klog pa ni de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi dge sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni ches rnyed pa slal// gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba de lta ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gal te semam can mnar/ 
270b4(gzungs 'dus): med pa 'khod pa bskul par gnas so// 'tshams med pa lnga byas dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa sems can da dag phyir/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dgu zhag ci shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
270b5(gzungs 'dus): gsum brdad na// de'i tshe gzung sa sngags pa de dag gi ma thus sems can dmyal ba chen pa mnar med pa la rgyas byam par 'gyur lo// sems can de dag kyang yang subar bar 'gyur/ 'jam bu'i gong ma na
270b6(gzungs 'dus): dngagan les par gyur gi dad ni ba na zhin gshegs pa pa ni pa sa dang/ byang chub sa pa dpa dzin pa rnams da nga ma pa
270b7(gzungs 'dus): ngan pa yinan/ sram du gas par la ba'i / 'di sa mam ci ma/ yid gnyis byed par ma byer/ cag/ dun ti drun ti/ ma 'dun ni/ mu ru su rusas/ shugag c-i garteni rnon/ ta ca man
271a1(gzungs 'dus): shar b+hi b+hI tu ru tu ru sahA/ pad ma ma ni ni sah+la/ ta ra ru bud ti/ hu ru hu ru sahA/ sad+ya d+ya bud ti/ a la la ka dza/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ swahA/ d+hun na d+hud ti/ ad tra ti/ ha ta/ b+hud ti/ tsu ru tsu rusas
271a2(gzungs 'dus): lag shi tsa hu ma pa ri ha re/ hu ru hu ru/ khu ru khu ru khu ru sa he/ da ra da / ma hA da ra~M/ d+ha ra d+he ra/ ya na ti sAhA/ su tri ti su ma ti/ ma pra pra ti/ ha da b+hUd de/ d+ha ra d+ha ra yan ti satwa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes
271a3(gzungs 'dus): ta la la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od brtsegs pa snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa/

271a5(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgog phung po'i ri len/ dge slong stong gnyis brgya
271a6(gzungs 'dus): lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin/ rgyal po'i khab kyi dud khrod chen po bsil ba tshal na/ bud shing chen po lta bu'i tshogs na 'dug
271a7(gzungs 'dus): drer 'di lta ste lha'i don rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi rngon rnams dang / klu'i rngon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi rngon rnaMs dang / srin po'i rngon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i don rnams dang / lto ma phye chen po'i rngon rnas pa
271a8(gzungs 'dus): dri za'i dzin rnams dang / mi'i rngon rnams dang / rlung lha'i don rnams dang / yid rtags kyi rngon rnams dang / 'byung po'i rngon rnas dang / sha za'i don rnams dang / grul bum gyi rngon rnams gzig rnams dang
271b1(gzungs 'dus): bya rog rnams dang / bug pa rnams dang / grog skur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnaMs dang / gzhan mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin la shin du bcas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin bya
271b2(gzungs 'dus): go daphung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
271b3(gzungs 'dus): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus ste mchi ma blags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la bka' bskul pa/ sgra can khyod ci'i phyir nga'i 'dun na 'dug go// mchi ma klog/ des skad ces

271b8(gzungs 'dus): shin du gtses lag mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin la bka' bstsal pa/ sgra can zin khyod kyis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rigs sngags 'khor bzhi po de dag dge slong rnam

272b2(gzungs 'dus): ma ti/ phu ru ma ti/ pu ru pu ru/ pu ru phu ru/ ba ra/ khu ru khu ru/ ma ti/ b+hu mi man Te/ ka li ke tsan d+ha li/ a ka sa tAM/ l-i a ya sa sA la ma to hUM le sU le/ shwa le dza ye/ sA le tsa la ni ti tsa la

273a1(gzungs 'dus): rol dug gi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o// pha rol gyi bcings pa las grol ba'o// nad dang mya ngan dang / dgegs rnams par 'jig par byed pa'o// 'thab pa'i rlog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// gdon

273a5(gzungs 'dus): kyi rigs sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gang gi'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gis bye ma snyed du gsungs pa gsung bar 'gyu ro// grub pa mchog tu grub zhes gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya'o// 
273a6(gzungs 'dus): lha dang klu dang / dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/ 'byung po'i tshigs thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thams can gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig/ nad med pa dang / 'jigs
273a7(gzungs 'dus): ba med par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zan yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa be con zhes bya ba'i
273a8(gzungs 'dus): gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sarba an d+ha ra yA b+hi sho d+ha ni/ na ma d+ha ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar do gcod pa thams cad rnam
273b1(gzungs 'dus): bar sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
273b2(gzungs 'dus): khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i shing / a mra'i nags zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ril dbang po'i breg phug na bzhugaso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la mchi 'pho'i cho su 'gyur te/ 
273b3(gzungs 'dus): tshe'i 'du byed lhag ma ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
273b4(gzungs 'dus): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang tshe don du gnyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis
273b5(gzungs 'dus): rig pa'i gsang sngags bzhi gang dag gis bdun thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ba// bar
273b6(gzungs 'dus): du gcod par 'gyur ba// bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par skyong po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzhi rnams nyon cig/ tad s+yA thA/ A~M b+ha ye/ b+ha swa bi gra te/ b+hai ya pa ri sho d+ha ni/ A b+hA yA
273b7(gzungs 'dus): A b+ha ya na/ da de ni ru kli Sh+Ti/ a na ku le/ a ku la pa ri sho d+ha nI/ a tra hAM/ a bi ka la be/ a ka la ba ne/ a ts+ya ta/ shu b+he/ shu b+ha te tsi de tsa ba ti sham+b+he/ u ma sho me/ ma sho ba sha mAM/ mA tra
273b8(gzungs 'dus): me trad b+hU te/ to she to Sha la ma ni sa traM/ sar+ya da shi/ a b+hi rud d+he/ sa hI te/ sA ha hi tre/ aR+Sha sid d+he/ a mr-i tre a mri tra ba te/ a bi te/ badz+ra sak+ka se/ a kA yA pra b+he/ d+han d+he d+han d+he d+he ta da/ 
274a1(gzungs 'dus): shud d+he shud d+he/ a ba b+ha se/ a b+ha b+ha sa ba te/ a pa yo ke a nud ta re/ a ma tsid d+d+ho b+hud d+ha ad+hi Sha ne/ a sang ha re/ su na gr-i hi/ tam ma ra wA na ma/ ba ya dza yo hri thA ga da naH
274a2(gzungs 'dus): dz+wa la nan// d+hi rmo la ka lA/ ud ka ta na na/ d+harmi ni d+ha s+ya/ sad tra ha na na/ d+harma ko Sha sa ya// kai'u shi ka khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags bzhi 'di dag ni khyod kyis rig pa'i bsang sngags pa ni gang dag/ 
274a3(gzungs 'dus): gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshor spyod par gyur pa dag go// 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma rtogs pa'i ba
274a4(gzungs 'dus): du spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis des skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rangs te/ de
274a5(gzungs 'dus): tshe 'di skad du kho bo lha las gyur pa 'di nyid na ni/ 'dug bzhin du/ kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/ srog de dag grags dag de ltar shes par bgyis shig/ zhes ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod
274a6(gzungs 'dus): do 'di'i mthu thams cad kyis bdag gis bar du bcad pa dang / dgegs dang log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni 'grub par gyur cig/ na mo kai du la
274a7(gzungs 'dus): nA ge tsan d+hi na/ ye swA hA/ sarba a nA sa d+ha ni/ ye satwa/ d+ha ma ra sA d+ha ni ye swA hA/ sarba A na ta ra ya bi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang / 
274a8(gzungs 'dus): po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa bar du bcod pa
274b1(gzungs 'dus): thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bud d+ha hri d+ha ya/ na ma d+ha ra ni/ d+harma bar+ya ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs
274b2(gzungs 'dus): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul/ chos kyi dbyed
274b3(gzungs 'dus): dgon no/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ba/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs pa sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa
274b4(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rjesu spyod pa/ kun nas snang ba 'od kyi khang pan
274b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi dbus na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sna tshogs thob pa
274b6(gzungs 'dus): sha stag gi so yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis ltas nas/ thabs gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la
274b7(gzungs 'dus): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs rtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che la 'di'i don dang / pha/ 
274b8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhe
275a1(gzungs 'dus): bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog ga
275a2(gzungs 'dus): kun chub par byed pa gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ ngad dam/ lhag pa'i bsam par mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
275a3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang mi 'bral
275a4(gzungs 'dus): bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim 'gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ skal ba stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho bsil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
275a5(gzungs 'dus): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i bar tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung
275a6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i tshogs thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' ba
275a7(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chad pa spangs pa dang // dug btsal nas mchi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud
275a8(gzungs 'dus): sdug can gyi klags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyis ris kyi lha rnams kyis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byed pa der bdud kyis ris kyi lce de dag thams cad skrag cing skrag
275b1(gzungs 'dus): la dngang bar 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcur 'gros par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go// de bzhin gshen
275b2(gzungs 'dus): pa thams cad kyi tshig go// tad ya thA/ bud d+he/ su bud d+he/ ma hA bud d+he/ i ha bud d+he/ trang tra bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ ma hA/ ma hA bud d+ha/ sarba bud d+hA/ a nu mA te/ sarba bud d+ha/ a nu ga nya' ni/ bud d+ha bung/ 
275b3(gzungs 'dus): d+ha bAng d+ha bud d+ha bud d+ha bud d+ha brung d+ha/ bud d+ha bud d+hA bud d+ha swAhA// / sangs rgyas kyis yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mdo sde// gcig du yid la bya ba ni/ mdor na chos sgom pa
275b4(gzungs 'dus): gzungs 'di ni sems can rnams la thugs rtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ chos thams cad kyi phyag brgya yin no// tad+ya thA/ shud d+he/ su shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ni/ sad sho d+hA ni/ marma le rnam
275b5(gzungs 'dus): la a ba ga yaM/ dran te/ gra me/ kra ma sa ri/ sa re/ sa ra ba te/ ang shi ge/ a sho go sha ma ni/ shan t+ye/ a pa shwan te/ pra shAn d+hA/ a pa ye/ sarba bur+ya/ ba r-i man/ ti ta/ sarba da ma tra ti/ man/ dwi te/ 
275b6(gzungs 'dus): ha ra ha ra/ ma yang ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ san tsa la/ ta la ta la/ man ta la/ sa ma ta lA/ ro Ne ro Ne/ su re ni/ ri na ma ti/ l-I ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+ha rau/ d+hA ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ r-i d+ha ra d+ha/ mdA be dza
275b7(gzungs 'dus): yaH b+hi ho ni/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba bud d+hA/ he pre shi ta si/ sarbad nya bde bas rbad ma te/ ma ha pra ma nas ban te/ sa man te/ a l-i ki/ b+hud d+ha/ bau sha yAM/ b+hud d+hA/ pra ti man ti te/ ba ga ba ti/ su/ 
275b8(gzungs 'dus): ra su ra/ pra sar pra sa ra/ bi sa rang la ra/ pras ra ba // sha.a pa ga tes hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyo chos kyi snying po 'di bshad ma thag tu/ ring / 
276a1(gzungs 'dus): gran gsu bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug du g.yos/ stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab du g.yos/ rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs
276a2(gzungs 'dus): rab du 'khrugs/ kun du rab du 'khrugs so// ri'i rgyal po raM rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thas cad kyang skrag gnas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha gnas dang / bdud sdig can rnams shin tu
276a3(gzungs 'dus): sdug sngal yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go// sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas la
276a4(gzungs 'dus): phyag 'tshal lo// zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / man d+hA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ 
276a5(gzungs 'dus): mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la bskyabs su dong ba dag thams cad rab du dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di skad ces byas ste/ shAkya seng ge'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skyob
276a6(gzungs 'dus): bas yud gang la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di dag ni rab du gshad pa'i skad cig des yang rnam pa drug du g.yos/ brgya 'tsho'i 'khrugs shing / bdud kyi gnas kun lo / 
276a7(gzungs 'dus): rab du g.yos nas/ bdud kyi ris rnams kyi/ lha dag rab dngas shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/ bdud yid mi bde ba sdug bsngal mya ngan non/ de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thob nas/ 'jig rten
276a8(gzungs 'dus): mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ na mkha'i gnas na me tog man dar 'thor/ gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang nags rnams ni// se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang / bye ma dag dang dbyun/ 
276b1(gzungs 'dus): ba gos rnams dang // brgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi brgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyun
276b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / thos pa thams cad yongasu 'tshal bas mi ngoms pa'i brgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i brgyan dang / sems can thams cad nga'i dbang po'i mchog
276b3(gzungs 'dus): dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i brgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtags cing spyad pa'i brgyan dang / sems can yongs su smon par bya ba
276b4(gzungs 'dus): phyir/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / brgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin gyis rlabs kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan de rgyad po de dag gin/ yon tan
276b5(gzungs 'dus): gyi phan yon brgyad du 'gyur ba'o// gzungs rtag du rgyun du yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi bzhi 'di rnams yid la byas nas/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
276b6(gzungs 'dus): yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba'o// pad ma par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo// nad thos cad la lag pas bya bar 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o// bcom ldan
276b7(gzungs 'dus): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' mastsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rte
276b8(gzungs 'dus): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzog s+ho// / 
277a1(gzungs 'dus): gar skad du/ ar+ya bud d+ha hri ta yA/ na ma d+ha ra na/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
277a2(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das brgya mtsho'i 'bram gyis bskyed mo tshal na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ldan pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs
277a3(gzungs 'dus): tre/ lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskur cing / mdun nas ltas te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang phyug chen po bka' thub bkang po la sogs pa lnga'i bu dag de'i phyir
277a4(gzungs 'dus): legs par nyan la yid la bzung shig dang bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i dus na/ 'khor bzhi bsdu ba dang / rjes su bzung ba dang / khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang / don tha~Md
277a5(gzungs 'dus): dang / chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / thag pa chen po yang dag par bzhugs pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
277a6(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// 'chad dong khyod kyis bzung la da ltar dang nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ phyi mo'i dus ma theg pa
277a7(gzungs 'dus): chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i 'khor bzhi rnams la ston cing bshod cig/ yal bar mi mdor nges bstan par bya ba bsgrag par bya'o// ji tsam du 'phongs par 'gyur ba rnams dang / 
277a8(gzungs 'dus): sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung skrang zhing nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du
277b1(gzungs 'dus): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsngal ba ni nan tan gyis yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas
277b2(gzungs 'dus): kye snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na// tad+ya thA/ a na lI/ nirma leHsarba a ka rA/ aR+sha pa ri pra b+ha te/ a sA ma nan ta/ sarba gu na a ka re/ tu d+ha aHsang gA a na pra ti
277b3(gzungs 'dus): sa man tad shi ti/ sha pa ri pu ra na da di ka ne/ sarba a sang gra/ da ra sha na tA pa taM/ sarba pa shi ta pA/ ri pru NaM/ karba a ki re/ a sang gI sa ga ma ni te/ sa man+ta a pra ti ta te tseta d+ha da sha su kA pa ri/ pra ba ta an+ta
277b4(gzungs 'dus): shana? ta pra/ shAn te u pa sha na sa man ti bA mo kA a N+ya pra pa ta/ su tra ti bi d+ha ra na dra ru/ a t+ya nan/ su naM sr-id te/ sarba a ka ra ni sAM sA rin a na ba she/ sha pa rang ga ta/ bi pra mu ga ta/ a sa
277b5(gzungs 'dus): sr-i tidarma te/ ge ga na sa ma pra kr-i te/ ba ri shud d+hi naurma laM a sa man te/ N+ya d+hA a nu ga ta/ sa pra ba se purban te/ a pre rAn d+ha ma d+hA t+ya d+ya/ sa man ta a nu b+ha ba teHa na ba she
277b6(gzungs 'dus): pa ring nya pra ha na b+hA ba na sA kra da tri ya pa rA ma/ baM rang mag tre yang pa taM t+ya thA/ kau rAHsarba ka ra sa ma ban naM/ sarba an+te re/ ma hA mau tra/ mad ka ra na/ sarba a ka ra
277b7(gzungs 'dus): hA ra a n+ya pra pa te// lha'i dag 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po yas
277b8(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/ legs pa kha don du byas te// 'dzin pa des dman pa'o semasu mi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
278a1(gzungs 'dus): ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi btsun po stong du 'tshom su gnas par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni thos par 'gyur/ khwa cig ni chos
278a2(gzungs 'dus): smon par 'gyur ro// kha ci'i ni'i rlo 'i byin pas rgya/ rdo lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos sbyin par rgyan mo chad par 'gyur/ kun du 'dzin pa mi byed par 'gyur/ 
278a3(gzungs 'dus): rtse ba dacig gos thogs par 'gyu nyid dang chen pa'i sa pa'i rgya ma che thams cad kyis gzung su thod par 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la badzod pa thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyis rnam par
278a4(gzungs 'dus): bathob pa'i glegs pa med pa dang // yo'adu/ rdzogs pa'o ba rdo rje bu thob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyi tshe rabs 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o// rigs bu 'am rigs kyi bu
278a5(gzungs 'dus): mo dag la yang rig par brtan byan ma sgegs par bya'o/ yul nga mi mdzor phyi shul ma~M bya/ brjed par mi bya'o// gsal bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin du sgrub par bya'o// bcom ldan 'a
278a6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'o gzungs kyi rnams grangs sman pa'i nas ni/ 'kho bo bzhi rnams la phyi shel ma mchis na/ mi snus par bsam par bgyi/ bshad par bgyi/ rigs kyi bu
278a7(gzungs 'dus): rigs su me de dag la yang don rin po dang ldan pa'i da pa ni ga sre lung dang mthun pa dang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa chos yongs su bzung rab 'gyur/ rigs kyi
278a8(gzungs 'dus): bu'am rigs kyi bu med dag la yang nges pabasten par rgyuphan po ni dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'a kyis bka' bsngal pa/ lnga'i bu dag de'i phyir
278b1(gzungs 'dus): ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis des skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / dbang phyug chen po ka' thub bzang po la sogs
278b2(gzungs 'dus): gnas tsam ma'o ros kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags sangs rgyas kyi stong
278b3(gzungs 'dus): bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs b+h+yo/ tsam/ rgya gar skad du/ kyai a ru a pra ti ba d+ha rA ni bi d+ya ra dza yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sgron ma mchog
278b4(gzungs 'dus): gaM gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thos cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal po rgyal byed
278b5(gzungs 'dus): tshal/ mgon med zas skyon kun dga' ra ba nA/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i 'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'am 'bum phrag du ma dang / thabs cig tu
278b6(gzungs 'dus): bzhugs te/ rA yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis ltas nas chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 'dras pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khas me to/ 
278b7(gzungs 'dus): mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smon pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing zhes pa'i chos kyang sngon
278b8(gzungs 'dus): pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od bsrung chen po dang / 'odi dpag med ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khas mi mdzad 'dir btang
279a1(gzungs 'dus): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de nas rgyal bu brgyal byed kyi tshal 'gon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
279a2(gzungs 'dus): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 
279a3(gzungs 'dus): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
279a4(gzungs 'dus): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
279a5(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas sgron me'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes pa'i chos kyang bston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
279a6(gzungs 'dus): rgyas sgron me'i mchog des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir rab btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i
279a7(gzungs 'dus): mchog la 'dod pa chung ngam/ nyam du chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang nam mtsho'i stobs dang / bde ba dang kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sam/ zhes bsrung gsol to// de skad ces kyang gsungs
279a8(gzungs 'dus): ste de ni mi dang me ma legs pa'am/ 'byung po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ grul bum gyi sde dpon chen po blon po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ srul po 'am/ srin bu'am/ srin dus
279b1(gzungs 'dus): ta'am/ sbrang bu lcags kyi bye ma 'am/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag/ mche bar bgyid pa 'ga' mchis sam/ zhes gsung so// sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bdes
279b2(gzungs 'dus): dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan te brtsi dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan
279b3(gzungs 'dus): par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang sgrub pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog des gzungs sngags bzhi 'di kyang bskur te/ 
279b4(gzungs 'dus): 'di lta ste/ dza le dza le dzA lo te hu ga/ gu mug guN+Da se man ta ma hA ma ma te mahA lce/ dzalpe/ sa ha sa he/ ma hA dzA ye/ ug ge mug gaM sha ma sa me sa ma taM/ ma hA sa man ma hA sa ma te sAtA// 
279b5(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bstsal nga kun dga' bo khyod kyis bzhi 'di dag bzung shog long shig/ rmongs shig/ lhogs shog/ kun chen
279b6(gzungs 'dus): par bgyis shig/ gzhan dag la brgya cher rab tu ston cing / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi de dag rnyed par 'gyur// kun nga
279b7(gzungs 'dus): bo gzungs kyi rigs sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin du rnyed par dka'o// kun dga' blo kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'dri dag la
279b8(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la brgya cher ston pa de ni tshe rabs bdun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 
280a1(gzungs 'dus): la yang sngon gyi las ma rtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thas cad yang dag par 'dras te/ 'grub 'bras cad dang rje su mthun par 'gyur ro// kun dga' ba gzungs
280a2(gzungs 'dus): kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag bdun bcu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ grang gzungs kyi bzhi 'di dag les 'das par byed pa de ni de dag thams cad la khrus
280a3(gzungs 'dus): byas pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa bstan las langs te/ blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang nga sa la tsug
280a4(gzungs 'dus): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la mdor log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don
280a5(gzungs 'dus): da sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par gyi/ gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / 
280a6(gzungs 'dus): stobs dang ldan par gyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / srung ba dang sba ba dang / skyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bani rnams par brjod par gyi'o 'di
280a7(gzungs 'dus): lha ste// / a de pad te na dwe kun te/ bug sa ga sa a na ka swe/ nam ka se a nud pra n+yad kha zo ma hA kha rje sa ti pa baM/ ta Ta pA pA/ ta Ta me du te mA haM li mI li mi li ti le s+yA hA/

280b1(gzungs 'dus): chub par bgyis shig/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bston cing / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par bka'o// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag
280b2(gzungs 'dus): rnyed par dka'o// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang rnyed par dka'o// kun dga' bro rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags
280b3(gzungs 'dus): kyi bani 'di dag 'dzin pa dang len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu gnyi su tshe rabs dran par
280b4(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma rtogs par gzhan gyi nad pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad rjesu mthun par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo gzungs
280b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi gsang sngags bzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag rgya bcu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzugs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni de dag
280b6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad las 'khus pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus ma g.yas pa'i lhang dus la gtsug
280b7(gzungs 'dus): te/ bcom ldan 'daso ga la ba der lagasu thal ma sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang seMs can rnams
280b8(gzungs 'dus): kyi don dang sman dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang / ljon par bgyi ba dang / srung ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan
281a1(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan par bgyi khri dang / spobs pa dang mun par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / srung ba dang / sra ba dang / skyabs pa'i slang du gzungs kyi gsang sngags pa ni 'di
281a2(gzungs 'dus): rnams rjod par bya// 'di ska ste/ a ga ge ba ge ni tsi te/ nag sa re/ na hi la ba te/ tsan ta lI tsan Ta la ba te sahA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'o la bka'
281a3(gzungs 'dus): bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis gsang sngags pa ni 'od dag bzung shig/ long shig/ tshangs shig/ ltogs shig/ kun chub par bgyis shog/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag

281a5(gzungs 'dus): bzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin du dka'o// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga la las gzungs kyi bsang sngags pa ni 'od dag 'dzin pa dang len pa dang / 'chang ba dang
281a6(gzungs 'dus): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bston pa de ni/ tshe rabs bcu gsum du tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// tshe 'di nyid la sngon gyi las ma rtogs par

281b3(gzungs 'dus): gzungs kyi gsang sngags pa ni 'di dag rnams bshad/ 'di lta ste/ a Te pA te/ nan te kun te/ Ta ke a tag ge tad bdud be/ ra Ta kaM/ lo le hu le hi la mi li to le/ shi le sha ba ra
281b4(gzungs 'dus): a t+ta ba de/ na te kun te/ a Tu ba de ba na pa te/ kA se ka sa ka se/ pa si pa se pa sau/ mahA nas pa se swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'

281b7(gzungs 'dus): shin tu bka'o// kun dga' che ro ba rigs kyi bu 'am rags kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa
281b8(gzungs 'dus): byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo che rabs bcu bzhir rabs dran par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyin la yang sngon gyi las ma rtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa med
282a1(gzungs 'dus): thams cad las 'dad pa dang 'gro ba thams cad rdzas sumadzu par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi ngan 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag rgyabacu rtsa bzhi gsungs te/ 8
