284a8(gzungs 'dus): sngags 'di ni 'dzin byed pIH// pha ma dang ni phu nu dang / sring mo mdza'o gshes gnyen dag kyang // log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir gsang sngags mdo sde 'di// 'jigs med ge gang gis
284b1(gzungs 'dus): tho gyur nas// gsung sngags 'di brjod pa des// nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed yika bskal pa bye ba stong rnamasu sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ 
284b2(gzungs 'dus): bdun gyis ni zil gyis gnon// phyogs pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ lun ngon dang ni yul 'khor bsrung // mi ge mo bzang dang / 'phags skyes pa/ 
284b3(gzungs 'dus): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan pa/ 'khor bas blon bcas de dag kyang / gzungs sngags 'di ni brjod byed pa/ de la rtag tu bsrungs par byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad ces bka' bstsal nas// 
284b4(gzungs 'dus): tshe dang ldan 'das pa kun dga' bo// dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs dang / rgyal po chen
284b5(gzungs 'dus): po bzhi dang / lha dang mi dag lA ma yin dang dri zas bcas pa'i 'jika rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungasu pa la mngon por bstod / 'phags ma rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo sgron ma
284b6(gzungs 'dus): gi gzungs rdzogas+ho// / na mo rad na shi ka ni/ a ra swa te/ sa~M myagasaM bud d+ha ya// tad+yathA/ dar na dor ne shi khaM ne swA hA// 'chi ba'o tshe ma ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// 
284b7(gzungs 'dus): 'chi'i phos nas kyang sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas gyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas gtsug gi rje su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // srid pa rnal mdzad sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa yum
284b8(gzungs 'dus): mi khyod lags sug bsngal med par 'dzod// byang chung lam mchog khyod la can nas tho ba 'gyur ba/ nyon mongs mi ma dgA'i me rnams 'brar ba la// ye shes chu'i mar gyis gsil bar mdzad du gso'o// 
284b9(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gsum na dbyings kyi sems can ma lus pa/ sbal ma khyod de rlung lha'i ngo bo'am bdag nyid de// yon dad ming bzhin nor bu rin cher sku 'drab// seMni 'jigs par lhung dbying ba skyab par mdzod
285a1(gzungs 'dus): khyod kyi dgra rnams 'jigs pa ma lus myur du gsal du mdzod/ klu'i dug ni khyung gis bcom nas bzhi pa lta re/ khyod kyis dpal ldan sku mtshogs gang gi mthong gyur pa// sdig pa kun bcom
285a2(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams dpag med thob par shog/ don grug khyong mthong sgrub pa rdos ni 'grub 'gyur zhing // thugs rje'i bdag nyid thams cad sgrol mdzad pa// khyod kyi byin brlabs bka' drin 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur
285a3(gzungs 'dus): bris/ blong na bsod nams chung ba bdag ni zung du gsol// rtag tu gis khyed dam kyis gzugs ni g.yar dam bsgom/ sa nga ni 'dra bar byams pas 'bras bu sbyin mdzad na/ kye ma'o bdag du 'ang/ 
285a4(gzungs 'dus): ni bsdug bsngal bani 'gyur te/ ma bzhin phan pas dngos grub 'bras bu cis mi gsol// lha mo khyod kyis 'gro ba ma lus bde bar mdzod// dman pa'i sems kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'khor gyur pa/ de
285a5(gzungs 'dus): da dge sgyum med gyur te shin tu sems gdung las/ gtso mo khyod kyi 'gro ba yang nas yang du sbal to// zhi bar byed pa'i gzugs can khyod ni thugs rje'i bdag/ zhal ni nyi ma'i 'od pas shin du gsal/ 
285a6(gzungs 'dus): sdig pa'i gti mug shin mi zad mjoms pa// sbrul ma dam chog sgrub ma nga khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ tshongs pa ru tra lags nan du phyag 'tshal zhing // rin ches sna tshogs mdzes par sbas gyur pa
285a7(gzungs 'dus): mas kyi skye byas gnyis brgyan gyur te/ dang po'i sems kyi rab tu bstod de/ 'dud par byed gi/ mtha' ris lha rnams ltung ba'i shin du 'jigs skrag me// de bas sems ni shin du dang bskye
285a8(gzungs 'dus): sgrol ma khyod kyis de'i phyir skyabs 'gro mdzad// skul bas thun rje skyes nas gsung gyo mo 'jigs sbyin// lha rnams 'khor bcas yang ni sems na dad pa skyes// man d+ha ra ba in ti bA ra rje
285b1(gzungs 'dus): lasrogasom ra mo lca du'i khro zhabs la lha rnams mchod mchog mchod// sna tshogs pas mchod te/ khyod la bstod cha phyag 'tshal // mchod pa mchog gis lha rnams khyod la mchod par byed pa/ 
285b2(gzungs 'dus): po 'byos bu rang gi thob par bya ba'i phyir// mchod pas dges dang mi dgas khyod la mi da' yang / thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pas/ lha rnams bzung bar mtsho/ sngon tshe mi zhig mtshon med
285b3(gzungs 'dus): don gnyer lom 'gro 'o// don sar ma byin lam du dag dang 'phrad pa las// shin du 'jigs skrag sngangs te sgrol ma rjes su dan/ byin gyis rlabs dag de dran bzhin skyabasu gsol// sngon tsheH
285b4(gzungs 'dus): zhig don gnyer nags dkyil glang chen phrad ka glang chen khros nas mche bas rab tu btu bzung ba la// ha ha zhes smras ngu 'bod sgrol mdzad pos// de ma thag tu gtso mo'i glang chen 'jig r+Na pa skyabs/ sngon
285b5(gzungs 'dus): tshe mi zhig dgos myed khyim na mi zhig nyal ba la// dgra chen dug pa'i de'i khyim la me btang nas// skag sngangs langs nas sgrol ma mdzad pos// de ma thag par char gyi rgyun gyis 'bar zhi// sngon tshwa
285b6(gzungs 'dus): srid mtsho padzes ma rol phyir na swa/ tshal phyir// langs te a sho ka'i bzung ba la// yal ka'i rtsa nas sbrul nag khros pas de la bzung // sgrol ma dran pa tsam gyis sbrul gdug rab du bzhi ka sngon
285b7(gzungs 'dus): tshe tshang dpon nor ldan don gnyer lem 'gro ba ka/ grong khyer ma slebs skyabs mi nod phrad pa las/ de'i 'jigs pa'i yum chen sgrol ma dran rje su dran// byin gyis brlabs kyi dgra rnams dran bzhin dang
285b8(gzungs 'dus): du 'dus// spyan rgya mi zhig phongs nas kun mar song ba las// mdzad khang nang du phyin nas rgyal po'i nyul ma'i bzung // btson khang nang du lcags sgrogs mang pos bcings// skrag ste sgrol ma dran
285b9(gzungs 'dus): bcings pa'i sdug bsngal// sngan mo 'phags ma'i dge snyen tsan tra mgo mi nges/ 'khor bcas rgya mtshar zur zhugs bru de lam du zhag/ sgrol ma dran de thal mo sbyar nas rje su stong / byin brlangs
286a1(gzungs 'dus): mngon du nal bstan namul gling chu chags/ rgyal po gcig ni 'khang nang na du nub mo zhugs skabs bgegs kyi gdug pas de la gzungs pa las/ shin du 'jigs skag sngangs te sgrol rje dran/ 
286a2(gzungs 'dus): bco mo khyod kyis bsrungs pas 'byung po'i 'jigs pa bral// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad kyis nga ltar mdza / thugs rje'i bdag nyid sngon ma khyod kyis yung tsam gyis// srid pa ma lus sems can rnas
286a3(gzungs 'dus): ni 'jigs med mdzad// bdag ni shin sbag pas/ gtso mo khyod la skyabs su ma chi// 'jig rten sems can khyod kyis mtshan tsam sus thos pa// thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms
286a4(gzungs 'dus): par mdzad// bdag ni dad pas nang du nub khyod sngags ce su ngan/ sdug bsngal can bdag gtso mo khyod kyis sgrol bar mdzod/ kye mtsho// gdag gis khyod ni grub par dka' ba de// nang nu
286a5(gzungs 'dus): khyed kyis pa par dka' bde// sngags ni bzlas brjod brtson par bgyis// bdag ni sdig ldan de phyir khyod ni grub ma gyur// 'jigs sems ldan pa dag li lha mis dngos grub gsol// ma rungs
286a6(gzungs 'dus): sems can rmongs pa dge sbyor mi dran la// gang mug dragra pos sgribs pas lam mchog sa mthong ste// bsod nams chung ba bdag ni sred pa'i g.yang sar ltung // sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad sbrel
286a7(gzungs 'dus): mdzad sgrol ma khyod la skyabs su 'chis// ngagra dang glang po che dang me mra sbrul dang sra ni/ chom po bcing bar chu dang 'jigs pa rnams/ sgrol mthugs rje ldan pa bdag gis bstod byas nas/ srid gsu
286a8(gzungs 'dus): sems can ma lus sdug bsngal kun bral shog/ lha mo dam tshig sgrol ma'i bstod pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ma sa la ki shwa ra sha yam grI ba na ma pA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 
286b1(gzungs 'dus): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha yang grI ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / na mo ra na tA ya ya ka na ma a rgya pa lo ki ngi
286b2(gzungs 'dus): ra shor ba di swa ta ya ma hA sadaM dA ya// ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ sarba sad te b+h+ya san gton/ nams sarba sa twa b+hA sa na// a ba ha ri ni/ na mas sarba sad tA b+ha yid dA ra na ya/ na ma sa sarbaSh+Ta
286b3(gzungs 'dus): ba tra sha na ma ka ra ya/ nams sarba b+hi ba dra sha man ka ya/ nams/ sarba satra b+ho ti tsi gid sa na ka ra yo// nams sarba d+ha d+ha na ka ka ra ya// na mas sarba dug ka/ bra mog sha na// ka ra
286b4(gzungs 'dus): ya/ na mas sarba arba a tA bo d+hi ka tsi gi da sa na ka ra ya// na mas sarba d+ha na/ che d+ha na ka ra ya/ na mas sarba ma dug ka// pra mo ga sha na ka ra ya// na mas sarba a na d+ha ka ra// b+hi d+hi man ka ra ya na
286b5(gzungs 'dus): mas sarba b+hi d+ha ra dzA// ba sha pra ba te ye/ ma hA yo gi yo gi sha ra ya// ta s+ya na mas srid ta/ id na na a ba lo ki ti sha ra// mu khong g+h+ri rna// ri shi b+hi d+ha de de ba na ga/ yag sha rag sha sa/ shag
286b6(gzungs 'dus): kya bram ma/ l-I gA bA la/ bsnu ma tra sha ra// na ra ya na/ skan ta/ ku be ra/ a su dron dre// ma gri ga na/ na na skri tanaka/ badz+ra khu ra sa haM ya/ ha yan/ gri ban na ma/ ba ra ma hri ta ya/ ma
286b7(gzungs 'dus): yi r+ha/ yi sh+ya mi a ba prA me ya sadza krA na/ a sa t+ya na/ sarba b+hu tu// nan sarba bi ga na/ bi na ya ka ma a mo ga na/ sarba rkarmanan/ sha nan tsa bi na ya kan tad+ya thA/ ta ru la/ sarba ba sha g+h+raH
286b8(gzungs 'dus): ka/ sarba bu ta bi tra/ kra dz+wa li ta/ an la sru ling ka/ a ta ta sa// ke sa ra/ a to pa/ pra bai ta kra yaM badz+ra khu ra na ra/ ga ti ta/ tsa la ta ba su d+ha ta la badz+rod shA sa te sr-is ta ma ru to kra gi kra ma na
287a1(gzungs 'dus): man/ ka ra bar du sha b+hi d+ha ga na/ sas d+h+yakrAn/ kar sa b+hing sgyo te/ sha ka ra khar ma/ shan ti kaR+sha b+hU d+hAr+thA d+hA/ b+hu d+hA ya ma~M ta/ bgraban+d+ha/ ha yang skye ba/ sar+b+ba ba \u0f7f
287a2(gzungs 'dus): rmad/ ya ma r+ha ya ka sha ma khaMng kha da ka ma hA ro ru tra man tran ragra r+Noka?/ a ma sa hata ta/ man tran/ sid+d+hi saM sarba kairme shu ma/ sid d+he de he de'i a brI sh+ma/ pra bi sha
287a3(gzungs 'dus): sarba gra he shu d+hun d+hun/ b+h+r-i d+hun ba~M d+hu na/ ma tha mtha/ bram ze bram tha/ sa rba par bkram/ krid 'akra kho dur lang gi Sham/ shaM ka bai sha/ dang ts+tsha bi la rtsa rnaM yo/ a bi tsa ra/ bshag ran/ sa
287a4(gzungs 'dus): d+ha a na dza na/ tsog shu mo nyan/ tsid ta/ thig she/ ban ka ra/ nid byas par pre kra Na/ ta sa ya ta sa ya/ ma hA bod d+hi sad to// Ting d+hang sha Ta na ne/ sarba ye bas/ sad ta na/ rag sharag
287a5(gzungs 'dus): ma ma b+ha da/ dar ma sid ga/ a nu da nya dam/ me karma/ shig gram ku ru ku ru paha/ badz+ra khu ra ya phaT/ badz+ra dradak+to 'od kaT/ b+ha ya~M d+hA ra/ pa ya phaT pa ra man+ta dra na/ na sha na sha kar
287a6(gzungs 'dus): ya pha Ta bar duSh+pa/ b+h+r-i d+ha ga na bam bag sha ya/ na kar ya phaT/ sirbe gr-i ha shu a tra ti ha ta phaT kha dang mu kha ya phaT/ yi ge tsid ta ma ma a ti te/ shr-i na ka ye kra min ta/ ma
287a7(gzungs 'dus): yan ti/ dzu han ti ka kho rdang / ku rban ti ta na sa zan/ bad khe mi khe na/ bkrid ya bkrenams sa rgya sarba du shAkya he da/ sa da na ya/ ha yaM grI ba ya/ sid d+h+yan du man tra bar
287a8(gzungs 'dus): swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ta yang grI ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkan mchog gsum phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
287a9(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// gang la la zhig zugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis tshog su bcad pa 'dzin
287b1(gzungs 'dus): des gong du smos pa'i skye ba rnam par bco lnga po de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du lha dang mi tha~Md kyis rtag tu brjod cing bzungs par bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba skye bar bgyi'o// de nas/ 
287b2(gzungs 'dus): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyung gyis tshig 'di skad smras nas// de'i rjes la 'khor mang po dbus de nyid du 'dug ste/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas
287b3(gzungs 'dus): sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de// 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/ rgyal po chen po kun nas/ yong su rdzogs pa thogs pa med snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin
287b4(gzungs 'dus): gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po bzhin mdzes po 'di smras// na mor na kra ya/ nam ar+ya ba lo ki ti sha ya/ b+ho d+hi sa d+ha ya/ ma hA sa ta ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya/ sarba ban d+ha na che/ 
287b5(gzungs 'dus): da na ka ra ya/ sarba bA sa mud drod mo/ lan ka ra ya/ sarba b+h+ya dud+da sha na ma ga ra ya/ sarba i t+yu pa tra ba bi tan/ sha ka ra ya/ sarba yod ta/ ku ru ya ru ya/ ngo sta sa rba ya/ ma
287b6(gzungs 'dus): sa d+ha ya/ ma hA ka ru ni ka ya// sad d+han du me man tra ti ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
287b7(gzungs 'dus): phyug la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de ni sa la phyag 'tshal lo// rig po 'di brjod kyi rig pa 'di dag la 'grub par gyur cigaka ta da ya thA ha ha nas
287b8(gzungs 'dus): de ni bas sa te/ ta pa da pa ne/ sa dza la dza la ni/ tsi la tsa la ni/ pur ba yog ma nu sma ra pad ma ye swA hA/ gang gis rigs pa 'di klag par de tshe rabs rgya skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di
287b9(gzungs 'dus): nas shi 'phos nas ka/ yang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyuraro// dkon mchog dang a rgya ba lo rje su dran pa'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba dur gau ti pa ri sho da ni ka/ u/ 
288a1(gzungs 'dus): shrIg pa'i dza ya na ma d+hA ra ni/ bod skad thu gnod pa'i rgyun thams cad yongs spyod ba/ gtsug gto rnam par rtul ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dkan mchog gsum la phyag 'tsham/ 
288a2(gzungs 'dus): na mo rA na tra ya ya// nam pa ga ra ta~M/ nam rjel la kyai pra ti bi shi sh+tha ya/ bud d+ha ya/ bgo bti tad ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ya/ ba sho d+ha ya sa man ta a b+ha bas ska ra na ga ti// ga na so b+hA d+hi shungaH
288a3(gzungs 'dus): a b+hi sha~Mn tsan du na su ga ta/ bar tsan/ a mr-i ta she kai re ma ha mun tra ba te/ a ra ha re/ a yu san dar ni sho d+ha yang sho d+ha ya/ ga ga ni bi shud d+he/ a shwa sha ba~M dza ya pa ri shud d+ha sa sa?
288a4(gzungs 'dus): skumam dza ga tas ca thag tu hr-i nga la/ a hrI Sh+TAH/ a dz+nyA s+t+waM the/ mas sun dre/ badz+ra badz+rag sa tar na shud te/ sa a ba ra na ba shud ste/ ba nyin rnaM ma/ a su ra bi shud d+he/ sa sa oM hrI
288a5(gzungs 'dus): ma ti ma ti ma ti/ maHti mA ti/ te nga gtan nyi pa ri shud d+he/ b+hUM sU ti drung rtsi shud d+hin ci dza mdzul/ rdo dza ma bi dza ma/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ sarbad+hA rmA/ ud+b+hi shrI r+d+he shud d+he/ badz+re 'adz+ra man brje/ 'adz+re
288a6(gzungs 'dus): ma badz+ra ma b+ha du ma ma sha ra'i ra nan/ sar+b+ba sa twA nan/ sa tsaM ka ya ba ri shud d+he/ b+hi b+h+ri mI sarba ga ti pi shud d+he/ sarba ta thad gad/ sim+ba shwa sa i d+hi sti shrI d+hI/ sarba 'a tra ta ka gta shA ma nas ma thus maH
288a7(gzungs 'dus): tu b+hu d+hA d+hA d+ha mr-i/ b+ho d+ha ya b+ho d+ha ya/ bi bai d+ha yai/ sa mas/ pa ri shud d+hi/ sarba thAg daM hre ta ya/ a de shA ti ma mug tre swA hA/ oM badz+re tsan d+ha sa rba du bstan dka ha na da ya bi tsa hU~M paH
288a8(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta b+he'i sha dzA ma dar ni/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi sman go zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dashin mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal/ na mo rangan tha ya/ ni ma pag / 
288b1(gzungs 'dus): be ro tsa na ya da tha ta ga ta ya/ a ra had de/ sa ma myag sam b+hud d+ha ya/ tad ya thA/ prad be ne/ bi ra ga da ra ma d+he/ pra si dang sid de/ srid d+ha a nu ga te/ ma hA bi pa nu ga nu te/ sarba d+harma a ba bod swA hA/ 
288b2(gzungs 'dus): tshig gzhan mi slu bar so shing la lan bdun bzlas la// zas la dang por bzlas te zos na// zhag bdun gyis nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// bzla ba phyed de brtson par byas nas thos par 'dzin par
288b3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyuro// zla bar byas na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyu ro// bdud rtsi sman zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzagas+ho// // dkon gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gdon sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag
288b4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thal sbyar gyis 'khor thams cad la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems rtswa
288b5(gzungs 'dus): rnams kyis sman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang // dad pa ma mchis pa dang // dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zeng la/ 
288b6(gzungs 'dus): rkam pa dang // rtag tu log 'dren dang / 'chi ba can dang / sha zas rnams kyis zin lags te/ dgegs dang log 'dren de dag zhig pa dang / mthar thug pa'i slad du// gsang sngags bshad par 'tshalo// / 
288b7(gzungs 'dus): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// bArtsi thal sbyar gang khyod sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so// legs so// khyod la de bzhin gshegs
288b8(gzungs 'dus): pa gnang gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig/ de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thal sbor gyi bcom ldan 'das dang lag no rdo rje'i zhabs la gdugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa// na/ 
288b9(gzungs 'dus): mo rad na tra ya yA na ma shAn da badz+ra pa na ya/ ma hA yakra se na pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro ta ya/ pra dz+wa la te/ b+haM phaT dau/ shoT da kata pa yaM b+he ra ba ye/ a si mu sa la badz+ra ba ra shu pa shu ha ste ya// tad+ya tha/ oM hu lu ts+tsha Shu
289a1(gzungs 'dus): a mr-i ta ku da li/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ kha da kha da/ kha hi kha hi/ ti shi ti sh+tsa/ ha na he na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ g+h+r-ir+ha ban d+hA/ gardza gardza/ tardza tardza/ bi s+pho ta yA/ bi s+pho ta yAHbag+ma ban
289a2(gzungs 'dus): amr-i ta kun du laM mu brtan ta ka da yA/ ba ya badz+re na sarba bgA na bi na ya kan ni ba ra/ mai hA ge na pa ti/ dz+ri ba tan te ka ra ya hUM hUM peT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ga na yA swA hA/ bdud ci thal sbyor gyi gsang sngags gsum
289a3(gzungs 'dus): pa'o// na mau ran tra yA yA/ na ma rtsan shun d+ha badz+ra pa na ye/ ma hA ya krA yin pa Sha ye/ na mo badz+ra kro ta yA/ dam shAng / ka ta pe ra bA yAM/ a ti ba sha ta sA yA/ he he he pa ta pa ta/ d+hA pa d+ha pa/ kha kha/ kha hi kha hI/ armaM
289a4(gzungs 'dus): d+ha kun d+ha li ti shA ti shA/ bAn d+ha b+han d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ ga na pa ti/ dzi ba ta a na d+ha ka ra yA swA hA/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor kyi gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma sh+tsan d+hi badz+ra pAn
289a5(gzungs 'dus): ya/ ma hA ya ka shese mate ye/ na mo badz+ra kro ta yA/ baM ma la kan ka/ dza la ba sha na la rga na a mr-i ba sa~Mb ba ya// rag tam l+ya/ rig ta a ru le pa ti/ pri yA yA/ badz+ra ba nAM pr-i yA lA/ badz+ra bane+e du s+yai ba pram
289a6(gzungs 'dus): de ba na ga/ yakra rak+ka sa bra ma tha na lI/ tre le kya ga tsa ra ya/ sha d+ha s+ya na pa ta na ga ra yA/ tri rad na gar bod ta ma ya/ a mri ta kun da li/ e he dam Sh+T+r-i de ki he ba ra b+ha g+na/ b+hing d+hu dang ya mU ling gA shan
289a7(gzungs 'dus): tru l+ya ru ba de taM/ sam bu ta oM kha kha kha ga/ g+h+rin rjen/ bAn d+ha d+han d+hau/ han ha na/ gardza gerdza/ bi swo ta yA/ bi s+t+ri ta yA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ pra dz+re wa dz+wa la/ gra sa gra saM/ sarba big nanA/ hri ta ya na s+pho Ta/ gad
289a8(gzungs 'dus): yan swaT/ rag sha da yan sngo na/ sa b+he ma rakr-i sa hr-i p+ta ya s+phoT// sarba ra hri da ya na s+phota/ sarba tsa tu rata ke hri ta ya na swo da/ sarba na ga nan/ hri da ya s+pho ta ya/ hri ta ya na so hU~M hUM phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa na/ 
289a9(gzungs 'dus): a b+hi sha/ a b+ha~M sha/ i dan tsam/ kar kyang ku ru badz+ra d+ha/ ad wa ba ya Ni swA hA/ bdud thal sbyor gyis gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na ma badz+ra d+ha ya/ d+haM shI ka be re bai re ba ya/ Shad ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ 
289b1(gzungs 'dus): kha ga ba hi kha hi/ ti shrI ti Sh+Thi ti/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha sA la// / bcud pa ci thal sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o// de nas de dag gi snying po gang yod pa gdon pa dang / zlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs nas/ bdag gis gas
289b2(gzungs 'dus): sngags thams cad gton cing legs par bzlas brjod pabyis pa dang / bsgrub par 'gyur pa de bshad par 'tshal lo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lag so// / oM a mr-i ShA hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor
289b3(gzungs 'dus): snying po'o// rdo rje khro bo bdur rtsi thal sbyor gyis// gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// log 'dren rnams kyang skrag te/ bdud skyabs med cing brten
289b4(gzungs 'dus): par gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thag tu song ste// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi skabs mdzad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol// zhes smras zhing mgo
289b5(gzungs 'dus): bo bathur du bdug so// kye kye leg 'dre ma rungs pa rnams long la nga'i bka' nyon cig rdo rje kun tu 'brar shing rab tu 'bar bus khyod kyis gshegs su re/ ngas rol pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags
289b6(gzungs 'dus): kyi lha'i lo stong gi bar du lag 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / bdugs pa dang / rdungs pa dang / bzir ba dang / skam pa gang yin pa de dran par bgyis shig pa'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol
289b7(gzungs 'dus): gnon pa chen po dran par bgyis shig/ gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / des bsrungs pa byed pa de la klags mi tshol cig/ ti la smras pa 'am/ zas zas dran pa yang rung
289b8(gzungs 'dus): grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sbubs pa la klags ma tshol cig/ zani za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po la sngags kyis bad ba te/ dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma shar ba'i tshe/ lan bdun
289b9(gzungs 'dus): brjod na/ de'i phyir bzhin du 'brang ngo // log 'dren rnams kyang klags mi tshol lo// sha dang / nya dang til dang / slan chan dang / 'bras g.yos dang / ben che dang / snga ma khur bar ba dang dang / la phug kyang
290a1(gzungs 'dus): rung ste/ zas thams cad zas zin kyang sha nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thal
290a2(gzungs 'dus): sa bya ba'i gzungs rdzog stsa// rgya gar skad du/ kr-i sta de bzhin ma dz+ra ni/ bod skad du lha mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
290a3(gzungs 'dus): 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon par byang chub kyi shing drung nas bzhug
290a4(gzungs 'dus): pa gshin rje'i srid mo// lha mo nag mo chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das gang na zhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/ phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'kho // phyogs
290a5(gzungs 'dus): gcig tu 'khod nas kyang // 'dod pa'i khams kyis dbang phyug bdud kyi ma/ gshin rje'i snying po yis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
290a6(gzungs 'dus): la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na// bdag gi der gshegs su gsol// tad+ya tha/ oM ru ra be du tis sbas pa to si~M/ ru ru ro pa ti shu ba to sa~M swA s+sa// 'di gdon pas gdon thams cad dang
290a7(gzungs 'dus): nad thams cad dang // 'byung po thaMd dag mi ngas thams cad dang // nyes thar lta pab thams cad da na nyes par bor ba rnams dang / bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mi shis pa dang / mi mthun
290a8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i byed pa phyogs ris thams cad steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed man chad thug pa mi 'dro shig/ theng kar ni khor yug gi ril thug pa tshun tshad chings shig/ zlogs shig/ 'og dun sems ca
290b1(gzungs 'dus): dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad chings shig/ zlogs shig swany+dza/ lha mo nag mo'i gzungs rdzogs spyo// kar+m+ma bar skad du/ a r+ya mAM tre ya bya ka ra na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lung stan pa
290b2(gzungs 'dus): 'phrogs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi ded dpon// khyabo bdag dpal/ shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus/ 'jig rten rnams la snying rje b+h+yar+ya// ston pa l+la khyi ma'i mdolas naM/ ma 'ong
290b3(gzungs 'dus): pa'i sangs rgyas gang // 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa po// byams pa zhes bya ba'i bstan pa de/ 'dren pa dag ni de mthu dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ni don thams cang / rgyal la rab tu nyal
290b4(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal na/ de ni mi mchog bdag la gsungs// de la bsngon pas bka' bstsol pa// sangs rgyas byams pa mi mchog de'i ka'abyor pa rgyas khyod la nges// lung bstan byas nga la nyon// 
290b5(gzungs 'dus): de'i tshe na rgya mtsho ni/ khor yug du ni dpag tshad brgya// bskam par gyur te yang ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam bzlas yin// de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yang / chu zheng thag 'bru
290b6(gzungs 'dus): mnyam par ni/ dpag tshad stong phrag bcu pa de/ 'byung po kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// de'i tshe na yul gyi mi// dUr cing 'byor la chags pa med/ 'tshe med mi ni de dag kyang // 
290b7(gzungs 'dus): dge ba byed pa dag tu 'gyur// ma bzhi che ma med pa dang / banyon zhing ni sing sngo deng ldan// 'phyar zhing ni me zhes byed pa ste/ shing dpal 'dam ma bzhin du 'jam// dngar zhing dri ni zhim
290b8(gzungs 'dus): pa yaM/ sa lu ma rmongs pa hu smai/ sa tshigs mtshon gyis mdzes byas pa'i/ gos gyi ljon shing rgyud par 'gyur// me tog le 'bras ldan ma yi// 
292a1(gzungs 'dus): ljon 'ang 'phang du rgyang grags 'byung // de dag rnams kyi ma lo ni/ rgya khri kho na thub par 'gyur// sems can de dag skyon cing // nyes bral smra ba tshe dang ldan// lus
292a2(gzungs 'dus): kha dog ldan pa ste// chen po de'i spobs dang ldan// nang ni gsum bzhig 'byung 'gyur te// 'dod dang mi zad dga' ba pa// bu mo l-i ni lnga brgya dag/ lon nas khyod la bag mar
292a3(gzungs 'dus): de tshe'i tog ldan zhes bya ba'i// rgyal po'i pho brang 'byung 'gyur te// srog chags dge ba'i las byed pa// sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no// chur ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis ste/ 
292a4(gzungs 'dus): ni dpag tshad bdun yod pa// bsod/ nams byas pa rnams dag gis// grong khyer yid 'ong 'byung 'gyur/ rin chen bdun las byas mtho ba'i// rab 'phang du rgyang
292a5(gzungs 'dus): grags tsam// shing thabs dang ni sgro rnams gang // rin chen sna tshogs dag gis brgyan// rin chen so bag gis rtsigs shing // bad+ma ma ud pa btsal du bkram// dur
292a6(gzungs 'dus): mdzes par byas pa'o// 'obs kyang 'byung ba kho nar 'gyur// 'khor yug du ni rA ta la~M// 'breng ba bdun gyis yongs bskur// dI la bu phra ba'i mdzes byas pa'i// rin chen bzhi
292a7(gzungs 'dus): t+pal bdag/ rlung skyong ta la de dag las// sman pa'i sbyi ni 'di ltar dper// sil bstan yan lag ldan zhing // de las yid 'angs sgra snog sa 'byor/ mi rnams gang dag slong
292a8(gzungs 'dus): khyer der// bce ra dga' bde don gnyer ba rnams// de dag ta la'i sgra des rab tu 'gu zhing btse bar byed// ud pal ku ma tas gang nga'o// rdzing bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// 
292b1(gzungs 'dus): grong de skyed mo tshal dang ni// nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// der ni dung zhes bya ba yi// rgyal po gzi 'arjid che ldan pa/ stobs chen gling bzhi'i dbang phyug ste// mnga' 'khor
292b2(gzungs 'dus): lo bsgyur ba 'byung // dpung gi yan lag bzhi sbyor zhing // rin chen bdun dang yan lag ldan// rgyal po de'i sras rnams ni// stong du tshangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// mi'i dbang po de yang na
292b3(gzungs 'dus): sA 'di rgya mtshos mthas klas pas// chags pa med par chos dang ni// mthun par yongasu skyong bar 'gyur// de tshe dung zhes bya ba yi// sa bdag rgyal po de la yang // rin chen khrag
292b4(gzungs 'dus): khrig brgyan mtshon pa'i// brjer rkyen bzhi ni 'byung 'gyur// su'i mtshan ni ser skyo ste// bcom rtags la/ ni dkar po yin// sa 'dzin na naM A la'i bA bA// bar na se
292b5(gzungs 'dus): grong khyer drung // rter ni bzhi po kho na dang // rgyal po yang dag ldan pa ni// 'byung 'gyur dpa' bo chen pa yid/ bsod nams bskya'i stobs las skyes// de tshe rgyal po de
292b6(gzungs 'dus): 'dun 'don// sgra des tshangs rab ces bya ba// thog mar rigs byed bzhi 'don pa// mkhan po zhig ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dun du 'jug dang gsang sngags 'dzin// dran lnga/ rig byed
292b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhung 'brel dang // sgra des sbyor byas pha rol phyin// brda' spyod pa'i tshig dang ldan// de tshe de'i chung ma ni/ tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba yi// mdzes zhing ldan sdug pa dang / gzugs
292b8(gzungs 'dus): bzong grags pa ldan pa 'byung // byams pa rkang gnyis mtshig 'gyur ba// dge' ldan gnas nas shi 'phos nas// de tshe de'i ldum su ni/ nges par nyid mechi mes sbyor bar 'gyur// 
293a1(gzungs 'dus): gzi brjid chen po bzla ba cu// tshangs par lhums su zhugs nas kyang // byams pa'i gnas ni bskyed mo tshal// me tog bzangs rgyas nang gshegs te// chos spyod ma de
293a2(gzungs 'dus): mi 'dug cing / maM nyal 'phreng bzhin dag du ni shing gis yal ga las gzung nas byams pa ldum pa nyid du 'gyur// mi'i mchog tu 'gyur// mi'i mchog tu gyur pa ni// blo g.yas ni 'byung
293a3(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur te// dper na sprin gyi phung po nas pa nas// nyi ma 'byung ba shin du gsal// ji ltar chu'i pad mo bzhin// mngal gyi 'dab gyis mi gos so// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad
293a4(gzungs 'dus): du/ 'od gyis rgyas par 'gyengs par 'gyur// de nas rgya byin lha dbang po// bde sogs mnga' bdag 'gyur nas// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa// lham pa'i tshe na len
293a5(gzungs 'dus): par 'gyur// de tshe ldam ma tha ga du yang / gom pa bdun dag 'dod par 'gyur go pa re re gteg dang ni// pang ma re re 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi dag du gzigs nas/ 
293a6(gzungs 'dus): bdag gi skye ba thA ma ni// 'di yin yang srid yod ma yin// yang yang du phyir mi 'ong // zag med mya ngan 'das 'gras zhes// gsungs yang rab tu bka' bskul to// klu rnams kyi ni
293a7(gzungs 'dus): chu bo rgyun / bsil dang 'jam pas sku bsil 'gyur// na mkha'i ngos nas lha rdzas kyi// gos dang me tog 'bar 'gyur// de'i dbul gdugs dkar po/ lce rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur
293a8(gzungs 'dus): mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mngar// byams pa dpal gyis 'bar ba de// ma mas blang yang dag blangs nas su// yum gyi phyag du phul bar 'gyur// rin chen sna tshogs brgyan pa'i
293b1(gzungs 'dus): khyags ni yid du 'ong ba la// sras dang bcas te bzhugs gsol nas// lha rnams kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur// bsil snyan stong phrag du ma dag/ sgra 'byin 'khrol ba'i grong khyer der/ byams pa/ 
293b2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa tsam gyis ni// me tog char pa 'ba' bar 'gyur// de'i nyin par sku ma ma ri// bud med rnams kyang bca' 'gyur nas// de dag thams cad nyams bde zhing // bde legs
293b3(gzungs 'dus): sun bca' bar 'gyur// tshangs rang mtshan mchog sum btsun gnyis// ldan pa'i sras de b+h+yong nas ni// gsong sngags de dag ba rtags nas ka da 'om du dga' bar 'gyur/ dzam
293b4(gzungs 'dus): sngags las 'byung ba bzhin// gzhon nu 'gro ba gnyis yin te// mi dbang 'khor los bsgyur ba 'am/ sang+ga rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis
293b5(gzungs 'dus): mchog pa// dpal den tshod rdzogs nas ni// skye dgu 'di ni sdug bsngal snyam// chos kyi bdag nyid dgongs pa mdzad// dbyangs chen tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// 'od chen
293b6(gzungs 'dus): gser gyi mdog dang wA 'dra// spyod 'phel che zhing thal gong rgyus// pad ma 'dab ma 'dra ba'i spyan// de'i sgra'i bran du ni// khru ni brgya bcu dag tu 'gyur du 'gyur// zhing du 'khru rnams
293b7(gzungs 'dus): nyi shu ste// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor de'i tshad// byams pa de ni bram ze'i bu// stong phrag bzhi po dag dang ni// brgya bcu bdun du bdar nas ni// gsang sngags dag kyang mdun du 'jug
293b8(gzungs 'dus): de nas rgyal chen po'i drung // sdom su 'dom ni drug bcu bzhi// 'phang du 'dom ni sdong yod pa'i// mchod stong zhig ni 'jigs par 'gyur// mi dbang de'i mchod stong de// rin che sna
294a1(gzungs 'dus): kyis brgyan pa'i// mchod sbyin gyis ni 'dun grangs nas// bram ze dag la rab tu dbul// mchod sbyong yid 'od rin chen rgyan// de ni phul ma thag du yang // bram ze
294a2(gzungs 'dus): stong pa rnams kyis ni// de'i mdo la 'byed par 'gyur// byams pa mchod stod de'i ni/ mi rtags nyid de mthong nas kyang / 'khor ba'i mtha' dag rnams spangs nas// byams
294a3(gzungs 'dus): rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir bdag rab tu phyung nas ni// bdud rtsi'i go 'phang reg gyur dang // skye bo 'chi bdag na dga' ba'i 'jigs las grol bar 'gyur snyam zhing
294a4(gzungs 'dus): byams pa gang zag mchog gyur pa// stong phrag bzhi po/ ngag dang ni// rgya bcu dag gis mdun bangar nas// rab tu byung ba de 'byung 'gyur// de tshe ni bdan ni byang chub
294a5(gzungs 'dus): shing // klu shing zhes bya 'byung 'gyur// de'i yag gnam 'bang du// dpag tshad tsam du yang dag 'phags// tshe byang chub sems de yi// yan ga gyel pa
294a6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad du// kho ra khor yug rgyangs grags drug/ khyebs pa kho na dag du 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// de'i drung zhugs nas su// bla med byang chub bzhi
294a7(gzungs 'dus): ba ni// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// gang gis phyir ni kho na la// rab tu byung ba mngon 'byung ba// de'i nub mo kho na la// byang chub dam pa thabar bar 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thug
294a8(gzungs 'dus): mchog de'i// dam chos sdug bsngal kun spongs shing // zhi ba yan lag brgyad pa'i// gsung gi ston pa mdzad par 'gyur// skye bo rab dag gzigs nas ni// sdug bsngal skus
294b1(gzungs 'dus): bsngal kun 'byung dang // bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa'i// bden pa dag kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur// de'i chos de thos nas kyang // bstan pa la nan tan bsgrus
294b2(gzungs 'dus): me tog mdzes brgyas pas// skyed mo tshal du de'i 'khor// dpag tshad rgya khyon gang ba dag// gang dag 'du ba kho nar 'gyur// de nas mi dbang rgyal po dung // grags pa chen po thos nas
294b3(gzungs 'dus): sbyin pa grangs med btang nas su// rab tu byung ba 'dod par 'gyur// rgyal po stong phrag bzhi dang ni// brgya bcu dag gis mdun bdar nas// khyim nas nges par 'byung nas ni// rab tu 'byung bar
294b4(gzungs 'dus): 'gro bar 'gyur/ khyams pa'i yab dang de bzhin du de'i tshad mnyam pa'i// bram ze rnams kyis mdun bdar nas// rab tu byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas de tshe khyim bdag ni
294b5(gzungs 'dus): nor bzang zhes ni rnams grags pa// chos kyi bdag nyid stong bdag gis// skor nas rab du 'byung bar 'gyur// dung gi bud med po che// sa bzhi na rnams grags pa// bud med sdong
294b6(gzungs 'dus): phrag bzhi dang ni// brgya bcu dag gis mdun 'dar te// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de tshe de ni byams pa yis// bstan pa la srog chags dag/ stong phrag dang ni brgya phrag rnams// 8
294b7(gzungs 'dus): tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thugs rje'i can// ston pa byams pa rkang gnyis mchog// 'khor la rnams par gzigs nas ni// shAkya seng ge thub pa de// gtso bo skyob pa mdzad
294b8(gzungs 'dus): pa po// dam pa'i chos dbyings gzigs gyur pa// 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag kun// thar pa'i lam ni bskyed nas kyang // don gyi nga'i bstan pa btang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / 
295a1(gzungs 'dus): dri dang 'phreng ba drug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra bstan skyugs pa yis// shAkya thub la mchod nas ni// nga'i bstan las lhags pa yin// gur gum chu'i bdab pa dang // tsan dan gyis ni chun
295a2(gzungs 'dus): pa yis// shAkya thub pa'i mchod rten la// mchod nas de'i lcags// shAkya hU~Mb lam do ma sangs rgyas cho sna dang ni// dge 'dun la yang skya bas so gli // dge ba'i las kyang byas nas ni// 
295a3(gzungs 'dus): nga'i stan la si lhags pa yin// shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la// bsngal ba'i ni yang dag blangs nas su// ji ltar gsungs dri na bsgrubs na ni// nga'i bstan la lhags pa yin dge 'dun
295a4(gzungs 'dus): la yang chos gos dang // zhal zas dang ni bdung ba dang // bstan gsos sna tshogs sbyin pa rnams// phul nas nga'i bstan la lhan bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // de bzhin
295a5(gzungs 'dus): zla gcig ches brgyad dang // chu 'phrul gyin zla ba la ni// yan lag brgyad legs mnyam gzhag cig/ bsnyen gnas gso sbyong byas nas ni// nga'i bstan las lhags
295a6(gzungs 'dus): pa yin// don 'di rab tu gsung bar 'gyur// de'i nyan thos rnams dang ni// chom 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur// de thams cad ni zag pa zad pa 'gregs na bde bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa
295a7(gzungs 'dus): pa ni// nyan thos 'ching ba las grol ba// dung phyur phrag dgu bye brag gnyis// tshangs pa'i nyan thos 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nas// lha dang mi rnams rnam brtul nas
295a8(gzungs 'dus): nyan thos rnams dang thabs gcig tu// gong du bsod snyoms spyod la rgyu// de nas rtog ldan dga' ldan lha'i// grong khyer der ni gshegs pa na// grong khyer mchog tu man dar ba'i
295b1(gzungs 'dus): me tog chang chen 'bral ngar 'gyur// lha'i bu dag mthu shes pa// ung bal pad ma kun mu ta/ pad ma bkar madz+ra nam dang / a ka ru dang can dan dang // lha'i me tog mtho
295b2(gzungs 'dus): 'gyur// brgyal po chen po ni dag dang // brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum dang // tshangs pa lha tshogs rlung // tshangs pa lha tshogs thams cad du de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// lha
295b3(gzungs 'dus): shuni mthu chen gyis// ud pal pad ma kun mu tra// pad ma dkar ba dri nim dang // a ka ru dang tsan dan dang // de bzhin lha rdzas phreng ba dang / lha rdzas gos kyang 'thor bar 'gyur
295b4(gzungs 'dus): 'jig rten gyi grong khyer gyi// mchog tu gshegs pa mthong ni// shing bal 'dab ma ltar 'jam dang // sa rer brjing ba brgya chen dgading // de dag lam dkar 'gre ba bzhi
295b5(gzungs 'dus): sna tshogs dag ni rnam par 'grems// lha'i du ni mthu chen dang / mi rnams yid ni rab dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dbyug pa dang // rol
295b6(gzungs 'dus): mo sna spyan grags pa yi// ston pa la ni mchod par 'bul// brgya byin mig stong lha rnams kyis// brgyal po bsogs bdag po de// rab mgu thal po sbyar nas ni// 'jig rten mgon
295b7(gzungs 'dus): la bstod par byed// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// gang zag mchog 'gyur bcom ldan 'das// skye dgu kun la thugs rtser mdzod// de'i tshe na lha
295b8(gzungs 'dus): bu mthu chen 'dud ces bya ba'i byung // de yang thal mo so rab sbyar nas// 'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongasu bskor zhing // tshangs pas kyang ni mdun dang
296a1(gzungs 'dus): nI tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni bsgrags bzhin du// dam pa'i chos ni gsung bar 'gyur// zag zang nye bar rnam grol zhing // srin pa'i bcing pa rab spangs pa'o/ 
296a2(gzungs 'dus): bcom rnams kyis 'di ni// thams cad kun du gang bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang drin dang / gnod sbyin dang ni sgren po'i klu'i// mgu chen rnams kyis mgu gyur nas// sngon la
296a3(gzungs 'dus): mchod par byed par 'gyur// gang dag byas pa'i bstan pa la// tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de dag don mi za bar ni// nyon mongs med cing the tsom mod/ gang dge byams
296a4(gzungs 'dus): pa'i bstan pa la// tshangs par sbyang bskyod par/ 'gyur// de dag gdon mi tho bar ni// srid pa'i dri ba bcad pa/ dang // bsam gtan rdzogs par byas nas ni// dgal
296a5(gzungs 'dus): dang 'de dang yang dag ldan// 'byung ba kun 'thunartse 'a// byams pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ lo ni drugakhri'i bar du yang // dam pa'i chos ni bston par 'gyur/ 
296a6(gzungs 'dus): de ni srog chags brgya snying dnga'i sum theg rnams par 'dren po ste// dam pa'i chos la bdul nas su// de nas mya 'das nas// de ma 'di'i dam chos nAM/ lo khri dag tu
296a7(gzungs 'dus): gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba shAkya thub de la// sems ni rang tu dang b.ri bgyis// de tshe byangs pa rkang gnyis mchog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyasatshos
296a8(gzungs 'dus): dag dang dge 'dun tshogs kyi mchog bcas la// sems ni du dgas dang / 'byor ba'i nyung mthong nas ni/ nag pa rigs la dad par 'gyur/ mkhas pa su nig dang mi 'gyur
296b1(gzungs 'dus): phyir 'di dag bdag nyid che// 'dod cing bdag la legs 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bstan pa bzhin tu// dam pa'i chos la gus par bya// 'phags pa byams pa'i lung bstan pa rdzogs / 
296b2(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sha ba ti byA ha na ma hA ya na su kra bod skad du// 'phags pa bde ba can bkod pa zhes bya ba the chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
296b3(gzungs 'dus): thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal// mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na/ dge
296b4(gzungs 'dus): slong stong nyis brgya bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun// chen po// gnas rten nyan thos chen po dgra bcom pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ gnas bton sha ri'i bu dang // me'u 'das
296b5(gzungs 'dus): gyi bu chen po dang // 'od bsrung chen po dang // ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang // ka phyi na chen po dang // gsus po che dang / nam 'bru dang / lam bstan blun po dang dga' bo dang / kun dag
296b6(gzungs 'dus): bo dang / ngag can 'dzin dang // ba lang bdag dang / ba ra dwa tsa dang / mtshar byed nug po dang / bkul dang mu 'gags pa dang // nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
296b7(gzungs 'dus): dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag brtson
296b8(gzungs 'dus): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsod mi 'dod pa dang / de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan mang po dang // lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang dang mi 'phye
297a1(gzungs 'dus): kyi bdag po tshungs pa dang / de dag dang lnga bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po gnan dang // yang thabs gcig chu ba nugs so// de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa drashA ri'i du
297a2(gzungs 'dus): ma bka' bstsal pa// sha ra~M bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi ni da bye ga zug khrig phrag 'dzub 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya
297a3(gzungs 'dus): zhig bya ba yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsho dpag med ces bya bzhugs te// mtsho skyong zhing bzhes pa chos kyang ston to// sha
297a4(gzungs 'dus): bu 'di ji snyam du sems 'jig rten gyi khams phyir// 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan zhes bya ba zhe na/ 'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de ni// sems can
297a5(gzungs 'dus): kyi lus la sdug bsngam med// sems lagrus phrul med cing // bde ba'i nan tshad me pa med do// de byunga'ajig chen gyi khams bde bcan zhes bya'o// shA
297a6(gzungs 'dus): gzhan yang 'jig rten gi khams badrebacan ni// kha khyer rim pa bdun dang // tu shing du sa 'dun dang / dril gA yod de'i dra ba rnams kyis kun nas yongasu ma chog/ k+Sha ba ldan
297a7(gzungs 'dus): sdug pa'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rin pa che sku bdun po ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur r+ya dang // shel dong rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis
297a8(gzungs 'dus): yim ngan pakod pa dag gis legs par brgyan du rgya/ sha ro'i du gzhan mang 'jig rten gyi khams byeng bca na// 'on gyi che sna bdun gyis rdzing lani yid lag brgyad dang ldan
297b1(gzungs 'dus): chus yongs su gang ba// rin po che'i pad mas khyabs pa// bya rog gi sdong bus rung bar kha ta tshad du gyur pa// gser gyi bye ma gangal ba bdag yod pa// rdzing bu de dag phyogs kun na them
297b2(gzungs 'dus): skyes pa// lta na sdug pa/ gser dang dngul dang / bye dur r+ya dang / shel dang / rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa bzhi bani yod do// rdzing de dag gi 'gram na rin po che'i shing ljon pa/ 
297b3(gzungs 'dus): rin po che sna bdun la 'di lnga ste// gse drang dul byi dur+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang // rdo rje'i snying po dang // smug gi shing bkra ba dang // lta na sdug pa dag pa skyes/ 
297b4(gzungs 'dus): rdzing de dag kun nas pad ma skyes pa 'di lta ste// go ser gyi kha dog gser gyi mdog 'byung ba gser lnga buraldan pa// sngon po kha dog sngon po// 'di sngon po lta bu 'byung
297b5(gzungs 'dus): ga sngon po lta bur bston pa// ser po kha dog ser po kha 'od ser po 'byung ba// ser lta bur ston pa// dmar po kha dog dmar po// 'od dmar po 'byung ba// dmar po ltar spen
297b6(gzungs 'dus): dkar po kha dog dkar po khyang ba// dkar po lta bur ston pa// bkra ba kha dog bkra ba/ 'od bkra bar 'byung ba// bkra ba lta bur ston pa// shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag bskyes so// sha ri'i bu
297b7(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa// rnam par de lta bu dag gis legs par rgyan pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can// lha'i bsil bstan du sgra rtag du 'byung
297b8(gzungs 'dus): po sa chen po ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu ste// khams dga' ba'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni// sangs rgyas kyis zhing bkod pa// rnam pa de lta bu bdag gis legaso par brgyan pa'o// 
298a1(gzungs 'dus): sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du balnga'o// me dog man d+hA ra ba chen po lha'i me tog gi char chen po 'bang po// der sems can
298a2(gzungs 'dus): gang dag skyes te/ de dag kyang snga gro gcig bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang // gzhan du dong ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa
298a3(gzungs 'dus): re re la// me tog skon bu bye ba phrag 'bum mngon par rdor to// gartor nas nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir// slar 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du dong ngo // sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
298a4(gzungs 'dus): yon tan bkod pa// rngam po de lta bu dag gis/ legs par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ dang ba dang krung krung dang / rma bya
298a5(gzungs 'dus): ngag yod de/ de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'dus nas// klu dbyangs len te/ rang rang gi skad kyis smra'o// de dag gi sgrub na dbang po dang // stobs dang byang
298a6(gzungs 'dus): chud kyi yan lag gi sgra dag byung ngo // sems can gang drug der skyes pa de dag gi de thos nas// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ste/ chos yid la skyes// dge 'dun yid la skye'o/ 
298a7(gzungs 'dus): ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can du 'gro ba'i skye gnas su gyur pa yin/ snyam du sems pa ldan de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems
298a8(gzungs 'dus): can dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro'i skye gnas su dang / gshin rje'i 'jog rten du skye ba'i ming yang med do// bya'i tshogs de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med de// nyid kyis
298b1(gzungs 'dus): chos kyi sgra 'byung ba'i phyir sprul pa dag go// sha ri'i bu bzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi ning ta li 'phreng ba de dag dang // dril bu g.yer gA'i dra ba de dag la rlung gyis phob cing // rlung gyis skyod na
298b2(gzungs 'dus): sgra snyan pa yid du yid 'ong ba nyams dga' ba dag gis 'byung ste/ dper na rol mo mkhan gyi yan lag bye ba 'bum dang ldan pa/ lha'i bsil bstan bslangs pa bzhin ni// der mi
298b3(gzungs 'dus): de dag gis/ sgra de dag thos nas// sangs rgyas rje su ngan pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang // lus la gnas so// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ 
298b4(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon bkod pa'i brgyan rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu 'di ji/ snyam tu sems// ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
298b5(gzungs 'dus): pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba zhes na/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba zhes na// sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i tshe// de
298b6(gzungs 'dus): 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med de// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag med ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
298b7(gzungs 'dus): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par sa rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bcu lon no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi de/ 
298b8(gzungs 'dus): 'dun dag la// dgra bcom pa sha stag tshad med de// de dag gi tshad brjod par slab ma yin no// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshad ni brjod par slab ma yin te/ gzhan du
298b9(gzungs 'dus): tshu ma so kyi mang 'i mas pa nan bya rdzus pa rgya sa ma tshul pa na
299a1(gzungs 'dus): tshad med grangs med ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dkod pa rnams pa de lta bu dag gis
299a2(gzungs 'dus): legs par brgyan pa'o// shA rI'i bu de ltar bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni// skye bar bya ba'i phyir// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gus par yongs
299a3(gzungs 'dus): su bsngo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa'i de lta bu dge dang 'phrad par bya ba'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba bden pa// ngom tsam gyis ni/ 
299a4(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ tsho dpag med de'i zhing du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu rigs// kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis// bcom ldan
299a5(gzungs 'dus): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan thos la// thos nas kyang yid la byed cing nang nub bar bzung ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la yid ches
299a6(gzungs 'dus): par bgyis shig/ ces gsungs par mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs du byung phyogs na// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra 'phro'i phung po zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
299a7(gzungs 'dus): cad sgrol ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu thul dka' zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs
299a8(gzungs 'dus): pa dran pa can zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang // de dag la sogs pa byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i/ 
299b1(gzungs 'dus): klung gi bye ma rnyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad do// khyab pa gcig yon tan bsams mi khyab pa yongasu brjod pa
299b2(gzungs 'dus): sings rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'od la yid ches par bgyis shig ces gsungs pa mdzad do// de bzhin du 'od kyi phyogs ni de bzhin
299b3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa 'od ces bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa chos shes bya
299b4(gzungs 'dus): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa 'og ni phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung
299b5(gzungs 'dus): gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas zhing rnams lcags kyi dbang pos khyad par mdzad de// khyed cag yon tan pasam mi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa// sangs rgyas
299b6(gzungs 'dus): thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la yid skyes par dkris shig// ces bsrung ba mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbungs zhes bya ba / 
299b7(gzungs 'dus): de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos yod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa smos kyi/ 
299b8(gzungs 'dus): phung po zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog shin du brgyas par rig par zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dza/ 
300a1(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa rin ud pa'i 'dapal zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya
300a2(gzungs 'dus): ba dang / de dag la sogs pa steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gis phyogs klung gi bye ma dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos
300a3(gzungs 'dus): khyab par mdzad de// khyed cag yon tan bas ma mi khyab pa yongasu rjo gsangs rgyas thams cad kyis yong su bzung ba chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la yid ches par bgyis shig ces
300a4(gzungs 'dus): gsung ba mdzad do// sha ri bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de ci'i phyir zhe/ chos kyi rnams grangs songs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasu pa zhes bya ba na// sha ri
300a5(gzungs 'dus): bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di dang // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'de dag gis mtshan thos par 'gyur ba dang // thos pa dang /

300a7(gzungs 'dus): nga 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtsug gam// nub ginyis sa / nu sum 'am/ nung duni 'am/ rlung lnga tramany+dzi nung bdun du g.yeng ba'i med pa'i sems kyis yid/ 
300a8(gzungs 'dus): la byed na// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'chi ba'i dus kyis tshe// phyin tso l-ig ga med pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas pa/ de bzhin gshe
300b1(gzungs 'dus): 'od dpag med nyan thos kyis dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun gyis bltas nas// mdun du bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
300b2(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing // 'jig rten gau khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// sha ri'i bu de bas na/ don gyi dbang de mthong nas// rigs kyi bu 'am
300b3(gzungs 'dus): rigs kyi mos sangs rgyas kyis zhing der gus pas// smon lam btab par bya'o// zhes du skad ces bshad do// sha ri'i bu 'ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas da ltar/ 
300b4(gzungs 'dus): yongs brjod pa de bzhin du/ sha ri bu shar phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs smra
300b5(gzungs 'dus): lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin ga

300b7(gzungs 'dus): de dag la sogs pa shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyis zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyabs
300b8(gzungs 'dus): par mdzad do// khyed cag yom tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong su brjod par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongasu bzung ba'i chos kyi rnams grangs 'di la yid ches por bgyis

301a2(gzungs 'dus): bzhin gshegs pa drags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro phung po zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs par lhun po'i sgron ma zhes pa bye dang // de bzhin
301a3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
301a4(gzungs 'dus): rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyed par sna // khyed cag yon dan das ma gyis mi khyab pa yongs su dza dang // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yongasu srung pa'i cho
301a5(gzungs 'dus): rnams grangs 'di la yid ches par bgyis shig/ ces gsungs pa mdzad do// de bzhin du nub phyogs ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsho dpag med ces bya ba dang / de bzhin kan+ye/ 
301a6(gzungs 'dus): ba phung po dpag med ces bya ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan dpag med ces bya ba deng / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer
301a7(gzungs 'dus): snang po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa che tog chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin shi shegs pa 'od zer dag pa zhes bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nub phyogs kyi sangs rgya
301a8(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyen par mdzad do// khyed cag yon tan bsam rgyas ma khyam pam
301b1(gzungs 'dus): brjod pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bde ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du sangs rgyas kyis ston par byed pa 'am// byas pa 'am/ byed par 'am 'gyur ba de dag
301b2(gzungs 'dus): thams cad bla na med par yongs rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// phyir mi log go// phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu ji ltar sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das dag gi
301b3(gzungs 'dus): 'khor yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu brjod pa de bzhin du sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga'i yon dade bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu brjod do// 
301b4(gzungs 'dus): sha ri'i lus gsol pa// bcom lngas shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po bskal pa'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can kyi snyig ma dang
301b5(gzungs 'dus): lta ba'i snyigs ma dang // tshe'i snyigs ma'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'byed du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
301b6(gzungs 'dus): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed der chos ston pa ni ngo 'tshur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ sha r-i'i bu snyigs
301b7(gzungs 'dus): ma lnga'i tshe// 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun
301b8(gzungs 'dus): pa'i chos bsnyon pa de ni mchog tu dga' bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal nas// tshe dang pa ldan pa ga ri'i bu dang nyan thos chen po de dag/ 
302a1(gzungs 'dus): dang lha dang / mi dang lA yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed do// 'phags pa
302a2(gzungs 'dus): bde ba can bkod pa zhes bya ba rdzogas+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshe ta pra ti d+ha kli na ma b+ha d+ha// bod skad du/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad zhes bya
302a3(gzungs 'dus): ba dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab ldan mchog sha ri'i bu// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'i// shes rab chen po sha ri'i bus// ston pa la naM zhu
302a4(gzungs 'dus): zhus// mchod rten bskor ba bya ba ni// rnam par smin pa ci 'gyur ba// bskal pa chen po 'jig rten mchog// rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// rdzogs
302a5(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog// sngon pas de la bskal bstsal pa// mchod rten dag pa phyag byas pa'i// yon ta na ga gis phyogs mtshams bstan// mchod rten
302a6(gzungs 'dus): bskor ba byas pa yi ka lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / shar za de bzhin srin po rnams kyis/ thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// dal brnyed dka' thob gyur nas// skad ga
302a7(gzungs 'dus): cig tsam yang du yang // mchod rten bskor ba byas pa na/ maM khom brgyad rnams spong bar 'gyur/ mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dran dang ldan dang blo gros ldan// khad
302a8(gzungs 'dus): ldan zhing mdzangs dang ldan// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'jam bu'i gling su rus kyi// lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// tshe ri
302b1(gzungs 'dus): ba yang de'i thob// grags pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam bu'i gling du rus kyi mchog/ chos rigs yongasu dag pa dang // blo ldan te
302b2(gzungs 'dus): 'dir skyes par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// ser na med cing btong ba dang // sbyin pa dag la dpa' bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// yid du'o
302b3(gzungs 'dus): zhing lta na sdug/ mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // long spyong rgya chen thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'du byed stong pa mthong nas yang // de ni chos
302b4(gzungs 'dus): la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur du dga' ba thob/ par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// rgyal rigs mchog/ du skye ba dang // bu slad dang yang ldan par 'gyur// sngon
302b5(gzungs 'dus): dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bram ze che zhing mthong bar 'gyur// tshul khrim ldan zhing thos par 'gyur// dang ldan rigs byed gas
302b6(gzungs 'dus): sngags ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar 'gyur// phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang // nor dang 'bru rnams ldan par 'gyur/ 
302b7(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten bskor ba byas na// 'dzam bu gling du mnga' bdag rje// sa bdag mtha' bdag dbang byed pa// chos dang ldan pa'i dbang por 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas/ 
302b8(gzungs 'dus): bas ni// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzhin 'khor lo skor byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas pa ni// 'di nas 'phos
303a1(gzungs 'dus): nas mtho ris 'gro// sangs rgyas bstan las dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// mched rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dngal kyai skyon dang
303a2(gzungs 'dus): dri ma yis// de la dgos pa yid mi 'gyur// de ni nor bu dag par bzhin/ mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// ma wAr bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de ni bde bar bcas
303a3(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / bde bar du bzho mthong bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phas kyang g.yog 'khor mang po yis// de la gso zhing gnas par 'gyur// dpa' bas rtag
303a4(gzungs 'dus): tu rim 'gro byed// mchod rten bskor ba/ byas pas ni// nyi du rnams kyi snying du sdug/ de bzhin pha ma lhags par byams// skyes gnas long skyed 'phel bar 'gyur// 
303a5(gzungs 'dus): mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis// de la gno pa yang mi nus// long spyod dag la skyon med spyod// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ 
303a6(gzungs 'dus): pa brgya yang de dag rnams// zhar 'baskur po yong mi 'gyur// lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dmig kyang rnam par dag par 'gyu
303a7(gzungs 'dus): dkrugs ring mthon thing sdig pa dang // lho'i dmigs kyang thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lus brtan sems kyang brtan pa ste// de bzhin brtson 'grus
303a8(gzungs 'dus): brtan pa dang // dpung mgo zla zhing brtan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// stobs dang spyang gzugs phun sum tshogs// yan lag rnams mtshan gyi// legs
303b1(gzungs 'dus): rgyabastobs dang ldan pa phun gyi tshags// de cazhin gyi myi ma ma sa// shin du sgrun rkang thong par 'gyur// ngan rjes myung du 'grub par snang // mched rgyun pa ba byas byas/ 
303b2(gzungs 'dus): par brgyan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor dbyas pas ni// sum bcu rtsa gsu dbang phyug me// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rgya byin dang // lha'i bdag por chen por 'gyur// mchod rten bsgo/ 
303b3(gzungs 'dus): ba byas pas ni// 'thab dral lnga'i rgyal po dang // de bzhin yosu dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan rdul dbang byed 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig
303b4(gzungs 'dus): rten tshangs pa yis// dbang phyug nyid du de 'gyur zhing // lha rnams bye ba rnyed kyis mchod// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bskal dbye ba spong dgra dang // khrag khrig khrag brgyad// 
303b5(gzungs 'dus): du yang // shes rab ldan pas rtag tu mchod// mchod rten bskor ba byis pa ni// bskal pa bye ba rnyed dag tu// lus gan gos kyang gtsang ma dang // dkar po'i tshogs
303b6(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// brtson 'grus brten zhing mthun pa ldan// brtsal brtan ces kyang mi tshugs te// don rnams myur du 'gyur
303b7(gzungs 'dus): 'grub par byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mdangs snyan gsung dbyangs thob pa dang // yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro can// nor ba med cing nang med 'gyur// mchod rten bsko
303b8(gzungs 'dus): ba byas pas ni// nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yis// gnas der myur du 'de 'gro zhing // shas cher skye bar thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dran pa nye bar gzhan
303b9(gzungs 'dus): pa bzhi// sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang // dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang // byang chub yan lag 'bras bu thob// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mngon shes
303b10(gzungs 'dus): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang thob// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mngon shes drug ldan pa ni po dang /

304a2(gzungs 'dus): mug spangs// 'khor rnams thams cad spangs pa yis// rang rgyal byang chub 'bras bu thob// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'jig rten dag du de bzhin gshegs// mtshan rnams
304a3(gzungs 'dus): kyis brgyan pa dang // gser gyi sku mdog thob par 'gyur// lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin// ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin// yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin// smon lam btab pa yang
304a4(gzungs 'dus): bskor ba yin ka/ 'dir ni bskor ba byasapas ni// srong ka bde mgur don rnams 'grub// 'jig rten mgon gyi// mchod rten la// bskor ba byas pas yon gang // de ni tshig
304a5(gzungs 'dus): tsam zhu tse zhes// legs par bstan par mi nus so// sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir// sha ri'i bus ni zhus nA kyang // mchod rten phyag rgyas yon tan gang // 'jig
304a6(gzungs 'dus): mgon pos bstan pa yin// rta brgya dang ni ser srang brgya// dri mo shing rnga brgya dag dang // dgod ma brgyani shing rta rdzas// bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba// bcu drug char yang mi bod do// 
304a7(gzungs 'dus): po dza'i bu mo brgya// nor bun cha gdub 'khor thogs// gser gyi dpung brgyan 'chung ba dang // 'grim pa gser gyis legs par brgyan// bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i// 4
304a8(gzungs 'dus): drug char yang mi phod do// gangs kyi glang chen brgyad snyed dag/ lus chen na pamau da yang sra pa dge// sna zho 'dab 'dra ba'i glang // ga ser dang nor bus brgyan pa dag/ bskor ba
304b1(gzungs 'dus): gom pa gcig bor ba'i// bcu drug tshur yang mi bod do// 'phags pa gang ga'i sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis sgom pa gcig bor ba'i// 'dzam du'i chu/ 
304b2(gzungs 'dus): klung gser 'bum grangs med pa'o// de ni de dang mtshungs par long ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba'i//

304b5(gzungs 'dus): chu bkang bskor pa// 'dzam bu'i chu'i klung gser phye ma gnyis ka de dang mtshungs par yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// bdaga'
304b6(gzungs 'dus): ba'i sems kyis mar me 'dum byed do// 'dzam bu mu klung gser srang bye ma 'bum// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dag

304b8(gzungs 'dus): na gang gis mchod// mya ngan 'das 'ag gang gis mchod// sems dga' bya ni mtshungs gyur na// bsad nams ganga'ang khyad par med// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi

306a1(gzungs 'dus): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' bskul bte/ kun dga' bo yig drug pa'i rigs sngags gang // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug

357b5(gzungs 'dus): 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jig
357b6(gzungs 'dus): dA dang / lha'i 'jigs pa dang / klu 'jigs pa dang / klog gi 'dzin pa dang / na mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs de dag 'ang
357b7(gzungs 'dus): rig sngags 'dis bcad do// phur bus gdab po/ tho bsdu brdung ngo // phyag rgyas mnan to// / nA mA sa mAn+ta ka ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra na na/ oM g+hag+na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sArba tu
357b8(gzungs 'dus): ShAn/ bdag gi 'jigs pa thaMd maM ra ya phaT/ ki li ki li yAM/ sarbo pa piM hAM hAM hAM/ badz+ra d+ha rod ki li ki li yA/ badz+ra dA rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka yi waM k+ka tsit+ta badz+ra ki li ki liH
358a1(gzungs 'dus): hUM phaT// bdag lnga'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lA ma yin gyi gdon dang / dr-i'i za'i gdon dang / na mkha'i lding gi gdon dang / maM 'am ci'i gdon dang / lho'
358a2(gzungs 'dus): chen po'i gdon dang / gnod gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yid btags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / sbrul po
358a3(gzungs 'dus): gdon dang / lus sprul pa'i gdon dang / skye ba byed kyi gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon dang / stod byed kyi gdon dang // grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro
358a4(gzungs 'dus): ma'i gdon dang / nem gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun na 'greng ba'i don dang / tsher ma 'don bI don dang / gdon de rnam
358a5(gzungs 'dus): las bdag rgyal bar gyur cig/ gdon de dag thams cad kyi ngan sems dang / gnod sems sdig sems thaMd rig sngags 'das bcad do// phur pos gdab po/ thobs bcu
358a6(gzungs 'dus): phyag rgyas mnan to// / na ma sa man+ta ka ya wa k+ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn// gdon thams cad kyi gnod sos thams cad ma ra ya phaT ki la ki la~M
358a7(gzungs 'dus): yA sarba pa paM hUM hU~M hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya la k+ka tsitA/ badz+ra ki li ki li ya hUM phaT// / bdag gi mdangs 'phrog pa dang / gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / zas su
358a8(gzungs 'dus): mngal za dang / ze su khrig 'thung ba dang / zasu sha za ba dang / zas su zhag ba dang / zas su tshil ze ba dang / zasu rkang za ba dang / za su btsas pa za ba dang / zasu srog 'phrog pa dang
358b1(gzungs 'dus): zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gdong khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lha ma za ba dang / zas su 'chil
358b2(gzungs 'dus): ma za ba dang / zas su snab s+ya zla ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba dang / za su dri za ba dang / zas su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa
358b3(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / zas su lo thog za ba dang / zasu sbyin bsreg gza ba dang / de dag thams cad las bdag rgyal bar gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyi ngan sems dang / gnod sos thams
358b4(gzungs 'dus): cad rig sngags 'dis bcad do// phur bus gdab po// phyag rgyas mnad do// / na ma sa man+ta ka ya wa krA tsi tA badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha b+ha b+ha ya/ g+ha tra ya/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ bdag ni
358b5(gzungs 'dus): mdangs 'phrogs pa dang / gzi brjid 'phrog pa rnams ma ra ya phaT// ki li ti/ la ya/ swarba pa paM hUM hUM hUM/ badz+rA ki li ki lA ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa krA tsat+ta
358b6(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra ki li kai la yA hUM phaT// bdag la phur pa'i dpal 'brel ba dang / ma mo'i thun zor 'phen pa dang / gi she ni rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs kyi sngags rgod zlos
358b7(gzungs 'dus): pa dang // sku'i byang sdom su bcug pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi spong gtong ba dang / 'dud kyi drag sngags spong ba dang / mtsho zor dang / yungs zor dang / mnga' zor dang / skor zer dang
358b8(gzungs 'dus): khrag zor dang / thun zor dang / ches zor dang / 'on zer dang / bud med kyi dmod mo dang / skyes pa'i ya kha sla ba thams cad rig sngags 'dis bcad do// pur bus gdab po// tho bas 'dzun
359a1(gzungs 'dus): phyag rgyas mnan te// nAm sa man+ta ka ya wa k+ki tsaSh+Tha badz+ra nan/ oM g+hag+h+ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn/ bdag la rig sngags kyi mthu gtong ba thams cad mar ya phaH
359a2(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra kI li ki la yA/ sarba pa pa~M hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kA laM ki la yA// badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa k+ka tsat+ta badz+ra ki li gi la yA hUM phaT// / bdag la rims nyin gcig pa dang / 
359a3(gzungs 'dus): nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum po dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin lnga pa dang / nyin drug pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims ldang dub pa dang / rims mi zad pa
359a4(gzungs 'dus): dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa// las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa dang / rims nad dang klad pa na ni
359a5(gzungs 'dus): rims thams cad rig sngags 'das bcad do// phur bus gdang po/ tho bas brdung ngo // phyag rgyas mnan to// na ma sa man+ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM gA g+ha g+hA ta ya g+ha
359a6(gzungs 'dus): ya/ sarba duShan// bdag gi rims thams cad ma ra ya baT/ ki li kI la yA/ sarba ba baM hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra ki laM ko la yA/ badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa rka tsitrA~M badz+ra ki la~M
359a7(gzungs 'dus): la yA hUM phaH// bdag gi lus tha na pa dang gzhogs byed na pa dang / maM ka mi nus pa dang / mi ga ni de dang / sna nad kha nang dang / mgul nang dang / snying nad dang lho nang dang / lkog ma'i lha
359a8(gzungs 'dus): ger na be dang / sna na ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / so na pa dang / snying na ba dang / rked na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na bu dang / de dag thams cad rig sngags 'dis bcad do// phur bus gad
359b1(gzungs 'dus): tho bas brdung ngo // phyag rgyas mnan to// na ma sa man+ta ka ya wak+ka tsir+N+Na badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+hA g+hA ta yA g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn/ bAdag gis lus kyi nad thaMd ma ra yaM phaT/ ki li ki la yAM/ sarba pa paM hUM
359b2(gzungs 'dus): hUM hUM/ badz+ra ki laM kaM la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod a dzA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra ki li ki la ya hUM phaT/ bdag lo yul mri dgrar langs pa dang / pa mtshan dgrar langs pa dang / spun zla dgar ladra
359b3(gzungs 'dus): pe dang / zhang gnyen dag ru langs pa dang / dpon po dgar langs pa dang / g.yog po dgar langs pa dang / dpag pa dgrar lengs pa dang / grags po dgrar langs pa dang / ma sring dgrar langs pa dang
359b4(gzungs 'dus): khyim mdzes dgrar langs pa dang / de dag thams cad rig sngags 'dis bca// phur bus gad po// tho bas brdung ngo // phyag rgyas mnan to// nam sa man+ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ 
359b5(gzungs 'dus): gA g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ya/ sam duSh+Tan/ bdag la snga dgra da ba dang / phyi ngag sems padz+rasam ra ya phaT/ ki li kau lA ya/ sArbab pa NAM/ dz+ra ka li ka lA ma/ badz+ra d+ha rod
359b6(gzungs 'dus): dzA pa ya ti ka ya wa k+ka tsit+ta badz+ra kai li ki la yA hUM phaT/ bdag la logs na mi dga' bar nyes na dga' ba dang / bdag la yod na mi dga' bar med na dga' ba dang / dag bdeni mi dga'
359b7(gzungs 'dus): bar sdug na dga' ba dang / bdag la bstod na mi dga' bar smad na dga' ba dang // bdag mthon mi dga' bar dma' na dga' ba dang / bdag bzang na mi dga' bar ngan na dga' ba dang / zad / 
359b8(gzungs 'dus): btsun mi dga' bar mi btsun na dga' gro bdag la gzhan gyis bkur ste byas nas dga' bA ma byas na dga' ba dang / bdag la mthu rtsal byung na mi dga' bar ma byung na dga' ba dang / bdag la byas la
360a1(gzungs 'dus): paM dga' bar mi byams pa byung na dga' bar sems pa rnams rig sngags 'dis bcang ngo // phur bus gdang po/ thobs bdung ngo // phyag rgya rgyas mnan 'o// nam sa man+da ka ya la ka tsi
360a2(gzungs 'dus): badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha/ gA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba dut+pan/ bdag la ngan sems rgyu bathad ma ra ya phaT// kai li ki la ya/ sarba pa paM hUM hUM hUM/ ma badz+ra pA rod a dz+nyA pa yaNi/ ka ya wa kA tsit+ta ba
360a3(gzungs 'dus): la ka la hUM phaT/ bdag la rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan dang / ltas ngan dang / yas kyi bdud g.yos pa dang / mas kyi sri langs pa dang / bar gyi btsan 'khros pa dang // tshel gnod pa dang
360a4(gzungs 'dus): dpal la rku ba dang / 'khor la 'tshe ba dang / long spyod dang / bsod nams la gnodapa/ dang / sems la sdug bsngal bskyed par byed pa thams cad rig sngags 'dis bcado// phur bus
360a5(gzungs 'dus): gdab po// thibs brdub // phyag rgyas mnan to// // na ma sa man+ta ka ya wa ka badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+hA/ g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Tan/ bdag la rnam par 'tshe ba thad ma ra ya phaT ki
360a6(gzungs 'dus): maM ki la ya sarba pa pa~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa ga tsad+b+ha badz+ra ki li ki la yi hUM phaT// / bdag la ma~M kha b+hU ba prA mA 'jug pa dang
360a7(gzungs 'dus): skal yugs 'brel ba deng / mtho gong du rgol ba dang / dma' sa la bug pa 'dugs pa dang / byas rkyen la stog pa dang / 'brang rten 'gyeg la sdug pa dang / phye'i zhing la gnod pa
360a8(gzungs 'dus): phugs kyi nor la rku ba dang / sgo ru phyugs la gnod pa dang / 'phyan gyi bu la gnod pa dang / gdon grogs la gnod pa dang / thaMd rig sngags 'dis bcad do// pur bus bdab po// 
360b1(gzungs 'dus): tho bas bzung ngo // phyag rgyas mnan to// nam sa man+ta ka ya wak+ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba du wAn/ bdag la snang ba'i ngagra dang / gnod pa'i bgegs thad
360b2(gzungs 'dus): ma ra ya phaT/ kai l-i ki lI ya/ sarba pa paM hAM hUM hUM/ badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ ka ya wa k+ka tsit+ta/ badz+ra ki li ki la ya hUM phaT/ dkon mchog gi dbu'angang smod pa dang sangs
360b3(gzungs 'dus): rgyas kyi bstan pa gshig pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon go sku la sngo ba dang // mched deng lcam bral rnams la mche ba dang / bdag la sku la sngo zhing ring la snyog pa dang / lus la sbrul ltar su 'khri/ 
360b4(gzungs 'dus): pa dang / ngag la khyi ltar du zugs pa dang // mgo la gza' ltar du bzla ba dang / mig ngan ce re blta ba dang / bas ma ngan gyis tu re sems pa dang / sgral ba'i zhing bcu
360b5(gzungs 'dus): la gtogs pa thaMd sngag sngags 'dis bcad do// phur bus bad pa rben tho bas rdudzaphyag rgyas mnan dI// / na ma sa man+ta ka ya waM k+ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan au gr-i b+ha g+ha ta ya g+ha da ya
360b6(gzungs 'dus): sarba duSh+TAn/ bdag li snga dgu dar ba dang / phyi dag sems pa thad ma ra ya paT/ ki li ki la yA/ sarba pa paM hA hUM hUM/ badz+ra ki li ki la ya/ badz+ra dA rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti ka ya wa
360b7(gzungs 'dus): k+ka tsiSh+Tha badz+ra kI li ki la ya/ e a kro dA ka ya man taka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ko ta ma hA pA la// ha na ha na pa tsa bi dan sa yA dza ti laM bo d+ha ra u nuSh+pe kro tra hUM phaT// rig pa 'dzin pa dag
360b8(gzungs 'dus): dpal rdo sder mAM gzungs 'di ni bas byis mi khyab go/ sa la btib nas 'gas khrig la bdab phrag nyi la// yul bdag 'chad/ shing la rkang na shing skamani rlung la tong na rlung zlogs/ rdza bar shes
361a1(gzungs 'dus): dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams smos ci dgos// de nas dpal rdo rje sder mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag sngon dran pa'i dus na/ bskal pa 'dum
361a2(gzungs 'dus): phrag grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol du med kyi lus blangs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' ba'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po
361a3(gzungs 'dus): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ phyag gser gi dog can spyi bor bzhag nas 'di skad ces bkal bstsal to// rigs kyi bu mo khyod kyis snying po nga gzungasu bzung la yid la gyis
361a4(gzungs 'dus): shig/ de ltar byas na phyi mi ma 'ongs pa'i dus dran pa na dngol rdo rje sder mo zhes bya bar skye ba blangs nas/ son thaMd la bon pa dang bde ba chen po byed de// rigs pa 'dzin pa nas la/ 
361a5(gzungs 'dus): mthu dang stongs gogs byed do// rika pA rAg gzungs 'di dang phrad pa ni sngon sangs rgyas grangs med pa la mchod pa la phul zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po byas pa yino// sngon smon/ 
361a6(gzungs 'dus): lam bzang po btab pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa yin no// gzungs sngags 'di gzungs su 'dzin cing bzlas brjod byed pa rnams ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam pas
361a7(gzungs 'dus): rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang mu stegs dang phyir rgol ba'i ngagra thaMd las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can du pad ma la brdzus
361a8(gzungs 'dus): te skye bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin de rnams gzungs sngags 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum bu 'don par bya'o// sems 'de ba dang ldan pas spyod pa bag yang su
361b1(gzungs 'dus): gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde chen po rjes shig/ nga dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams la bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces gsol pa dang / bcoM ldan
361b2(gzungs 'dus): 'ad kyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la stong pa// dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sder po khyod// mkha' mnyam bde la rol mdzad khro mo'i gzugs/ chags pa'i mdangs kyis khro ba'i
361b3(gzungs 'dus): sku la 'khril// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mkha' 'gro ma des gzungs 'di'i dam tshig gsungs pa// slob dpon spyi bor bkur zhing dam tshig
361b4(gzungs 'dus): mi nos ka man ngag kun la mi bstan dgon par gsang la sgrub// tshogs nang du mi 'gro// dam tshig nyams rnams dang kha mi sr-i/ mchod pa dang gtor ma nya stong dus bzhir bya/ 
361b5(gzungs 'dus): lta bas thag bcad/ skom sgrub dad pas 'bad la bya// spyod pa dam tshig ldan na dngos grub thob// tshe 'di don med ma byed gdams pa nyams su long // rang sems dbang du tshugs la
361b6(gzungs 'dus): dngos grub don du gnyer// de skad ces smras pa dang bde nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkha' 'gro ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// legaso legs so rig pa 'dzin pa rnams de
361b7(gzungs 'dus): bzhin du spyad par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces spras bka' bstsal nas/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi doge 'dun rnams dga' zhing mgul yid rungs te/ bcom ldan pa
361b8(gzungs 'dus): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// / dpal rdo rje sder mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bar mche na ma ma hAn su
361b9(gzungs 'dus): bod skad du/ 'phags pa snang brgyad ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ 'ang ska ba dag gis thos pa'i dus
362a1(gzungs 'dus): gtsang zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ ba che'i khang banabacom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhugs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
362a2(gzungs 'dus): dpa' thamasadang mi la sogs pas mchod cing bstod pa dang / 'khor mang ba'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thogs pas byang bcom ldan 'das la
362a3(gzungs 'dus): 'di skad ces sal dbang byed pa'i sa bdag dang lnga glu mthub mgus ni bar dang legs su mdzod tshu gsol skad ces gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das
362a4(gzungs 'dus): kyis pa so cig/ bdag gis spyo'o kun da bangan du masu cas so// sa la gnas nas byang ni myur gyim stsal ldan gdags

362a6(gzungs 'dus): ba na ma ltu ba'i ngos bzhi nas yar la rgya mtsha'i 'din mkha' la phog mi 'dren pa ni gnam zhes bya'o// sa nas bya ba ma
362a7(gzungs 'dus): gleng steso sI zhes bya'o// sA zhes bya ba ni gnams gnyis kyi bar na gnas de'i spyi 'gro'i sems can dathugs kyis brdzus kyis bsdus mAM
362a8(gzungs 'dus): dasreg chasayo pa'i mdzub che phrin sde rgyad la bya'o// ro la ring rab lhun po dang / gsang gAr dadun dang rol ba'i margya
362b1(gzungs 'dus): lnga dpag tshad brgyad khri ni stong yod la// dpag tshad bzhi khri mtsho nang na yar la yod do// gser gi ri bdun dang / rol pa'i mtsho bdun ni rim pa bzhin du gnas so// phyi'i gling bzhi dang
