362b3(gzungs 'dus): ba dang bde legs su bachos so// ri rab ldan po dang gser gyi ri btun dang / rol pa'i mtsho bdun la gnas pa'i klu gzhan dang sa bdag kun yon dag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi
362b4(gzungs 'dus): dang bde le gsung ces so// slong byed chen po rnams bcos te/ bzo'i rgyal po byi shi garame dang / mthar gi rgyal po mgar lha yug pa dang / sprin gyi rgyal po 'tsho byed gzhon nu
362b5(gzungs 'dus): la sogs te/ skying byed chen po rnamos yon bdag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su bcos so// lha chen po rnams bcos te/ lha chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / 
362b6(gzungs 'dus): lha chen po 'phags skyes po dang / lha chen po mig maM bzang dang / lha chen po rnam thos sras dang / lha chen po ka ma la kar phyogs skyong bcu dang / lha chen po nan ti kar ti dang / lha chen
362b7(gzungs 'dus): tshangs pa dang / lha chen po brgya byin dang / lha chen po b+hi sU raM tsa dang / lha chen po khyag 'jug dang / lha chen po 'bring gi d+h+r-i sti dang / lha chen po ka ma la kar d+hi dang / lnga chen po sum
362b8(gzungs 'dus): bcu rtsa gsum dang / lha chen po dag ldan dang / lha chen po 'phrul dga' dang / lha chen po gzhon 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha che bo gzugs khas kyi lha bcu bdun dang / lha chen po gzugs med khams kyi
363a1(gzungs 'dus): lA nga ni la sogs te/ lha chen po de rnams yon bdag dang / 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bcos so// yon bdag 'di la phrag dog ma byed cig/ klu chen po rnams
363a2(gzungs 'dus): bcos te/ klu chen po rgyal rigs dang / klu chen po rje rigs dang / klu chen po dmangs rigs dang / klu chen po bram ze'i rigs dang / klu chen po rdol pa'i rigs dang / klu chen pa dam can
363a3(gzungs 'dus): dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dung skyong dang / pad me dang / lha dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po ma dngos
363a4(gzungs 'dus): bu can dang / sbu gu can gyi klu dang / gdengs ka can gyi klu dang / kha brgya mig sdong gIH/ rang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po la dang / klu 'khor rigs bzhi dang // khams gsum srid pa'i klu
363a5(gzungs 'dus): dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs te/ klu'i rgyal ze rnams yon bdag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su bcos so// gnyen chen po
363a6(gzungs 'dus): rnams bcos te/ gnyen mo gnam mthong grub bzhi dang / gnam gnyen g.yu 'brug sngon po la gser gyi ze ba can dang / sa gnyen gser gyi sbal pa la g.yu'i 'brum bu can dang / gangs
363a7(gzungs 'dus): gnyen gangs kyi seng ge dkar mo la g.yu'i ral pa can dang / mchog nyan g.yu'i lcong mo la dung gi 'dab ma can dang / gser gnyan bra ma can dang / brag gnyen gser gyi spre'u gser po
363a8(gzungs 'dus): la dung gi thor tshugs can dang / shing gzhan gzi brjid can dang / gzhan yang gnyen chen po sde bzhi dang / de dag la sogs te/ shing gzhan dang / sa gnyen dang / chu gnyen dang / rjeganyanas
363b1(gzungs 'dus): gzhan chen po de dag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ 'di ba dang bde leg su bcos so// nor bsrungs chen po rnams bcos te/ nor bsrungs chen ngo ma nu pa tra dang / pu rna pa tra dang / ngan pa tra dang / 
363b2(gzungs 'dus): d+ha tsa dang / tsaM bi kun d+ha li dang / kau m-i li dang / mu ka rA tsa dang / dpal ar+ya 'jam pa lha lo sogs te/ nor bsrungs chen po rnams yon 'dagra dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde leg
363b3(gzungs 'dus): su bco so// gze chen po rnams bcos te/ gza' chen po nyi ma dang / gza' chen po zla ba dang / gza' chen po mig dmar dang / gza' chen po log pa dang / gza' chen po phur pa dang
363b4(gzungs 'dus): gza' chen po pa la sangs dang / gza' chen po spen pa dang / gza' chen po sgra gcan 'dzin dang / gza' chen po dub 'jug rings la sogs te// gza' chen po rnams yon 'das
363b5(gzungs 'dus): dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su bcos so// pra dog dang rko long ma byed cig/ oM ma ma shing ma sngo ta ye sAhA// oM mar mer thab thib yal yol ki ma
363b6(gzungs 'dus): na swA hA/ gnam sa thog 'phreng swA hA// oM ma mA kA ra swahA/ oM ma ma me ri ri swatwa/ 'byung ba chen po lnga bcas so// sa 'di ma 'khrug cig/ par kha chen po brgyad bcos te// par kha chen
363b7(gzungs 'dus): po khye nam dang / da lcags dang / kho na sa dang / laM me dang zon rlung dang dzin rlung dang / zin shing dang / gyin ri dang / khams chu la sogs te/ par kha chen po brgyad yon bdag dang 'thun
363b8(gzungs 'dus): par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su bcos so// phra dog ma byed par zhi ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ ha thA ga ta sarba shan cing kur ru me swA hAM/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad
363b9(gzungs 'dus): kyi sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // 'gro ba rigs drug sems can thams cad kyi so so'i sdug bsngal zhe nas bde legs su gyur cig/ bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa 'phags
363'a1(gzungs 'dus): namakha'i snying po dang / bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'phag pa sa'i snying po dang / gzi 'arjid phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang / bde yun sum tshogs pa
363'a2(gzungs 'dus): byams pa byem mgon pa dang / dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'aphags pa sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / mkhyen rabs phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa 'phags 'jam dpal gnan
363'a3(gzungs 'dus): nur gyur pa dang / thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dab dang / mthu bskyobs phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa 'di brgyad kyi bka'/ 
363'a4(gzungs 'dus): yang dag pa'i bden pas/ klu chen po brgyad kyi zhugs gnas te/ gser gi sbal pa chen po rgya mtsho'i nang na zhugs pa'i yan la go bzhi dang // mgo mjug gnyis dang / mdab ma/ 
363'a5(gzungs 'dus): gnyis ste brgyad la gnas pa'i lo bskor bcu gnyis kyi lha chen po rnams/ se so'i phyogs dag tu zhi ba dang bde legs su bcoso// shar stod na gnas pa'i sgeg lnga la/ shing gi sdug
363'a6(gzungs 'dus): dang / me'i stag dang / sa'i stag dang / lcags kyi stag dang / chu'i stag dang / stag de lnga ma 'khrug cig/ ni nga dang bde legs bcos so// shar smad na gnas pa'i yos lnga la/ shing gi yas
363'a7(gzungs 'dus): dang / me'i yis dang / sa'i yos dang / lcags kyi yis dang / chu'i yos dang / yos de lta ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang 'do lagasu bco'o// shAr lnga 'tshams na gnas pa'i 'jug lnga la
363'a8(gzungs 'dus): gi 'brug dang / me'i 'brug dang / sa'i 'brug dang / lcags kyi 'brug dang / chu'i 'brug dang / 'brug de lnga 'khru gcig/ zhi ba dang bde legs bcoso// lho sdod na gnas pa'i sbrul lnga la/ shing gi

363'b9(gzungs 'dus): kyi glang dang / chu'i glang dang / glang de lA ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su bcos so// de ltar lo bskor bcu gnyis kaM sa bdag khyed rnams kyis// yon dag 'di li mar la
364a1(gzungs 'dus): gshed dang bgegs su ma 'bebs cig/ yar la lnga dang dpal bu bskyed cig/ oM ki li mi pe da li oM te pa la sa/ phun sum tshogs pa brgyad kyi sngags 'di rjod
364a2(gzungs 'dus): pa tsam gyis/ dam pa'i chos las bdag dang klu gzhan kun med ches te/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bcas so// byang chub sems dpa' rgya
364a3(gzungs 'dus): kyi mtshan la/ seM rgya'i skad du na/ ha hA hA bod srid du/ stobs chen rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dnga'o// rgyu'i skad du/ la len te drin/ bod ska / bla na med pa rnam
364a4(gzungs 'dus): grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// rgya'i sad / ke'u be de shud tsa/ zad med dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rnam par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ rgya'i mang

364a8(gzungs 'dus): sems dpa' 'odi brgyad kyi bka' ba den pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lo bskor drug bcu'i lha de rnams da // yon bdag 'thun par cig// zhi ba dang bde logs su
364b1(gzungs 'dus): bcas so// namakha' la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar kun bcos te/ shAr phyogs na gnas pa'i lha'i skar ma bdun la/ srin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang nam so dang /

364b3(gzungs 'dus): dang ni/ me zhi nag pa sa ga dang / sa ri dang ni bdun po yang yon bdag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bces so// nub phyogs na na gnas pa'i sngun
364b4(gzungs 'dus): gi skar ma bdun te/ lha 'tshams dang ni snod dang / skyabs dang chu slad dang / ji bzhin gro bzhin dang ni bdun po yang // yon bdag dang 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs

364b7(gzungs 'dus): ngan nam/ 'dur ba'i skar ma ngan nam/ dmag 'dren pa'i skar ma ngan/ so nam dang las ci byed kyang skar tshogs ngan pa la bab pa'i skyon byis sa bdag dang lha 'dre rnams 'khrugs
364b8(gzungs 'dus): par gyur na/ sman rnams pa sna tshogs kyis bcos so// sa bdag dang lha klu kun yon bdag 'di dag 'thun par gyur cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bcom so// 'phags pa rnams kyi ba/ 
365a1(gzungs 'dus): ma bcag cig/ 'phags pa'i bka' bcag par gyur na ni// mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas shing lus kyi yan lag kun kyang tshig pa ban+dan// se yang 'gas par 'gyuro/ 
365a2(gzungs 'dus): a ka ni nI ka ni a b+hi la man d+ha la man tA ye swA hA// / gnams snang brgyad kyi snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis/ snang srid kyis bdag dang l+h+wa gri kun zhi bar gyur cig/ sa bdag
365a3(gzungs 'dus): dang lha klu zhi bas mi thul ba rnams kyi mgo bo ardza ka'i rdog po ltar tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na zhi bar gyur la bstan pa bsrungs cig/ shes rab che ba rnam
365a4(gzungs 'dus): kyi mchog 'phags pa sha ri'i bu dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa me'u 'gal gyi bu dang / sbyangs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po da

365'b9(gzungs 'dus): dang bde legasu gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thogs pa med pa la sogs te/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' tshoms pani lham srin sde brgyang

366a4(gzungs 'dus): rdo rje brtsegs pa'i gur khang / rin chen spungs hU~M khri/ ge sar pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bkra shes pa'i khor mang po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
366a5(gzungs 'dus): chen po stong rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba ni 'di ltar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkra shes bsdud dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis brgyan

366b1(gzungs 'dus): dpa' rnam par gzigs dang // bkri shis kyi byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpag med dang / tshe dpag med dang / sangs rgyas 'od srung dang / bkra shis

366b3(gzungs 'dus): shA ri'i bu dang / rab 'byor la sogs pa bkra shis pa'i 'khor mang po dang / gzhan yang lha deng klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang mi yin pa'i tshogs dang thabs
366b4(gzungs 'dus): gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig/ shu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga laM sa la btsug
366b5(gzungs 'dus): te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bkra shis dang ldan pa'i 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i skabs 'dir/ thog mar bkra shis shing dge ba/ 
366b6(gzungs 'dus): bar du bkra shis shing dge ba/ tha mar bkra shis shing bdeg pa bkra mi shis pa thams cad rab tu zhig pa/ bkra shis pa thams cad rab tu 'duganyis skyon thams cad rab tu sel ba/ legs

372b1(gzungs 'dus): ya // sgra tsam khyon la dus gsum chad de dag/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams pargya mtsho dang // bskal pa brgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag brgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/ 
372b2(gzungs 'dus): rgyal ba kun dbyings yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtog tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad
372b3(gzungs 'dus): kyai/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi bzad la// blo'i stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cing
372b4(gzungs 'dus): gcig gis bdag kyang bar bgyi// gang yang bskal pa dus tha tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyi ni bzhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge gang // de dag skad cig gcig la
372b5(gzungs 'dus): bdag gis lnga// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stong kyi 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnam// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo
372b6(gzungs 'dus): bskor// ma ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha'o skom// mgon po kun du gyi drung du bdag du bdag 'chi'o// kun nas du myur ba'i bsod rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun du sgo ba'i theg pa'i stob
372b7(gzungs 'dus): ngag dang // kun du yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa khyim pa dag gi stobs// kun nas dge bo ri bsod nams sgribs rnams dang // chags pa med par gyur pa'i yis
372b8(gzungs 'dus): stobs// shwe rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed// las kyi spobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rtag rnams kun
372b9(gzungs 'dus): la 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // sems can
373a1(gzungs 'dus): rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par grol// chos rnams brgya mtsha na ni rab tu mthong / byed cing // ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // smon
373a2(gzungs 'dus): lam mtsho rnam par ba du rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas brgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing // bskal pa brgya mtshor mi sku spyad par bgyi// gang yong dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi/ 
373a3(gzungs 'dus): byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams// bzang po spyod pa'i byang chub sangs rgyas rnams// de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par dgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras bgyi thu bo pa// ga
373a4(gzungs 'dus): gi ming ni kun bdu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsgrol/ lus dang ngag dag na yid kyis rnam dag cing // sbyang
373a5(gzungs 'dus): rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag pa// sngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs pa re shig/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpel/ 
373a6(gzungs 'dus): gyis ni smon lam spyad pa'i phyir// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du mi bskyo bar// de'i bya ba mi lus rdzogs par bgyi spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med
373a7(gzungs 'dus): par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang // de dag 'dzul pa tha~Md 'tshal bar bgyi// namakha'i mtha' thug zlar btsornam par// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin to// ji
373a8(gzungs 'dus): las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bdag kyi sprin lam mtha' yang de tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas// rin chen rgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang mi/ 
373b1(gzungs 'dus): mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskul par phul ba bas// gang gis sngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjesu rab mos shing // lan cig tsam yang dad pa skyes
373b2(gzungs 'dus): pas ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang spyod smon la 'di thos btab pas// des de gogs po ngan pa spangs par 'gyur// de ni ngan song thams cad spangs
373b3(gzungs 'dus): pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang de myur shog/ de dag snyed pa rab brnyed bde bar mtsho// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs 'ongs nas// kun du bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag rings
373b4(gzungs 'dus): por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su bya
373b5(gzungs 'dus): bar shog// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub// 'jig rten gsum po dag na 'ong
373b6(gzungs 'dus): mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing du de myur 'gro// song nas sems can phan phyir der dug lte// byang chub sangs rgyas 'kho ro lo tu bskor// bdud rjems sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'atum
373b7(gzungs 'dus): gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon la mo 'di// 'chang 'am ston tam// klog pa yi// de'i rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig/ 'jam dpal ji
373b8(gzungs 'dus): lhar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang // kun du bzang po spyod pa'i sa de yang de bzhin te// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab du bsngo// dus sum gshegs
373b9(gzungs 'dus): pa rgyal po tha~Md kyi/ sngo ba gang la mchog tu sngags pa des// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i di dag kun// bzang po spyod phyir yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// 
374a1(gzungs 'dus): sgrung ba thangs sa dgun byung la te// mngon sum sdu nga mas d+ha mdzung nas// bde bcan gyi zhing de rab du'a'o// der sa ngangan srod lam 'di dag kyang // thams ca
374a2(gzungs 'dus): lus mngon ni 'gyur bar shog/ de dag ma lus bdag gis yong ste snad// 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par brtse// rtul ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang ning dga' ba der// pad mo ngam pa
374a3(gzungs 'dus): shin du mdzes las skyes// snang ba mtha' yas rgyal ba'i mngon gsum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang po bye ba
374a4(gzungs 'dus): phrag rgya yis// blo'i stobs su kyis phyogs bcu rnams su yang // sems can rnams la phan par ma gyur te// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam ston pa yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis tshogs
374a5(gzungs 'dus): pa/ des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dag pa rnams// skad cig tu yang thams cad 'byor par shog// dang yang bzang po spyong bsngos pa yis// bsod nams mthara' yas dam pa gang tho des// 'gro
374a6(gzungs 'dus): sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag rma'i gnas rab thob par shog// smod lam rgyal po 'di dgu pa dag ga tso// mtha' yas 'gro ba kun la phan byed cing // kun du bzang po brgyan
374a7(gzungs 'dus): de'i bzhu grub nas// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus spongs par shog/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ 
374a8(gzungs 'dus): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya badz+ra rA dza pa rin ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongasu bsngo ba// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byan
374b1(gzungs 'dus): 'tshal lo// rgyu dang mi rgyu ba yi 'jig rten sman slad du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang de ltar gyi hA/ rang byung thob dbang po'i dbang thugs rje ldan rnams dang // bdag gi bdag kun
374b2(gzungs 'dus): btud te phyag bgyi'o// chags pa dang ni sa zhe sdang gti mug gis// bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam dar sdig can bsags pa// sdig pa de kun sa
374b3(gzungs 'dus): gshegs par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nas mdzod gang dang // byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams dang // gang yang nyan thos rkyen kyi theg chen dang // 'jig rten
374b4(gzungs 'dus): bsod nams de la yid rang ngo // byang chub snying por thog mar gang sangs rgyas// pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dabA ma 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// sangs rgyas zla med mtha' yas de dag la// chos
374b5(gzungs 'dus): kyi 'khor lo dam pa skor bar bskul// phung po mya ngan 'da' 'da' dbyings su gshegs// par gang zhed mi dang lha'o lA// mgon de dag la 'jig rten dang slad du// bzhugs dang
374b6(gzungs 'dus): sangs rgyas sku don mdzad par gsol// phyag 'tshal ba dang gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang // bskal pa dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang // de bzhin yid rang bsod nams ci ma
374b7(gzungs 'dus): byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gis bsod nams bsags pa 'di rtag tu// byang chub sems ni rjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs dang
374b8(gzungs 'dus): dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cing // mi khom gnod rgya de ni slong bar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus rgyan te// rtag tu skye dran sems ni mi rmongs dang // rab
375a1(gzungs 'dus): nges pha rol phyim brtsom gyur cig/ dbang phyug mi rje chos kyi dbang phyug dang // yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur med shog/ g.yog 'khor mang po thul bar ldan pa
375a2(gzungs 'dus): dang // bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya che dang / gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad rnam dag rdo ldam dang // cho ga yon tan dag la dga' bar shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsngo ba rdzogs s+ho/ 
375a3(gzungs 'dus): gnas tshen khyad par 'phags pa'i dpal dgon zur po che 'dir/ bsags pa chos phyir gtong pon can// dad mos ches pas mchod mtsho gnyes par mdzad// yon
375a4(gzungs 'dus): btsun rgyal mtshan mgon dang // pha bzangs bu mo sman mo 'phrul gyi rigs// oMng jo'i rnams sbrul zas nor cud kyi gte re// dkon mchog mchod cing lA mi gnyis par mdzad// bsngags
375a5(gzungs 'dus): pa don can mdzad pa'i zhe rus can// yon gi bdag mo ang phyug sgron ne ni// bsam pa sgrub cing sngar lgar zas nor 'phel bar byon// de'i sras mo ta ri lus la skyeg pa'i mdangs
375a6(gzungs 'dus): ldan ma// 'dzum dang bzhin legs zas kyi ro mchog 'don mkhas mya/ lha mo'i rnams sbrul sman mdzes bu mo ni/ dkon mchog cing lha mi gnyis dang / yang yum gnyis
375a7(gzungs 'dus): gyi kha nangs rtog yin bzhin mdzod// / yon bdag po mo mtshe mo ma par 'gro/ dpon chen rnam pa gi ser bya ngang pa 'gro// mtshol dang pa babs pa'i dga' bshad la/ 
375a8(gzungs 'dus): mdo mangs 'di re zhengs pa'i byin brlabs gyis// yon mchod 'khor bcas dga' ldan gnasu 'byal bar shog// mdo mangs 'di la mdo sna rgya dang nye gnyi shu rtsa suM bcu zhag so// bkra shis pa byon
xa1(gzungs 'dus): yos dang sa'i yos dang lcags kyi yos dang / chu'i yos dang / yos de lnga ma 'khru/ cig/ zhe ma dang bde legasu bcos so// shar lho 'tshams na gnas shrIng gi 'brug dang / me'i
xa2(gzungs 'dus): 'brug da / sa'i 'brug dang / lcags kyi 'brag dang / chu'i 'brug dang / 'brug de ldu ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bcos so// lho stong na gnas pa'i sbrul lnga la/ shing gi sbrul dang / me'i sgra
xa3(gzungs 'dus): dang sa'i sbrul dang / lpags kyi sbrul dang / rgyu'i sbrul dang / sbrul de lnga mA 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang dad legasu bcos so// lho smad na gnas pa'i rta lnga la/ shing gi rti dngape / me'i rtsad po sa'i rta dang lA
xa4(gzungs 'dus): kyi rta dang / chu'i rta dang rta de lA ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu cos so// lho nub 'tshams na gnas pa'i lug lnga la/ shing gi lug dang / me'i lug dang / sa'i lug dang / lcags kyi
xa5(gzungs 'dus): lug dang / chu'i lug dang / lug de lnga ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde legasu bac+doMs so// nu ba stod// gnas pa'i spre'u wA la/ shing gi spre'u dang / me'i spre'u dang / sa'i spre'u dang / lcags kyi spre'u dang / chu'i snro'u
xa6(gzungs 'dus): dang / spre'u de lnga ma 'khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde gsu bcos so// nub skad na gnas pa'i bye lnga la shing gi byA dang / ma'i bya dang / sa'i bye dang / lcags kyi byA dang / chu'i bya dang / bya de lde ma 'khrug cig/ 
xa7(gzungs 'dus): dang bdi liM gsu btsas so// nub byang 'tshams na gnas pa'i khyi ldi la/ shing gi khyed po me'i dang / sa ri khyi dang / lcags kyi khyid po/ chul byaM dang / khyed lnga ma la khrug cig/ zhi ba dang bde lagasu bcos
